Summary Heading: Perfect family place to stay for Disneyland
Summary: The only hard part was you had to make pool reservations. Your hotel is perfect for families. Bunk beds for the kids and suites for more quiet time after a long day at Disneyland. Very clean and services for food, snacks, coffee in the lobby. And close to park entrance. Free breakfast would be nice!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great service, awesome location, all add to the magic experience
Summary: Our second time here.  The grounds and the staff did not disappoint.  The rooms are clean.   The common areas are clean.  The reservation requirement of the pool prevents overcrowding.  Food at the bistro does the job.  Valet is quick.  Sure, walking back from the park in the middle of the day is a drag but after all it’s only a 5-10 minute walk.  The level of service is what you’d expect from a JW Marriott or higher tier hotel.  We stayed at three different hotels on this road trip (another one being a bonvoy autograph property and another a self-proclaimed four star French chain) and this one - a courtyard- surprisingly has the best service! Will be back. Thank you for the wonderful time.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to review our hotel, we appreciate it very much!

Summary Heading: Great property. Staff not so much.
Summary: Room was great and very spacious. Front Desk Agent said the Waterpark is heated - it is in fact NOT. Valet Manager argued with me about charges while my exhausted family waited. He was finally proven wrong and never even bothered to apologize! Really frustrating to have wasted our time. We’ll try the Howard Johnson Waterpark hotel across the street next time.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great family experience, close enough for a walk
Summary: The hotel is 0.5 miles from the Disneyland security gates. It was an easy walk to and from the park each day. The hotel is definitely geared well for families with children - our kids loved the bunk beds, and us parents liked that there was a bathtub AND a walk-in shower in the bathroom - one parent could be getting the kids through the bathtub while the other parent was in a different room using the bathroom shower.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice stay for a family Disneyland visit
Summary: Good service. Loved our room layout with the 2-bedroom and living room setup. The convenience of the cafe/bistro and market were helpful after long days at the parks. And the walkability to Disneyland was great!   Some annoyances: several of the electrical outlets wouldn’t hold so I couldn’t plug in our baby monitors or sound machines in several parts of the rooms. And probably the worst are the multiple blinking lights in the bedrooms. Please please find a way to conceal the lights. Very disturbing for light sleepers. Finally, if you could add some magnets to help close the curtains fully it would help with minimizing light peeking through during nap time and early mornings.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff was incredible and accommodating. Rooms were comfortable and spacious. Proximity to the parks made the trip so much better, as we were able to easily recharge mid-day back in our room. Weather didn't cooperate much, so we spent limited time at the pool, but kids loved the water park.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice hotel, friendly people, would stay there again. 5 min walk to the park.  Water park was really fun for the kids! Room service was great. Kids loved the Disney store inside of the hotel. Had breakfast every day at the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear quadrunner1983, Thank you so much for your wonderful review—we’re so glad you enjoyed many of the perks of staying at Courtyard Anaheim. Having hot breakfast choices from our Bistro definitely helps to start your day and that quick walk to Disneyland can’t be beat. It’s fantastic to know your kids enjoyed the water park and shopping on our main level. We hope to see you again soon. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great customer service and online App. Clean and modern. Easy access to water park. Close to Downtown Disnayland. The Bistro food and coffee was pretty good and quick. I will definitely go back again.
Manager Response: Dear Shillla, We are passing along your compliments to our staff, thank you for mentioning our customer service. You really hit the key points for staying with us at Courtyard, clean, modern, water park, Bistro and a quick walk to Disneyland! Thank you for your review and we hope to see you again soon. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Booked a week at the Marriott Courtyard Theme Park Entrance and was very happy with the choice. The kids were 10 and 12 and the hotel bunk beds were perfect for them, we even had a queen bed each to ourselves. The walk to the theme parks was only 5-7 minutes and we were close enough to pop back for lunch or to change clothes. Uber from the airport was ~$20 each way and to Universal Studios Hollywood was ~$65.
Manager Response: Dear ironliam,  Thank you for sharing your experience staying at our property. We are overjoyed that you found Courtyard to be such a great fit for your family. We also appreciate you sharing your rideshare rates, as that will help other guests in their planning.  We hope to see you again soon!  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We loved staying here with access to a free water park and love the spacious room with 2 showers. The only downfall was how expensive parking was and our car didn’t even get parked into the garage. Our car was next to Mimi’s parking and I didn’t like that because we could have just parked it ourselves!
Manager Response: Dear Brittany,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We are happy that you enjoyed the property. We understand that you expected to be parked in the garage, and that is usually the case, unless the number of guests with cars exceeds the usual. We will pass along your concerns.  We hope to welcome you again in the future.  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: great experience.  would definitely stay here again
Summary: great location, and much nicer than I expected.  It is a short walk to the main entrance to the parks.  This hotel is very well maintained, especially considering its proximity to the parks and the amount of traffic that I suspect flows through here.
Manager Response: Dear MOBannion,  Thank you for your review. We pride ourselves on exceeding guest expectations, and are happy that was apparent during your visit.   We look forward to welcoming you back!  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Amazing, great staff, great, clean room, the pool is fun, and the restaurant is one of the best ever with great pricing. Definitely recommend for families or anyone going to Disneyland, as it is a two minute walk to the park. Very satisfied!!
Manager Response: Dear spencer6464,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We are so happy you were able to experience our many amenities, and especially that you had a chance to dine at the Bistro. We will be passing along your compliments to our Bistro staff.  We hope to welcome you in the near future!  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: After-sales service is poor, information feedback is slow.
Summary: I lost a white snowcoat in the hotel. I called the information desk. But until today, I still haven't received any information. Even if you find it or not, the hotel should let me know.I will keep complaining until I get feedback.
Manager Response: Dear 2744382060, Thank you for choosing our hotel and for posting a review. I apologize that you are not satisfied with our Lost and Found system. Please call us at 714-254-1442 and leave a message for our Lost and Found team or complete your contact infomration using the Lost and Found page on our website and we will quickly confirm if we have your lost item.

Summary: I loved the valet service even though I thought that $35 a day is a bit steep.  I did love that we were helped up to our room with luggage service.   My husband got ill with a stomach bug and I went down to the market to buy some Gatorade, and when I went to pay for it, I engaged in conversation with the hotel representative. She was very kind and said that the Gatorade would be complimentary. She wished my husband well. He did get better after a day!  The room was AMAZING!! The bunk beds were a pleasant surprise and very comfortable. The two showers were helpful when getting ready to get out to Disneyland!  We have stayed at the Disneyland Hotel in the past, and we have to say that we liked the Marriot better!
Manager Response: Dear Nielson4,   First off, we are so glad that your husband recovered and was able to enjoy the rest of your vacation.   Secondly, thank you for taking the time to recognize our staff member. Our staff is some of the best around, and they really work to make sure our guests are taken care of.  We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and are looking forward to you visiting again in the future.  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great place to stay -- 10 minute walk to the Park.  Waterpark is great for the kids and the room set up with 2 queens and the bunkbeds is family friendly.  Bathroom has separate shower and tub so another great family feature!
Manager Response: Dear Travelfun252023,   We are so pleased that you enjoyed our hotel. We were built with families in mind, so we are glad that shines through to our guests. We hope to welcome you back int he future.   Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: I had such an amazing experience here. Aside from the room being perfect for my family of 6, the staff was impeccable. I’m big on customer service and this property has it. I’m not sure who the girls name at the front desk was the night before I checked out but she was so sweet! And a big thank you to Travis and Allen for taking care of us with our bags and valet. I usually stay down the street at another Marriott for the last couple years, but this experience has changed that. This is going to be our go to spot moving forward for all our Disney trips!
Manager Response: Dear anajmayfieldxo,  We are thrilled to know our staff and customer service made your visit! Travis and Allen will also be happy to hear that you mentioned them by name. We’re so glad your family of 6 feels right at home here at Courtyard. We look forward to seeing you again soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We were greeted by friendly staff who were helpful and accommodating.  Loved having the option to eat breakfast right in the hotel. It definitely saved us time in the morning.  My kids loved the pool area.  Our room was clean and spacious. The location was great. When we were tired at the end of the day it was a short walk from Disney, which was immensely helpful for tired kids and parents.  I have stayed at other hotels for our past trips and the courtyard Marriott has been my favorite. We will definitely be returning to this hotel for our future trips!
Manager Response: Dear haleypL1499JT, We’re so pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us. Being clean and offering a spacious, relaxing place to unwind is exactly what we aim for. The short walk is an added bonus and we’re so happy you found your new Disneyland home away from home! We hope to see you again soon. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The hotel staff was very helpful, and friendly. I stayed at plenty good neighbor hotels by Disneyland, and this is hands down the best. From the location, to excellent service this hotel provided, I can’t imagine staying anywhere else.
Manager Response: Dear hectorzamora1, We’re delighted to hear you say our hotel is the best good neighbor hotel, hands down! To know that our locations and amenities fit your needs makes us smile.  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at Courtyard Anaheim and we’ll see you again soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The room was great with an excellent view of Disneylands fireworks. The staff are very friendly and accommodating. Always love staying here during Disneyland trips! Large room for 6, clean and comfortable
Manager Response: Dear pwkime,  Thank you for shouting out to our staff who work so hard to maintain our hotel and provide the best service possible. We love welcoming back guests for return stays and so grateful to have you as a repeat guest. It’s wonderful to view the Disneyland fireworks from multiple locations on property after a long day. We’ll see you again soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Poor place close to Disney Gate
Summary: The phone didn't work. Called they knew they couldn't hear me, but I could hear them.   They said they would call back, but didn't.  The refrigerator froze by orange juice and all my orange.  The staff who tended to our room on the day before we left did not leave any cups for morning coffee. Worst stay we've had at a Marriotts.
Manager Response: Dear KeenanChris, Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your experience while staying with us. Providing the highest level of hospitality is our number one priority and I sincerely apologize for failing to meet your expectations. I apologize the phone and refrigerator in your room were not functioning properly and we did not properly replenish your in-room amenities while servicing your room.  We try to promptly address all amenity failures as soon as we are alerted so I do apolgize these repairs were not properly completed in a timely manner.   We value your feedback and hope to welcome you again in the future.

Summary: My family and I just stayed here and we absolutely loved it! The rooms are so nice, clean and spacious. We love the bunk beds and 2 queen beds for our family. The room had 2 showers which was very nice to have when getting ready! The water park was so much fun and my kids loved the water slides and playground area. They have a bistro you can order food from and we had breakfast and dinner there both were delicious. It is across the street from the Disneyland Resort so the walk is nice and easy! We can not wait to stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear K5361XRericaw, Thank you so much for your wonderful review—a 10/10 is our ultimate goal. We’re so glad you had ample space in the rooms and got to explore the water park. We agree, the Bistro food onsite is perfect for time away from theme park food. And of course, Disneyland is just a short walk away. We hope to see you again soon. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great location, awesome customer service, and wonderful hotel.
Summary: This location is a wonderfully located 10 minutes outside Disneyland gate. If you have a large party of more than 4 I highly recommend this hotel. Rooms are clean and spacious, water park was fun for all on off Disneyland days.   We often walk back to our rooms through the day as we break up our Disney day. The convenient location makes it easy.   My customers are in the hospitality industry, I must say that this hotel has incredible customer service. That’s a compliment to the culture and team there that makes it part of the work culture. We had two situations where the employees went out of the way. The first was when my niece forgot her retainer at the restaurant and the staff dug through the trash and found it. The second was when she left her sunglasses at the pool when it
Manager Response: Dear Charles H, Thank you so much for your positive feedback! Our team really does whatever it takes to meet the needs of our guests, including the occasional trash dig. We know how important those small, misplaced items can be! We loved hosting you and we think you should give your niece another chance ;). Thank you for all your kind words regarding our location, water park, cleanliness and more. We hope you’ll come visit us again soon.  Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Outstanding stay, right next to Disneyland!
Summary: Incredibly clean rooms, super close to Disneyland! They also let us check in at 11 am (5 hours early) at no additional cost! The layout of the room was great: the kids had a separate sleeping area (bunk bed and pack and play that the hotel provided)! I honestly can’t wait to stay here again for our next Disney visit! Also: incredible view of the fireworks from our room!
Manager Response: Dear Journey732701, We’re so happy to hear you had a great experience at Courtyard Anaheim. Early check in is a perk we love to offer when rooms are available. We’re glad you got to check in and get settled into our rooms with all the extra touches including bunk beds and two showers.  Thank you for your review, and we hope to see you again soon. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great for families, Disney location perfect
Summary: It's a great place for families and the staff are always happy to help in anyway. The onsite laundry was a God send, and the meals at the Bistro are well priced and very tasty. It's so close to Disneyland, so you can easily use it as a base and come and go through the day as you need. The Bistro can also package up meals for you to take into the parks, which is very handy.
Manager Response: Dear dgillie02, Thank you for sharing your kind words with us. We are glad to hear that the Bistro fit your needs for meals here and to-go. We are happy to serve as your home base anytime you are visiting Disneyland Resort or the Anaheim area. Thank you for mentioning the helpful nature of our team, it means so much to us. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Happiest Place on Earth to Stay!
Summary: Water Park is awesome. Front desk crew are super friendly. Highly recommend staying here…large rooms with bunkbeds, bathtub and separate shower. Fantastic space for a family. Bistro has good food. Took our breakfast burrito into park, tasted great even a little cold. Yummy Starbucks coffee on site
Manager Response: Dear jodysteliga, We’re delighted to hear about your recent stay and interactions with our front desk staff. The large rooms were designed with families in mind and we’re happy that worked well for your stay. Having the Bistro and Starbucks on location is a game changer for those early mornings.  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at Courtyard Anaheim.  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: The right hotel for my family.
Summary: The hotel is located in walking distance to the Disneyland theme parks and close to the interstate. The staff were all nice and helpful. The room we stayed in was well designed and very spacious and clean.
Manager Response: Dear wonbeomcho, Thank you for pointing out our well designed rooms. We think they’re the perfect option for families with 2 queens, bunk beds and 2 showers. Your compliments to our staff will definitely be passed along. We look forward to hosting you again here at Courtyard. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Short walk to the park. Pool area was awesome for the kids! Room very spacious and clean. We had 3 adults and 2 kids and never felt cramped. Cute gift shop. Would for sure stay here again. Decent food options.
Manager Response: Dear susied881,  We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and the time at our water park. Even with 3 adults and 2 kids, it makes us so happy to know you never felt cramped. We certainly hope you’ll choose to stay with us again.  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This was probably the best hotel designed for families we have stayed in, especially if you have more than 2 kids.  Our kids loved the bunk beds (in all rooms), and we all enjoyed the extra space.   Even the most basic room we stayed in was really well laid out with a corner table and dining bench to easily fit 3.  The double vanities with a separate shower and additional tub/shower combo came in handy to get everyone ready faster.  The hotel is a relatively short walk to the main Disneyland gates (7 minutes?) with restaurant stops along the way like McDonald's, IHOP, Panera and Denny's. The Bistro in the hotel was really convenient for any meal of the day as well, including Starbucks coffee drinks.  We didn't get a chance to try the water park because the weather was a little
Manager Response: Dear deanna559, We loved reading your review today. We are so glad you noticed all the effort that went into building this hotel with families in mind with bunk beds, extra space, seating area and additional showers combine to make vacations that much easier. We’re glad you enjoyed the Bistro and nearby dining options. While our water park is heated, we know these lower temperatures have made the choice harder. We sure hope you’ll come back to experience the water slides (adults love them too!) during your next visit to Anaheim. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: From the very start our stay was wonderful.  To start the stay we were upgraded to a room with a view of Disneyland nightly fireworks. Next was Ron, bellhop, who was very friendly and very hopefully.  The Bistro was a great place to grab a bite and stay dry.
Manager Response: Dear masxxxxxxx, Thank you so much for your wonderful review—we are so happy we could provide that upgrade for your girls weekend at Disneyland. The fireworks view is such a nice touch to end the night. We’ll make sure Ron hears about your review as well, thanks for mentioning him and the bellhop team. We hope to see you again soon. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great hotel for business for family travel.
Summary: thank you to your staff for making our 2 day meeting and booking rooms an easy process. the rooms were more space than we needed and the food was great!! the service provided from Nancy preparing our food orders was spot on, she was the sweetest! give Nancy a Raise! and a special thank you to Carrie for taking such great care of our booking a block of rooms, parking and the meeting room. all of our staff were very pleased. we appreciate all of what you did for us at Team Vega! p.s.. thank you to your Valet staff as well, they were very gracious as we came and went!
Manager Response: Dear corim322, Thank you for posting your positive review in various places so others can benefit from your feedback. We are so glad your meeting space and guest rooms worked out well for your group. Carrie and Nancy are the best of the best—we’re glad you agree and will be passing along your compliments. Team Vega is welcome back anytime!  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great stay and perfect location to the parks. Valet guys are super friendly and helpful. Beds were comfortable we booked a 1 bedroom suite which was perfect with kids as there is bunks in the lounge area. Two shower areas would be good but one wasn’t working properly so we stuck to one. (Didn’t call to report as wasn’t a huge deal). The Starbucks downstairs was great as well although it seemed the coffee machine was not working more than it was but wasn’t a huge issue. What really makes this hotel is the location and friendly staff, it would be nice if the front desk did acknowledge my Marriott status don’t need to give any benefits but first time I’ve stayed at a Marriott and it wasn’t acknowledged. The few issues weren’t a deal breaker for us and would definitely return.
Manager Response: Dear nathanb759,  Thank you for your detailed review. It’s wonderful to hear that what really makes this hotel is the location and friendly staff. We are so happy that you enjoyed the layout of your suite with bunk beds in a separate area. We appreciate you mentioning those details that need attention like the second shower and will certainly look into that. We look forward to the next time! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Would thoroughly recommend Courtyard Marriott at Anaheim.
Summary: Spacious and comfortable room in a great locations - just 10 mins walk to DisneyLand entrance. Staff were very friendly and helpful.  Facilities and restaurant great for families.  Would thoroughly recommend Courtyard Marriott at Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear darrenbG9737SG, It’s great to hear you recommend Courtyard Anaheim! We are passing along your compliments to our staff and glad to know the walk to Disneyland was short and easy. We hope to see you again! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great hotel in a great location!
Summary: Great location, excellent staff.  We were greeted promptly when we arrived at the hotel and the check in process was quick and courteous.  We stopped in for a cup of coffee at the small cafe in the lobby each morning as we headed out the door to Disney and were impressed by the friendliness of the patient and efficient staff.  The rooms were clean and comfortable, providing us with a place to colapse after long Disney days.  We plan to make the Courtyard our go to hotel when we visit Disney!
Manager Response: Dear Lowell1644, We are thrilled that you found our staff welcoming and attentive. Having that cup of coffee to go makes the morning hours that much easier. We’re so glad to hear Courtyard is now your go-to hotel and is the perfect place to unwind after long Disney days. See you again real soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Our family had a wonderful stay. The staff were super friendly and the location was great. The room accommodated all 5 of us comfortably. The bunk beds were a hit with the kids and the 2 showers in our room were extremely convenient. We would recommend The Courtyard to anyone but especially families of 4 or more.
Manager Response: Dear byronta,  We loved reading your review! We’re so happy to hear that our staff made your stay that much better. It’s great to know you recommend Courtyard for larger families and we hope to welcome you back for your next Disneyland getaway! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Excellent! The room was fantastic and I loved the family room as it has 2 showers. The water slide and hot tub was fantastic for the kids and I also loved it too. Definitely recommend this hotel as walking distance to Disneyland, very clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear 453tanyat,  We are so glad to hear that your Disneyland trip was a success! It sounds like everyone loved the hot tub and water park, along with the clean rooms and close distance to Disneyland. We hope to see you back at Courtyard Anaheim very soon. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We love this hotel! Kind staff... clean rooms... perfect location. Room has two showers which helps when you have a full room of people! Slept 6 comfortably and a quick easy walk to Disneyland! It's the only place we stay now when we go!
Manager Response: Dear jasonandjen88, We’re glad you chose Courtyard Anaheim and found how easily it fits a group of 6 in our standard rooms. The walk to Disneyland helps as well–quick and easy! We’re so glad you found your go-to hotel for your next Disneyland vacation. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Thank you for the spacious room with the beautiful view of the Theme Park! Valet parking was efficient and valets were very accommodating to our needs. Staff members at check-in and check-out were courteous and helpful and made it all so pleasant! Many thanks for our short getaway!
Manager Response: Dear debandfrank2023, Thank you for your review! It’s wonderful to know the spacious room and theme park view made your stay extra special. We will certainly let our staff know that you appreciated their efforts at the valet and check in. We’re glad you chose Courtyard Anaheim for your vacation and hope you’ll stay with us again soon. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: It was wonderful.  Great staff, very clean, great food in the lobby with good prices!   We stayed 6 days for our family vacation to Disneyland.  It was still decorated for Christmas which was great for our trip.
Manager Response: Dear pamcam55, We always enjoy hearing that our guests enjoyed the property. We were built with families in mind so our rooms, and double showers are a guest favorite. We’re glad you got to see the last bit of our holiday decor as well. We hope you’ll stay with us again when you return to Anaheim! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Very inviting. All associates were very friendly and accommodating. Have a very spacious entry, easy to check in. It was great having a snack shop open 24 hours and Starbuck area opening at 6:30am within the hotel. Having a Mimi's restaurant right out the front door was a plus. Looking forward to returning.
Manager Response: Dear smceliceo, We’re delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay and felt welcomed by all our staff. Thank you for mentioning the hours of our snack shop and Starbucks, as we know guests are coming and going at all hours, we always want them to find a quick bite to eat when needed. We are so glad you chose Courtyard and look forward to welcoming you back soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This hotel is great. It’s clean, close to Disneyland, and very comfortable. It has a bar and plenty of seating areas, inside and out, to visit with friends after a long day at the park. It has a restaurant and a very nice sundry and convenience / tourist store in the lobby. Love the rooms with their bunk beds and the bathrooms with the separate toilet and shower on one side and bathtub on the other. Rooms can accommodate big families. Really like this feature.
Manager Response: Dear lorenv662, Thank you for your 5-Star review! It’s always wonderful to hear when guests enjoy their stay at our property. You hit on many of the important things to us and what makes a great stay: clean, comfortable and close to Disneyland. We’re glad you also enjoyed the extra space in the rooms and lobby area to relax. We hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great place to stay would do it again love a nice get it was my wife’s 45th birthday. Wish I could Disneyland and it was really close to nice to be there with a fabulous time almost want to stay if you had to get back to my kids.
Manager Response: Dear M6164SZryanc, It’s our pleasure to have hosted you and your wife on her 45th birthday. We are so happy that you enjoyed all our hotel has to offer. We look forward to the next time you return to Disneyland! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Second stay and it was a good as the first 5 yrs ago.  Epic location close to the gates of Disney.  Massive rooms which are really well appointed.  The pool is perfect after a day in the park.  Staff really helpful. We had takeaway from the restaurant one night and it was perfect!  A bit more expensive than it’s neighbours but 100% worth it.
Manager Response: Dear bearandrose, Thank you so much for your wonderful review—it’s always a treat to see returning guests here at Courtyard. We’re so glad you enjoyed your second stay and found the rooms to be well appointed. We love having the water park and onsite dining at the Bistro too. We hope your next trip will be just as amazing.  Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Too pricey and declining customer service for an old hotel!!
Summary: The check-in experience was awful. Being a gold member and paying $600 per night, I requested water bottles since I have received water bottles here from a manager before. I was rudely and mockingly told by the front desk agents that we never provide that to anyone..you need to buy it. They didn't care.....  Also, having stayed here multiple times over the years, I can tell that the hotel is falling apart. The carpet/rugs in the common area were dirty. The beds in the room are not comfortable as they used to be. However, the pricing has gone up significantly without any benefit for the customers. If I am paying this high a price and could not even get a water bottle, for our next visits to Disneyland we will be moving to JW Marriott near the main entrance and atleast get the
Manager Response: Dear muthukumarappanr2016, As we pride ourselves on delivering a memorable hotel experience during your travels, we have unfortunately fallen short of our goal during your recent stay. Please accept my sincere apology for not meeting your expectations concerning our amenities and value. I know how satisfying it is when you find the perfect hotel for your individual needs; one that offers all the services and amenities you want and none of the ones you don't. The Marriott Bonvoy program has an establishded welcome amenity program in place for each brand based on your Elite status and the Courtyard brand does not provide complimentary water bottles upon arrival to any guest.  I apologize that we were not the right hotel for you but hope you will consider other Marriott hotels for your future travel needs. Marriott has 30 hotel brands in its collection which range from luxury hotels such as the Ritz Carlton to economy hotels such as the Fairfield Inn - I hope you will find the perfect Marriott hotel for your future travel needs.

Summary: Very comfortable and clean room, with two queen beds and a bunk bed plus two showers! The hotel is easily walkable to the park entrance - about 1-2 blocks. All the staff were super friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear H8387CNerikap, Thank you so much for your positive review! We are pleased you enjoyed our spacious rooms and convenient location. We hope to see you real soon for another stay at Courtyard Anaheim! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Wonderful experience with my family.  Rooms are spacious, very clean, and the staff is extremely kind and professional. The restaurant could be better, but for a quick snack is enough.  The water park is icing on the cake and my kids loved it. You can walk a short distance to Disney parks, and this makes this property very convenient.
Manager Response: Dear anasK395HR  Thank you for your 5-Star review!  It’s always wonderful to hear when our guests enjoy the property. We are built with families in mind, so we can’t help but smile when families have such positive feedback.  We hope to see you again soon.   Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Amazing hotel , valet was wonderful andree and Mack were wonderful
Summary: Great experience , staff were wonderful . Rooms are clean . Valet staff at the front made feel extremely welcome  Andree r and Mack p were truly amazing and made me and my wife feel extremely welcome . Would definitely recommend this hotel .  Great place for families , close to the park
Manager Response: Dear theBradshaw It’s our pleasure to provide the best service and we love hearing that our staff delivered. We will be sharing this review with them.  We look forward to the next time! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel, could have probably found something less expensive that would have been fine
Summary: We chose this hotel because we weren't sure how long we would be in the parks each day, turns out our kids aged 6 and 8 at the time could handle full days so we spent very little time at the hotel. We only used the waterpark on the day we arrived, it was very nice but the breeze in April was quite cold for being wet outside. The beds were very comfortable and the kids loved the bunk beds. The little breakfast table was a nice addition. We enjoyed being able to grab Starbucks in the mornings and there is a McDonald's on the way to the parks for a quick breakfast. The walk to the gates was about 10 minutes which doesn't seem too bad but after a few days with very sore feet and 12+ hour days it was definitely a bit much. In the future we will probably try to save some money on
Manager Response: Dear BCluna19, Thank you so much for your wonderful review—we’re so glad to hear your kids enjoyed the water park and bunk beds that come in each room. We love hosting families for their Disneyland vacations and are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you again next time you visit Anaheim. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: The best place to stay with a family for visiting Disney!
Summary: We absolutely loved our stay at the Courtyard by Marriott. The location was perfect for walking to Disney each day. Clean beautiful rooms and conveniences within the hotel. The kids loved their water park! We will be staying here again next time we visit Disney theme parks! We had a party of 12 in our family and this is the place to stay!
Manager Response: Dear CertifiedAutoBro2022,  It’s our pleasure to provide the best experience for our guests during their Disneyland vacation. We are pleased you were able to take time to enjoy the amenities and location, including Surfside Waterpark.   We are glad that our hotel was a perfect fit for your family and look forward to welcoming you back.   We look forward to the next time!  Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Well decorated for Christmas. Staff was helpful. Certainly convenient to Disneyland. Room well designed - especially if you are old and use an electric scooter. The only negatives were (1) I didn’t find the breakfast choices that appetizing, and (2) I caught a severe cold at Disneyland. 😀 That was certainly not the hotel's fault. Overall, I’d recommend it highly.
Manager Response: Dear U89646CPjohnh,  Thank you for your review! Our Bistro menu is updated often, and hope something will catch your eye next time.   We hope you are feeling better!  We’re certainly glad you chose Courtyard Anaheim for your vacation.  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: So clean and welcoming! Staff was excellent! The room was comfortable and inviting. Having a Starbucks on property was convenient also! We would most definitely return and recommend this property to any friend or family going to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear  D3226Jelizabethv,  Thank you for your 5-Star review!   It’s always wonderful to hear when guests enjoy their stay at our property.  We hope to see you, and your friends and family, again soon.   Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Room was very spacious and very clean. There were to queen beds and a set of twin bunk beds. There were also a tub and separate shower so 2 people could shower at once. Bistro downstairs had very good food. There is a convenience store in the the lobby with all the basics. Very short walk to Disney from here.
Manager Response: Dear Pabloo901,  We always enjoy hearing that our guests enjoyed the property. We were built with families in mind so our rooms, and double showers are a guest favorite.   We hope you’ll stay with us again when you return to Anaheim!  Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: It very well be the most expensive Courtyard in the world but it is worth every penny. The room configuration is perfect for families and the bed was awesome. Good breakfast in the morning and only a few minutes walk from the gate. We enjoyed the water park on our third day, a great respite from Disney. Staff were all friendly and knowledgeable. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Hopefullylost,  We’re delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay and felt the resort was a great value for the rate offered.   We hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This was our first trip to Disneyland…myself, my DIL and two young granddaughters. We are Disneyworld vets and always stay in a Disney resort there, so I was very unsure of how I’d feel about being offsite for the first time. We chose this hotel because it offered enough bedding so no one had to share, and the proximity to the parks.   This hotel did not disappoint! Great services, with the option to eat and pick up Starbucks before leaving for the park. If you’ve ever tried to get Starbucks at the park, you know what a headache that is! The public areas were beautifully decorated for the holidays, and it smells wonderful! All the staff were very friendly and helpful. Rooms were clean and spacious, lots of room for everyone to spread out. Only complaint would be the water
Manager Response: Dear Jane, It’s our pleasure to provide the best experience for our guests. We are so happy that you enjoyed all our hotel has to offer. We wanted to let you know that the water pressure in the sinks has been addressed and you should see a noticeable difference during your next stay. We look forward to the next time! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: 4 adults stayed in one room on the 3rd floor at the back of the building - very quiet with no road noise.  Room size was perfect - 1 x queen bed and 2 bunk beds. Bathroom had 2 showers which was perfect. Great food option in the lobby and many restaurants nearby. Only 10 minutes walk to Disneyland.  We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Wombat2002, Thank you so much for your wonderful review—it’s always nice to hear your room was spacious and quiet. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay at Courtyard Anaheim and the quick walk to Disneyland. We hope you’ll choose to stay here again when you are back in the area.  Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Perfect place for families going to Disneyland
Summary: This was our second time staying at Courtyard Theme Park Entrance - the first time was great, but this time was WONDERFUL. There are too many things to list in appreciation - bathrooms have a shower and separate tub/shower combo (so when trying to get tired kids to bed, can manage both at once), the waterpark, the onsite store and cafe. It's a quick walk down to the street to get to the main entrance. All of this would be great on its own, but what makes it truly wonderful is the service. Everyone - every single person we spoke with, from front desk to valet - couldn't have been kinder, more helpful, just all-around amazing. Special thanks in particular to Jeff at the front desk, who really went above and beyond to help make our stay perfect. Thank you Jeff!!
Manager Response: Dear KateL1904, We love hearing from our guests who return to us again and again. We agree, while the amenities are unique with bunk beds, two showers and more—it truly is our staff who makes the difference. We will definitely let Jeff know how much he is appreciated by you and our entire team. Thank you and we hope to see you again very soon. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great family spot for Disneyland visitors
Summary: Great hotel for families visiting Disneyland, between 5-10min walk depending your pace with little ones. Close enough to do an afternoon break and head back over for evening parade etc. McDonalds & Panera so close was a godsend. We had the bunk beds room, which was just far enough away to feel like you have a mini apartment (though no door). The extra shower was great to get us all out the door.   Mini mart downstairs handy, Starbucks/easy breakfast downstairs was perfect for us. There is a microwave and keurig in room- would prefer a kettle but I suspect that’s a cultural thing. The hotel was decorated really nicely for Christmas, and all of the staff very helpful and friendly.   Remember to book in for the pool if you would like to visit- kids (9&7) enjoyed it.   The hotel
Manager Response: Dear RobCat-reviews, Thank you for your 5-Star review! We love welcoming guests for longer holidays and glad you were able to use many of our on site services like the waterpark, Bistro and more. It’s always wonderful to hear from guests who write detailed reviews so others also know what to expect.  We hope to see you again when you come back to the States. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We stayed here with our 4 kids and can’t say enough great things! The hotel was decorated beautifully for the holidays and the staff was very welcoming and hospitable. If you are looking for a family friendly hotel to stay at while visiting the parks, look no further. The rooms were spacious, clean, and had 2 showers which was perfect for our family of 6! The hotel cafe was convenient for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. We will stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Catkins20, Thank you for your kind words about our staff and holiday decor. It’s wonderful to offer comfortable accommodations in one space for a family with 4 kids. Not many places do and we are so happy you chose Courtyard! We’re glad our commitment to cleanliness and hospitality was reflected in your visit. We look forward to the next time! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Amazing room and staff, definitely coming back
Summary: Amazing room and staff, definitely coming back. The proximity yo Disney could not have been more convenient, saved money, cheaper parking and shorter walk.  Some rooms have bunkbeds, great fun for the kids
Manager Response: Dear edbender, We’re delighted to hear about your recent stay and glad you enjoyed the bunk beds that come in every standard room. It is truly a delight to know you saved time and money as a guest of  Courtyard Anaheim. We hope to see you again soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Our family of 1 senior, 2 adults, 1 baby, had a 5-Star stay at this hotel. King Suite was perfect size, on a high floor, at the end of a hallway, away from the elevators and very quiet, very clean, well stocked.  Staff was all very efficient and courteous. Restaurant, Starbucks and Convenience Store were convenient in the lobby. Location is within 1 block of Disneyland's entrance, walkable, and plenty of valet parking available. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear christinekD3409HD, Thank you for mentioning so many of the perks of staying at Courtyard Anaheim. We’re so glad the King Suite was just what you expected—clean, quiet and well stocked. Thank you for the kind words to our staff who work so hard to maintain our hotel and provide the best service possible. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Valet staff was rude and unprofessional. Overpriced no room cleaning everyday had to take out out town trash. Coffee maker full of mold, showers didn’t drain water water was either freezing cold or piping hot
Manager Response: Dear sdc636, As we pride ourselves on delivering a memorable hotel experience during your travels, we have unfortunately fallen short of our goal during your recent stay. Please accept my sincere apology for not meeting your expectations concerning our services and amenities. In July 2022 Marriott introduced their new housekeeping model with includes housekeeping service every other day (but we will not enter if the "Do Not Disturb" sign is present) or guests may ask the front desk for services such as towel refresh or trash removal upon request. This information is noted on our website and confirmations as well as our welcome letter in every guest room.   We value your feedback and hope to welcome you again in the future.

Summary: Amazing hotel highly recommend close to the park they say 8 min walk more like 3 min walk staff is friendly they unload your stuff and load it all back up just super nice we will be back in March 2023
Manager Response: Dear rsinghbasketball, We are so glad you enjoyed your stay at Courtyard. We agree, that short walk is fantastic as you watch the monorail go by and see the sights of Disneyland along the way. Thank you for mentioning our valet staff, they truly go the extra mile to make your day that much better. We’ll be counting down until March! Looking forward to welcoming you back. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We had a great stay.  It was the perfect location and had everything we needed.  The staff were wonderful and even came up to the room to fix a TV issue for us.  We stayed in the one bedroom suite and it was perfect for our family.  We would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear nicoledudleysell2022, We are passing along your compliments to our staff and glad they were able to quickly fix your TV issue. The one bedroom suite is certainly a treat and we’re happy you found the location to be exactly what you expected. We hope to see you again at Courtyard soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great room set up to sleep 6. Clean, loved the 2 showers and tub. Plenty of space for 6 people. Close to Disneyland. The staff was friendly and helpful. The Starbucks in the lobby before Disney was quick.
Manager Response: Dear kourtneym922, We’re thrilled to hear you enjoyed our room set up for 6, including the two showers. We love being close to Disneyland and sending you off with Starbucks in hand each morning. We’re so glad you have a great stay and thank you for your kind words. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Perfect for our family of six
Summary: Perfect place for families! The check in staff was so helpful and friendly. The rooms are perfect for a family. Bunk beds, mini-fridge and a microwave with just a short walk over to the parks! We have stayed here several times and always have a great experience!
Manager Response: Dear taraeve2022, It’s always a pleasure to welcome you back. Thank you so much for your positive review. We’re glad to stand the test of time throughout all your stays. Thank you for making Courtyard Anaheim your home away from home. See you again soon! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Very luxurious hotel.  Beautifully decorated for the holidays.  Staff was helpful and very nice.  Rooms were clean and spacious.  Conveniently located to  the main entrance of Disneyland. Reasonably priced.  Convenient restaurant and stores inside.
Manager Response: Dear fairplayhardware, We’re so happy to hear you had a great experience at Courtyard Anaheim. We love the holiday decor too, and we’re glad you could enjoy that extra touch during your stay. Our staff works so hard to provide the best service in the area and between the Bistro, front desk and on site store, we’re glad to know that you experienced only the best.  Thanks again, and we hope to see you soon. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We love the Courtyard Theme Park Entrance. The rooms are large and perfect for families.   My only complaint is that on our most recent stay we received no housekeeping at all. After 4 nights the room was a mess, we were out of towels, and the garbage were overflowing. At check in I was specifically asked if we wanted housekeeping on the second night of our stay and we never received it.
Manager Response: Dear andrakayp2021, Thank you for sharing your kind words and feedback with us. We’re so glad you found the space well equipped for large families. We definitely appreciate you mentioning the lack of housekeeping. We will look into why your room was missed after the second night so this will not happen in the future. Thank you again for your reviews of Courtyard.  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: It was great and we will be back to stay again. There were 5 of us which included 2 kids. The bunk beds were great. The walk to the Disneyland resort was short and the water park was a hit. We probably could have skipped Disneyland lol the kids wanted to swim the entire time. Food was quick and convenient, but was hoping for a sit down restaurant.  Amazing visit and place for a family vacation.
Manager Response: Dear ambernichole1969, We are thrilled to know your stay was so great. To hear that the kids loved the waterpark even more than Disneyland makes us smile. We’re glad you were able to try out the Bistro and look forward to seeing you again soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Hotel was clean and lovely.  Staff very pleasant.  When we requested a specific window for our room to be cleaned, they did it and didn't cut any corners.  Our favorite place to stay for a Disney vacation
Manager Response: Dear wesleygp, We’re so pleased that our staff treated you well and responded to your requests.We’re happy to hear that Courtyard is your favorite place to stay for a Disney vacation. We hope to see you again soon. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Excellent clean rooms with a great layout, comfortable beds and convenient separate bath and shower. Incredibly friendly and helpful valet and concierge.  Pool/water park still requiring reservations, which is unnecessary, and would be nice to drop in when able.
Manager Response: Dear O6530REamandat, We are thrilled that you found our rooms clean with comfortable beds and enjoyed the extra space during your stay. While the water park reservations will remain in place to avoid overcrowding and keep things clean and sanitary, we always try to accommodate walk-ins whenever possible. We hope to welcome you back to Courtyard Anaheim in the near future. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great customer service, seamless check in and out, comfy beds after a long day and quick walk back from the park. I highly recommend this hotel and we will definitely stay here again on our next Disneyland trip!
Manager Response: Dear mmprentice, We loved reading your review today. We’re so happy to hear you found the beds to be comfortable and the walk to Disneyland quick and easy! We look forward to welcoming you back for your next getaway. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This place was great.  Loved the bunks,  didn’t have to worry about thee little ones falling off the top with the guard. Also, special shout out to Jeff was truly amazing!  He made a our stay warm welcoming and the best.
Manager Response: Dear desireemcgrath, Thank you so much for your wonderful review—it’s always a treat to hear our guests shout out a specific team member. Jeff is fantastic and we’ll be sure he sees this. We’re so glad your time at Courtyard Anaheim was warm and welcoming. We hope to see you again soon. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Could be better. Not as good as in the past.
Summary: Nice hotel with very professional staff. However, there are 2 issues that erode the value of staying in this expensive hotel. 1. They do not clean the rooms daily. After 3 days of no service, our trash can were overflowing and the room (with 2 kids) was in desperate need of cleaning. 2. The hotel purposely keeps the water pressure in the bathroom EXTREMELY low (I guess they are trying to conserve water). This is very inconvenient because we were unable to wash our hand without touching the edges of the sink, which is unsanitary. This is the 5th time we stayed in this hotel, but are now considering other alternatives.
Manager Response: Hi novardisn, We love welcoming return guests to our property.  At this time Marriott properties offer housekeeping every other day (but will not enter if the "Do Not Disturb" sign is present) or guests may ask the front desk for services as needed. This information is noted on our website and reitterated at the front desk during check-in.  We are addressing the water pressure issue and hope you notice the improvement on your next visit. We value your feedback and hope to welcome you a 6th time in the near future.

Summary Heading: Nice accommodations, but bistro is overpriced, with few options
Summary: Overall this is a great hotel. However, the have very few gluten-free options in their bistro. Also, the bistro prices are very high. I was not thrilled to pay $4 for a Chobani yogurt. Yes, I do expect to pay more than at a grocery store, but 4x more is excessive. They are clearly taking advantage of the traveler.
Manager Response: Dear AliaCampbell, Thank you for taking the time to review Courtyard Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback regarding gluten-free options at the Bistro. We’re always considering ways to improve and accommodate a variety of dietary needs. We are glad you found your room and other accommodations nice and thank you for staying with us.  Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Perfect spot to start and end each day at Disneyland
Summary: Like most guests at the hotel, we were here for a visit to Disneyland and this hotel provided the perfect spot to start and end each day. It was an easy walk to the park. Loved the Starbucks, bistro and little marketplace at the reception area. Our room was a double queen with a bunk bed facing the park, so we could see the fireworks at night. The bathroom had a tub and a separate shower. Overall, it was very clean and comfortable. Happy to recommend it!
Manager Response: Dear rpjy66, Thank you for your kind works and noting your found our hotel clean and comfortable. We’re glad you were able to view fireworks right from your room and make the easy walk back and forth to Disneyland. We certainly hope we get the privilege of hosting your group again next time! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel - close and perfect for going to Disneyland
Summary: Courtyard Main Gate is the best location for Disneyland! the hotel is perfect, with lovely decorations. the staff is fantastic - very friendly and helpful. We always select the perfect room for our family - 2 queen beds and a bunk bed - couldn't have been tailored more perfectly for our needs!
Manager Response: Dear Pleader2022, It’s our pleasure to provide the best service and location here at Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance. We’re thrilled our rooms meet your family’s needs with two queen beds, a bunk bed and extra touches to make mornings easier. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to the next time! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: I would use this hotel again if I had the chance.
Summary: They decorated the lobby to get our family in the mood. The staff were all gentle and helpful. The rooms were well cleaned and comfortable. Disneyland was within a 10 minute walk from our hotel room, which was very convenient.
Manager Response: Dear Taku3527, We’re grateful for your feedback and happy to hear you loved the holiday decorations in the lobby. Our staff works hard to make every guest feel welcome and at home. It sounds like your Disneyland visit was a success and we’re glad to be your Disney vacation hotel. We hope to see you again very soon. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Always nicely decorated for the holidays.  Clean and well maintained.   Front desk and bell services very helpful.  Love having the cafe right on the first floor as we head out to the Disney parks in the morning.  Our favorite Disneyland destination hotel in the area.
Manager Response: Dear MoBar1x, Thank you for your kind words about our hotel staff. We’re so glad you enjoyed the holiday decor and the fresh look we strive to maintain in our hotel. It’s great to hear the Bistro was able to help you with grab and go breakfast options each morning as well.  We look forward to the next time! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Convenient to Disneyland, an excellent choice for an off site hotel. A very nice staff, with a yummy Bistro which has a good wine choices.  Possibly one of the best pizzas anywhere!  They had very festive Christmas decorations displayed. A welcome hotel to return to after a long day at the theme park.
Manager Response: Dear kkmore920, We are thrilled that you found our hotel conveniently located near Disneyland and a great choice for your family. We love having the Bistro onsite for quick bites and of course the pizza! We’re so glad you were able to see the holiday decorations as well. We hope to welcome you again soon. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great room!  Plenty of sleeping space with two queens and a bunkbed.  Loved the dual bathroom with full shower and second full bath and tub combo.  Great room for family trip to Disney located right across the street.  Comfortable beds and great decor, microwave and mini fridge. Kind and professional staff.   Highly recommend for a family Disney trip!
Manager Response: Dear samuelcQ8829AO, We loved reading your review today. We’re so happy to hear there was plenty of space for everyone with the bunk beds and dual showers. It’s wonderful to hear you recommend our hotel for family Disney trips. We hope to welcome you back for your next Disneyland getaway! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Hotel property was very clean, orderly, and decorated for the Holidays. The room was large, clean, and well accommodated. The pool area was very nice and had a great splash pad area for the kids. There is an onsite restaurant that is very convenient and has good food. The property is a short 5 minute walk to the park entrance. Very nice hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Happiness26730421766, Thank you so much for your wonderful review—it’s always nice to hear guests describe our hotel as clean and well accommodated. We’re glad your time at Courtyard Anaheim’s water park was filled with fun and the short 5 minute walk was quick and easy. We hope to see you again soon. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: great place to stay for Disneyland
Summary: Very good location. Beautiful holiday decor in lobby. Great staff for check in (which was a breeze) and valet. We stayed in room with one king and two bunk beds down the hall. You enter room with a little foyer. Plenty of closet space with nice Wolfgang Puck coffee pods/Keurig and fridge with microwave. The room has almost a suite feel to it. Room  is very spacious. Shower and a separate bathtub. I like the shower with nice glass doors and soaps in pump dispensers attached to wall. Bed is very comfortable. Slept well. HVAC works well, not too loud. Sliding patio door on second floor. Feels like an apartment. Has little desk nook. Brightly lit, modern decor hallway. Internet is OK--not fast nor super slow. Very enjoyable stay. Feels like 10-15 minute walk from hotel room door to
Manager Response: Dear P5591IEdavidc, Thank you for your 5-Star review! It’s always wonderful to hear detailed feedback and what guests like you enjoy. We like the home away from home apartment feel as well and we’re so glad you found the bed to be comfortable. We’re certainly glad you chose Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance and enjoyed being so close to Disneyland with dining on site and nearby for a variety of options. We truly appreciate you staying with us and hope to see you again soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Exceeded expectations.  Clean, friendly staff.  Great proximity to parks. Sometimes hotels by theme parks are soso and I would say this was a great experience.  Have spent a lot of time in Courtyard’s and this was well above average.  Fitness center also very nice.
Manager Response: Dear mfabre218, Thank you so much for your positive review! We are proud to have exceeded your expectations. We appreciate hearing our staff was kind and the property itself is above average. We strive to be exactly that and are glad you were able to try our fitness center in between time at Disneyland. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Decent but not ideal if walking to Disney
Summary: Decent. The breakfast was nice however this place isn’t a good walking distance to Disney. The area seems a bit sketch and it’s farther away from the park than I would’ve liked. For the same price you can go to a more convenient hotel
Manager Response: Dear ravenkwilliams93, We wanted to check in and verify you have the correct Courtyard Marriott for your review. Our hotel is located across the street from Disneyland Resort, with views of the Matterhorn just outside many guest rooms. We also have an expansive water park on site with two large water slides you can see right from Harbor Blvd. Disneyland is about a 7-10 minute walk from our lobby with many hotels and restaurants along the way. Please let us know if you did indeed review the correct location.  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great Hotel. Would Stay Here Again!
Summary: Excellent hotel! Would stay here again. Wonderful staff, clean and spacious rooms, water park, bistro, multiple sitting areas in main entrance, water filling station on main floor, and so VERY close to Disney main gate.
Manager Response: Dear Fontardelli, Thank you so much for your positive feedback! We’re thrilled to hear you enjoyed the clean and spacious rooms. The water park is definitely another treat when you’re not at Disneyland. Thanks again for your kind words and for being a fantastic guest. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We only stayed one night as a special treat for my daughter's 8th bday. It was myself, my daughter, and one of her friends. We were upgraded to a 1 bedroom suite which was perfect. The girls loved the bunk beds! The hotel had a great atmosphere with the holiday decorations. Food from the bistro was great. But let's be honest the best thing about this place is the water park. Even though we were only there one night we used the water park 3 times. Once right after check-in, again after dinner at DTD, again right before check out after we went to DL. It was truly a great and special stay.
Manager Response: Dear Trail600424, We’re so happy to hear your daughter had a special birthday celebration at Courtyard Anaheim. From the bunk beds, holiday decorations, to the water park—we’re glad to hear you enjoyed every bit of your stay. Thanks again, and we hope to see you again soon. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This hotel is so awesome! This is our 2nd time staying here. We came with a large group. Carrie helped with the booking and she was amazing! All the staff at the hotel are friendly and helpful. The rooms are spacious and clean. The location could not be better! It is basically across the street from the entrance to Disneyland. I love how it was decorated for the holidays! It has a very cozy, homey, welcoming feeling.
Manager Response: Dear Thelittleblondebean, We are thrilled to see you awarded us with the title “Disneyland’s Best!” Thank you for sharing your kind words with us. We’re so glad Carrie was able to help accommodate your large group and glad you enjoyed our quick access to Disneyland. We look forward to seeing you again soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This was a great family hotel. Rooms and bathrooms are spacious and CLEAN with in room coffee, microwave and refrigerator. Our son's room had a great view of the Matterhorn mountain and the kids watched the fireworks from their room. All of the public areas are tastefully decorated and clean.  The gift shop has a great selection as does the small snack and sundries store. The Bistro has a nice selection for kids and adults and is very convenient to start your day, have lunch or an evening meal. Our grandkids loved the Waterpark which was well staffed with friendly watchful staff. A very short walk to Disneyland, California Adventure and Downtown Disney with restaurants in close walking distance made this a winner for us. Overall a very clean hotel staffed with friendly employees
Manager Response: Dear C5519XAbillc, We’re delighted to hear your family had such a successful experience at Courtyard Anaheim and we’re so pleased that you enjoyed fireworks views, good food, pleasant staff and a short walk to Disneyland.  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay and we look forward to welcoming you back soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Perfect location for a Disney vacation
Summary: Staff was so kind and I love the decorations during the holidays. We didn’t use the pool while we were there, but it looks great! The rooms have plenty of rooms for families, our toddler loved the bunk beds. We’ll definitely be back.
Manager Response: Dear michellesmat, We are thrilled that you came to stay at Courtyard Anaheim during your recent vacation. Our property was built with families in mind and those bunk beds sure do add an extra element of fun for toddlers! We hope to welcome you again soon. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We prefer your hotel over the on-site hotels at Disneyland! All of your staff is friendly and welcoming. The hotel is always decorated amazing for every holiday and very clean. Thank you for always providing a great experience:)
Manager Response: Dear lmlvier, Thank you so much for your wonderful review—it’s always a treat to hear you’ve found your favorite place to stay here at Courtyard Anaheim. We’re so happy to have you back again and look forward to next time. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This Marriott hotel was 5 + stars in my book.  It is 5 minutes from the Disneyland entrance, it is near lots of family friendly restaurants.  It has it's own cafe which we took advantage of in the morning for coffee and snacks and late at night upon returning from Disneyland for a late night snack or glass of wine.  The staff is friendly, every one of them.  The rooms are spacious and clean.  Our family used the water park in November and had a wonderful time on our arrival day before we went to Disneyland.  I would stay here again every time we could to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear 638lynettej, Thank you for your kind words and mentioning every friendly member of our team. We love being so close to Disneyland and offering a space for families to unwind and relax. It sounds like the Bistro and water park did just that! It’s our pleasure to provide the best family hotel in Anaheim and we’re glad that this commitment was reflected in your visit.  We look forward to the next time! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Kids loved the water park!! Loved the bunk beds!! And especially the decorations for Halloween and Dia de Los Muertos. The Bistro is very handy and has quick service. The hotel is very nicely located both for access to Disneyland and for several easy places to take a hungry family after a fun filled and exhausting day.
Manager Response: Dear kclarkinson,  Thank you for your 5-Star review! It’s always wonderful to hear how much families enjoy our water park and the seasonal decorations. We certainly strive for quality service at every level. Thank you for pointing out our close proximity to Disneyland and our wide variety of menu options available at our on site Bistro.  We hope to see you again soon at Courtyard! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Very Clean, staff was very helpful.  Laundry on our floor came in very handy!  The property is close to the park so allowed us to do rope drop, take a break during the peak hours and come back after dark for a different Disney experience.
Manager Response: Dear Canadianrugger255, Thank you for your awesome review! We’re delighted to hear our location helped you have an ideal Disney vacation. We agree, being close enough to come for breaks is so helpful. It’s good to know the laundry facilities came in handy as well. We would love to have you back for another stay soon. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Friendly staff, beautiful lobby, clean cozy rooms. Decorated for Christmas, so lovely. 6 minute walk to Disneyland. Most friendly people in all areas of the property, comfy beds, 2 showers… Love this property
Manager Response: Dear randijones004, Thank you for your 5-Star review! It’s wonderful to be considered the best family hotel in Anaheim. We’re glad you could stay during the holidays and enjoy the seasonal decor. We truly appreciate your kind words regarding our staff, they really do make the magic here! We hope to welcome you back for another magical stay in the future. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Everyone very courteous and helpful Especially at the Bistro!! the valets were great getting the car to us quickly  Rooms were very clean with mini frig and micro wave which we used everyday  We would definitely stay here with kids again.
Manager Response: Dear rschuberth, Thank you for your excellent review! It’s lovely to hear our Bistro staff was courteous and helpful, all while preparing delicious meals for your family. We’re glad our room had everything you needed for your stay like the mini fridge and microwave. We look forward to welcoming you back for many more magical hotel stays in the future. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This was the perfect hotel for our family. We absolutely loved it! We had a room with a separate bunk bed section. The room had a banquette and a fridge which is very convenient. The beds were comfortable and we didn’t hear a peep from anyone else! Lots of times I can’t sleep in hotels due to hearing other guests but that wasn’t the case. Close walk to Disneyland! It seemed even closer than the actual Disney hotels. The restaurant food was also really good. I definitely recommend this place.
Manager Response: Dear kbhickman80,  Thank you so much for your awesome review! We’re happy to hear your room was quiet and well appointed. It’s so important to have a comfortable and restful place to sleep, it’s good to know all our soundproofing is doing its job. We love the close proximity to Disneyland as well and glad you enjoyed your visit. We can’t wait to welcome you back to Courtyard Anaheim on your next trip! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entranc

Summary: Friendly staff, and the location was perfect.  It is truly only a 10 min walk (with toddlers) from hotel lobby to the gate of Disneyland.  We even watched the fireworks from one of the rooms one night
Manager Response: Dear Clete10, Thank you so much for your incredible review! We’re delighted to hear even with toddlers in tow you were able to get to Disneyland in 10 minutes. We agree, fireworks views from your room is just one of the many perks of staying here at Courtyard Anaheim. We hope you’ll come stay again when you return to Disneyland Resort! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This is a nice, clean property that is close to the parks.  It offers great food and drink options if you prefer to relax on site.  The pool is a great place to have fun or relax.  Staff was great and we would definitely recommend this hotel for your next Disney visit.
Manager Response: Dear paulmR7022YZ, Thank you for the wonderful review! To hear that you recommend Courtyard Anaheim to others headed to Disneyland makes our day. We’re happy to know your visit included great food and drinks from our Bistro and relaxing time spent by the pool area. We look forward to welcoming you back soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: I think this is the 3rd time you have asked me for a review, but here it goes. Clean room. Friendly front desk and bistro staff. Pool staff needs some training in hospitality. A little bit of a walk to the Park.  I would love to get some compensation for the fire alarm testing from 10 am to 1 pm on one of the days. Wreaked havoc on my tinnitus.
Manager Response: Dear sallysO9346CI, Thank you so much for your feedback. These reviews are consistently monitored by our team and used to improve where needed. It’s great to hear your room was clean and well maintained. We’re glad you were able to have positive interactions with our front desk and Bistro staff. I’m sorry to hear the fire safety testing aggravated your tinnitus. We will certainly take your feedback to our water park staff and thank you again for your review.  Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great location, BUT many things to improve.
Summary: Great Location, BUT the some things were not as we expected. 1. They DON'T clean your room every day (2 cleanings out of 6! days stay)... disappointing for that room rate. 2. NO room service and the Bistro lacks of more breakfast/dinner options in its menu. GREAT staff at reception and Valet Parking. Not so friendly staff at the Pool, we felt as they were grumpy teachers instead of life savers.... could be friendlier. So, if you want to be near Disney, that's the place. But don't expect anything more.
Manager Response: Dear asota2022, We’re so happy to hear you the location was exactly as expected at Courtyard Anaheim—we love being right across the street from Disneyland. As you noticed, housekeeping throughout the entire Marriott portfolio has changed to every other day. We’re glad you were able to try the Bistro on site and are always looking to improve the menu options. We appreciate your candid feedback regarding our water park staff and will address this with our team.  Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Best place to stay in Anaheim ! This hotel is across the street from the gates of Disneyland, it's uber clean, the employee's bend over backwards to make your stay the very best. There is a waterpark on the property. The dining area and food is convenient and tasty.
Manager Response: Dear stevedL4812U,  We are thrilled to know you consider Courtyard the best place to stay in Anaheim. Thank you for sharing your kind words with us regarding our staff, Bistro, water park and hotel cleanliness. It means so much to us and to our entire team.We look forward to seeing you again soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This place was amazing.  Location and price are worth the stay alone.  Then you add the water park.   It’s top notch.  Staff is so friendly.   I left two pairs of glasses behind.  Their cleaning staff found them.   We had a second floor room facing the water park so we actually had a patio area.  I felt horrible when I arrived at the airport and realized I had left a bag of trash outside.    I called the hotel to let them know.   They were understanding.
Manager Response: Dear sarahdZ2521XS, We’re delighted to hear you had an amazing stay!  We’re so pleased that you found the location and water park to be exactly what you needed during this Disneyland vacation. It’s so good to hear we were able to locate your glasses quickly as well. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and we look forward to welcoming you back soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Perfect hotel if you don’t want to stay in the park at Disney. A few minute walk there! Kids had a great time at the pool and loved the water slides. Staff were very accommodating and welcoming. Great place to stay with kids.
Manager Response: Dear kristinahartman2022, We are thrilled that your kids had a great time at the pool and loved the water slides. We are passing along your compliments to our staff that work so hard to welcome each guest and provide the best service possible. We hope to see you again soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance
