Summary: The room is well laid out for a family of four with lots of space. The staff was super friendly and helpful. Everything was clean, great amenities and food from the Bistro was excellent. And we couldn’t beat convenience to the parks.
Manager Response: Dear 323charityh, Thank you so much for your wonderful review! It always makes our day to hear our staff was super friendly and you found everything to be clean and well appointed. We’re glad you were able to try the Bistro food as well. We hope to welcome you back again very soon for your next Disneyland getaway! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great rooms that are family friendly. Food was good. And staff very hospital. So great being close to the Park. Wish we would've been able to try the water park. It's a major plus for my wife that they had Starbucks, great way to start the day.
Manager Response: Dear cmac716, Thank you for your 5-Star review! It’s always wonderful to hear staff made you feel welcome during your stay. We certainly strive to be the best hotel near Disneyland, and having Starbucks in the lobby is just one of those extra touches to help make your vacation that much better. We hope to see you again soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: I booked this hotel because I have three kids, and with bunk beds in the room and a small water park attached, I knew they would enjoy it. What I didn’t realize is how much I would love this hotel! I stayed with my husband, 3 kids, and had my parents in the room next door. Everyone agreed it is the best place we have stayed in Anaheim. The lobby restaurant food is solid, the shop is nice, and the grab and go section next to the front desk is very convenient. We were lucky enough to stay while it was decked out for the holidays - so fun! Would absolutely recommend. Oh, and the staff were all super helpful and friendly! I was especially impressed with the restaurant staff - they really made it amazing.
Manager Response: Dear Road373036, Thank you for your kind words. It’s our pleasure to provide the best family vacation possible. It’s great to know that not only did your children love the water park, you and your parents also found many things to love about Courtyard Marriott. We’re glad you were also able to see our holiday decor during your visit.  We look forward to the next time! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The staff were so friendly and helpful! The hotel was very clean! The water park was amazing! My kid and nieces and nephew love it and the adults can have fun too! Loved the holiday decorations! It was a great stay!
Manager Response: Dear ddickinson2402, Thank you so much for your positive feedback! We’re thrilled to hear you enjoyed our on site water park. We find it to be a favorite among many of our guests. Thanks again for your kind words and for being a fantastic guest. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Close to Disney, clean, big room!
Summary: We enjoyed our stay! There’s nothing better than being able to walk to and from the park. The bunk rooms sleep 7, and as a family that generally has to get two rooms, we really appreciated that we didn’t need to here! The WiFi was down with no idea as to when it would be back up and there was not adequate parking for the amount of guests there. Our only option was to park at a neighboring hotel. For those two reasons, I docked a star. But as far as cleanliness, friendliness and proximity to the park, it was great. Mickey waffles were a bonus!
Manager Response: Dear whitneywillard2022, We’re so happy to hear you had a great experience at Courtyard Anaheim. We agree, there’s nothing better than being able to walk to and from Disneyland with ease. It’s wonderful to  have the extra space in our two queen and bunk bed rooms to fit a large family. Thank you again for your review, and we hope to see you again soon. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Beautiful hotel, gorgeous and comfortable rooms, lovely service, easy walk to the parks.  Kids loved the bunkbeds. The double bathrooms were so convenient. Spacious and bright hallways, good valet service and gift shop
Manager Response: Dear Staceyr0se55, We are thrilled to be part of your Disneyland vacation. To read that your stay was perfect is everything we hope for. We’re so glad your kids liked the bunk beds and you appreciated the easy walk to Disney.  Thank you again for sharing your kind words with us. It means so much to us and to our entire team!  We look forward to seeing you again soon. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Awesome, friendly staff. The room was clean and in good repair, and it's an easy walk to Disneyland with a range of restaurants on the way. The on-site Bistro was a pleasant surprise with quick service, reasonable pricing, and a varied (if not large) menu; it became our go-to for a number of meals and snacks. Fully recommended for your Disney trip.
Manager Response: Dear 91cavalier, We’re delighted to hear about your recent stay and experience with our friendly staff. We’re so pleased that you recommend our on site Bistro. We definitely enjoy the food there as well. Thank you for taking the time to share your review and we look forward to welcoming you back soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Had an amazing stay on our Disney vacation! Staff went out of their way to show how much they truly care about guests and made the whole experience enjoyable.  Our stay was everything I hoped for and more.  We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear stephani2803, We are thrilled that you had such an amazing stay for your Disney vacation. We are passing along your compliments to our staff who work so hard to make each guest experience enjoyable. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Beautiful place to stay,  Loved the rooms, great for kids. Location to  Disneyland is great, McDonald’s close for a Quick snack with the kids, Wonderful staff. Beautiful Halloween decorations. Restaurant  very Good.
Manager Response: Dear sullygrandma55, Thank you so much for your wonderful review—it’s always a treat to hear our rooms and location fit your travel needs. We pride ourselves on giving our visitors the best vacation experience possible, and we’re happy the decorations and close proximity to nearby dining and theme parks made your stay memorable. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: great walking distance to the parks. rooms were clean.  I thought we'd be able to open the glass door to the deck but it was locked and no key provided in the room.  Also- only 2 elevators with no stairs anywhere near the rooms.  This made travel to and from lobby/room often tedious.  The halloween decorations were amazing!
Manager Response: Dear P8289SFmegans, Thank you for your review! We’re delighted to hear you found the short walk to Disneyland easy and convenient. We’re glad you were able to enjoy our Halloween decorations during your stay as well. There are several east facing rooms that do not unlock. We keep these closed to the exhaust fan and dust it creates. However, if another location is available we are always happy to relocate you to a room that does open. Thank you for your comments and hope to see you again soon. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Hotel was great! So close to Disneyland, we were able to walk to the parks.  Bistro was super convenient to grab breakfast on our way out.  Room was clean and comfy.  Front desk staff was helpful and happy.  Valet staff was awesome.  Great experience!
Manager Response: Dear gibsonfam97, Thank you for your 5-Star review! It’s always wonderful to hear that our staff made you feel at home during your visit. We’re certainly glad you pointed out the close proximity to Disneyland and enjoyed your clean, comfy rooms after a long day. We truly appreciate your kind words and will gladly welcome you back for another magical stay in the future. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Every time I passed the front desk, I was greeted by the front desk staff, which was very nice.  The food in the restaurant was excellent.  We actually ate there twice.  The rooms were good sized and beds were comfortable.  The table and half booth in the corner of the room was a great addition to the room.  The decorations for Halloween were great.  If there was anything I would change, it would be with regards to housekeeping.  They clean the rooms every other day.  It would be helpful, thought, if they emptied the trash  each day, as it seemed to build up.  I would also have the carpet vacuumed more thoroughly.  The housekeepers were very friendly and I could tell they were hard workers.
Manager Response: Dear Q4884TEjoel, Thank you for your excellent review! It’s lovely to hear our front desk staff welcomed you each time you returned. We’re glad our unique room set up fits your family well; we think the booth table set up is fantastic too! Housekeeping throughout the entire Marriott portfolio has changed to every other day but we can certainly understand the need for more frequent trash removal. Thank you for mentioning that and our hard working housekeeping team. We look forward to welcoming you back to Courtyard in the near future.  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: I think the Covid protocols are outdated. Housekeeping should be everyday and the water park doesn’t need to be closed between sessions. The water has chlorine!!  Desk clerks were friendly and welcoming.
Manager Response: Dear 18cherib, Thank you for your review. We’re happy to hear your experience with our staff was welcoming and friendly. As you noticed, housekeeping throughout the entire Marriott portfolio has changed to every other day. Our waterpark sanitation policy empowers us to deliver on our most important goals: the safety and health of our guests. The brief cleaning periods prevent water quality issues and allow us to refresh towels and lounge areas. We do offer several water park reservation time slots throughout the day so everyone can enjoy it. We greatly appreciate your comments, and we hope you will consider Courtyard Anaheim again. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Perfect place to stay for families
Summary: Staff was extremely friendly, property was decorated for Halloween and Disney: and the location was super convenient, just a short walk to Disneyland. The rooms are designed perfectly for families with many children. Our room had two queen beds and a set of bunk beds. Bathroom had two sinks, a tub/shower combo and also a stand-alone shower making it easy for everyone to get ready quickly. Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear CaseyChanan, Thank you so much for your incredible review! We’re delighted to hear our room layout worked so well for your family with the double vanity, bunk beds and two queen beds. We agree this helps for a quicker morning getting ready for that short walk to Disneyland. We are happy to hear you will stay with us again when you return to Anaheim. See you real soon! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Phenomenal stay. Great employees!  They were always there to welcome us back at the end of our very long days. The hotel was clean and comfortable. I love the unique floor plan. It is really close to the park.
Manager Response: Dear 1tlr2018, Thank you for the wonderful review! To hear that Courtyard Anaheim was phenomenal is such a treat. We always enjoy hearing feedback regarding our staff and comfort levels of the rooms and property.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This stay was short and sweet! As always they had excellent customer service! I used my lunch break to check in and was very limited on time. David made sure I was checked in so quickly and efficiently. He was super friendly and made sure I had all the information I needed to have a pleasant stay. The room was spacious and I was pleasantly surprised that there were 2 showers in the bathroom. We had a great view of the water park and I loved being able to just relax in our room. It’s an awesome place for a staycation, especially since it’s walking distance from Disneyland.  I also loved that whenever we would walk back into the hotel, someone would always welcome us back, from the valet attendants to the front desks staff. They really make you feel at home, away from home! I will
Manager Response: Dear  jolimberio, Thank you so much for your positive review! Our staff works hard to provide that home-like, comfortable atmosphere you just described. We’re so glad David was able to check you in quickly and get you started on that staycation you so deserved. We appreciate hearing the two showers and water park view worked so well for your family. We hope to see you real soon for another staycation at Courtyard Anaheim! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Second time there. Great place, water park is fun, price is good and close to Disneyland. Can’t really ask for a better place with kids. Bunks are a treat for the little ones— coffee bar in first floor is a nice touch.
Manager Response: Dear baldeagle123, Thank you for your awesome review! We’re delighted to hear you returned for a second time. From the bunk beds, Starbucks coffee in our lobby and location so close to Disneyland, it really is a winner and we’re glad you agree. We hope to see you again the next time you’re in town for vacation.  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Absolutely loved this location.  The king suite with the bunk room was perfect for our family of 4, and the double showers and bath were a lifesaver! The bistro had amazing food at a decent price, and having thr 24hr. Market was so helpful for those late night needs.
Manager Response: Dear MelonieCarroll, Thank you for your 5-Star review! It’s always wonderful to hear our location and suite layout fit what you are looking for during your stay. Our Bistro staff will be so pleased to hear you enjoyed the food and prices! Thank you again and we hope to see you soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Our second trip and we'll be back. Great hotel, great locations and great Waterpark. Only a 8-10 minute walk to the parks. Makes it great to get to parks and take mid day breaks.   Can't wait to stay again.
Manager Response: Dear kodyt468, Thank you for returning to stay with us at Courtyard Anaheim! It’s our pleasure to have you as a repeat guest to our hotel and water park. We’re so glad you’ve chosen to stay with us for your Disneyland vacations. We look forward to the next time! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: My husband and I really enjoyed staying at this hotel.  The staff were all very friendly and helpful. They always made us feel welcomed. The hotel and rooms rooms were very neat and clean. The beds were very comfortable. It is about a five minute walk from the hotel to the Disneyland  Park  gate entrance. We also loved the fun way that it was decorated for Halloween. All in all, everything was wonderful and we would definitely like to stay here again on our next visit back to Disneyland. It is very clear why it is a Disney Good Neighbor Hotel.
Manager Response: Dear doreen02038, Thank you so much for your positive feedback! We’re thrilled to hear you enjoyed our clean rooms, comfortable beds and welcoming atmosphere. Add that quick walk to Disneyland, and everything falls right into place! We’re proud to be one of Disneyland’s Good Neighbor Hotels and can’t wait to welcome you back for another stay soon.  Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great for families seeking convenience & fun (if you’re into that)
Summary: Beware, your kids may enjoy the water park more than Disneyland itself.  It happened to me, and it can happen to you. And the holiday decor, what a distraction! Constant “oohs!” and “whoas!” by the kids as they looked in awe. Don’t get me started about the helpful and courteous staff, don’t they have better things to do than to go out of their way and get me new keys because I lost mine in the park, or pick up all my bags as they spill out of the cart?  Go in the back and crunch some numbers or file some papers I say!  Lastly, immaculately maintained, clean facilities everywhere- where’s the charm, the hovering flies, the garbage on the floors?  But to each their own.
Manager Response: Dear HeyJoesOnline, We’re so happy to hear you had a great experience at Courtyard Anaheim, especially our water park. Our staff truly is amazing, and while we don’t wish lost keys or spilt groceries on anyone, we know our team steps in wherever they are needed. It’s wonderful to hear your kids love the decor and you appreciate the standards of cleanliness we strive to maintain. Thanks again, and we hope to see you soon. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: I didn’t like having my room cleaned only 2 times during my 5 night stay. I also did not receive my 2 free bottles of water daily. The hotel only has two elevators, during busy time, it is quite a wait if you have scooter or stroller. However, it was close to the gate of Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear siuling2022,  Thank you for your review. We’re glad you found the close proximity to Disneyland to be a bright spot during your stay. Unfortunately, Courtyard does not provide complimentary water bottles. We do have our on site market and Bistro as well as water bottle refill stations on property. As you also noted, housekeeping throughout the entire Marriott portfolio has changed to every other day. We’re sorry to hear the frequency of housekeeping did not meet your expectations. We thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: I’ve stayed in a lot of courtyard hotels and this one was one of the nicest. It have been the little things that made the experience better. I have a 8 and 5 year old so the bunkbeds were a nice touch. The waterpark was also a big hit with the kids. Our next trip to Disneyland we plan to stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear n8quist,  Thank you so much for your positive review! The water park is definitely a fun feature for kids and we’re glad your family enjoyed it, along with the bunk bed set up in your room. We appreciate hearing our Courtyard property stands out among the rest and can’t wait to welcome you back again! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The guy who checked us in had no idea about the bus service that stopped outside.  Eventually we found out it costs too much and walking was much better.  They didn't clean the room - they said the rooms are only cleaned every other day.  I think if you are there for two nights (exactly one day) they should make the effort to clean the room - otherwise it just feels like they aren't giving you the service you feel like you are paying for.
Manager Response: Dear AucklandJerry, Thank you for sharing your experience with us. I appreciate knowing that you found walking to Disneyland a convenient option over the ART shuttle. We certainly strive for 5 stars and apologize we did not meet those expectations. Please feel free to contact us directly if you would like to discuss the housekeeping services further.  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Hotel accommodated our early arrival and we were able to go to our room immediately. Hotel was decorated for Halloween in such a fun way. Super clean. Ample space in our room. Although we didn't request a resort view, we were still able to still see the fireworks from our balcony.  The food at the Bistro was quite good. A quick walk to the Disneyland gate. Only downside was the water pressure in the bathroom sinks. Would recommend and stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Serenity0605 We’re delighted to hear about your recent stay with us. It’s wonderful to hear that you enjoyed the Halloween decorations, large rooms and of course the fireworks view! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and we look forward to welcoming you back soon. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Best hotel we have ever stayed with…..
Summary: This was by far the best property we have ever stayed at with littles. The staff was super amazing and friendly and helpful! This hotel was very very clean and spacious and so close to everything that we could walk to wherever we needed to go for food, toiletries, entertainment or a hot cup of coffee. The hotel offers great food and sun dried too!! I can’t say enough about the property and the staff, it was just the best vacation. Thank you so much for all your hard work and kindness you showed our family!
Manager Response: Dear falkconnie6, We are thrilled that you found our to be the best hotel you’ve ever stayed at! Our property was built with families in mind, down to the spacious rooms and location near Disneyland and other walkable locations. We will share your compliments with our staff as well. We hope to welcome you back for another vacation soon. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: I am titanium status with Marriott so I really like staying at Marriott properties and this one is the BEST at Disney. While I really like the new Westin as well, this property is closer to the park, and a better set up for a family of 5. My kids being older now ( 12, 12, 15) don't really take as much advantage of the water park anymore but I can see how that would be a big draw for kids and families. They actually have a very nice selection of food at their on site Cafe and Panera and McDonald's is like a 2 minute walk away for something quick. But my personal favorite part is how amazing they decorate the hotel inside and outside for Halloween!  The only down side is that it can be pricey-on par with the Disney Hotels, but I do think it is a great choice plus if you are a
Manager Response: Dear followthefive5, Thank you for your 5-Star review! It’s always wonderful to hear from our loyal Marriott guests.  As titanium status, we’re certainly glad you chose Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance and consider it the best near Disneyland. We truly appreciate you taking the time to let us know how much you enjoyed your stay and the Halloween decorations. We hope to see you again in the future.  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Six minute walk across the street to Disneyland entrance
Summary: Newer hotel, incredibly decorated for the season, with fun splash pad and water slide for kids. Standard rooms are really big with two queen beds and a set of bunkbeds, and even two showers in the bathroom. Great for families and groups. Could not be more convenient to Disneyland entrance.
Manager Response: Dear D8672RFwendyb, Thank you for your excellent review! It’s lovely to hear you enjoyed our Halloween decorations and large guest rooms. We’re glad our unique set up with bunk beds and two showers worked well for your family. We look forward to welcoming you back for many more magic hotel stays in the future! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Nice, affordable,  and a short walk to Disneyland
Summary: Affordable but well above average accommodations/short walk to park. It was just my husband and me so being a larger group/family specific hotel I thought it would be loud, but it was a great stay! Very clean throughout. Standard room sleeps 6 with 2 showers. AMAZING STAFF!! Starbucks in the lobby. Pretty good food and cocktails available in these little glass bottles. A nice selection of beers and wine, too. Valet and bell service was excellent. We will definitely be back next year!
Manager Response: Dear 11carlacooper, Thank you so much for your awesome review! We’re happy to hear how much you enjoyed your stay as a couple. We love that we could provide a quiet room to relax and unwind, along with cocktails and Starbucks. Thank you for letting us know how our valet and bell services accommodated you so well.  We can’t wait to welcome you back at Courtyard Anaheim on your next getaway.  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great family place to stay for Disneyland
Summary: Very nice facility with helpful staff . Comfortable and clean. Very nice water park pool area for this traveling with kids.  Decent on site restaurant. Room had two comfortable queen beds a set of bunks for the kids . Spacious rooms
Manager Response: Dear snohomitch, Thank you so much for your incredible review! We’re delighted to hear our rooms fit your needs so well with two comfortable queen beds and bunk beds. We agree, the water park is fantastic when traveling with kids! We hope you’ll come stay again when you return to Anaheim! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Clean  friendly convenient (easy walk to Disneyland) Large comfortable room Decorated for Halloween made it fun for the whole family  The staff were all friendly and very helpful  Definitely will stay there again
Manager Response: Dear kjoymb, Thank you for the wonderful review! To hear that Courtyard Anaheim was a hit for your whole family is truly a delight. We always enjoy decorating for Halloween and love seeing our guests’ reactions to the celebration. We’re happy you enjoyed the large room and easy walk to Disneyland. We look forward to welcoming you back soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: I am on dialysis and it was my first time traveling with my equipment. Room was very clean, quiet and safe. Upon arrival, I felt comfortable leaving my dialysis equipment and have it placed in storage until it was time to check-in, since we were several hours early. Great experience and will stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear mscguzman, Thank you so much for your review!  We’re happy to hear you were able to get away for a quick summer vacation even with your new medical equipment. We love that our staff made you feel welcomed and comfortable. We can’t wait to have you back to Courtyard Anaheim on your next Disneyland Resort vacation! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: BEST BANG FOR YOUR BUCK NEAR DISNEY!  6 MIN WALK TO PARK!
Summary: Jeff was amazing!  The hotel staff was phenomenal.  Very accommodating, kind and professional.  This property is PERFECT for Disney.  Literally a 6 min walk to the park and the water slides on site are AMAZING!  Will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear misskrystel, Thank you for your kind words about our staff. It’s our pleasure to provide the best stay near Disneyland with ideal accommodations for families. We’re glad that this commitment was reflected in your visit, and will certainly let Jeff know what a stand-out he was during your stay.  We look forward to the next time! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: There was no shuttle to the park, after walking 15 miles a day in the park, an additional one walking back to the hotel can be treacherous. Wasn't aware they also charge $30/day just to park there... really?!? Staff was average, Housekeeping was wonderful, did a great job.
Manager Response: Dear martinezoscar1, Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay at Courtyard Anaheim. We completely sympathize with all the walking required for long Disneyland days. We greatly appreciate your comments, and we hope you will consider Courtyard Anaheim again to deliver you a relaxing vacation experience you deserve. If you would like to discuss anything else, please feel free to contact us directly. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The people were really helpful and the rooms were perfect for my family. It was so nice to have the extra bunk bed space and it didn’t feel like it took away from the space in the room. The food options were delicious and nice to grab a breakfast burrito and head out to Disney
Manager Response: Dear tbook210, Thank you for your excellent review! It’s lovely to hear you enjoyed the food and quick breakfast options from our Bistro. We’re glad our unique bunk bed set up gave you all the space you needed to relax after a day at Disneyland. We look forward to welcoming you back for many more magic hotel stays in the future! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We had a great stay.  It's less than a 5 minute walk to Disneyland and the staff is really friendly and helpful. The room was set up really well for a family. Two queen size beds, a set of bunk beds (which my nieces loved), and a spacious bathroom with two showers so we could get ready quickly and get on our way to Disneyland. All this without feeling cramped. And the waterpark is amazing, a great day to cool off or soak your tired bones after being at Disneyland all day. Another feature my nieces loved. Thank you for taking such good care of us!
Manager Response: Dear 08label,  Thank you for your incredible review! We’re delighted to hear you were well taken care of at Courtyard. We’re glad you and your nieces were able to enjoy the spacious rooms with bunk beds and two showers for quick morning routines. The walk to Disneyland is certainly a bonus in our book and we love hearing about your experience at our water park. We would love to have you back for another stay very soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Awesome place to stay! Friendliest staff, awesome pool. Halloween decorations were super fun. 2 showers in each room and bunk beds for the kids. Very close to Disneyland and an awesome view of the fireworks.
Manager Response: Dear mcarter3636, Thank you for your 5-Star review! It’s always wonderful to hear about our friendly staff. We’re certainly glad you chose Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance and enjoyed our Halloween decorations, family-equipped rooms and of course those fireworks views!  We truly appreciate your kind words and would love to welcome you back for another magical stay in the future. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Rooms were clean and adequate. Nice beds. We were able to rent 2 rooms close to each other to fit the 8 of us (6 in one, 2 in the other). Kids liked the bunk beds. Had to request a new hair dryer since the one in our room didn’t work. Also, fairly noisy since we were at the back corner up against the freeway. Kids running back and forth in the hallways was pretty loud too.
Manager Response: Dear jaysonlosado, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We’re glad you found the rooms clean and well appointed for families. I’m sorry the hallway noise could be heard inside your rooms and I will certainly let our team know about that detail. We hope to be able to host your family again when you return to Anaheim.  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: My room was ready really early, around noon. I was so happy about that because we were able to quickly go to the pool,  shower and change for the Oggie Boogie Bash before our lunch reservation. It's not a bad walk to/from the parks. Parking is valet only. We Ubered to Disneyland hotel for lunch and walked back after the Bash around 11pm because driving and parking over there would've been a hassle, the Uber for four was less than $10. The staff we encountered were all super nice. The snack shop has some ok options and is open 24h, you make purchases at the front desk. Having two showers was cool. The only thing my kids wanted was a tv in the bunkbed room.
Manager Response: Dear 537kellir, Thank you so much for your positive review! It sounds like you had tons of fun during your stay! We’re glad you even had a splash and swim before Oogie Boogie Bash! Our staff truly is the best and we’re glad they lived up to that reputation during your visit. We appreciate hearing how easy it was to get snacks when needed and agree that a TV for the bunk beds would certainly be a nice addition. Thank you again and we hope to see you real soon for another stay at Courtyard Anaheim! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Beautiful hotel. Our stay was extremely comfortable. The hotel was very clean & fresh. All hotel staff were accommodating & very friendly. Would definitely recommend this hotel & would not hesitate to return!
Manager Response: Dear melissadannaoui, Thank you for your awesome review! We’re delighted to hear you had a comfortable stay. We agree, our staff is very friendly and goes the extra mile for each guest. We’ll be sure to let them know you enjoyed your stay and would not hesitate to return. We’ll see you again soon, I hope! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Excellent location to Disney! Room was spacious and was perfect for our family. Hotel was clean, smelled great and was convenient. Pool/Splash pad  is exactly as pictured and kids had so much fun. Would definitely stay here again
Manager Response: Dear Megjackson5, Thank you for your 5-Star review! It’s always wonderful to hear our location and spacious rooms were perfect for your family. We certainly strive for cleanliness, convenience and fun! I am personally so happy to hear the photos we share online reflect the actual state of our water park. What a perfect place to unwind and relax during your time away from the theme parks. Thank you again and we hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great hotel, very clean and comfortable. Good restaurant in lobby. Easy walk to Disneyland  Fun water park and we could see the fireworks perfectly from our room. Lots of families watched fireworks from the pool area- right across from Matterhorn
Manager Response: Dear 876jaimek, Thank you for sharing your review! We’re grateful to hear you found our property clean and comfortable. It’s our pleasure to provide the best hotel near Disneyland for families, including that quick walk to the theme parks and fireworks view! We’re glad our commitment to providing that experience was reflected in your visit. We look forward to seeing you next time! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Clean, spacious rooms.  Beds were comfortable.  Friendly service.  Waterpark was fun.  The lifeguards were very good at keeping everyone in line and following the rules.  The bistro has really good food (especially the breakfast burrito and pizza) and they serve the food surprisingly fast!  Perfect location to access Disneyland and restaurants on foot.
Manager Response: Dear BackcountryLuv23, Thank you so much for your positive feedback! We’re thrilled to hear you enjoyed our water park and Bistro food. Comfortable beds in any hotel is a must; we find our room set up and bedding to be a favorite among many of our customers. We’re so glad you could stay with us during your trip to Disneyland and have a quick walk over to the theme parks. Thanks again for your kind words and for being a fantastic guest. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: 3 night stay. All the staff are really friendly. They didn't have a room available for early check in, however we were able to use the water park while we waited which was nice. Room was clean. We had dinner at the restaurant the first night which was very good.  Only reason not a 5 rating is they never cleaned our room. They did inform during check in they only clean every other day, but with a 3 night stay they should have cleaned once. In addition, the sticker the valet left on the inside of our windshield left residue that I had to get off with a razor.  Great location for the park and if weather permits enjoy the water park.
Manager Response: Dear Mobile22940432201, We’re happy to hear you had an enjoyable stay at Courtyard Anaheim and glad you were able to enjoy the water park while you awaited check in time. Thank you for your feedback on room refreshing and the valet sticker. We certainly want you to remember your Courtyard stay, but we will have to look into easier sticker removals. Thank you again for your kind words and positive review! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We will most definitely stay here again the property is well taken care of and staff was very nice. It was located walking distance to Disney land. The bistro located in the hotel was also very convenient.
Manager Response: Dear lmb1377, We are thrilled to know you will be staying with us again! It is always a pleasure to meet new guests and see familiar faces return for their Disneyland vacations. Thank you for sharing your kind words with us and our staff. It means so much to us and to our entire team! We’ll be counting down the days until next time. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: It was not a stay that I would want to go back to we weren’t told that our card had to have a chip so our plans were ruined so we basically had no hotel and had to go try to call family members as we’re leaving Disneyland because we have no hotel to go to very inconvenient I’m very disappointed my kids were exhausted and they just wanted to lay down and go to sleep which was supposed to be across the street from Disneyland which is your location and they were not able to three kids and mine were exhausted so was I very Of sad
Manager Response: Dear sadbunny1313, Unfortunately without having a chipped card we were unable to secure proper payment for your room and unable to get you checked into our hotel.  We post this information both on the website and app to ensure every guest is aware of this policy prior to arriving to the hotel.  This policy is standard practice in all Marriott hotels to provide protection of credit card fraud.

Summary: Awesome hotel, staff, rooms, and bistro!!! Would most definitely stay here again! Pool was for small children. The big pool was only 3.5’ deep. Resort view was great and could see the fireworks from our balcony.
Manager Response: Dear 872lesley, We’re delighted to hear about your recent stay and that you enjoyed your rooms and Bistro. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about our water park and pool area. We also love seeing fireworks right from the balcony or water park area. We certainly hope you’ll consider another stay with us in the future.  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This place was beautiful and clean. The staff was so welcoming and friendly. The rooms were perfect for our family of 5 and it made our stay comfortable. Will definitely book here again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear chelseachastain91, We are thrilled that you found our property beautiful, clean and just right for your family of five. We are passing along your compliments to our staff, thank you for mentioning how welcoming and friendly they were during your stay. We’re delighted to hear you’ll be back again and hope it’s sooner rather than later! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Best Family Friendly Hotel Across the Street from Disneyland!
Summary: Wonderful stay! Spacious, Modern Rooms! Fun Water park! Great food! Friendly and Courteous Staff!  My mom was able to reserve a scooter on site. Valet parking was easy! Safe walk to Disneyland which took less than 5 minutes!
Manager Response: Dear  elesaca733, Thank you so much for your wonderful review—it’s always a treat to hear our guests describe their time at Courtyard Anaheim as “the best family hotel.”We pride ourselves on giving our visitors the best vacation experience possible, and we’re so happy to hear that you were able to enjoy many of our amenities like the water park and Bistro. I am especially happy to hear you were able to get your mom set up with a scooter easily on site. It makes everything so much easier to have everything you need right on site.We hope to help you plan another stay very soon! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This hotel was above expectations!! It was clean the rooms were very spacious and the staff was so nice and helpful. The food at the bistro was better than any restaurants around there and it was fast! Plus having Starbucks coffee on my way to Disneyland was very nice. The pool was perfect for the kids and it was so close to the park! I for sure will go with this hotel on all future trips to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Skrekow, Thank you for your 5-Star review! It’s always wonderful to hear you found our rooms clean and spacious, in addition to kind and welcoming staff members. We’re certainly glad you chose Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance and enjoyed that sip of Starbucks coffee each morning! We truly appreciate your feedback and would love to welcome you back for another magical stay in the future. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We just returned from a 4 day stay and were really impressed.  As soon as we pulled up and saw all the fantastic Halloween decorations we knew this would be a great stay.  The staff at the front counter and Bell Services were so friendly and acomadating.  Our room was very clean and comfortable beds.   We were told housekeeping would clean every other day but we opted to just get fresh towels and empty garbages.  For a short stay we didn't need full cleaning.  Location to Disneyland is fantastic.  7 min with 1 trafffic light.  Small store with the essentials which was open late.  Didn't get a chance to try the cafe.   My 10 year old loved the water park.  He had an accident and cut his foot badly the second day and the recreation team was over to assist immediately .  They were
Manager Response: Dear I1130YLmaryannes, Thank you for your excellent review! We’re glad your first impressions were so positive and our staff was able to deliver the same customer service throughout your stay. We’re glad you found the short walk to Disneyland easy and convenient. We are so glad to hear your son enjoyed the water park and that he was able to get the immediate assistance he needed. We’re glad Courtyard met your needs and we look forward to welcoming you back for many more magical hotel stays in the future! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The location of this property should be enough to sway any one to stay here if you are going to Disneyland. But the staff, amenities and facilities made our stay so much better. The staff - from the bellmen to the front desk to food services to housekeeping - were all kind and knowledgeable. The market and gift shop were well stocked, especially if you are visiting without a vehicle. The bistro food was varied and so good. We ate there a lot more than expected because the food was so good. We got a much better start to our mornings with the convenience of grabbing food downstairs and then eating at a leisurely pace in our room. And our room! There's a bunk bed for the littles and a banquet and table to be able to enjoy a meal not sitting on a bed. We even hit the waterpark a few
Manager Response: Dear DayTrip02964758782, Thank you for your kind words to our staff and team. It’s our pleasure to provide the best location and service near Disneyland Resort and we’re glad that this commitment was reflected in your visit. We love the Bistro food as well and happy to hear you found the variety and price point worth your while. Sounds like the water park visits were a success as well! We look forward to the next time! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Will def be making this our go to hotel if not staying at the Grand California! Service was top notch and feels more like a JW than a courtyard! Everyone was friendly and helpful. Clean new spacious rooms. Bunk beds were great for the kids. The water park is so great! FYI- No actual adult book but a small 3.5ft pool and a 1ft toddler pool. Two larger water slides fun for adults too! You book a 2hr session at designated time which at first I thought was annoying but perfect for us bc less crowded and made the kids leave when session ended. The restaurant is more of a cafe but worked us us. You can bring the food out to the pool area. They are have a gift shop and tiny market for snacks and plenty of drinks. Quick walk to Disneyland. Will stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Michelle G, We’re so happy to hear you had a great experience at Courtyard Anaheim. Our whole team works hard to provide a 5-star level of service and we’re glad you found that to be true. Kudos to you for trying the water slides—it sure is fun to be a kid again! Thanks again, and we hope to see you again soon. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Our family had the best hotel experience with Courtyard! The staff were extremely helpful, courteous and friendly. Having the water park, pool Bistro, store and workout room was such an added bonus. Being so close to the park entrance, we were able to come back to the water park for the afternoon then head back to Disneyland for the evening. Within walking distance of restaurants, Disney outlet and liquor store. We did take a quick Uber to Target for groceries and liquor but there are closer small convenience stores to walk to. Excellent accommodation!
Manager Response: Dear gschw2022, Thank you so much for your positive feedback! We’re thrilled to hear you found our staff to he helpful, courteous and friendly. We’re glad you were able to access many of our guests’ favorite amenities like the water park, on site market and gym. Thanks again for your kind words and for being a fantastic guest. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Very friendly and helpful staff willing to help with everything and location was perfect  we also ate there food was great and good service it was also very reasonable price wise I would definitely stay there again
Manager Response: Dear timmay1954, We are thrilled to know you had such a great visit! Thank you for sharing your kind words with us regarding our food and service. It means so much to us and to our entire team!  We look forward to seeing you again soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Would stay here again- worked great!
Summary: Stayed here for our long awaited trip to Disney. Great location, friendly staff, rooms were nice enough and we were not awakened by neighboring room- and the kids loved the slides on our off days !!! (Though I missed the full sized pool)
Manager Response: Dear christinenicholas1, We’re delighted to hear we delivered on your long awaited Disneyland vacation and we’re so pleased that you recommend our water park for time away from the parks. It’s fabulous to know all the sound-proofing has paid off! Getting a good night's sleep is so essential for a relaxing vacation. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and we look forward to welcoming you back soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great Hotel Easy Walk to Park!
Summary: The room were great, clean and perfect for our family vacation. The kids loved the waterpark! It was only a quick 7-10  minute walk from our door to the entrance even with our 2 year old and baby! We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear McMom53,  We are thrilled that you found our hotel to be the perfect location for your Disneyland visit. We love the quick walk over to Disneyland as well. Our property was built with families in mind, and it sounds like your kids really enjoyed our on site water park. We hope to welcome you again soon. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Not as good as it used to be…
Summary: Upon checking into room within minutes discovered the toilet was not working and would not flush, thee we handle was broken. We tried to call down to check in desk. Phone wasn’t working had to walk all the way down to lobby. We were given a new room with no assistance moving all the luggage. Newly issued room was fine but this was our 4th time staying and I can say this hotel is going downhill fast. I asked for late checkout as a silver Marriott reward member and was told I would need to do it morning of checkout, then morning of check was told it was not asked for or noted on my account. Very frustrating. We have had better service in the past, May have to research a new place to stay while visiting the happiest place on earth, which is sad given their great location.
Manager Response: Dear brandyann21, Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your experience while staying with us. Providing the highest level of hospitality is our number one priority and I sincerely apologize for failing to meet your expectations.  I also apologize the toilet in your room was not functioning properly and we did not provide the proper assistance in getting you settled into your new room.  Unfortunately  late checkout requests are prioritized by Marriott Bonvoy status which result in some late check out requests being denied in order for our hotel to have rooms available by check in time for the new arriving guest.  I hope you will find the perfect hotel for your future travel needs.

Summary: Friendly and helpful staff. Great location w/regards to Disneyland.   Water park for all ages to enjoy.  Food and beverages good.  Rooms (we had five reserved in our family) all clean and cared for.  Front desk clerks provide a warm welcome to all.
Manager Response: Dear stanaugustine, Thank you so much for your wonderful review—it’s always a treat to hear our guests describe the warm welcome they receive at Courtyard Anaheim.  We pride ourselves on giving our visitors the best vacation experience possible, and we’re so happy to hear that your entire family with five rooms found clean and well maintained guest rooms. We’re glad you were able to enjoy the Bistro and water park too! We hope to welcome you back again very soon for your next Disneyland getaway! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great room, fantastic location, decorated for the holidays.
Summary: A near-perfect stay.  Clean rooms, lots of space, fun layout with bunk beds and a king bed. Short walk to the park.  The only odd part was the shower curtain in the tub didn't extend low enough to function as intended.
Manager Response: Dear COSMolly,  Thank you so much for your positive review! We’re glad you enjoyed the Halloween decor, it adds just the right touch for the season! We’re glad you enjoyed the room layout with bunk beds and a king bed. Thank you for the feedback on the shower curtain, we certainly want everything to be perfect when staying at Courtyard Anaheim. We hope to see you again soon! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Love Marriott hotels. Had a wonderful stay. Took my family to Disneyland. The hotel is located within walking distance to the park. My family enjoyed their stay. They had a wonderful time at the water park too. Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear 457jennieb, Thank you for your incredible review! We’re delighted to hear you loved our hotel, especially as a frequent Marriott guest. We agree, being able to walk to Disneyland is such a perk. We’re so happy your family was able to enjoy the water park as well. We would love to have you back soon for another stay very soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Hotel was beautifully decorated for the Halloween activities and room was both spacious and comfortable. Employees of the Bistro were all particularly friendly and helpful. Small item but room towels were very nice and soft .
Manager Response: Dear L718JRroberts, Thank you for your 5-Star review! It’s always wonderful to hear you enjoyed our Halloween decorations. You’ll have to come back to see what we do for the holiday season as well. We’re certainly glad you chose Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance and were able to unwind after a long day at the parks. We truly appreciate hearing from you, especially about those little things like the soft towels. All those things certainly make you feel taken care of while on vacation. We look forward to welcoming you back for another magical stay in the future. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We loved our stay at the courtyard Marriott theme park entrance. When we arrived we were able to check-in early, the staff were courteous and helpful, the place was beautifully decorated for Halloween. The bedroom was spacious and clean and cool. The food and coffee were really good. We would definitely recommend this hotel and stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear emilypedrazzi, Thank you for your excellent review! It’s lovely to hear about our courteous and helpful staff. They make it a point to go out of their way for every guest, including accommodating early check in whenever possible.  We’re glad our unique space and water park was a hit for your family. We look forward to welcoming you back for many more magic hotel stays in the future! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We love this hotel. The rooms are comfortable clean and spacious. The service is excellent!! Across the street from Disneyland. Great for the family!! They have good food and Starbucks coffee. View of Disneyland
Manager Response: Dear necol2022, Thank you so much for your awesome review! We’re happy to hear how much you loved our clean, comfortable and spacious rooms. We love having bunk beds as a standard option. We’re glad you were able to taste-test a few things in our Bistro as well. We can’t wait to welcome you back at Courtyard Anaheim on your next Disneyland Resort vacation!  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Beautiful, clean and quiet hotel close to the entrance to Disneyland. I will absolutely stay here again and take advantage of the water park. The hosts and valets were super friendly and helpful and it made our visit special.
Manager Response: Dear gbbysmms, Thank you so much for your incredible review! We’re delighted to hear your stay was quiet and just as close to Disneyland as you imagined. We agree that water park time is a must, so we hope to see you back for a splashing-fun time. Thank you for shouting out to our hotel staff and valet team, they love hearing from guests as well. We’ll see you again soon! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Our stay was extremely comfortable, the staff was helpful and the service was beyond expectations. The rims were VERY clean and amenities just added to the experience. The pool reservations were helpful with allowing us to enjoy or time at surf side.
Manager Response: Dear xsleepyxboatx, Thank you for the wonderful review! To hear that Courtyard Anaheim went above and beyond your expectations is wonderful! We always enjoy hearing you enjoyed the uncrowded water park, it’s one of the reasons we have kept reservations in place for our guests. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This was our 6th visit back (first time post covid) and this hotel feels like home every time you walk in the lobby. The signature scent (white tea and fig?) brought me right back to our last visit in 2019 and it was better than every. The rooms are spacious and well designed with lots of storage, a dinette for eating in the room, bunk beds for the kids, a bathroom with a separate toilet/ stand up shower, and so much more. Beds are soft and comfortable and the AC worked great.  The pool and water park is a life saver for those hot California afternoons when you need to recharge before heading back to the park.  Special thank you to the front desk supervisor David Giang who went above and beyond over and over again providing the best customer service. From securing us an amazing
Manager Response: Dear amby6063, Thank you so much for your positive review! It’s our pleasure to welcome your family back year after year. We love being your home away from home. Yes, that white tea and fig scent certainly brings back the memories of Disneyland and Courtyard. We appreciate hearing how David helped you navigate our water park reservation system and was able to help it be an even more relaxing vacation. Counting down the days until your next visit! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: What can you say? It's a very nice and clean hotel with a waterpark! Kids loved it, we loved it. We have stayed here on multiple occasions. Highly recommend to those who have kids who love waterparks!
Manager Response: Dear PetePalacios, Thank you for your incredible review! We’re delighted to hear you have come back to stay with us again and again. It sounds like the perfect fit for your group and we’re glad you were able to enjoy the water park. We look forward to welcoming you back soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Very kind staff, clean bathrooms, and quiet for a hotel full of families. Love the space it was great for a family of 5 and everyone was comfortable! Nice walk to Disneyland and lots of food options Around the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear kms6x6,  Thank you for your 5-Star review!  It’s always wonderful to hear we hit the mark for families looking for a place near Disneyland. We’re certainly glad you chose Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance and enjoyed the space and layout with your family of 5. We truly appreciate you mentioning our staff and would love to welcome you back for another magical stay in the future. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The Courtyard by Marriott was the perfect hotel for our Disney trip! The amenities at the hotel paired with a ten minute walk to the park made for an unforgettable experience. I would highly recommend to anyone!
Manager Response: Dear Coelhoriley, Thank you for your excellent review! It’s lovely to hear you had an unforgettable experience with us.  We’re glad our unique amenities and quick walk to Disneyland made the visit even more enjoyable. We look forward to welcoming you back for many more magic hotel stays in the future! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Loved it! Super clean, amazing service, close to the Disneyland Parks and has a great water park! Cannot wait to visit again. Plenty of food options within easy walkable distance. Adorable gift shop. Hotel restaurant was good and prices reasonable and it offered Starbucks!
Manager Response: Dear heidiw395,  Thank you so much for your awesome review! It sounds like you were able to enjoy all the perks of staying at Courtyard Anaheim. We’re happy to hear the rooms were clean and welcoming. We love hearing from guests like you about their experience at the water park, shopping in our gift shop and of course the Starbucks in the lobby! We can’t wait to welcome you back for your next Disneyland Resort vacation!  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The room was large and perfect for my family Hotel was clean and nicely decorated for Halloween  Water park was great for the kids Easy walk to Disneyland  Lots of food choices within walking distance
Manager Response: Dear robertnOregon, Thank you so much for your incredible review! We’re delighted to hear you like our Halloween decor. It’s a great way to get into the season! We agree, the water park is a hit and glad your kids enjoyed it. We hope you’ll come stay with us for a quick walk to Disneyland when you return to Anaheim again! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great family hotel for Disney trip
Summary: Top notch family hotel for Disney trip.  Easy 10 minute walk to the front entrance AND there's a water park at the hotel if you need a change of pace.  Restaurant in the lobby is perfect for pre and post-park bites.  Plus my kids LOVED the bunk beds in our room.
Manager Response: Dear jonesyc13, Thank you for the wonderful review! To hear that Courtyard Anaheim was just the change of pace you needed during your Disneyland trip is awesome. The walk is indeed easy and we love hearing how your kids felt right at home with our bunk beds and water park. Our staff even grabs bites to eat on site and agree the Bistro is a perfect snack spot. We look forward to welcoming you back soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Our family of 6 loved this hotel (Kids are 11, 10, 7 and 3).  The kids loved the bunk beds and the water park. It's an easy walk over to Disneyland and there's tons of restaurants nearby. Starbucks downstairs was great the staff was so friendly.
Manager Response: Dear heatherbX4405CL,  Thank you so much for your positive review! Our property was built with families in mind and we’re so glad it worked perfectly for your children’s ages. We appreciate hearing they loved the bunk beds and water park! It’s always wonderful to hear about our staff as well. We hope to see you real soon for another stay at Courtyard Anaheim! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Excellent choice for visiting Disney. Very close to Disney gate. Absolutelynice people and cozy room condition. Pool is great to take a rest during lunch time when you enjoy Disney Land.  It was awesome time with my family.
Manager Response: Dear Seong Hun Y, We’re so happy to hear you had a great experience at Courtyard Anaheim.  Our whole team works hard to take care of each guest and their needs. It brings a smile to our faces to know your room was in excellent condition and our staff was kind. Thanks again, and we hope to see you again soon. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Just returned from 7 nights at the hotel. First and foremost I would like to thank Carrie Alen for the constant patience with putting up with me for the constant emails. Ok let's get down to business...  CLEANNESS - Put it this way, from my own experiences staying at other hotels around the world I ended up taking my own cleaning products just to disinfect and be on the safe side. I can honestly say I didn't need it, the room and bathrooms were really clean.  ROOM - Beds and pillows were really comfortable and very spacious. We had two queen beds and bunk beds. There is also a separate little lounge and table. Great for families  LOCATION - Great location, only 10 minute walk from the hotel to the entrance of Disneyland. McDonalds is also great which is along the way.  STAFF -
Manager Response: Dear Disneydan82, Wow! Thank you for your kind words. We agree, Carrie is amazing and we’re so glad you were pleased with her correspondence during the planning phases of your trip. We’re grateful for your feedback on all things cleanliness as well! It’s our pleasure to provide the best accommodations in Anaheim and we’re glad that this commitment was reflected in your visit. We’ll also let Elijah know how helpful he was during your stay. We know it’s a long journey but we hope to welcome you back soon! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great service, very clean rooms and hotel. We had 2 queen beds, bunk beds and 2 separate showers which was so helpful with our family of 5! We were very happy with our stay and sad to leave. The only request would be to lower prices at the cafe. $15 for a "large" pizza which really was a small didn't satisfy our family.
Manager Response: Dear mellydevason84, Thank you for your 5-Star review! It’s wonderful to hear you enjoyed the spacious room accommodations with 2 showers, 2 queens and a bunk bed. We’re certainly glad you chose Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance truly appreciate your feedback on the pizza size. We would love to welcome you back for another magical stay in the future. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great hotel to stay at close to Disneyland entrance! The staff were all very friendly and helpful. The hotel was very clean and decorated nicely for Halloween. The water park is perfect for little ones. My 9-year-old liked the two bigger slides in the park. The pool is very small and shallow, more for little kids. The only thing missing was a full-service bar and restaurant at this hotel. You can buy single beer and wine in the gift shop or at the cafe. You do have to order your food and drinks at the cafe counter. There are no servers taking your order at the table. The food we did have at the café was good and reasonably priced. We were upgraded to a pool view room. The beds in the room were ok, not the most comfortable. We also ended up with bunkbeds, and they were more
Manager Response: Dear kbaustin16, Thank you so much for your review! We’re so glad you enjoyed the Halloween decor. We strive to create a complete resort experience when staying at Courtyard Anaheim. We appreciate hearing your feedback on having servers poolside or even at the tables in the bistro area. We’re always looking for ways to improve and hope you’ll visit us again in Anaheim. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This is a great hotel. The staff is super friendly. The pool was absolutely awesome. You can see fireworks from the hotel. My kids loved the bunk beds. Would definitely stay here again when we come back to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear jennag874, Thank you for your incredible review! We’re delighted to hear our staff made your stay that much better! The fireworks view from the room is truly icing on the cake. We’re so happy you were able to enjoy the proximity to Disneyland and the bunk beds. We would love to have you back soon for another stay very soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Our room and the hotel was very nice. The staff was very friendly and helpful!The hotel was within a 10 minute walk to the front gate of Disneyland. There were nice restaurants closed to the hotel. The hotel had a nice restaurant and gift shop inside the hotel. The workout room and water park for the kids were nice.
Manager Response: Dear Explorer32798963844, Thank you for your excellent review!  It’s lovely to hear you enjoyed both our fitness center and water park. We’re proud to offer a variety of services, including our bistro right on site. We’re glad our gift shop and quick walk to Disneyland met your needs as well. We look forward to welcoming you back for many more magic hotel stays in the future! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: If you are staying on this side of the park, chose this hotel.
Summary: This lovely hotel has superior rooms, an excellent location, and a number of excellent amenities in its small footprint. Get a breakfast sandwich in the morning to power your line-waits or a to-go beer and late night snack from the quick service spot adjacent the check in desk on your way back to rest your tired, Disney feet. Then use the shower, the spacious, wonderful shower.
Manager Response: Dear DangerDannimal,  Thank you so much for your awesome review! Your title says it all, and we couldn’t agree more! We love the breakfast sandwich to fuel you in the morning on your way to Disneyland.  We can’t wait to welcome you back at Courtyard Anaheim on your next Disneyland Resort vacation!   Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Very nice, clean. Walking distance to Disneyland. I will recommend the hotel and will plan my next vacations in the same hotel. Everyone is friendly also the have a bistro place inside with really good food.
Manager Response: Dear sandrag16892022,  Thank you so much for your review! We’re delighted to hear that you plan to join us again for your next Disneyland vacation. We agree, walking distance to Disneyland is a must. We hope you’ll come stay soon and enjoy our tasty Bistro as well!  Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for families with young kids
Summary: Great place to stay if you have young kids. We walked to and from Disneyland every day during our stay to avoid parking and shuttles fees. We visited the water park on the hotel property our first day there and our girls (7 and 11) loved it. The hotel is clean and the staff is friendly and very accommodating.
Manager Response: Dear josetorrez72, Thank you for the wonderful review! To hear that Courtyard Anaheim worked so well for your family brightens our day. We are glad you got the best value from staying within walking distance to Disneyland, with the added benefit of our onsite water park. Thank you for your compliments to our staff, we’ll be sure to let them know!  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The hotel was very clean and modern.  The staff was extremely helpful.   It was conveniently located a block from the main resort entrances. My only complaint was the outrageous cost.  I could expect the price for a 5 star Marriott, but not for a Courtyard.
Manager Response: Dear WendyS877, Thank you so much for taking the time to review our property. We love the location being so close to Disneyland and we’re so glad you were able to go back and forth with ease. We appreciate hearing that our staff was so helpful during your visit. We always strive for  memorable and magical service here at Courtyard Anaheim! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Can’t wait to stay here again.
Summary: The room was very clean and spacious. Working with the staff was great, they answered all my questions and were very helpful. The hotel also has a great dinner and is within walking distance to other restaurants and the entrance of Disney.
Manager Response: Dear 03crownking, Thank you for your awesome review! We’re delighted to hear our staff was so helpful and attentive. We agree, the bistro on site has a great menu, even being walking distance from Disneyland it is still nice to have something nearby to choose from. We would love to have you back soon for another stay very soon. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Fantastic hotel close to Disneyland! Very clean, and all of the staff were absolutely wonderful. They even decorated the lobby for Halloween. The water park gave us a nice break every day from the heat. On site laundry, two stores, a decently priced bistro made everything very convenient. Rooms were very quiet and we did not hear any noise from rooms next to us, or above us. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear astropuff9, Thank you for your 5-Star review! We’re so glad to know you enjoyed our Halloween decor outside and in the lobby. It’s always wonderful to hear the convenience we offer with on site laundry, bistro and water park made a difference for your stay. We certainly strive for recommendations like yours and are delighted to hear about your experience. We hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Thanks for making my families trip to Disneyland such a magical experience! Our rooms were clean and spacious, the food was tasty and the waterpark was a nice relaxing break from the park during the kids nap times
Manager Response: Dear Abreen4, Thank you so much for your positive feedback! We’re thrilled to hear you enjoyed our water park, spacious rooms and tasty Bistro food. It is so great to know your family enjoyed it and all the amenities we offer. Thanks again for your kind words and for being a fantastic guest. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We had a great 6 night stay here in August 2022! What really stands out are the staff here. Everyone was so accommodating and friendly! The waterpark is awesome but we found the pool a little small. The coffee bar is very reasonably priced and so convenient for the morning. We would definitely stay here again! Also...the whole property smells lovely which seems silly but it's important!
Manager Response: Dear Q7024KGmeghanb, We are thrilled to know your six night vacation was everything you dreamed of. We’re so glad you enjoyed the water park and our on site Bistro for coffee and snacks. Our staff loves the scent of the property too, it is White Tea & Fig just in case you wondered! Attention to detail is so important to us and we’re glad our staff exceeded your expectations. Thank you for sharing your kind words with us.  We look forward to seeing you again soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Absolutely perfect for families visiting Disneyland
Summary: Family of 5 were absolutely loved this hotel! So convenient to Disneyland, and downtown Disney! We did Disneyland all day and let the kiddos play in the water park. Great cocktails from the little counter and the family loved the pizza!
Manager Response: Dear daisymcbreezy, We’re delighted to hear about your family vacation to Disneyland Resort and so glad we got to be part of it! We’re so pleased that you recommend our property for larger families and enjoy the quick access to Disneyland and Downtown Disney. We agree, the water park (and cocktails!) are a must!  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and we look forward to welcoming you back soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great location and bunk bed room
Summary: We stayed at the Courtyard Theme Park entrance for two nights.  We spent one day at Disneyland and the next morning at the water park before heading out.  The location is great - about a 10-15 minute walk to the park (and a McDonald's on the way if you want to grab breakfast to eat while you wait in line for the park to open).   We were surprised in a great way by our room.  Based on the pictures online we thought it would be our bed and the bunk bed in one room.  But that's the set up for the rooms with two queens and a bunk bed.  For a King with a bunk bed (our room type), the bunk bed is in its own nook.  This allowed us to be up even with the lights on after the kids went to bed.  The bathroom in between the nook and the room with the King and it had two showers, which was
Manager Response: Dear PhillyCali, We’re delighted to hear about your family’s 2 night stay at Courtyard and we’re so pleased that you found the king and bunk bed room the perfect place to unwind after a long day at Disneyland. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, along with the fireworks view and water park slides! We hope to welcome you back soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Good location to Disney; staff couldn't care less if you stayed.
Summary: The room was good.  The front desk staff were not particularly friendly and seemed like they were over the Disney crowd in general.  There's not a 'restaurant' on site, but a Starbucks type cafe that has a little extra food, if they're open.  It's a good location to walk to Disney, but to use the pool you have to make a reservation, which we did not know before we booked or we would have booked our stay elsewhere.
Manager Response: Dear Sp0ntane0usTraveller, Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your experience while staying with us. Providing the highest level of hospitality is our number one priority and I sincerely apologize for failing to meet your expectations.   I apologize you were not satisfied with your Front Desk staff experience, our Bistro and our reservations requirements for our waterpark and pool facilities.  Please contact me if I can provide any additional assistance.

Summary Heading: Not cheap, but everything you require in a hotel for visiting Disneyland
Summary: Excellent hotel. Valet parking and check-in were staff were very friendly, and did their jobs efficiently. Very close to Disneyland Park entrance - 5-10 minute walk, and McDonalds was only a couple of minutes walk.  Room was very large, and well furnished. A balcony included a view of Disneyland Park, with good view of fireworks display, but strangely no furniture on balcony. Hotel has an extensive water park, but I didn't visit it. Gift shops in hotel for food and drinks, as well as souvenirs.
Manager Response: Dear michaelmM3324WD, Thank you for your incredible review! We’re delighted to hear you enjoyed the fireworks view from your balcony. We certainly love our front row view as well! We’re delighted to hear you were able to enjoy a quick walk to Disneyland Resort and nearby dining locations, including our Bistro right inside the lobby. We would love to have you back soon for another stay very soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great visit, but frustrating water park
Summary: The hotel was great and the staff very friendly. They were always greeting us when we came and went, and we felt the service overall was fantastic. The rooms were clean and nicely renovated and the sound proofing was good. I really only have one complaint, and that is with respect to water park reservations. We primarily booked this hotel for the water parks but we’re disappointed we had to reserve and could only choose one two-hour slot per day of our trip. For the entire week, the 2:30-5pm slot was booked before we even got to the hotel. On top of this, having to decide ahead of time where you’re going to be was a challenge since Disneyland has a lot to offer. At the end of the day, we only made it to the water park for 3 short visits over our 6 night stay. If we were to go
Manager Response: Dear Jeremy222,   Thank you for choosing our hotel and for posting a review. We are so glad you enjoyed the room and our friendly staff. I apologize that you were unaware of our waterpark reservation requirement; we want our guests to be fully informed, so we provide that information in multiple locations on our webpage, as well as in the first sentence of our hotel description, and provide that information and a link to the waterpark reservation website on our email confirmation notices.  It is our goal to provide all our guests with an opportunity to enjoy our waterpark in a safe, clean, and uncrowded environment. When our hotel is busy, we have up to 800 guests in house and we have found that our reservation system helps us to deliver on our most important goals: the safety and health of our guests. The reservation system prevents over-crowding and ensures we do not exceed the fire marshal and health department maximum occupancy limits at our water park.  The scheduled, periodic closures help to ensure that optimum water chemistry is maintained throughout the day - this allows our filtration system, UV light purification system, and chemical feeders to effectively do their jobs and ensures each session has optimal water safety. Additionally, the closures allow us to clean and prepare the water park facility and furniture for each new session. In addition to the 1 reservation per day per room we do welcome “walk-ins” for our registered guests for additional sessions at the waterpark when it is not fully booked. We hope to host you again sometime for another chance at making your stay more magical. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great staff and very close to Disneyland!
Summary: What a great stay at this property! All the reviews complimenting the staff have been deserved. We've stayed at numerous Marriott properties and can honestly say that the attitude of this staff has been one of the best we've encountered. Thank you Jeff and David at the front desk for being so accommodating when we needed to check in a little earlier (and our room wasn't ready yet) because our baby was napping.
