The close proximity to the Disneyland, reasonable parking rates, water park, friendly staff that you could tell love their jobs and large and clean rooms all make this property the perfect hotel to stay at for a trip to Disneyland. Only cons are no free breakfast (but it's a Courtyard and they normally don't offer free breakfast so it's not a surprise), yes you need
Manager Response: Dear Dream49442058559, Thank you for your 5-Star review! It’s always wonderful to hear our staff went above and beyond to make your stay even better. We’ll be sure to thank Jeff and David for their service and care during your stay.  We’re certainly glad you chose Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance and enjoyed the large rooms and water park. We truly appreciate your kindness and would love to welcome you back for another magical stay in the future. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: YOU MUST RESERVE FOR THE WATER PARK, CANNOT GO AT ANY TIME.
Summary: the rooms were very clean, you have a great staff. however what is disappointing and will not be staying there , and sharing with family/friends is the reservations for the water park. having to reserve to go to disneyland or california adventure is more than enough stress. and then to have to plan our day around reserving for the water park. you do know people stay here because of that??? having to schedule around that as well is ridiculous, instead of having the FREEDOM to go at any time. yes i know , everyone's new excuse, due to covid. perhaps at the time of booking you should disclose this , when it says non-refundable not wait until 72 hours prior to staying that one important fact,that reservations are needed and can no longer cancel and get your money back. An abuse to
Manager Response: Dear sandradL9660OU, Thank you for choosing our hotel and for posting a review. I apologize that you were unaware of our waterpark reservation requirement; we want our guests to be fully informed, so we provide that information in multiple locations on our webpage, as well as in the first sentence of our hotel description, and provide that information and a link to the waterpark reservation website on our email confirmation notices.  It is our goal to provide all our guests with an opportunity to enjoy our waterpark in a safe, clean, and uncrowded environment. When our hotel is busy, we have up to 800 guests in house and we have found that our reservation system helps us to deliver on our most important goals: the safety and health of our guests. The reservation system prevents over-crowding and ensures we do not exceed the fire marshal and health department maximum occupancy limits at our water park.  The scheduled, periodic closures help to ensure that optimum water chemistry is maintained throughout the day - this allows our filtration system, UV light purification system, and chemical feeders to effectively do their jobs and ensures each session has optimal water safety. Additionally, the closures allow us to clean and prepare the water park facility and furniture for each new session. In addition to the 1 reservation per day per room we do welcome “walk-ins” for our registered guests for additional sessions at the waterpark when it is not fully booked.

Summary: Loved watching fire works from balcony big room friendly staff liked refrigerator and microwave beds comfortable quite room valet people nice cage in hotel lobby very good and fast service people very helpful with luggage water slide great
Manager Response: Dear suehumbertrico, Thank you so much for your positive review! The fireworks view from the balcony is one of our favorite perks when staying at Courtyard Anaheim, too! We appreciate hearing how our staff made your visit even more memorable. We strive to keep our guests happy and relaxed during their vacation. We hope to see you again very soon. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Outstanding service, great facility, excellent location
Summary: Unexpectedly OUTSTANDING. The people make the place. Yes, it's an extremely convenient location for visiting Disney. The rooms themselves are awesome with the bunk beds and double shower. All of that was well worth it, but what put it over the top was the truly top tier service and attitude from every single employee, from arrival until departure. When we came back at the end of a great but thoroughly exhausting day at Disney, we were welcomed back with what seemed like genuine warmth. Our last few vacations have been spent at JW Marriots in various locations and none offered the service of this Courtyard.
Manager Response: Dear ccidentalf, We are thrilled to know our staff treated you with such kindness and attention during every part of your stay. We’re glad you enjoyed our standard rooms which all include bunk beds and double showers. Thank you for sharing your kind words with us—it means so much to us and to our entire team!  We look forward to seeing you again soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Fantastic property! I cannot recommend highly enough for the cozy rooms, kind staff, and great amenities. Our kids loved the water park, the walk to/from Disneyland was barely 10 minutes, and we were always greeted with a smile. The staff working in the hotel shop were incredibly kind - Gregory made sure we had all we needed. Excellent stay!
Manager Response: Dear QstacyinTX, We’re delighted to hear about your recent stay with us and so pleased that you love our cozy rooms, amenities and Surfside water park! Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences, especially regarding our team members. We’ll be sure to let Gregory know you felt well taken care of. We look forward to welcoming you back soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The hotel was centrally located, clean and staff were very friendly. We would definitely return and I have already recommended it to friends looking to go to Disneyland. The rooms are large and very clean. The pool are was wonderful for our 6year old!
Manager Response: Dear elliedorosz,  We are thrilled to know you have already recommended Courtyard Marriott to your friends and family.  We’re glad you enjoyed our large rooms that come with each standard booking. It’s always a blast at Surfside Water Park and we love seeing families make memories there. We look forward to seeing you again soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We had a wonderful time at your resort while visiting Disneyland!  Room was spacious enough for the 6 of us, clean and modern, plus the double showers and sinks helped us navigate the bathroom in a timely manner.  The kids loved the water park, good for kids of all ages!
Manager Response: Dear nancyj7192020, Thank you for your kind words. It’s our pleasure to provide the best family hotel within walking distance to Disneyland and glad your family of six fit comfortably. We love hearing that our Surfside Water Park had something for everyone in your group as well. We look forward to hosting you next time! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great family stay, and the two hours in the water park was a great option for the afternoon.  There were kind and helpful staff.  And the pizza that the hotel served was pretty good too.  Everyone in the family really enjoyed it.
Manager Response: Dear Rmanterg, We’re delighted to hear about your recent stay with us including your afternoon poolside at Surfside Waterpark. We’re so pleased that you recommend our onsite dining options from the Bistro. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and we look forward to welcoming you back soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great place to stay for Disneyland or any other adventure. The staff was super friendly and attentive. The rooms are huge. The pool area is nice for kids who love water slides and play areas. The food is ok. You should drive or uber to nearby restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear b0ugiew,  Thank you for your 5-Star review! It’s always wonderful to hear our staff was friendly and attentive. We certainly strive for excellence and are glad to know you enjoyed our oversized guest rooms as well as the water slides! Thank you again for your kind words, we hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great room, fun water park, and friendly staff. Everything was clean. The coffee bar was nice to have in the morning. It was a short walk to Disney Land. valet parking was convenient. We really enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Dear kcarney2022, Thank you for your awesome review! We’re delighted to hear you found our property clean, convenient and fun! The short walk to Disneyland is definitely a plus. We would love to have you back soon for another stay very soon. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We have stayed here twice and we have been completely satisfied with our experience both times. The location is so convenient and the facility is meticulous. The rooms with bunk beds are a great offering for a family traveling with kids. The water park is fun and the bistro has convenient and reasonable food and drinks. Service is great and we had a particularly excellent experience with Ron the valet, who is very cheerful, knowledgeable and helpful. Highly recommend this hotel for any family visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear MatthewM06, Welcome back and thank you so much for your positive review! Our valet team is indeed top-notch and we’re so glad Ron was there to greet you with a smile! We appreciate hearing our convenient location next to Disneyland Resort works well for your family. We hope to see you real soon for another stay at Courtyard Anaheim! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The hotel was very clean. Proximity to the park made for an easy walk. The kids loved the waterpark and the food options at the cafe in the lobby exceed expectations. Every single employee we interacted with was very helpful and friendly. One of our best hotel stays anywhere!
Manager Response: Dear Cruzimoto,  Thank you for the wonderful review! To hear that Courtyard Anaheim was one of the best hotels you have stayed at is an honor. We always enjoy hearing from families and glad you enjoyed our onsite Bistro and splashing around at our waterpark. We look forward to welcoming you and the kids back soon!  Sincerely,   Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Wonderful experience during our 4 night stay
Summary: Exceptional valet, front desk and concierge service. Cafe was a great option for meals and morning coffee. Cafe staff could not have been nicer. Reservation system at the water park turned out to be a plus since it was never overcrowded and helped us plan our day. Easy walk to the park. Great view of Disney fireworks from the water park. Impeccably clean. Every staff member we encountered was pleasant and accommodating. Hope to return someday!
Manager Response: Dear CaitMC77, Thank you so much for your incredible review! We’re delighted to hear our front desk, valet and entire staff exceeded your expectations. We agree, the reservation windows for Surfside Waterpark are a plus keeping the area clean and uncrowded. We hope you’ll come stay and watch fireworks with us again soon when you return to Anaheim! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This hotel is amazing for families. The customer service was exceptional and the pool and slides were so much fun for the whole family. The bistro also offered lots of great food options at reasonable prices. Definitely order the Mickey Mouse pancakes for your first morning at Disney. We can’t wait to come back!
Manager Response: Dear Bcopz,   Thank you so much for your awesome review! We’re happy to hear how much your entire family enjoyed the pool and water slides—adults included! We love that the Bistro has so many options for a variety of palates and prices. We can’t wait to welcome you back at Courtyard Anaheim on your next Disneyland Resort vacation!   Sincerely,   Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Nice clean rooms with very friendly staff. Having the bunkbeds in the room made it very comfortable for the kiddos and the double shower is amazing. We will definitely be making this hotel our home away from home for future trips.
Manager Response: Dear kierab2019,  Thank you for your excellent review! It’s lovely to hear you have found your home away from home at Courtyard. We’re glad our unique room amenities like bunk beds and double showers met your family's needs. We look forward to welcoming you back for many more magic hotel stays in the future! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entranc

Summary: I really love this hotel, staff was friendly and welcoming. We went for 1 night stay as a staycation. My son and his friends enjoy the water park. The cafe is amazing and have great cocktails. Can’t wait to go again
Manager Response: Dear mslilbit17,  Thank you for your 5-Star review! It’s always wonderful to hear our staff was welcoming and attentive. We’re certainly glad you chose Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance for your staycation and enjoyed the waterpark and cocktails! We truly appreciate your kind words and hope to welcome you back for another magical stay in the future. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Decent stay but front desk is still one of the worst in Marriott family.
Summary: Front desk could be worst I have ever experienced.  No mention of your status with Marriott and certainly no perks of spending close to $500 a night.  Other than the close parking (which is an absolute ripoff as it is required) there is nothing special with this motel.  I use the word motel because that is what the front desk treats you like when checking in or asking for anything.   The bistro employees are some of the best around.  The water park employees are great as well.  Overall poor experience and not much has changed in the last few years.
Manager Response: Dear greercory, As we pride ourselves on delivering a memorable hotel experience during your travels, we have unfortunately fallen short of our goal during your recent stay.  Please contact me directly at your convenience to discuss your interaction with our Front Desk team.  I look forward to hearing your feedback as our goal is to deliver a memorable experience to every guest that walks thru our doors.  Thank you.

Summary: The valet service was top notch and  the staff went beyond expectations to make our stay memorable. The hotel was also a very fun place to stay with kids. They had a great time in the water park and the dual showers in the bathroom made getting ready each morning easy and quick for the group of us… we’ll be back!
Manager Response: Dear mrmack15, Thank you for your incredible review! We’re delighted to hear our staff exceeded your expectations and you were able to enjoy our on property waterpark. We would love to have you back soon for another stay very soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: A very short walk to Disneyland/California adventure. Awesome water park for the kids. Its hard to find accommodations for a family of 5 or 6, the bunk beds make it possible to avoid booking 2 rooms elsewhere. Only slight disappointment was the nearby freeway noise, but really not a huge issue.
Manager Response: Dear Jennyjinjan, Thank you so much for your positive review! The short walk to Disneyland Resort is certainly a perk when staying at Courtyard Anaheim. We appreciate hearing the bunk beds and room layout fit your family perfectly! We strive to be the best family location near Disneyland and hope to welcome you back very soon. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Stayed there while going to Disney. Staff was very helpful, accommodating and friendly.  Bistro was reasonably priced with quick service. We should have eaten every meal there. Water park was a great break from the heat for the kids. Overall great place to stay while going to Disney
Manager Response: Dear Rolimeca,  Thank you for the wonderful review! We always enjoy hearing from families and glad you enjoyed meals at our onsite Bistro. It sounds like many magical memories were made both at Disneyland and our on site waterpark. We look forward to welcoming you and the kids back soon!  Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Awesome  stay everyone and everything was great. Pool and slides the kids had a great time. Pool was 2 hour appointments  and worked out beautifully. Also rented a scooter to use during our stay. I was pleasantly reasonable.
Manager Response: Dear Avescelius, Thank you so much for your incredible review! We’re delighted to hear your family enjoyed our pool area. We are so glad the reservation windows for Surfside Waterpark fit your needs. We hope you’ll come to see us again soon when you return to Anaheim! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We loved our stay! The staff is top notch and the property is well maintained. The rooms are spacious, clean and configured well for families! The water park is also perfect for kiddos. There are several spot around the property that provide wonderful views of the fireworks too!
Manager Response: Dear JuLo2012, Thank you so much for your lovely review! We’re delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay at Courtyard Anaheim and that you especially loved getting to enjoy spectacular views of the fireworks, our spacious rooms, and the top-tier hospitality from our dedicated team. We’re thrilled you were able to spend time at our fun water park too, and hope to have the chance to welcome you all back soon for another unforgettable vacation.   Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Quality offsite option when visiting Disneyland
Summary: This hotel was everything we were looking for in Anaheim when visiting DLR.  Yes, it is pricey in comparison to some of the neighboring Harbor Drive hotels but it is worth it if you have kids who will make use of the waterpark/pool area and think bunkbeds are the coolest!    Hotel is very clean, all staff (front desk, valets, housekeeping, lifeguards) were incredibly friendly and helpful.  You must have waterpark/pool reservations, but I had no issues changing my timeslot 3 of the 6 days we were there based on our activities in the parks.  I was impressed the waterpark was in such great condition - it basically looked brand new - which is impressive given the daily wear and tear it experiences.    Check in was after 4 because our room was not ready, but front desk gave us an
Manager Response: Dear GrandTour40258436191, Thank you very much for your glowing review! We understand how important it is to make sure our guests feel safe and well taken care of, and we strive to ensure that our accommodations and amenities are kept to the highest standards of cleanliness. We’re so happy to know that you and your family were able to relax and enjoy all of the fun Courtyard Anaheim has to offer. Thank you again so much for your review; whether you’re in town for another Disney adventure, or just looking for a place to unwind and escape, we can’t wait to host you again and welcome you back for another magical vacation.   Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: I loved that it was within walking distance to Disneyland.  And loved that it has rooms with 2 queen beds and bunkbeds. It is perfect for our family. I loved the view from our balcony of the park. Within walking distance to places to eat.
Manager Response: Dear Paulinespeirs, Thank you so much for the enthusiastic review! We’re delighted to hear that our spacious accommodations were the perfect fit for your family. It’s always a plus when you can see the sights of Disneyland right outside your window. We hope you’ll come to see us again soon when you return to Anaheim! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We had a room with two queen beds and a set of bunkbeds.  It was the perfect size for our needs - 4 adults and two kids.  There was a tub and two showers which came in handy after a day at the parks.  Within walking distance to the parks.  Grandkids had fun at the water park.  Like that there are reservations for the water park as it keeps it from getting too crowded.  Breakfast at the hotel was great.
Manager Response: Dear Jkdlkd, Thank you for the wonderful review! We always enjoy hearing from families and glad you enjoyed our two shower rooms and bunk beds. I am sure many magical memories were made both at Disneyland and our on site water park. We appreciate you pointing out our reservation process so everyone can enjoy the slides and pool area with plenty of space. We look forward to welcoming you and the grandkids back soon! Sincerely,   Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Honestly beat hotel yet. Hospitality was great, the employees were so helpful and kind. Excellent customer service. The food was good, and the water park in the hotel was awesome. I also cannot forget they have the most comfortable beds! We stayed in a 2 queen beds and a bunk bed room. It was very roomy and even had a small dinning area. I loved that it also has 2 showers, made getting ready a lot easier. We also loved that’s it right across the street from Disney land,!quick 10 min walk. We loved our stay here and will definitely be returning!
Manager Response: Dear Maricelarvizu92, Thank you so much for your positive review! We’re thrilled to have been able to give you and your family such a fantastic vacation experience at Courtyard Anaheim. We appreciate hearing from you about our staff, on site dining at the Bistro and guest accommodations. We strive to be the best family location near Disneyland and would love to welcome you back very soon! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The hotel was very clean, the staff was super friendly, and the kids had a good time at the pool/water slides.  Our room was upgraded to a king suite, so we had plenty of room.  The walk to the front gate of Disneyland took about 10 minutes. The only thing I would have changed about the trip was to add an additional night after our day at Disneyland so we didn't have to drive after a long day.
Manager Response: Dear R_Family2014, Thank you for your incredible review! We’re delighted to hear you enjoyed your upgraded King Suite room and took time to enjoy our on property water park. We would love to have you back soon for a longer stay and keep the magic going even longer next time! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: I thought your staff were incredibly helpful, polite and  most importantly so attentive to us travelers with families. I'm a Bonvoy Gold  member and just starting to travel again due to pandemic and will certainly recommend your facility to friends and family.
Manager Response: Dear APolce,  Thank you for your 5-Star review! It’s always wonderful to hear our staff was attentive to your family. We’re certainly glad you chose Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance to kick off your Bonvoy Gold travels again. We truly appreciate your kind words and hope to welcome you back for another magical stay in the future! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This was our third time to stay at this hotel. It is a great hotel for visiting Disneyland, especially if you're a Marriott Bonvoy member. My only suggestion to hotel ownership is to add Disney themes to the room to make it an extra magical experience.
Manager Response: Dear Robbiem73,  Thank you for your excellent review! It’s lovely to hear you enjoyed your third visit with us as a Marriott Bonvoy member. We look forward to welcoming you back for many more magic hotel stays in the future!  Sincerely,   Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: It was a great location just a short walk from the main entrance of the Disneyland resort. We had a great view from our balcony watching the nightly fireworks display too, overlooking both the Matterhorn and Space Mountain. Staff was great, room was very clean and the best part was the double shower and separate space with bunk beds for the kiddos! Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Coxfamily723,   Thank you so much for your awesome review! We’re happy to hear how much your family enjoyed nightly fireworks from the comfort of your room and balcony. We love that every room comes standard with the double shower, too. We can’t wait to welcome you back at Courtyard Anaheim on your next Disneyland Resort vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Nice hotel. The lack of breakfast options was a real burden. All these families trying to get out of the door early for Disneyland, and minimal food options. A free buffet would have been amazing, one I could have paid for would be a close second. A huge oversight for this location
Manager Response: Dear rgnorth, As we pride ourselves on delivering a memorable hotel experience during your travels, we have unfortunately fallen short of our goal during your recent stay. Please accept my sincere apology for not meeting your expectations concerning our services and amenities. I know how satisfying it is when you find the perfect hotel for your individual needs; one that offers all the services and amenities you want and none of the ones you don't. I apologize that we were not the right hotel for you but hope you will consider other Marriott hotels for your future travel needs. Marriott has 30 hotel brands in its collection which range from luxury hotels such as the Ritz Carlton to economy hotels such as the Fairfield Inn - I hope you will find the perfect Marriott hotel for your future travel needs.

Summary Heading: WHAT A JOKE THIS PLACE HAS BECOME
Summary: Paper thin walls. Had to complain about the noise multiple times. Couldn’t sleep after a long day at the park. Front desk wouldn’t give us an extra our to check out but instead said we could book another night at $549. They had the availability but wouldn’t give us the time. Their pool is extremely small so unless you want to play in the water park, good luck! Oh, and if you don’t reserve your pool time you’re not getting access to the water park. WHAT A JOKE!  This property is too expensive for what it has to offer. There are plenty other properties close to the park and at these prices, I recommend you pay a little extra, book ahead and stay at one of the Disneyland properties.
Manager Response: Dear Extraordinary729111, Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your experience while staying with us. Providing the highest level of hospitality is our number one priority and I sincerely apologize for failing to meet your expectations.  Unfortunately during our peak seasons such as summer our late checkouts are prioritized by Marriott Bonvoy status which result in other late check out requests being denied in order for our hotel to have rooms available by check in time for the new arriving guest.  I apologize you experienced some noisy neighbors and were not satisfied with our pool facilities.   I hope you will find the perfect hotel for your future travel needs.

Summary: Great Hotel.  New, Clean, really great layout in the rooms with excellent Bathroom.  Separate toilet and large shower.  Double vanity with a tub/shower area.  Perfect for families.  The room has a long counter with storage .  Great for suitcases access or organization of vacation items or folded clothes. Has a mini Fridge. The rooms are very quiet.  Pool and slides are refreshing.  Grandkids loved it.  Used it the night we arrived and through out our stay. Hotel also has a Starbucks type of cafe and little market with refreshments , chips and candies. Then there is a store with some refreshments, souvenirs and clothing. Staff is very friendly.  Valet parking only at $30 per day.   You can get a view room for a few hundred more to see the pool slides and fireworks if that is
Manager Response: Dear Explorer18922906915,   Thank you so much for your kind five-star review! We are so happy to hear that your incredible stay was made even better by our prime location, beautiful water park, and super spacious accommodations—not to mention our welcoming staff! It’s a treat to know we’ll be seeing you again, and we look forward to welcoming you and your family back for another fantastic vacation.  Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Location is great, room and facilities are fantastic. We love the bunk beds and the water park.  The restaurant is also very good, with healthy options for adults after all that theme park food, and a solid kids menu. Only drawback is that not all rooms have the best beds.
Manager Response: Dear amlala2022,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! Courtyard Anaheim is designed to give guests of all ages a fantastic vacation experience, and we’re so pleased to hear that your family enjoyed every aspect of your stay. We hope to have you back again soon for another unforgettable vacation!   Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Love this hotel!  Great service, clean rooms, and having two showers in our room is fantastic!  So close to Disneyland and it’s nice to have a Panera and other restaurants close by. We always use this hotel when going to DL!
Manager Response: Dear Michelle C,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! It’s such a treat to hear that every aspect of your time with us was magical and memorable, from our amazing amenities to our world-class staff. We look forward to having you back again the next time you’re planning another Disneyland vacation!   Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We thought our stay was good. We had a room with a balcony but no chairs to sit on. The food and coffee in the morning was great, Service was quick. Breakfast for the kids was well thought out. I was a little shocked that I had to make a reservation for the pool.
Manager Response: Dear thetindoctor, Thank you so much for your lovely review! We’re thrilled to hear that you and your family enjoyed your overall stay at Courtyard Anaheim. Our reservation system for the pool helps to prevent overcrowding and make our guests feel comfortable, and we hope you and your family were able to enjoy the water park to the fullest. Should your travels bring you back, we look forward to welcoming you once again for an even better Disneyland vacation!   Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: One bedroom suite- perfect for families
Summary: Wonderful hotel with great rooms. One bedroom suite perfect set up for 4 person family. Easy walking distance to Disneyland. Great bistro food and fun water park. Would definitely plan on staying here future visits. Staff was always wonderful and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear ahenderson0709 Thank you so much for your gracious review! We are glad our family-friendly amenities, convenient location, and our wonderful staff made for a great vacation. Our incredible amenities are truly the foundation of our operation at Courtyard Anaheim, and we’re so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay to the fullest. We hope to welcome you and your family back soon for another fantastic vacation!  Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great location and great service. A few minutes walk to the theme park entrances and a great waterpark for a break in between - our kids loved it! A special shoutout to Lynzie, Charlotte and Adrianna who helped us replace the ‘care whale’ for our son that we lost!
Manager Response: Dear Lukas,   Thank you so much for your generous review! Top-notch hospitality is a top priority at Courtyard Anaheim, and we’re so happy to hear that our dedicated staff went above and beyond to help make your stay relaxing and enjoyable. It was a real treat to host you and your family, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another wonderful stay.  Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great hotel for those visiting Disneyland
Summary: Great staff - everyone was friendly and helpful.  Great location - it was an easy walk to Disneyland  Great water play- area.  The pool and play areas required reservations which made them not so crowded.  The weather was great for the kids.    Bar options are a bit limited at the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear ML166, Thank you for the five-star review! It’s always been our goal to provide incredible getaways for all our guests, and we’re delighted to hear that was exactly your experience. It’s such a delight to know that our unique location, magical amenities, and dedicated team members made your family vacation even more special. We truly appreciate your kind words and hope to welcome you back for another exciting adventure in the future!  Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Fantasmic and fantastic in every way!
Summary: Each employee we encountered from the front desk  to the restaurants, shops, and water park were friendly and helpful. All were very accommodating. :-) The water park is a fantastic feature of this hotel! The kids and adults loved it! It is very helpful that The Bistro is open from early morning until late at night and the food is very good. I highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear kimberlyr0se21, Thank you so much for your positive review! It’s a pleasure to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay at Courtyard Anaheim and that our spacious accommodations and fun amenities made your time with us even better. We’re thrilled that you enjoyed our delightful food and beverage options and hope that we’ll have the chance to welcome you back again soon for another excellent vacation experience!   Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Everything was amazing! Rooms were cleaned and very nice. My daughter loved the balcony and the bunk beds. The staff was very nice and friendly! Valet was very convenient, didn’t have to worry about parking.
Manager Response: Dear salinacatano, What a wonderful review! It was a real treat to host you and your family, and we’re thrilled to hear you especially enjoyed our spacious rooms, fun amenities, and top-tier team. We hope we’ll have the opportunity to welcome you back for your next California getaway! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Everyone we were in contact with from the front desk to the bistro staff to housekeeping were so nice and friendly and helpful! The rooms were clean and spacious- the bunk beds were great for families! And the water park was such a nice option to have right there!  A fairly close walk to the parks, and good dining options close by eliminated the need for a rental car which was also a plus! The only thing that would have made this stay better would be a free breakfast buffet!
Manager Response: Dear Soon2BEmptyNester, Thank you so much for the five stars! How wonderful to hear that our dedicated staff was able to go above and beyond for you to make your time with us even more enjoyable and relaxing! It’s a delight to know that our convenient location and expansive accommodations helped you truly enjoy all that we have to offer. If you ever find yourself back in Anaheim, we hope we’ll have the chance to welcome you and your family again for another incredible vacation. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: A WONDERFUL PLACE TO STAY IN ANAHEIM!
Summary: We were more than pleased with our stay at the Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim Theme Park Entrance! They were kind, helpful, and welcoming!  We were so pleased with the room - two queen beds and a bunk bed with 2 twins - and TWO SHOWERS (one with a tub)! We could have used these types of rooms when our family of 6 traveled in the midwest as our children were growing up! So nice! And the employees were so very helpful. We needed help with a fax and then they helped us when our credit card had been hacked - by alerting us as soon as the new one arrived! We highly recommend this place and have already! Also, guest services had items up to the room very quickly if we had a need. Thank you to everyone!
Manager Response: Dear MaWa2323, Thank you so much for the wonderful review and comments. Leaving out guests with memorable vacation memories has always been our top priority, and we’re delighted to have been able to do just that. From our spacious rooms to the attentive hospitality of our team, we are happy to see that every moment of your stay was memorable and magical. We can’t wait to welcome you and your family back again for another excellent experience! Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great for children, easy to go to the park, come back to the hotel and pool, then back to the park.  Good service, great rooms for a family with children. Appreciate help for handicapped. Will come back
Manager Response: Dear Aklipm,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review! It’s a pleasure to hear that every aspect of your time at Courtyard Anaheim went above and beyond your expectations, from our fun pool for the kids to the convenience of our location to Disneyland! We’re delighted that you had such a fantastic vacation with us, and we hope to have the chance to welcome you back again soon for another unforgettable family getaway.  Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: A Heaven Sent Disney Vacation at the Courtyard by Marriott
Summary: We were so well treated upon our very early arrival and given access to our rooms before heading out to Disneyland.  Everything was centrally located and we lacked for nothing and  the concierge.was so helpful.  Thanks!
Manager Response: Dear themmert1, Thank you for your incredible review! We’re always striving to provide the best possible experience for our guests and it’s a delight to hear that you and your family had an amazing and comfortable stay at our hotel. We can’t wait to welcome you all back again soon for another unforgettable vacation experience!  Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Convenient to Disneyland and great all around
Summary: Really a fantastic hotel...nice and clean and quiet. Nine minute walk to Disneyland! Had a great bellman that brought out bags in that told us what we needed to know and made us feel welcome. I've stayed at a lot of Marriott-brand hotels and this was one of the best. I'd rate it 10 out of 5 if I could.
Manager Response: Dear NerdDad42, Thank you so much for your wonderful review! It’s a real pleasure to hear that every aspect of your time with us was fantastic, thanks to our amazing amenities, convenient location, and our top-tier staff. We’re delighted that you had such a marvelous experience, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again for your next California getaway!  Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This hotel is simply excellent. Every single staff member goes out of their way to make your stay as good as it can be. The hotel is spotless, and the service is second to none. It offers exceptional value for money and is literally a 10 minute walk to the Disney gates. We couldn’t fault it.
Manager Response: Dear SkelmELH, Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We’re always striving to give our guests an incredible hotel experience from start to finish, and it’s a delight to hear that our friendly staff went out of their way to make you feel so welcome. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Better waterpark pool area than the actual Disney hotels!
Summary: We stayed here to go to Disneyland the next day.  Let's put it this way...my 8 yr old talked more about the fun hotel stay here than she did Disneyland after a day at Disneyland.     Definitely the Waterpark pool area and the fact that every room comes with bunk beds for the kids is the best part of this hotel.  Only negative comment I would make is the daily parking fee is $30 and if you keep your car there after check out time on the day of departure  they charge you another $30 which seems unfair to me but not enough to take off a star.
Manager Response: Dear Hanh N, Thank you so much for your fabulous review! We’re delighted to hear that your kiddo couldn’t stop raving about our amazing water park and bunk beds—what a compliment! We’re so glad to have been able to give you and your family such a memorable vacation experience, and we hope we’ll get to welcome you back again soon. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Loved this hotel and close proximity to the park entrance! It was a .5 mile walk which was about 10 mins.  We took advantage of the waterpark on the day we arrived and it was a perfect 2.5 hour play session for the kids.  They loved the room, the bunk beds and the bistro/restaurant downstairs. Overall, it was a great stay.
Manager Response: Dear vcaleca2022, Thank you so much for your lovely review! It’s a pleasure to hear that you and your family loved every aspect of your Courtyard Anaheim stay, from our convenient Disneyland location to our super cool bunk bed accommodations. We hope we’ll have the chance to welcome you back for another perfect vacation! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This is our number one choice of hotels to stay at when visiting Anaheim (and we’ve tried A LOT of them). The staff is always very welcoming, warm and helpful,  and the rooms are spacious, clean and comfortable. We love the bunkbeds and the little corner table nook. And the water park is AWESOME!
Manager Response: Dear marybg5678, Thank you so much for your marvelous review! What an honor it is to be your go-to hotel when visiting Anaheim. We’re delighted to have been able to give you a comfortable and exciting vacation experience from check-in to check-out, and we look forward to welcoming you back again for many more wonderful stays in the future! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great Hotel the staff was exceptional and my kids loved the water park I would stay at this hotel every time I visit Disneyland I highly recommend and will encourage friends and family to stay at this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear BeedyDaKid, Thank you so much for your positive review! We’re thrilled to have been able to give you and your family such a fantastic vacation experience at Courtyard Anaheim. We greatly appreciate your enthusiastic recommendation, and we can’t wait to welcome you back again for another unforgettable stay in the future. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The Hotel was clean, and convenient to Disneyland, which was primary reason for selecting. However it was missing many conveniences Marriott  clients have come to expect. No room service, no full service bar, bistro was minimal at best.  When charging to your room you need to yell your full room number and last name for them to verify you prior to ringing up your order. Everyone near you can hear and then make charges to your room, as they have all the information. Parking for hotel guest is very expensive over $30/day.
Manager Response: Dear rw97062, As we pride ourselves on delivering a memorable hotel experience during your travels, we have unfortunately fallen short of our goal during your recent stay. Please accept my sincere apology for not meeting your expectations concerning our services and amenities. I know how satisfying it is when you find the perfect hotel for your individual needs; one that offers all the services and amenities you want and none of the ones you don't. I apologize that we were not the right hotel for you but hope you will consider other Marriott hotels for your future travel needs. Marriott has 30 hotel brands in its collection which range from luxury hotels such as the Ritz Carlton to economy hotels such as the Fairfield Inn - I hope you will find the perfect Marriott hotel for your future travel needs.

Summary: Clean room, food was delicious. Personal was very nice. Very convenient to downtown Disney and parks. My boys had a blast at the water park at the hotel. Also great view of the firework from Disneyland
Manager Response: Dear mirellaruiz1, Thank you so much for your positive review! We’re so happy to hear that you and your kiddos had such a great time at Courtyard Anaheim, especially with our amazing water park and awesome view of the Disneyland fireworks. We hope that we’ll have the opportunity to welcome you back again for your next family vacation. Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great staff, ideal location, nice facilities!
Summary: The staff was the highlight!!  The valet team was awesome and helpful.  The check in desk was understanding, flexible and patient.  The food staff was always upbeat even though there was a big crowd in AM's and PM's.  Service was great.   Rooms were clean and facilities were updated!
Manager Response: Dear FamilyTourist2022, Thank you for taking the time to review your stay! What a delight to see this five-star review and your words of appreciation for our team members. We are always on the lookout to make our guests feel welcome with memorable moments, and we’re glad your stay was utterly relaxing. We appreciate your feedback and hope we get the chance to welcome you back for more fun in the future!  Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We had a great stay here while visiting Disneyland. The gentleman that helped us with our bags to our room (I believe his name was Ron)  was very helpful and knowledgeable. Thanks Ron! Hotel was clean and not overly crowded like a lot of Disneyland hotels. Would definitely come back here.
Manager Response: Dear Ashlynwebb,  Thank you so much for sharing your feedback. Ron truly is a star and we are glad you had a memorable and magical stay with us.  It is a pleasure to know that you felt welcomed and well taken care of from start to finish and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again for another memorable vacation soon!    Sincerely,   Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Fantastic option for families with young kids
Summary: I looked up lists of best hotels for families and this one was always at the top. They have a cute "waterpark", which is essentially a splashpad and pool, that kids enjoy. It was perfect for my one-year-old and four-year-old. I would say 13 and under would enjoy it best. They have a reservation system and every two hours they clear the area so they can clean it. I really, really appreciate their dedication to cleanliness. We had a 5:30 p.m. - 7:30 p.m. reservation the day we arrived and a 9 a.m. - 11 a.m. reservation the day we left. At 6:30 p.m. it was moderately busy, but nothing crazy and at 9 a.m. it was empty except for one other family.  The rooms are also clean and spacious. We had two queens and a bunk bed. The table area is perfect for eating a quick bite. They have a
Manager Response: Dear Christina C, Thank you for taking the time to share this awesome review. It is a delight to know that your time with us was great from beginning to end, thanks to our friendly staff, amazing accommodations, thoughtful amenities, and convenient location. We’ll definitely share your kind words with our team members who will be delighted to hear from you. We are glad your first time with us was magical and we cannot wait to have you with us again soon!   Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The hotel staff was friendly and helpful, the room had a great amount of space for my family, and it was in walking distance to Disneyland! We appreciated the cleanliness of the space and the dining options in the lobby.
Manager Response: Dear Gretchen B, Thank you so much for this incredible 5-star review. We’re delighted to hear that you and your family enjoyed every aspect of your Courtyard Anaheim stay, like our friendly staff, convenient location, and spacious accommodations. We hope you will think us again when you’re looking for another incredible vacation experience!   Sincerely,   Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Check-in staff were exceptionally helpful resolving a reservation issue created by our travel agent, adjusting dates and enabling an early check-in. This was much appreciated after a long flight from Australia.
Manager Response: Dear 925brucew, Thank you for sharing such fantastic feedback. We’re pleased to have been able to help accommodate you and allay your concerns at check-in to ensure that your Courtyard Anaheim experience was as enjoyable as it should have been. We hope that we’ll have the chance to welcome you back again for another great stay in the future!   Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: great hotel, location, amenities, and fantastic friendly service
Summary: Great hotel, fantastic location and over the top service. Very clean and exceeded our expectations. The valets, front desk, housekeeping, bistro, store, and waterpark staff were all incredibly efficient, helpful and friendly.  We were there with our extended family and they made our 3 nights at the hotel very enjoyable and stress free.  A special thanks to Ron the valet who patiently handled luggage for 10 people spread across 3 rooms. We enjoyed the bistro food and the common spaces the hotel offered.
Manager Response: Dear CTEinCO,  What a delightful review! It is such a pleasure to learn that your time with us was everything you expected and more thanks to our dedicated team members who made your stay stress-free and relaxing. We will definitely pass on your words of praise to Ron who will be delighted to hear from you. We appreciate your positive feedback and we hope we’ll get to welcome you all back again for more fun in the future!  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The hotel was clean and extremely convenient with regards to the park. Overall the staff was friendly and accommodating. The pool staff could use work. Not as friendly, made a smile would help. Also the two hour water park rule would make sense if it was busy. It was not and my family was kicked out.
Manager Response: Dear rymendi,   Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. We are glad to see you appreciate the efforts of our team members and you had a great stay at our conveniently-located hotel. We are however, disappointed that certain aspects of your stay did not meet expectations. Our reservation system prevents overcrowding and related water quality issues, as well as ensures we do not exceed the fire marshal and health department maximum occupancy limits at our water park.  We understand this policy does not necessarily work for all of our guests and sympathize with your frustrations. We do hope we’ll have the chance to welcome you back again in the future for an improved stay!   Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: From the moment we walked in and to the time we left, the staff was friendly,  inviting,  helpful, and super nice! The room was perfect for our family of 5. The pool area was a huge hit especially for my youngest son.  Thank you for being an amazing part of our family's perfect siwr vacation
Manager Response: Dear Ashely J,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We’re delighted to hear that our friendly staff, spacious accommodations, and awesome water park helped make you and your family feel so welcome from the moment you arrived. We hope that we’ll have the chance to welcome you back and be part of many more memorable family vacations to come!  Sincerely,   Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Our stay was beyond incredible, extremely friendly staff throughout the hotel and the water park tops it all off. Our babies had so much fun and it was overall an experience we will never forget. Rooms are very clean and organized and we absolutely loved the bunk bed for the little ones. Didn’t have a chance to try their food but we definitely will next time!  I recommend this hotel 100%!
Manager Response: Dear lindsaysoria15,  Thank you so much for your glowing review! What a pleasure it is to hear that you and your family had such a magical stay at Courtyard Anaheim. We’re honored to have been able to give your kiddos an unforgettable vacation experience from start to finish, and we look forward to welcoming you all back again in the future to make even more wonderful memories!  Sincerely,   Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Emily at check-in was extremely accommodating and helped each member of the family at check-in ensuring a great start to 3 days in Disneyland. Our questions regarding where to eat, access to the water park and best times to get started each day were answered quickly.  Delivery of a crib was fast , clean and immediate after check-in.
Manager Response: Dear Stay759212,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review! It’s our aim to give our guests a relaxing and inviting stay from check-in to check-out, and we’re so happy to hear that our accommodating staff were able to do just that for you and your family. We’ll be certain to pass along your kind comments to Emily! We hope to be able to welcome you back again in the future for another enjoyable Courtyard Anaheim stay.  Sincerely,   Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The moment we stepped into our room we knew that we have made the right choice. I have never seen a bunk bed in a room, let alone the size of the room is so spacious. We love our water park view room that fits our family of 5. Five minute walk to the main entrance of Disneyland. So glad we didn't have drive or look for parking. Walking back to hotel was great after  a long day. Although valet parking is $35/day.  Our highlight was definitely the water park. Although you have to make reservation, it wasn't that challenging as I thought it would be .   I was also how quiet each room was, the fact that there are so many families stay here. They def. Have some great sound proof system.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Socooltotravel,  Thank you so much for the detailed and thoughtful review! We’re delighted to hear that your time at Courtyard Anaheim was so memorable and enjoyable from the moment you arrived for your vacation. It’s our aim to give our guests a stay that goes above and beyond the ordinary hotel experience, and we’re so glad that our incredible location, spacious accommodations, and super fun water park did just that! Whether you’re planning another Disneyland trip in the future, or just looking for a relaxing California getaway, we hope we’ll have the chance to welcome you and your family back again soon.  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great place to stay while visiting Disneyland.  It is only a short walk to the Disneyland entrance.  The rooms are very clean.  There are bunk beds in each room and they can easily accommodate a family of four to six individuals.  There is a wonderful water park at the hotel for the children to enjoy when not visiting Dinner.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear AHMMYEE,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We’re delighted to hear that Courtyard Anaheim was the perfect choice to accommodate you and your party, from our wonderful water park and bunk beds for the kids to our convenient Disneyland location. We hope that we’ll have the chance to welcome you all back again in the future for another excellent vacation! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great Disney themed hotel for the family.  waterpark to keep the kids entertained. Water slide for adults to par take in the fun 🤩 conveniently about 2 blocks away from the entrance of Disney. Thank you for the wonderful upgrade and making this trip a fantastic memory.
Manager Response: Dear Surfthis86,  Thank you so much for the fabulous review! Fun has no age limit here at Courtyard Anaheim, and we’re thrilled to hear that the whole family enjoyed our awesome water park and amenities! We appreciate your kind comments, and we can’t wait to welcome you back again in the future for many more wonderful trips to come.  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Incredible in every way, I HIGHLY recommend 100%!!  If you want a ‘5-Star’ hotel, location, and most of all ‘5-Star’ hospitality, this Courtyard Marriott Theme Park Entrance is the place to be!  To our pleasant surprise this location is a 5 minute-easy walk to The Disneyland Park entrance.  CLEAN-cute hotel-beautiful gift shop-very nice lobby cafe and biggest perk is an amazing-mega water park!  People we encountered at the hotel…  Front Desk: Checking in (and out) we had Emily, very friendly and super helpful welcoming us for our stay.  David Ciang also great, went all out to make sure we were happy, comfortable in our room.  Surfside Pool: Jessica, pool attendant, super nice!  Bistro Cafe: Aria, helpful, kind, patient with ordering! Nancy, Bistro Manager, insisted we had
Manager Response: Dear croddy,  What a fabulous review! Thank you so much for your effusive and enthusiastic comments. It’s our goal to give our guests an experience that goes above and beyond on all fronts, and we’re delighted to hear that you left Courtyard Anaheim with so many wonderful memories. Our staff are the heart and soul of our operation, and it’s an absolute pleasure to hear about all of the individual team members who went out of their way to make your stay so wonderful. We’ll be certain to pass along your comments and gratitude! Thank you again for your thoughtful review; we look forward to welcoming you back for your next Disneyland getaway.  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We loved this hotel! The location couldn’t be better — across the street from the park but also very quiet at night.  The staff’s friendliness and hospitality was top notch. Every time we returned to the hotel we were always greeted with a kind hello and welcome back.   I especially want to praise Ron the valet who went above and beyond to provide excellent customer service. He gave us several helpful tips about the hotel & bistro which we were grateful for! Thank you, Ron! We will certainly be back to stay at this gem of a hotel for our next Disney trip.
Manager Response: Dear AZA897,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We’re thrilled to hear that every aspect of your Courtyard Anaheim experience was so enjoyable from start to finish. It’s our aim to make our guests feel as welcome and comfortable as possible, and we’re so glad that our accommodating staff did just that for you and your family! We’ll be certain to pass along your kind compliments to Ron, and we can’t wait to welcome you back again soon for another unforgettable vacation.  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great hotel and amenities with a very short walk to both Disneyland and California Adventure entrances. Staff were very friendly and helpful and the bistro in the main lobby had great food selections for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Leslie G,   Thank you so much for your awesome review! We’re thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our convenient location, wonderful dining options, and friendly staff during your stay. We appreciate your recommendation and look forward to welcoming you back again in the near future! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great stay!  Close to main gates of both parks and bistro downstairs had solid breakfast options.  Keep in mind valet parking only, which isn't a huge deal if you're just visiting the parks.  Didn't have time to use the waterpark, but the reservation system seems to keep crowds down.
Manager Response: Dear Kevin S,   Thank you so much for your positive review! We’re so glad to hear that you had an enjoyable and relaxing stay at Courtyard Anaheim. We hope that you’ll return in the future and have a chance to experience our incredible water park on your next Disneyland vacation.   Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: I enjoyed my stay there. It's so nice clean and sleek. As soon as you walk in there too it smells amazing, beautiful place just wish they had a breakfast buffet. It was also a very close distance from Disneyland which is why we where there. Nice experience will recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Yesiloks13,   Thank you so much for the five-star review! It’s our aim to make our guests feel welcome and comfortable from the moment they arrive at Courtyard Anaheim. We’re delighted to hear that you enjoyed our convenient location and inviting accommodations, and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We had an excellent time and the staff were all very prompt and accommodating. The room was very comfortable and I was impressed that we had a set of bunk beds that fit in the room without taking valuable space in our double queen room.   I liked the double sink in the bathroom area with separated bathtub shower an one side and large shower on the other side.  Thank you for making this trip special in every way.
Manager Response: Dear Wanda S,   Thank you so much for your thoughtful review! Our guests’ comfort is our top priority here at Courtyard Anaheim, and we’re so glad to hear that you loved the spacious accommodations and features in our double queen suite. It’s a pleasure to have been able to give you such a wonderful experience, and we hope we’ll have the chance to welcome you back again soon for another magical vacation.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great location; we walked easily to/from Disneyland parks as well as McDonalds & Mimi’s for quick eats. The hotel itself is clean, great service, friendly staff, Starbucks 👌🏻and Waterpark was the highlight for my kids ages 8 & 9. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear PStevenson82,   Thank you so much for your awesome review! We’re thrilled to have been able to give you and your kiddos such a fun and memorable stay—our water park is definitely one of our younger guests’ favorite features! We appreciate your enthusiastic recommendation, and we hope to welcome you back again soon.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great location for Disneyland. Room was very clean. Bonus - 2 separate showers! Great for large families trying to get ready in the morning or showering before bed. Bunk bed very helpful. Nice sitting area with table. Small refrigerator and microwave in the room. Water park was fun for the kids.
Manager Response: Dear 747kata,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We’re always striving to give our guests the most comfortable and welcoming experience possible, and it’s great to hear that our spacious accommodations and in-suite amenities were perfect for you and your family. We hope we’ll have the chance to welcome you back again soon for another excellent stay!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Fantastic stay. The rooms are large and comfortable. Great waterpark. Starbucks coffee. Friendly service. I came with just my son but I could see myself bringing my entire family. Very clean. Close to everything
Manager Response: Dear Tanya B,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We’re so happy to hear that you had an incredible time at Courtyard Anaheim and that you especially enjoyed our convenient amenities and welcoming accommodations. We look forward to welcoming you and the whole family back to Courtyard Anaheim for another excellent vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great Hotel, it was clean the Staff was very friendly and helpful. We loved the bunk bends and having 2 showers was a great surprise! We loved the waterpark it was super fun! Food and service at the bistro was amazing!
Manager Response: Dear Shelby M,   Thank you so much for the enthusiastic review! We’re delighted to hear that our spacious accommodations, welcoming staff, and incredible amenities were awesome for you and your party. We can’t wait to welcome you back again soon for your next big Disneyland adventure!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We have had such great service and friendliness right form the start! The valet helped us find someone to carry our bags- The front desk you g lady was wonderful! Our helper to our room was Eon and he told us all the great food to eat and gave us ideas to make our stay better. Thanks for hiring and keeping such great staff!
Manager Response: Dear TerCor B,  Thank you so much for the fabulous review! We take great pride in our incredible staff, and it’s always a delight to hear when one of our team members goes out of their way to make our guests feel so comfortable and welcome. We’ll be sure to pass on your kind comments to Eon and the entire team, and we hope we’ll have the chance to welcome you back again soon!  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Excellent time. Service by Travis Nguyen  at the valet was superb . Very kind and helpful. Thank you!!!!! Will come again. Pool was well maintained. Close walk to the park. Clean rooms. K cups saved the day. And valet service was so easy and friendly!
Manager Response: Dear Wanderer19875,   Thank you for your five-star review! We are delighted to discover that you enjoyed so many different aspects of your stay, from our prime location to our relaxing pool. On that note, we are especially happy to hear that our team treated you to such outstanding service, and we will certainly pass along your compliments to Travis. In the future, we would love to welcome you back, and we sincerely hope to see you again soon.    Sincerely,   Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Pros: The rooms and bathrooms are very spacious. My kiddos got a kick out of bunk beds and my husband and I were grateful for the chance to sleep alone lol. Also the bathroom had double sinks, bathtub-shower AND a large walk-in shower. Proximity to Disney is great and the fireworks show can be seen (although it is much grander in the park.) Cons: Our carpet was sticky. Previous guests had obviously spilled soda. The pool and aqua park are great, however you have to reserve a two-hour time slot online. And only one spot per day. I think this is a Covid protocol still in place. While it keeps it from being crowded, it sucks to plan your Disney stay around the pool.  There is no self parking. You must pay for valet.
Manager Response: Dear Carrie L,   While we are happy to hear that you and your family had such a lovely time at our hotel just moments from the Magic Kingdom, we are sorry to learn that some aspects fell short of expectations. We will certainly keep your feedback in mind regarding our pool as we are always striving to provide our guests with the best vacation experiences possible. That being said, we would love to welcome you and your family back at any time, and we sincerely hope you will return while your little ones can still enjoy our kid-friendly bunk beds.    Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Hotel was great! Service for food in the restaurant was extremely fast leaving us more time at the park. My only complaint is that you can't order food and drinks out by the pool. You can go inside and purchase them and bring them outside but that isn't convenient when you are sitting poolside with kids. Location to the park is great! Pool area was a hit for my 9 and 11 year olds.
Manager Response: Dear Frenchiefamily0415,   Thank you for this outstanding feedback! We are so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your time with us so much. That being said, we will certainly look into our poolside dining moving forward, so every guest can enjoy their time in sunny Southern California to the fullest. On that note, we would love to welcome you back at any time, and we hope you will return soon.    Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: All of the hotel staff was very friendly, polite and informational. The hotel was clean, we were able to check in early and overall, we were just well taken care of. The waterpark area was awesome and it was an easy walk to the parks.
Manager Response: Dear Corbi B,   We are over the moon reading your outstanding review! From our friendly service to our prime location, it is a pleasure to learn that we could provide you with everything you needed for a delightful vacation, and we sincerely hope to welcome you back again soon.    Sincerely,   Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This is the BEST Courtyard Marriott I've ever stayed at. I'm used to staying at Westins, Marriotts, JWs, etc. for work, but booked this for 3 nights for part of our family vacation for a couple reasons: the waterpark and the proximity to the Disneyland entrance. Let me bulletize why we had such a great experience: - Ability to accommodate us for an early check-in - Every area throughout the hotel is clean - Great food menu for families and drink menu for adults - Water park is a nice attraction for down-time away from Disney. The slides are great; the pool is on the small side. - Jacob at the front desk is the resident Disney expert and was Very helpful. - All staff (front desk, cleaners, waitstaff, valet, water park attendants) were extremely pleasant - we felt like we were at
Manager Response: Dear jimsH8437FM,   Wow! We are taken aback by your five-star endorsement! From our prime location just moments from the parks to our own full-filled aquatic experiences, you really highlighted the best that we have to offer. That being said, we are especially happy to hear that our team treated you to such friendly service throughout your stay, and we will certainly pass along the compliments to Jacob and the rest of the staff. Above all, we are just delighted that you had such a lovely time, and we hope you will return soon for another magical vacation.    Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Good location - nice bistro offerings- accommodating rooms for families- the bath and shower and bunk beds were excellent for families. Staff was welcoming and helpful. Would recommend this location for travelers with children going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Sue D,   Thank you for your five-star endorsement! From our thoughtfully appointed accommodations to our delicious dining options, we are delighted to discover that we could provide you with everything you needed to enjoy your vacation to Disneyland to the fullest. Whenever you’re planning another magical getaway, we would love to host you again, and we sincerely hope you will return again soon.    Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The staff was very friendly and accommodating.  Velicity  at the front desk was amazing at check in, helpful, kind, understanding, and made sure to check in when she saw us that our stay was going well. My kids loved the water park and I really appreciated the lifeguards helping to Monitor the area so parents can relax with such a large area for the kids to explore.
Manager Response: Dear fishgocrazy,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! Our friendly and welcoming staff are the heart and soul of our hotel, and it’s a pleasure to hear that our team made you and your family feel comfortable and well taken care of from start to finish. We’ll certainly pass along your kind comments and gratitude to Valicity! We hope we’ll have the chance to welcome you all back again for another magical vacation in the future.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great hotel, just don’t forget to make water park reservations
Summary: Great hotel. Location perfect for Disney. They are extremely strict with the reservations at the water park (which is great if you are at the water park because it felt empty, but really crappy if you forgot to make a reservation and no exceptions to the rules)!
Manager Response: Dear OnAir18539588414,   Thank you so much for your positive review and feedback! We’re so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at Courtyard Anaheim. We hope that we’ll have the opportunity to welcome you back again to experience our amazing water park during your next Disney vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Lots of fun for the kids and grand kids
Summary: Everything was great except the bathroom sinks have no water pressure. My family I joyed the water park the staff was very accommodating with allowing us to come into the water park even when we didn’t have a reservation. We will book again
Manager Response: Dear Hoachristie,   Thank you so much for your review! We’re thrilled to hear that our incredible and accommodating staff were able to help make your time at Courtyard Anaheim so enjoyable for you and your family. As we’re always striving to improve our guest experience with each stay, we greatly appreciate your feedback regarding your accommodations. It’s a pleasure to know you’ll be returning to our hotel in the future, and we look forward to welcoming you all back for another unforgettable vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Best hotel right outside the park.
Summary: There isn't a better place to stay close to Disneyland. Staff is always cleaning. Only 2 elevators. Guests not allowed to access stairs unless in an emergency.  Plan on crowded elevators at check in time.
Manager Response: Dear richito801,   Thank you so much for your positive review and comments! We’re delighted and honored to be considered one of the best hotels in the Anaheim area, and we hope that we were able to give you the vacation experience of a lifetime. We hope we’ll have the chance to welcome you back to our hotel again in the future!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great Family Hotel—walking distance to Disney
Summary: This was a perfect hotel for families visiting Disneyland. 10 minutes to walk to security unless you are slow like me and it was more like 15 for my poor blistered feet.  Bunk beds for kids, a shower plus a tub/shower combo in separate  parts of bathroom to help bathing go faster, tons of room for your stuff, a table with bench seating, super comfy beds, lots of places to plug your electronics. Did I Mention the beds were super comfortable? Some of the best beds I’ve slept on at a hotel.  The Bistro off the lobby was delicious and we ate there a few times. It’s like a Starbucks with a real kitchen and we really liked the avocado mash toast and both kinds of quesadillas.  My 13-yr-old said the bunk beds were really comfortable, view was amazing, easy walk to parks with food along
Manager Response: Dear alb40,   Thank you so much for your fabulous review! We’re delighted to hear that you and your family had such a wonderful stay at Courtyard Anaheim. It’s always our aim to give our guests a vacation experience that’s as convenient and welcoming as it is relaxing, and it’s a pleasure to hear that we were able to achieve just that with our incredible amenities and comfortable accommodations. We hope that we’ll have the opportunity to welcome you and your family back again soon for another magical stay!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Best place to stay if your going to Disneyland
Summary: The best place to stay if your going to Disneyland! It’s close, but asking distance to the park! The staff was amazing. Ron the valet was the best and gave us the menu choices from the Bistro in the hotel!!!
Manager Response: Dear juliesU8072BZ,   Thank you so much for your enthusiastic review! It’s a pleasure to hear that you had such a wonderful stay at Courtyard Anaheim. We’re so glad that Ron was able to help make you feel even more welcome with his kindness and delicious Bistro recommendations! We hope we’ll have the chance to welcome you back again in the future for another fantastic vacation.   Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Would book a room there again
Summary: Good customer service.  Quite surprisingly clean.  Close to the park.  Two showers in the 6 person room which is helpful.  However for future building, I recommend building for two toilets and one shower which is better for a big group in one room.  Reserving the pool is understandable but frustrating.
Manager Response: Dear deesselisa,   Thanks so much for your positive review! We’re glad to hear that your time with us was so enjoyable, and we greatly appreciate your honest and helpful feedback. We look forward to having the chance to host you again for another fantastic vacation experience!   Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Rooms were very clean, staff courteous, food options reasonably priced, easy walking distance to Disneyland.  We had a room looking out toward Disney, and we could see the fireworks, which was nice for those nights we didn't want to stay out late.  The only thing that would have made that better was if the balcony had a couple of chairs to sit on.
Manager Response: Dear rishbrni,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We’re thrilled to hear you loved our convenient location, welcoming staff, and comfortable accommodations during your stay. We’re always striving to improve our guest experience with each stay, and we appreciate your suggestion about chairs on the balcony to make the fireworks viewing even more enjoyable! We hope we’ll have the chance to welcome you back again for your next Disneyland vacation.   Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We loved that the hotel/water park area was not crowed and the kids were able to enjoy all the water play with very little wait times.  Also there was plenty of space/chairs for the parents to sit and watch the kids.  Overall I'd say a 9.5 out of 10!!
Manager Response: Dear Mollie M,   Thank you so much for your enthusiastic review! We’re so glad to hear that you and your family had such a great time getting to splash, play, and relax at our water park during your stay. We appreciate your positive feedback and we hope we’ll get to welcome you all back again for more fun in the future!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great option for families visiting Disneyland
Summary: This is a great hotel for families visiting Disneyland. This was our first time and the staff was welcoming and friendly. The bistro stayed open late and had tasty food. Our room was large and updated with an incredible view of the park. The parks are a quick and easy walk from the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear BobinGeorgia,   Thank you so much for your awesome review! We’re delighted to hear that your first stay was so wonderful. Our friendly staff, amazing accommodations, and convenient location are just a few of the things that make Courtyard Anaheim so special, and it’s a pleasure to know that you felt welcomed and well taken care of from start to finish. We hope we’ll have the opportunity to welcome you back again for another marvelous vacation in the future!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance
