Summary: Great location but scheduling pool time is ridiculous when you have a family and go to Disneyland and aren’t sure each day when you will return. We ended up not making our required reservation for pool . Not that great of a water park/pool to need to schedule.
Manager Response: Dear Julie P,   Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at Courtyard Anaheim. While we’re happy to know that you enjoyed our convenient location, we’re sorry to hear that your stay wasn’t as magical as it should have been. It’s always been our goal to provide all guests with an opportunity to enjoy our waterpark in a safe, clean, and uncrowded environment. The reservation system prevents overcrowding and related water quality issues, as well as ensures we do not exceed the fire marshal and health department maximum occupancy limits at our water park. We understand this policy does not necessarily work for all of our guests and sympathize with your frustrations. While we understand that perhaps Courtyard Anaheim was not right for you, we hope that you were still able to enjoy the remainder of our stay outside of the water park. We greatly appreciate your comments and feedback, and we invite you to reach out to us directly with any further questions or inquiries.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This hotel is convenient nothing more. It is not the luxury brand it thinks it is. It was very overpriced for what you get. The room was comfortable and the bunkbeds were nice but it is very overpriced. We paid on a sliding scale for the 5 days we were there with the minimum being $401.00 per night and the max being $598.00 this is in no way a $600 per night hotel. They don't clean your room everyday and that is something I think you should get if you are paying that much. Disneyland is across the street and that is what you are paying for. Its' an average hotel with average service. I wouldn't stay here again because of the price.
Manager Response: Dear BoydL1964,   Thank you for your honest and thoughtful review. We’re disheartened to hear that your time at Courtyard Anaheim was not as enjoyable as it should have been, and we apologize for the inconvenience and disappointment you experienced during your stay. While we don’t automatically offer daily cleaning services, guests are welcome to request cleaning services as needed during their stay. This is to help ensure that those guests who prefer to maintain as much social distancing as possible, while also giving our other guests the option for daily services if desired. While we understand that Courtyard Anaheim may not have been the hotel for you, we do hope that you were still able to enjoy the remainder of your stay. We greatly appreciate your feedback and invite you to reach out with any further questions or inquiries you may have.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: It's a beautiful hotel and the waterpark was fun too.
Summary: My bill was much higher than I thought it would be and more than the quoted price.  The manager helped me to lower the fee. Although it didnt come out as low and the price I had seen on line, it did help a lot.  I much appreciated that.
Manager Response: Dear Navigate328289,   Thank you so much for your review! While we’re sorry to hear about the issue you encountered with billing, we’re pleased to have been able to help accommodate you where possible and make your Courtyard Anaheim experience a little more enjoyable. We hope that we’ll have the chance to welcome you back again for an even better return visit!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: My family had a good time. Friendly staff ,always happy to help, rooms high maintenance and very clean, restaurant food was delicious ,  the souvenir shop had good things.  I liked the fact that Disneyland was walking distance and was able to see the fireworks from outside the hotel.  It was close to a few fast food restaurants I could go on and on about this amazing hotel I highly recommend it and give it a 5 star .  Thank you to the valet parkers, housekeeping , cooks and service desk employees you guys did an amazing job keeping us happy 😊 will definitely be back oh and the gym was a 👍🏻 Up .  If you’re planning a trip this hotel is top notch.
Manager Response: Dear alemanaldape5,   Thank you so much for your thoughtful review! We’re thrilled to hear that your time at Courtyard Anaheim was nothing short of wonderful, from our incredible location and accommodations to our dedicated and friendly staff. We strive to give our guests a hotel experience that goes above and beyond, and it’s fantastic to hear we were able to do just that. It’s wonderful to hear that you’ll be returning for another visit in the future, and we can’t wait to welcome you back again soon!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Aloha and warm wishes through out !!
Summary: LOVED the Staff !!!  Especially Valicity !!!!!  Booked by Mistake …… best mistake EVER !!!  Valicity quickly fixed the booking process and did it all with a smile!!  And kindness . It is nice to see real personalities and people (Not Programed Cast members) . I stay in Hotels 4 + out of 7 nights I know the good bad and now the awesome!!   Super clean , rooms larger and cleaner !!  Great location and view .   Was the first time I had a upgrade and I think I got the best room in the house .   We took a later breakfast and the cook brought our food to the table along with a great smile and warm wishes .  Everyone greeted and treated us like family !!   Big Mahalo!!  !!
Manager Response: Dear greasmonki,   Wow, what a fabulous review! Thank you so much for your effusive comments. We’re delighted to hear that you were able to experience an incredible getaway and that your initial booking mistake turned out to be a happy accident! We take great pride in making our guests feel welcome, relaxed, and well taken care of from check-in to check-out, and it’s a pleasure to hear that Valicity was able to assist you and help make your stay even more enjoyable. We’re so happy to have been able to host you, and we hope that we’ll get to welcome you back to Courtyard Anaheim again and greet you with many more smiles and marvelous memories!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We had a great time.  Service before and during our stay was outstanding.  We were particularly happy with Vitalia, our check in clerk, who was outstanding in getting our information for the six rooms together.
Manager Response: Dear mmanmontana,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! It’s such a pleasure to hear that you had such a wonderful stay at Courtyard Anaheim. We take great pride in the kindness and dedication of our talented staff, and we’re delighted to hear that Vitalia helped make your check-in experience pleasant and stress-free for you and your party. We hope we’ll have the chance to welcome you back again in the future for another fantastic stay!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Family of 4 had a wonderful time. We stayed in a suite with 2 bunk beds. The room was large and there was plenty of table space for all four of us to eat together comfortably for the meals we had in the room. The hotel staff was exceptionally friendly, from the valet giving a nice greeting on the way in and out to the food service and pool staff. Hotel was very clean and the location to Disney was perfect. It was maybe a 7 minute walk to the entrance of the parks. We were very happy with our stay.
Manager Response: Dear Dan S,   Thank you so much for your awesome review! We’re delighted to hear that you and your family enjoyed every aspect of your Courtyard Anaheim stay, like our friendly staff, convenient location, and spacious accommodations. We hope we’ll have the chance to host you all again the next time you find yourself seeking out another incredible vacation experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Amazing experience. Wish I had a view to see the grandkids play. But this hotel was great. Customer service was great and food was yummy. For sure I will be coming back with the family. Great times  Thank you
Manager Response: Dear lydiablandino12,   Thank you so much for your fantastic review! We’re delighted to hear that you and your family had such a wonderful stay at Courtyard Anaheim. It’s a pleasure to know that you’ll be joining us again for another marvelous vacation, and we look forward to welcoming you all back in the near future!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: From the start everything was pleasant valet was helpful and friendly loved that I didn’t have to worry about parking my car after a long trip or unload my things from the car , from the time we checked in, fast and convenient, very clean hotel spotless smelled clean always seen someone cleaning the windows or keeping up the place which made me feel at ease, liked that there was a gift shop available to purchase things that was convenient and the Bistro as well was awesome! Kids had fun at the clean water park I mean spotless no trash or anything laying around I loved the fact that it wasn’t overcrowded because of the reservations(think that’s a great idea) also loved our room so spacious and clean kids loved the bunk beds loved the shower area. Cleaning service came after 2nd
Manager Response: Dear C4341ZDashleya,   Thank you so much for your kind comments—what a wonderful review! We are absolutely delighted to hear that every aspect of your stay at Courtyard Anaheim was so enjoyable. It’s our goal to give our guests a magical and memorable vacation experience, and we’re thrilled to know that our top-tier team was able to go above and beyond for you and your family, especially for your son’s birthday! We’re honored to be your go-to hotel and greatly appreciate your enthusiastic recommendation. We can’t wait to welcome you and your family back again for another remarkable visit in the future!   Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The best hotel to stay at when visiting Disneyland! We come here every year to celebrate our daughter’s birthdays. They play at the water park all day before we go to Disneyland the next day. The rooms are very spacious and the waterpark is the cherry on top. The valet parking is superb as is all the staff! Did I mention you can walk to Disneyland in 10 minutes!
Manager Response: Dear alucero81,   Thank you so much for your fabulous review! We’re so happy to hear that you and your family had such a wonderful time at Courtyard Anaheim. What a delight to hear that you come here every year to celebrate your daughter’s birthday! We’re honored to be part of such special moments, and we look forward to welcoming you back for many more magical visits to come!   Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: I get to travel and see a lot of the world and country and Marriott’s are usually my choice of stay. More stays/vacations than I can count, but Mack and Travis elevated my expectations to another level! A+++ We all get greeted with a smile but there’s a difference between a hourly wage smile and a genuine “how are you today” smile! When you pull up to the valet you can open your door like it’s a family spaghetti dinner!
Manager Response: Dear P-lottery,   What a wonderful review! Thank you so much for your kind and thoughtful comments. We take great pride in our dedicated and friendly staff, and it’s always a pleasure to hear when our team members go above and beyond to leave such a lasting impression on our guests. We’ll be sure to pass along your comments to Mack and Travis, and we can’t wait to have the chance to welcome you back with a smile the next time you find yourself at Courtyard Anaheim!   Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This hotel is conveniently located near the entrance to Disneyland parks. The room setup is perfect with the two Queen beds and the Bunk beds and was very comfortable for our family of 4.  We also thought the bathroom design was clever with a separate vanity area from shower and toilet and an additional tub/shower so multiple people could shower at the same time.  Small fridge, small microwave also provided some food flexibility.  Very friendly staff.  Waterpark was fun. Pool is small.  Would be nice to be able to use the pool any time without a reservation.  But a fantastic property.
Manager Response: Dear Alana M,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We’re pleased to hear that our convenient location and spacious accommodations were perfect for you and your family. It’s always wonderful to hear our guests describe Courtyard Anaheim as “fantastic,” and we hope we’ll have the opportunity to welcome you back again in the future for another memorable vacation!   Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Staff was very friendly. Would like better water pressure and more lighting in the bathrooms. Beds were very comfortable! Ice machine didn't work on our floor the first day but it was fixed and working about 24 hours later which we appreciated.
Manager Response: Dear Traci N,   Thank you so much for your positive review and helpful feedback! We’re glad to hear that our dedicated staff was able to help take care of some inconveniences you encountered and that your overall experience at Courtyard Anaheim was enjoyable and relaxing. We hope we’ll have the chance to welcome you back again soon!   Sincerely,   Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: I knew my stay would be great when we were greeted by Ron the valet. He welcomed us with great service with a smile. I Highly recommend especially for the wonderful staff anchored by the valet team and special thanks to Ron and his warm smile.
Manager Response: Dear elmergo,   Thank you so much for your effusive comments! It’s such a pleasure to read reviews like this. We’re delighted to hear that your time at Courtyard Anaheim was made so special and enjoyable by the kindness of our staff. We’ll be sure to pass on your compliments to Ron and the entire valet team, and we hope we’ll get to welcome you back again soon for another excellent stay!   Sincerely,   Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This was a great hotel to stay at for our June 2022 Family Disneyland Vacation! Having six actual beds (no horrible sofa beds!) in one room and TWO showers was AMAZING! These things, along with the short walk to the parks, were the best things about this hotel. We didn't use the restaurant, so no advice there. We did reserve a timeslot for the waterpark. The reservation process was very easy and our four teens enjoyed the water slides and small pool, while us parents enjoyed the hot tub for our poor aching feet. The staff were kind and helpful. A downside is the required valet parking, but I understand that space in the area is limited. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Julie R,   Thank you so much for your glowing review! We’re thrilled to hear that your time with us was so wonderful. It’s our goal to give our guests a stay that’s exciting, comfortable, and convenient for all ages, and we’re delighted to hear that you and your family were able to enjoy the best parts of Courtyard Anaheim. We appreciate your kind comments, and we look forward to welcoming you all back again soon for another remarkable vacation experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We had a great time at the Courtyard by Marriott. All staff was welcoming and responsive, especially Travis at the valet. He welcomed our big family and made us feel taken care of. He answered all of our questions with a smile.
Manager Response: Dear tasceaiec,   Thank you so much for your wonderful comments! Our friendly staff are the heart and soul of Courtyard Anaheim, and it’s always a delight to hear when a member of our team goes above and beyond to make our guests feel so well attended to and comfortable. We’ll be sure to pass along your kind words to Travis! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon for another unforgettable vacation in the near future.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Very nice, clean, modern hotel just across the street from Disneyland at a reasonable price.  We initially booked at Grand Californian but couldn’t justify the high price and small room.  After watching a YouTube review of the Courtyard Marriot we decided to stay here instead. Of course, it’s not as “Grand” but the room was larger for our family if 5 and we saved so much money. The hotel is up to date, nicely decorated, clean and the staff was super friendly, helpful and knowledgeable. The Bistro cafe serves Starbucks and the food there was quite good.
Manager Response: Dear Dalia1974,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! It’s our goal to be able to give our guests the best vacation experience possible from check-in to check-out, and we’re so pleased to hear that you and your family thoroughly enjoyed your stay at Courtyard Anaheim, from our welcoming staff to our convenient amenities and more. Whether you’re in town for another Disneyland getaway or just seeking out a place to escape with the family, we hope we’ll have the chance to welcome you all back again soon for another excellent vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Wonderful facility, close to Disneyland, great staff.  We had 43 of our family in your Hotel and they all loved it.  It was clean, beautiful, comfortable and your staff was friendly, help, polite and more.
Manager Response: Dear 495brentw,   Thank you so much for your fabulous review and kind comments! We’re delighted to hear that we were able to give every member of your family an unforgettable and comfortable stay from start to finish. We hope we’ll have the chance to welcome you all back again for another incredible getaway!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Best hotel we stayed at this entire trip. The staff was friendly and helpful, even when we had inconvenient requests due to 6 year old and a 2 year old mishaps! My wife and I have decided THIS will be our hotel for future visits to the park!
Manager Response: Dear UncleBacon20,   Thank you so much for your absolutely wonderful review! We’re pleased to know that you and your family felt well taken care of by our dedicated staff on all fronts. It’s such an honor and a compliment to hear that you loved your time at Courtyard Anaheim, and we can’t wait to welcome you all back again for many more incredible vacations to come!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: I was impressed with the friendliness of the front desk staff. Also the AC unit in the rooms was quiet and efficient. The rooms were large and the proximity to Disney was perfect. It allowed us to easily walk to the park.
Manager Response: Dear Caprdn,   Thank you so much for your positive review! We know how important it is to feel comfortable and well taken care of from check-in to check-out, and it’s a pleasure to hear that our spacious rooms, friendly staff, and ideal location all made your stay so wonderful. We hope we’ll have the pleasure of welcoming you back again soon!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Hotel staff extremely friendly and helpful!
Summary: Hotel staff was always very helpful and friendly.  Valet parking was another story.  Upon arrival,  they were very kind,  but when we left they asked us for additional money,  almost seemed like they wanted cash from us.  I asked to speak with a supervisor and was told he is the supervisor.  I  asked for whoever was above him,  I was told no one was available.  I became very upset and they finally told me I was square. They charge a fiend for parking and they wanted additional money,  even though we left a day early and had been charged all 5 days within 15 minutes of arrival,  very unprofessional!
Manager Response: Dear MsKringlr,   Thank you so much for taking the time to review your stay at Courtyard Anaheim. The situation you described regarding our valet parking service is certainly not something we want our guests to experience, and we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and frustration. We assure you that such occurrences are not typical of the Courtyard Anaheim experience, and we will be sure to investigate this matter further. We’re glad to hear that this situation did not dampen the remainder of your stay, and we hope we’ll have the opportunity to welcome you back for a more positive return experience.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Very nice clean hotel. Friendly staff. Close to Disneyland fast hood target dollar store. Great location. heated pool very nice bar. Good food. Starbucks inside. Microwave in ice room. All around great trip.
Manager Response: Dear ashleymcdavid,   Thank you so much for your fabulous review! We’re delighted to hear that your time with us was so enjoyable and convenient on all fronts, from our perfect location to our top-tier amenities and more. We hope we’ll have the chance to welcome you back again soon for another fantastic vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We loved our stay! Our room got upgraded to a pool view with bunk beds. It was perfect for our 5 year old who lived at the water park! Everyone was extremely friendly and helpful. We can’t say enough about Chris in The Bistro who was always friendly and super accommodating!
Manager Response: Dear c2babyblue,   Thank you so much for your fantastic comments! It’s a delight to hear that you were able to enjoy upgraded accommodations with a pool view and our awesome bunk beds. We strive to give our guests an unforgettable and welcoming experience from start to finish, and it’s always a pleasure to hear when one of our staff members goes above and beyond to leave such a lasting impression on our guests! We’ll be sure to pass along your comments to Chris and the rest of our staff members, and we hope to have you back to Courtyard Anaheim again soon!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Very large room, 2 showers in the bathroom! Had 2 queen beds and a set of bunk beds. Room had a coffee maker, fridge, safe etc. Close to Disneyland.  Did not use the pool area due to needing a reservation.
Manager Response: Dear jeanniec,   Thank you so much for your positive review and feedback! We’re so glad you enjoyed your stay at Courtyard Anaheim, especially our spacious and convenient accommodations and in-room amenities. While we’re sorry you weren’t able to make it to our water park this time around, we hope that we’ll have the pleasure of hosting you again so you can experience everything Courtyard Anaheim has to offer!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This is a kid friendly hotel, we’ve been visiting this hotel almost every summer for the past 6 years.   Rooms are a great size for a family, I think they sound proof their rooms, which is really nice.
Manager Response: Dear cguillen2022,   Thank you so much for your kind review! We love getting to hear from our return guests about their stay at Courtyard Anaheim. It’s such an honor to hear that you and your family have been loving your time with us for the past six years! Thank you so much for making us your go-to summer getaway hotel. We can’t wait to welcome you back for many more incredible vacations to come!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Our safe.dient work upon arrival also had issues with the toliet.and reached out nothing was done. Horrible customer service spent and saved so much to have mutplie issues. No tampons available fpr.purchSe or rest.room.
Manager Response: Dear jessmart0606: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your experience while staying with us. Providing the highest level of hospitality is our number one priority and I sincerely apologize for failing to meet your expectations. Our maintenance team replaced the batteries in your safe promptly once you reported it and we provided you with a $100.00 credit. I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We inspected your toilet and other reported issues in your room on several occasions but did not find anything wrong.  You requested an ADA room and we upgraded you to a Disney view ADA room, you were uncomfortable with the room because it had a doorbell; we demonstrated that there was a control switch in the room marked "doorbell on/off" which cut the power to the doorbell and prevented anyone from using it. I apologize that the public restroom in the lobby was out of tampons; we immediately provided you with complimentary tampons from our gift shop when you brought this to our attention.  I know that due to the hardships in your personal life and problems with your job you wanted your entire five-night stay refunded and I regret that I was unable to accommodate that request.   I hope you and your family will continue your healing journey and that only good things will happen to you in the future.  Sincerely, Bill Cleaver, General Manager

Summary: We absolutely loved this hotel. The double queen beds with bunk beds was perfect for our family of 6. And the waterpark was so dang fun! We loved how close it was in walking distance to Disneyland. The ONLY thing that could have made it better was if there was free continental breakfast but we just bought some food at the grocery store and they worked for us.
Manager Response: Dear tamberine02,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! It’s a pleasure to hear that you and your family had such an amazing stay, and that you especially loved our convenient location, spacious accommodations, and super fun water park! We hope to have the opportunity to host you and your family again soon for another unforgettable vacation experience.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The Courtyard personnel were very polite and courteous. The room and bathroom were larger than we expected. We really enjoyed the double vanity as well as the separate tub and shower. The proximity to Disneyland Is minimal. It is a bonus to have a Panera and McDonald’s next door.
Manager Response: Dear richardwS20,   Thank you so much for your positive review! We’re pleased to hear that your stay at Courtyard Anaheim was so enjoyable, and that our spacious accommodations and courteous staff exceeded your expectations. It’s wonderful to hear that you would stay with us again, and we hope that we’ll have the opportunity to welcome you back for your next Disneyland vacation!    Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We loved staying here! It was so convenient for the theme parks, but more importantly when we were at the hotel our family was completely comfortable in the room and the common areas. The Bistro food was quick and delicious and all of the staff we interacted with at the hotel were incredibly helpful and nice. We are very grateful we chose this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear 414torey,   Thank you so much for your effusive review! It’s always been our aim to provide our guests with an outstanding hotel experience on all fronts, and we’re so happy to hear that you and your family felt comfortable, relaxed, and welcomed by our wonderful staff and incredible amenities. We greatly appreciate your comments, and we hope to have the chance to welcome you all back again soon for another remarkable vacation experience.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: It was fabulous, to say the least. I worked with Carrie starting in November 2021 for planning our company retreat and coming to Disney. We had to reschedule for our initial date of January 2022 due to covid and she was nothing but helpful and accommodating. We ended up coming May of 2022, she welcomed us, had a meeting room set up exactly how we wanted and got all our rooms right next to each other -- the week of memorial day, too! She was incredible. The hotel itself was very clean and all the staff was very friendly. Only a 5 min walk to Disney :)
Manager Response: Dear ShelbiStevens,   Thank you so much for your fabulous comments and review! It’s our aim to give our guests the best experience possible from check-in to check-out, and we’re so happy to hear that we were able to accommodate you and your party for your company retreat. We’ll be sure to pass along your kind comments to Carrie! Whether you’re planning to host another event, or simply looking for a place to vacation, we hope we’ll have the opportunity to host you again soon!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Best place to stay to go to Disneyland
Summary: Very friendly staff our stay was great all amenities were great, we had great time thank you great hotel great staff great swimming pool great restaurants great coffee easy access around the block from Disney land
Manager Response: Dear ljmizer,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! It’s a delight to hear that you found every aspect of your Courtyard Anaheim stay to be so enjoyable, from our amazing staff to our incredible water park and more. We hope to welcome you back again soon for another fantastic Disneyland vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This is a great choice for larger families traveling together as the rooms are large with plenty of space to spread out. The Disney parks entrance is a mere 5 minute walk. Hotel was very clean and modern with an accommodating and friendly staff.
Manager Response: Dear Fulldemo,   Thank you so much for your positive review! We strive to give our guests a getaway experience that goes above and beyond a typical hotel stay, and we’re so glad that our spacious accommodations, convenient location, and delightful staff were able to do just that for you and your family. We hope to have the chance to welcome you all back again soon for another remarkable Disneyland vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Very nice hotel and close to the entrance of Disneyland.  I also left behind my galaxy tablet, which I thought was in the room. But I had left it on the bench out side waiting for our vehicle . I called as soon as I realized it was missing., no one had turned nothing in yet. But they got my info and within a couple of hours they called back that it was found and let me know how to get it sent to me. They were awesome!  Thank you so very much so for making our stay wonderful and for all your help locating my tablet and returning it to me.
Manager Response: Dear mgmkirker,   Thank you so much for your fabulous review! We take great pride in having an incredible team of dedicated and welcoming staff here at Courtyard Anaheim, and it’s such a delight to hear that they were able to help you find your missing tablet and make your stay so wonderful. We’ll be sure to pass along your thanks to our team! We hope to have the chance to welcome you back again for your future Disneyland family vacations.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Stayed 3/4 for disney.  Great proximity to everything via walking.  Abput a quarter mile walk to disney entrance.  Nice set up, bistro was better than expected, clean place, room layout was great for family with kids.  Laundry on site was a plus.  Wish they still had airport shuttle but no biggie.  An ATM on site.would be nice too
Manager Response: Dear KevinJfamily,   Thank you so much for your positive review and feedback! We’re delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay at Courtyard Anaheim, and that our convenient location and spacious accommodations were perfect for you and your family. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again soon for another wonderful vacation experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Valet ruined car a d refused to take ownership
Summary: Valet caused $1,000 of damage on the car and refused to take responsibility. Management was rude and unhelpful.  As someone who stays in hotels over 100 nights a year, I can say definitively that this place is poorly run.
Manager Response: 41csmith: Thank you for being our guest and for writing a review. I empathize with you and am sorry that your car has damage. When a guest arrives at our hotel to valet park, we take pictures of their car from multiple angles. The pictures have timestamps and are archived. We also have cameras located at our main entrance and within our garage.  You called and reported damage to your car after your wife had returned home with your car. We emailed you pictures which showed that your car was already damaged when your car arrived at our hotel. We reviewed the hotel video showing your car being parked with no incident. Your car was never moved after being parked and no other car, person, or structure touched your car for the one night it was here.   Our valet manager, Javier, has emailed you and has offered to file an insurance claim for you with our carrier, provide additional pictures, or assist you with your insurance claim but you have not responded. Please contact me if I can be of assistance to you. Sincerely, Bill Cleaver, General Manager 657.262.3120

Summary Heading: Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim Theme Park Entrance is awesome
Summary: We love Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim Theme Park Entrance. It's our number 1 family vacation destination. It's a great hotel with a very friendly staff, good food and beverage offerings, and a small waterpark right on site!! Super short walk to Disneyland - but you can spend the whole day in the hotel/waterpark.
Manager Response: Dear Seth K,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review—what a delight it is to be your family’s go-to vacation destination! We’re so happy that our friendly staff, incredible amenities, and perfect location helped make your getaway so enjoyable and memorable. We look forward to welcoming you back to Courtyard Anaheim again soon for even more amazing experiences and vacations!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Friendliest staff. Awesome water park. Great for young kids and also older kids (there’s something for everyone). The lifeguards were very attentive and courteous. Spacious rooms. Walking distance to the parks!
Manager Response: Dear karenerondeau,   Thank you so much for your enthusiastic review! We pride ourselves on giving guests of all ages an incredible vacation experience on all fronts, and it’s a treat to hear that your time at Courtyard Anaheim was so enjoyable from start to finish. We can’t wait to welcome you back again soon for another unforgettable vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great place to stay, not a long walk from entrance . The kids loved the water park.  So much so that they decided to play at the water park instead of going back to Disneyland. All staff was very helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear 9mwatkins,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! What a delight it is to hear that you and your family had such an enjoyable and fun stay at Courtyard Anaheim—our water park is definitely a favorite for our younger guests, and we’re glad that they has such a great time getting to splash and play! We hope that we’ll have the chance to welcome you all back again soon for another incredible vacation.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Staff is fabulous.. walking distance to Disneyland .  Great food in the bistro . Water park is a winner .  Great family vacation. Everyone is willing to meet your needs whatever they may be. Second time we have stayed here and we will be back. Beautiful rooms and great prices
Manager Response: Dear adamsonjudy,   Thank you so much for your fantastic review! We love having the opportunity to hear from our return guests about their experiences at Courtyard Anaheim. It’s such a pleasure to know that your second visit with us was just as magical as the first, and we look forward to having you back again for many more incredible stays in the future!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Stayed here for our trip to Disney. Perfect walking distance, great staff, clean, spacious, nice water park for kids. We all Loved it and enjoyed our stay! Great for children and families…Will definitely be coming back again!
Manager Response: Dear corinalj86,   Thank you so much for your fabulous review! It’s our aim to provide our guests with an unforgettable and enjoyable vacation from check-in to check-out, and we’re delighted to hear that every aspect of your stay at Courtyard Anaheim was nothing short of fantastic. We’re delighted to hear that you’ll be returning soon for another getaway, and we look forward to welcoming you and your family back again for even more incredible experiences!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Fabulous! Excellent customer service! The staff was absolutely incredible! Friendliest hotel staff I’ve ever encountered!! Super clean and beautiful rooms! The pool was so fun! My daughter had a blast!!
Manager Response: Dear jenijay6312,   Thank you so much for your marvelous review! We’re thrilled to hear that your time with us was so enjoyable and that we were able to give your daughter an incredible birthday. We take great pride in having a top-tier team of dedicated and friendly staff, and it’s always a pleasure to hear when they go above and beyond for our guests! Whether you’re coming back for another big celebration, or just looking for a fun getaway, we hope we’ll have the chance to welcome you and your family again for an unforgettable Courtyard Anaheim experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Jacob at the FD was very nice and helpful. Super friendly staff  and excellent bistro. I ordered a pizza and fries and both were delicious. The pool area was fun, clean and organized. I like that you have to make a reservation, I think it prevents the pool area from getting too crowded. The hotel was clean and well maintained. I will absolutely stay here again. Had a great time.
Manager Response: Dear liliwoolsey, Thank you for the kind-hearted review! We always strive to provide magical getaways for our guests, and we’re delighted to hear that was exactly your experience. From our team’s friendly hospitality to our clean and convenient accommodations, it’s great to know that every aspect of your stay was incredible. In addition, we’re glad you were able to soak up the sun, and serenity, at our outdoor pool and waterpark. We greatly appreciate your valuable feedback and look forward to your return. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Spacious clean rooms. Great housekeeping, friendly front desk. Would stay here again! The extra shower and bunk beds are a real winner for family travel. Was glad to have both a refrigerator and a microwave.
Manager Response: Dear D6373DPinfo,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! We know how important it is to have a comfortable place to unwind and relax at the end of the day, and we’re delighted to hear that our unique in-room amenities made your time with us so magical. We’re so happy that you would return for another visit in the future, and we look forward to welcoming you back to Courtyard Anaheim again soon for another unforgettable getaway!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: My family and I loved our stay at this property. Everything that we needed was so convenient. It was a few blocks away from Disneyland/California Adventures and the parking was $35 per night where you can also take it in or out. The room that we got had a king bed and a bunk bed so it fit our family. The bistro downstairs had yummy food and coffee and had decent prices. They also had a giftshop that sold amazing mugs at a cheaper price than the park. Emily helped us in the front and Pedro helped us Bell our things. Amazing customer service overall!
Manager Response: Dear 480tms,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! It’s an absolute pleasure to hear that you and your family loved your time at Courtyard Anaheim. We strive to give our guests the best vacation experience possible in every aspect, from our convenient location and excellent service to our unique amenities and delicious onsite dining options. We’re delighted that all of these elements of your stay were wonderful from start to finish! We’ll pass on your kind comments to both Emily and Pedro as well, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again for another unforgettable getaway.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The hotel was very clean and the room was huge. Less than a 10 minute walk to Disney Land. The bistro was super convenient for breakfast or dinner and a drink after the parks. Would highly recommend. We also had a resort view room so we could watch the fireworks at night.
Manager Response: Dear samanthaxanne,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review and recommendation! We’re so happy to hear that your time with us was so enjoyable, from our convenient location to our incredible onsite amenities. Getting to see the fireworks from your suite is always a delight, and we’re glad you were able to experience the magic from the comfort of your room! We hope to have the chance to welcome you back to Courtyard Anaheim again soon for another unforgettable vacation.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Pros: Waterslides/pool, microwave in room, bunk beds, valet helpful, location. Cons: dirty floors (sticky and visible dirt), could be cleaner in general, one rude associate at check in, no Disney+ in room.
Manager Response: Dear bhfugate,   Thank you so much for taking the time to review your stay at Courtyard Anaheim. We’re delighted to hear that you enjoyed our convenient location, amenities, and unique in-room features during your stay! While we’re glad your time with us was overall a positive experience, we’re sorry to hear that you encountered a few minor inconveniences. We want to ensure you such instances are not commonplace experiences for our guests, and that we’re always striving to improve our operations for the better with every stay. Thank you again so much for your honest comments and feedback; we hope that we’ll have the opportunity to welcome you back again for an even better return visit.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Excellent! It was about a 5 minute walk to the Disneyland entrance - very convenient. The hotel also allowed us to park there prior to our check in time - so we didn't need to buy a parking pass at Disneyland. (in our case we had already bought it - so we just wasted the $$, but maybe this will help others to know!). Beautiful hotel and the suite was perfect! Nice layout - I wish more hotels had rooms like this to offer at reasonable rates!
Manager Response: Dear dickersonfamily2022,   Thank you so much for your fabulous review! It’s such a pleasure to hear that your time at Courtyard Anaheim was nothing short of wonderful for your and your family. It’s always been our goal to give our guests a relaxing and inviting place to come back to at the end of a busy day at Disneyland, and we’re so happy we were able to give you just that from check-in to check out. We hope to have the chance to welcome you back to Courtyard Anaheim again soon for your next family getaway!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The hotel is very clean, the water park was great for the kids and very convenient when your going to Disney. The staff was very helpful and accommodating. We would definitely stay there again.  Great time!
Manager Response: Dear evonliec,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! It’s a pleasure to hear that you and your family had such a fantastic experience at Courtyard Anaheim, and that you especially enjoyed our convenient location and amazing water park. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again for another unforgettable Disney vacation in the near future!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: excellent staff from the valet to the check-in desk. Very informative on getting to the park. Would definitely recommend this hotel for a Disney Vacation! Excellent water park available at the hotel with several near by restaurants
Manager Response: Dear davebraggpt,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We’re so happy that you were able to take advantage of our convenient location and amenities during your stay at Courtyard Anaheim. It’s our goal to make our guests feel welcome and well attended to from check-in to check-out, and we’re delighted to hear that our incredible staff was able to do just that! Thank you again for your enthusiastic recommendation—we look forward to hosting you again for another unforgettable vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: THE place to stay for a family Disney vacation
Summary: Stayed here for a week and the whole family loved it. Our experience was consistent with the reviews - clean, comfortable, friendly. Very handy nook for drinks/snacks next to front desk area, then a larger and well stocked gift shop/general store down the hall. Housekeeping every 2 days but that is standard anywhere on the west coast with labor shortages and we didn't mind a bit. Water park is awesome and reservation system prevents overcrowding. Great view of fireworks from Disney in the water park area. I wish I could remember the names of everyone who helped us, but I have to say, without exception, that everyone was just so kind and helpful. Had a particularly wonderful chat with Jeff at the front desk area - thank you! Bistro staff helped with local information when I asked
Manager Response: Dear SavvyTraveller86543,   Thank you so much for your detailed and effusive review! Reading about experiences like this is an absolute delight. We’re thrilled to hear that every aspect of your time at Courtyard Anaheim was so enjoyable, convenient, and comfortable! We take great pride in having not only an incredible location and unique amenities but also a dedicated staff that goes above and beyond for every guest. It’s always a pleasure to hear when one of our specific staff members leaves such a lasting impression—we will certainly pass along your kind comments to Jeff and our other team members! Thank you again so much for your generous review; whether you’re in town for another Disney adventure, or just looking for a place to unwind and escape, we can’t wait to host you again and welcome you back for another magical vacation.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We stayed at this hotel during our trip to Disney.  I chose the hotel due to it’s proximity to the park, excellent reviews, and water park offering. We arrived late in the evening and the staff at the valet stand were very friendly and helped us with our bags.  When we got to the front desk my wife discovered that she had misplaced her ID during the max dash through security at the airport.  The ladies at the front desk did not skip a beat, got the situation figured out using mine, and got us set up with our room very quickly which really made us breathe a sigh of relief.  We did not tell our 5 year old that we were going to Disneyland (wanted to make it a surprise when she woke up) and they did not make anything too obvious so we were able to keep the secret.  In the morning
Manager Response: Dear patrickbW6950KK, Wow, thank you so much for this wonderful review! It truly was our pleasure to be part of your family’s special getaway to Disneyland—we know how exciting it is to visit the most magical place on Earth for the first time. It’s our goal to provide incredible vacations for every guest, and we are so happy to hear about your unforgettable experience. We greatly appreciate your kind words about our fantastic team and will certainly share your sentiments accordingly. We are quite lucky to have a dream team of hospitable folks. From theme park adventures to water park fun, we’re over the moon to know you departed with cherished memories you’ll remember forever. We value your kind recommendation and hope to welcome you back for another stellar stay in the future. Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Pros: nice,  clean room. Staff was very friendly, location was an easy 10 min walk to the park. Cons: I booked a non-view room specifically to save $$ and so I didn’t hear the waterpark noise. When we got there, they had “upgraded” our room to a waterpark view. I forgot about my noise concern and took the room. It was actually quiet during the day and the first 2 nights, so I thought it was ok. However, on night 3, we were exhausted and wanted to go to sleep early. Although it was FREEZING, there were a few kids out at the pool until 10pm, and all we heard was screaming until it closed at 10pm. I also didn't love the sheets - they felt like rough microfibre.   Weather was bad and we were at the park all day so didn’t use waterpark much. Pool was small. Next time, unless I knew
Manager Response: Dear 927janinew,  Thank you for providing thorough feedback about your recent stay. While it’s fantastic to know that you found our hospitality and location impressive, we apologize for any inconvenience during your getaway. We always strive to provide the best for our guests, and although we upgraded your accommodations, we’re sorry we did not prioritize your desired tranquility. Your honest feedback is important to us and we will share your valuable thoughts with our team as we continuously work to maximize guest satisfaction. Next time, we hope to welcome you back for a fun-filled adventure with wonderful waterpark memories included.  Sincerely, Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: last minute getaway from Palm Springs
Summary: The hotel was amazing.  We manage vacation rentals and this hotel was very clean and organized. I enjoyed the last minute vacation with our kids. Ranging from 17,13 and 3 years old.  We would enjoy staying here agin in the near future.
Manager Response: Dear sellingcoachellavall, Thank you for choosing to vacation with us! It’s our goal to provide incredible experiences for all visiting families, and we’re thrilled to know that you all had a wonderful time with us and departed with magical memories. We greatly appreciate your kind endorsement and hope to welcome you back for another special getaway in the future! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This hotel was great.  Very clean.  Location cannot be beat with it being just a short walk from the DLR entrance.  We were in a corner family room with bunk beds.  Even though the room faced the freeway, we didn't really hear a lot of highway noise.  If you think that may bother you make sure you request a room with a pool view. Staff was friendly and responsive.  Would absolutely stay here again and recommend to others looking for a family-friendly hotel in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear kiwisky,  What a delightful review! It’s always exciting to hear when our family-friendly hotel acts as the perfect home base for Anaheim explorations. We’re happy to hear that your guest room was a tranquil space to relax after a day of magical adventures. We pride ourselves on offering world-class service, and it’s exciting to learn about the stellar service you received throughout your stay. We will certainly share your kind sentiments with our team. It was a pleasure welcoming you and whenever you’re dreaming of another incredible getaway, know that our doors are always open.  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Front desk staff great, valets great Comfy beds Grab and Go was waaaaay longer than was satisfactory in the early mornings when everyone was trying to hurry to the theme parks Parking was too expensive
Manager Response: Dear GrandTour170386,  Thank you for taking the time to review your experience! We’re delighted to learn about the wonderful service you received from our friendly team, and will certainly share your kind sentiments accordingly. With that being said, we do apologize for any inconvenience during your stay. We completely understand your perspective regarding our Grab and Go offerings and will use your valuable feedback to make improvements. We appreciate your candor and hope to welcome you back for another exciting escape in the future!  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Excellent family experience - our older kids LOVED the bunk beds and enjoyed the water park as much as they did Disneyland!!  We were able to accommodate 3 kids and 2 adults comfortably in a standard room! The breakfast was a hit with character- style pancakes and breakfasts that fuelled us for hours while we went to Disneyland! The staff were all incredibly helpful and welcoming! Would stay here again without question!!
Manager Response: Dear DaisCanada,  Wow, thank you for the lovely review! It’s our goal to provide incredible getaways for all families, and we’re delighted to hear that was exactly your experience. It’s thrilling to know that our unique accommodations and magical amenities made your family vacation even more special. We truly appreciate your kind words and hope to welcome you back for another exciting adventure in the future! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We stayed here for a girls trip over the weekend. 7 women in two rooms. It was perfection! There are two showers in each room, plus our rooms had two queens and bunkbeds. We liked the little eating area and mini fridge as well.   The pool area looked awesome for kids. Lots of slides and splash pad areas. We also loved how we could walk to the Disney parks. It is SO CLOSE to the gates!   The hotel was also very clean. I would highly recommend! The rooms could easily accommodate a family of 6.
Manager Response: Dear TeresaKwant,  Wow, what a delightful review! It was a pleasure to host your girls’ getaway and we’re elated to know that you all had an incredible time with us. It’s fantastic to hear that our spacious accommodations had all the amenities to make your stay extra relaxing and comfortable. It truly is a pleasure neighboring the happiest place on Earth, and it’s wonderful to know that our convenient location led to epic adventures. We appreciate your kind recommendation and hope to welcome you all back soon! Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great for families with small kids
Summary: Another great stay for us at the Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park.  Main observations:  -  Staff are ultra friendly and helpful.  Keeping up the Disney vibes for sure.  Also a very very clean and well maintained property.  -  This is important:  YOU NEED TO MAKE POOL RESERVATIONS IN ADVANCE!!  I was not thrilled that this practice is being maintained.  It's bad enough that we are all scheduling our disney touring so it really stinks that now we have to schedule our pool time too.  I booked a month out and go the times that I wanted, but not happy that I had to do it.  - I recall the mattresses being more comfortable at my last visit four years ago.  Perhaps they are ready for replacement.  - this hotel really is perfect for families with small kids.  Bunk beds, eating area, huge
Manager Response: Greetings Aaron and Donna R: Thank you so much for being our guests once again; I am happy that you had an overall great experience. Thank you so much for writing such a thorough review. Your review will be a big help to other travelers so they can determine whether we are the right hotel for their travel needs and it helps us know where we have room for improvement. We have heard you and will work on making improvements wherever possible.  Our most important goal is the safety of our guests; small unattended children excited about seeing the Disney parks or fireworks could get into trouble climbing on the balcony railings so we do not have furniture on our balconies. Our waterpark reservation system prevents over-crowding and ensures we do not exceed the fire marshal and health department maximum occupancy limits at our water park and affords all our guests the opportunity to enjoy the waterpark in a safe, clean, and uncrowded environment. Thank you for being our guests and for sharing your insights with us. Sincerely, Bill Cleaver, General Manager

Summary: Great location to Disneyland (within walking distance). Quite a few restaurants nearby. Nice to have a small refrigerator and microwave in the room. Could have used a couple of drinking glasses in the room.
Manager Response: Dear terryaccobra,   Thank you so much for your positive review! We’re so happy that you enjoyed your recent stay at Courtyard Anaheim, and that our convenient location and accommodations made your time with us even better. We greatly appreciate your comments and feedback, and we hope that we’ll have the chance to welcome you back again soon for another excellent vacation experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Clean. Friendly staff.very responsive. Rooms were large. Need more water pressure in sinks. We would stay again. Well located as it is very close to I-5 and Disney park. A number of restaurants and drug stores are located within walking distance from the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear mldavis1886,   Thank you so much for your positive review and feedback! We’re so happy to hear that your stay overall was enjoyable, comfortable, and convenient. We’re always working to improve our operations and make Courtyard Anaheim as close to perfect as possible, and your comments are greatly appreciated in helping us achieve that for our guests. We greatly appreciate your review, and we hope to welcome you back again soon for an even better experience in the future!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The room was spacious and very clean, and the staff were so friendly and helpful. We also loved the amenities here and loved staying so close to the Disneyland entrance. Having the bistro and mini store open so early and closing so late was a wonderful perk…and the food was delicious!
Manager Response: Dear cfordfam80,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! It’s such a pleasure to hear that every aspect of your time at Courtyard Anaheim was fantastic, from our amazing amenities to convenient location, to our top-tier staff and delicious food and beverage options. We’re delighted that you had such a marvelous experience, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again for your next California getaway!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great customer service! During a time when I feel like good customer service is no longer a priority, it was super refreshing to experience friendly, attentive, informative and kind staff. The hotel as a whole was very nice! The room was spacious and clean, very comfortable and modern. Convenient breakfast and coffee in the morning. The pantry was a great option as well. Perfect for families. The walk to Disney was easy! Housekeeping was by request only, due to staffing issues, but they made it clear they would do anything they could to get what we needed. We ended up not requesting service, but I felt confident if I needed something, they would get it done. Kudos to the front desk and Bistro staff for providing wonderful service with a smile. Thanks Courtyard for a great stay!
Manager Response: Dear Lazyjenn3467,   Thank you so much for your effusive review! We have always made it our goal to provide our guests with an exceptional vacation experience from check-in to check-out, which begins with having an incredible team of dedicated and welcoming staff. On top of getting to experience our wonderful amenities and location, we’re delighted to hear that their kindness and service made you feel comfortable and well taken care of for the whole duration of your stay! We greatly appreciate your enthusiastic comments, and we hope to have the opportunity to host you and your family again for another extraordinary Courtyard Anaheim experience.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: very good no surprises excellent services throughout  One main issue was that we foung it very expensive
Summary: staff were friendly and very knowledgeable and helpful  grounds were kept clean  Food and rides were very good The atmosphere was fun and our children totally enjoyed the experience and want to come back again
Manager Response: Dear Roving47435754466,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We’re delighted to hear that you and your family had such an incredible vacation at Courtyard Anaheim, and that our friendly staff and inviting atmosphere helped make your stay so memorable. Whether you’re coming for a visit to the Disney parks or just looking for a great place to relax and unwind, we hope to have the chance to welcome you back again for another fantastic experience in the future!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Overall, great experience! The lady at the front desk upon arrival was rude, but the rest of the time there customer service was great. I loved the area, the kids liked the waterpark. Distance from hotel to main entrance to Disneyland was approximately 5 minutes. The rooms were great size and I enjoyed the bunk beds and 2 queen beds.
Manager Response: Dear F6324AHjenniferm,   Thank you so much for your review! We’re so pleased to hear that your stay with us was so enjoyable and exciting for the whole family. While we’re sorry to hear that your initial staff encounter was not ideal, we want to assure you that such instances are not typical to Courtyard Anaheim, and we’re glad that you were still left with a welcoming and overall positive experience. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again for an even better vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We arrived early and our room was ready. We were upgraded to a waterpark/Disneyland view. It was fun to see the colorful waterpark each day and to view the Disneyland fireworks from our hotel room. Staff was friendly and helpful. We were easily able to use our $20 daily Food and Beverage credit at the Bistro. Our room was clean and comfortable. We made reservations and enjoyed using the waterpark on two different days. The slides and pools were fun, there were lots of chairs and abundant towels. It less than a 15-minute walk to the California Adventure and Disneyland theme park gates.
Manager Response: Dear ajbardiea,   Thank you so much for your awesome review! It’s fantastic to hear that you were able to take advantage of the unique perks of our hotel, like our water park/Disneyland view suites and convenient location. From check-in to check-out, it’s always been our mission to go above and beyond for our guests at Courtyard Anaheim, and we’re delighted to hear that every aspect of your stay was so wonderful! We hope to have the chance to welcome you back again soon for another unforgettable vacation experience.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This is our third time staying here, and each time it gets better.  Very clean hotel, staff are all very helpful and friendly.  We have stayed at a few different spots while going to Disneyland, and this by far tops them all.
Manager Response: Dear trevcottam,   Thank you so much for your fabulous review! We love having the chance to both welcome back and hear from our returning guests about their experiences at Courtyard Anaheim, and it’s especially delightful to know that every visit has gotten better and better! We’re so happy and honored to be your go-to hotel for Disneyland trips, and we can’t wait to welcome you back again for even more wonderful visits in the future.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel and perfect for Disneyland
Summary: Took a family trip to Disneyland.  Choose this hotel because of proximity to Disneyland and also the waterpark they had.  Hotel was extremely nice.  Everything was clean.  Rooms were spotless.  All of the staff were extremely nice and helpful.  The restaurant downstairs was very good.  The waterpark was a hit with the kids.  You have to see pictures.  Tons to do.
Manager Response: Dear 503Disney,   Thank you so much for your lovely review—it’s always a pleasure to hear our guests describe their time at Courtyard Anaheim as perfect! We’re so happy that you and your family were able to enjoy our welcoming accommodations, convenient location, and unique on-site amenities. Whether you’re planning another Disneyland trip in the future, or just looking for a fun place to getaway, we look forward to welcoming you back for another excellent vacation experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Our room was super clean, the balcony was awesome (my kids got to watch the Disneyland fireworks. Everyone had their own bed. There were 2 showers which was super convenient. The water park was super cool for my boys. They loved it. We will be back.
Manager Response: Dear jessicasP5037ZN,  Thank you so much for your fantastic review! We know how important it is to feel like you have a comfortable place to unwind and relax when on vacation, and we’re delighted to hear that our spacious accommodations and wonderful amenities were able to do just that for you and your family. It’s a pleasure to hear that you’ll be returning for another visit in the future, and we look forward to welcoming you all back for an even better return experience at Courtyard Anaheim!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The staff was friendly, very clean and great location. It was a very easy walk to and from Disneyland. Would definitely stay there again. Didn’t get to enjoy the water park but would like to do so next time.
Manager Response: Dear mguti21,  Thank you so much for your kind review! We’re so pleased to hear that you loved your stay at Courtyard Anaheim. While we’re sorry to hear that you didn’t get a chance to enjoy our incredible water park this time around, we do hope to welcome you back again soon to give you an even more fabulous vacation experience than the first!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Very comfortable beds, clean rooms, and very quiet!  For once, we stayed in a hotel where the HVAC didn’t keep us up at night.  This hotel is about a ten minute walk from the parks.  All the employees we encountered were so friendly, it was very impressive.  Would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Sdow2,  Thank you so much for your fabulous review! It’s always a pleasure to hear from our guests that their time at Courtyard Anaheim exceeded their expectations and left them with plenty of wonderful vacation memories. We’re so happy to hear that you’d return for another visit in the future, and we hope that we’ll have the chance to welcome you back the next time you’re in Anaheim, be it for a Disney vacation or just to get away!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Clean, good service & close to Disneyland
Summary: Checked out today after a 5 night stay. The hotel was super clean. We loved the bunk bed setup, but I agree with a previous poster about the bathroom being a bit awkward. The shower in the main area was essentially useless other than holding went bathing suits. I loved the smell in the lobby. There is a cafe down there and the food is really good and pretty decently priced. The staff was all wonderful and super helpful.   My only complaint is that the water park requires reservations, and it closes for 30-60 minutes between each session. So the longest you can be at the pool is about 2 hours. And there is always a line to get in when each reservation window starts, so it’s actually less than that. When I am on vacation, I don’t want to have to get up and leave the pool before
Manager Response: Dear Heatheregan328,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your stay at Courtyard Anaheim! We’re delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, and that our friendly staff and convenient location made your time even better.    We greatly appreciate your feedback about our water park reservation system, and we completely understand the frustrations you’ve expressed. It is our goal to provide all our guests with an opportunity to enjoy our waterpark in a safe, clean, and uncrowded environment. When our hotel is busy, we have up to 800 guests in-house, and we have found that our reservation system helps us to prevent overcrowding and related water quality issues. The scheduled, periodic closures help to ensure that optimum water chemistry is maintained throughout the day - this allows our filtration system, UV light purification system, and chemical feeders to effectively do their jobs and ensures each session has optimal water safety. Additionally, the closures allow us to clean and prepare the water park facility and furniture for each new session.    We do understand that this policy is not for everyone, and we apologize for the inconvenience and disappointment. Your honest and detailed feedback is incredibly helpful for us as we strive to give our guests the best possible experience at our hotel, and we hope that we will have the chance to welcome you back in the future for an even more enjoyable vacation.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great hotel for family stay at Disneyland
Summary: Great hotel. Family friendly rooms. Professional valet service. Waterpark is fun. Be aware they have a reservation system for the waterpark. Very manageable walk to Disneyland. The Bistro is convenient, food is great, wait times are short.
Manager Response: Dear Road821232,  Thank you so much for your positive review! We’re pleased to hear that you had a great time during your stay at Courtyard Anaheim, and that our convenient location, unique amenities, and delicious Bistro all made your time with us even more enjoyable. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you and your family back for another fantastic vacation experience in the future!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Magical stay for our Disneyland vacay!
Summary: I debated staying off property for this Disneyland trip, when we go to Disney World, we have always stayed on property.  I didn’t miss being on Disney property at all!  This hotel experience is like staying at a Disney property.  Our room was ready when we arrived at 12pm, everyone was always so friendly and greeted us each time we walked through the lobby and the staff were constantly going above and beyond to make our stay magical, and it was!  The rooms very comfortably sleep 6, have a microwave, small fridge and coffee maker and a small dining area.  The pool area is great for toddlers and bigger kids, a rare find!  It is an easy walk to the parks and it has Mimi’s Cafe, Panera, McDonalds and iHop all on the way to Disney.  We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear 298shanar,  Thank you so much for your fabulous review! It’s such a compliment to hear that your time with us at Courtyard Anaheim exceeded your expectations during your Disneyland vacation. We take great pride in being able to give our guests a place to recharge and refresh at the end of their busy days, as well as provide a hub for time to play when not at the parks. We’re delighted to hear that we were able to tick all the boxes for you and your family, and we can’t wait to welcome you all back again for another excellent experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great hotel! Spacious rooms. Loved the bunk beds, corner table & 2 showers! Close to the main gate of Disneyland…just a five minute walk.  My kids loved the water park at the hotel too. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear WendyHendrick,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We’re so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at Courtyard Anaheim, and that you especially loved our unique accommodations and amenities—the water park and bunk beds are definitely favorites for our younger guests! It’s wonderful to hear that you’ll be returning for another stay in the future, and we look forward to welcoming you back very soon!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This was our 2nd stay at the Courtyard Marriott and, just like the last time, it was a wonderful stay. The hotel is impeccably clean and well-appointed. Every staff interaction - from front desk to housekeeping - was friendly and professional. The store located inside the hotel is stocked with everything you need. There’s also a laundry room, which is $2 a load. This was a game changer! The hotel itself is also just a few blocks away from the Disneyland entrance, and is located ride next to Panera and McDonalds.  We stayed in the pool view room, which had a great view of the fireworks.  The breakfast offerings at the Bistro were quick and delicious. I would highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear couponrn,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! We love getting the opportunity to hear from our return guests about their experiences at Courtyard Anaheim, and it’s a delight to know that your most recent stay was just as wonderful as the last. We’re so happy that you were able to enjoy every aspect of your time with us, from our incredible amenities and accommodations, to our convenient location and friendly staff. Your enthusiastic recommendation is greatly appreciated, and we can’t wait to welcome you back again for even more fabulous vacation experiences!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Our family of 5 had an amazing 5 night stay!  The room had 2 bunk beds and 2 queen beds and was large enough for our family.  The 2 showers and double sinks were nice as well.   We managed to sneak in some water park time as well and my kids thoroughly enjoyed it.  The lifeguards do a great job, saw they prevent a possible situation due to the quick action!  I just wish they wouldn’t tell from the top of the water slide tower as much.  No one can really hear what they are saying anyway.   We managed to walk from the hotel to the park, through security and scan our tickets into Disneyland in 15 mins. Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear chelsea_smile123,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review and comments! We know how important it is for families to have a comfortable and welcoming place to stay during vacation, and we pride ourselves on being able to provide the perfect setting for guests of all ages. We’re delighted to hear that your kiddos had such a fun time at our water park, too! We’re so happy to hear that you’d stay with us again, and we can’t wait to welcome you and your family back again in the near future for another excellent Disney experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We had an excellent stay at this location! At first, I was a bit bummed because I thought I wanted to stay at the Disneyland Hotel- but not now! From now on, this will always be my first choice! Where do I begin? Check-in was easy, and the front desk staff was excellent. The hotel was spotless, and our room was immaculate. The room configuration of two queen beds and a set of bunks was perfect! The walk to Disneyland was easy and safe. We grabbed a bite at The Bistro when we arrived and quickly realized that was a wonderful quick service option for us during our stay. The entire hotel staff was friendly and helpful - even our toddler’s meltdown in the gift shop over a stuffed Spider-Man did not rattle the kind clerk. I can not say enough about this professional and efficient
Manager Response: Dear JanaM58,   Thank you so much for your fabulous review and kind comments! What a compliment it is to hear that your time at Courtyard Anaheim not only exceeded your expectations, but also gave you a stay that left you with some wonderful memories and relaxing moments. From our spacious accommodations to our world-class staff, we take great pride in making our guests feel welcome and comfortable in every aspect of their stay. We so appreciate your positive comments, and we can’t wait to welcome you and your family back again for another remarkable vacation experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, great rooms for families, easy access to park.
Summary: I was very impressed with our stay. The staff are very friendly and helpful, from front desk to door, to restaurant. The food and service at the restaurant was very good and was a nice, easy space to have a meal away from the park or evening drink outside on the patio by the fire table. The room worked perfectly for our family of five which is hard to find. Two queens, a bunk bed, a sitting area with table, a large bathroom with separate toilet and second shower! There was also a microwave and mini fridge which worked out great. The kids loved the waterpark and the lifeguards were noticeably very attentive. Great access to the park as well - would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear hollylswinton,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We’re always striving to provide the best possible experience for our guests from start to finish, and it’s a delight to hear that you and your family had such an amazing and comfortable stay at Courtyard Anaheim. From our spacious accommodations to our dedicated and friendly staff, we’re thrilled to know that everyone in your family found something to love about your time with us! We can’t wait to have the chance to welcome you all back again soon for another unforgettable vacation experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Quiet and clean room with a 2nd floor balcony. We saw the Disneyland fireworks one night from our balcony- so cool! It's about a 5-7 minute walk to the parks. The shower was HUGE and everyone loved our stay! There's even a fun little water park with slides, pools and whirlpool.
Manager Response: Dear Prism1226,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! We’re delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay at Courtyard Anaheim, and that you especially loved getting to enjoy a spectacular view of the fireworks from your balcony! We’re so happy that everyone in your party had such a fantastic experience, and we hope to have the chance to welcome you all back soon for another unforgettable vacation.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We had two rooms and the check-in process was quick.  Rooms were clean and offered a great view of the park including the incredible fireworks show.  We didn’t eat at the hotel or visit the gift shop.
Manager Response: Dear 643tarak,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! It’s our aim to make our guests’ time at Courtyard Anaheim not only convenient, but also a relaxing and uniquely exciting vacation experience from start to finish. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again soon to enjoy even more of our wonderful amenities!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance
