Summary: Best Disney Hotel! My family and I have vaccinated at many place when we go to Disney and this place is our favorite thus far. Rooms are clean and specious, hotel has great amenities and staff is super friendly and welcoming. Valet parking is convenient.
Manager Response: Dear yajairacastro1988,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! It’s always a delight to hear from our guests who frequent Disneyland, and we’re absolutely thrilled to hear that Courtyard Anaheim is your go-to hotel when visiting the parks! We look forward to getting the chance to welcome you back again for even more incredible vacations for your future Disneyland adventures!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Valet was terrible, and the cost! $40 for them to stand around staring at each other while we waiting for 20 minutes for them to get our car. Overall the hotel was poor for the price we paid. The location being so close to Disney is the one redeeming feature.
Manager Response: Dear marclicata,   Thank you for taking the time to review your recent experience at Courtyard Anaheim. The issues you described with our valet service are certainly not what we want for our guests, and we want to assure you that such occurrences are not typical to our overall hotel experience. We understand that our valet and parking policy is not necessarily right for all of our guests, and we apologize that this aspect of your stay affected your overall experience. We’re always striving to improve our operations here at Courtyard Anaheim, and your feedback is an integral part of that process, so we want to thank you again for taking the time. If you have any further questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us directly and we’ll be happy to speak with you.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Staff was friendly and accommodating, rooms very nice!, they had a room ready when we arrived about 1:30pm, they also let us checkout at 12pm. We stood on second floor which was nice because that’s were the pool is located, the lifeguards on staff were very trained at keeping watchful eyes!!!, my grandkids love it!!!
Manager Response: Dear bgarcia626,   Thank you so much for your enthusiastic review! It’s always so wonderful to hear when our dedicated staff are able to go above and beyond for our guests—we’re so happy that they helped to make your stay even more enjoyable, comfortable, and relaxing! We hope to have the chance to welcome you and your family back again soon for another incredible staycation at Courtyard Anaheim.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This is such a convenient hotel for stays at Disneyland - we had a resort view which was great for watching the fireworks. The rooms were large and comfortable with 2 showers which was very useful and bunk beds and a small seating area. We used the Bistro for dinner and breakfast which had a great choice and tasty food. All of the colleagues where so genuinely friendly and helpful which was so nice - I arranged for a postal delivery through the reception team with them being so helpful with it being a breeze. Highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Amandari29,   Thank you so much for your fabulous review! What a delight it is to hear that every aspect of your time at Courtyard Anaheim was so incredible. We pride ourselves on being able to provide our guests with a convenient and comfortable home base for their Disney adventures, and we’re so happy that our dedicated staff, lovely amenities, and spacious accommodations made your time extra enjoyable. We greatly appreciate your recommendation, and we hope to welcome you back again the next time you find yourself in Anaheim!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great place to stay near Disneyland!
Summary: We were thrilled with this hotel! We had just come from a few days at the Marriott Marquis San Diego Marina, but this room was so much larger, with a much more comfortable mattress and linens (though without the amazing view)! The walk to the park was not bad at all (though when you are done at the end of the day you will really wish there was a shuttle because you are so ready to be done walking). The pool water park was great and we were able to make a reservation after our arrival with a little flexibility. The room was clean, the lobby was very nice.  We were just very pleased with our stay.
Manager Response: Dear Melinda R,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! It’s an absolute pleasure to hear that we were able to give you a comfortable, convenient, and relaxing experience at Courtyard Anaheim. From the spacious and welcoming accommodations, to our unique and exciting amenities, we’re delighted to know that you left our hotel with plenty of amazing memories. We hope to have the chance to welcome you back again soon for another unforgettable vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: I liked everything about this hotel the only thing I didn’t like is that i booked for my kids so they can enjoy the pool and it was a red flag when they don’t let you be in the pool as much as you want . You have to reserve and that was a turn off for me because I booked it thinking my kids were going to be at the pool the whole day . I even planned a whole day ahead to speak at the pool and we were only allowed to be there 2 hours . There for I won’t be staying at this hotel again .
Manager Response: Dear nancypas1811,   Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at Courtyard Anaheim. It’s disheartening to hear that your experience was not the relaxing getaway it should have been, and we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience.    It’s always been our goal to provide all guests with an opportunity to enjoy our waterpark in a safe, clean, and uncrowded environment. When our hotel is busy, we have up to 800 guests in house and we have found that our reservation system helps us to deliver on our most important goals: the safety and health of our guests. The reservation system prevents overcrowding and related water quality issues, as well as ensures we do not exceed the fire marshal and health department maximum occupancy limits at our water park.    We understand this policy does not necessarily work for all of our guests, and while we understand that perhaps Courtyard Anaheim was not right for you, we hope that the time you did have outside of the water park was enjoyable. We greatly appreciate your comments and feedback, and we invite you to reach out to us directly with any further questions or inquiries.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Wonderful! We will be coming back next Disney visit. Kids loved the pool- great water slides and  area for them to play. It was a great option to break up the day from Disneyland or end the day with. Easy walk to the park- less than 10 min!
Manager Response: Dear samanthaj162022,   Thank you so much for your enthusiastic review! We love getting to hear from our guests about their favorite experiences at Courtyard Anaheim, and it’s such a thrill to know that everyone in your party had such a wonderful and relaxing experience from start to finish. We hope to have the chance to have you all back again soon the next time you’re heading to Disneyland—or just looking for an incredible getaway!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great hotel. Great location to DisneyLand. We never needed a car. It is a 5-10 minute walk to Disneyland, California Adventure, and downtown Disney. The breakfast spot was good and well priced. Employees were very kind and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Lindsay88407,   Thank you so much for your kind review! We’re delighted to hear that we could provide you with a hotel experience that was convenient, comfortable, and welcoming on all fronts. It was a pleasure to host you for your Disneyland vacation, and we hope to have the chance to welcome you back again for another fabulous stay in the future!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Fun for the kids but felt too restricted for a relaxing getaway
Summary: The rooms were clean and spacious. The staff was friendly but the font desk didn't seem knowledgeable when asked questions regarding bonvoy late check out eligibility and or didn't provide adequate information at check-in. We had 2 rooms so we got lucky to schedule 2 time schedules for the kids but not all of us got to enjoy sitting out by the pool which defeats the purpose. I think its silly to have so many restrictions especially when not that busy. Didn't realize that if you don't have a pool reservation there is no outdoor seating area to enjoy even the sun. Not sure if  I'd return but at least now I fully understand the layout.
Manager Response: Greetings rafaelyani: Thank you for being our guest and for writing a review; we truly appreciate your providing us with feedback regarding your experience. We are happy that you found our rooms to be clean and spacious and the staff friendly. I apologize that the desk agent you spoke to did not answer your questions to your satisfaction. We will work with our front desk staff to ensure they are able to convey hotel information and late checkout eligibility appropriately.  Our waterpark reservation policy empowers us to deliver on our most important goals: the safety and health of our guests. The reservation system prevents over-crowding and related water quality issues. Our new policy ensures we do not exceed the fire marshal and health department maximum occupancy limits at our water park. The scheduled, periodic closures help to ensure that optimum water chemistry is maintained throughout the day - this allows our filtration system, UV light purification system, and chemical feeders to effectively do their jobs and ensures each session has optimal water safety. Additionally, the closures allow us to clean and prepare the water park facility and furniture for each new session. In addition to the 1 reservation per day per room we do welcome walk-in reservations for the waterpark when it is not fully booked.  Please contact me if I can be of additional assistance to you.

Summary: Hotel was great, except for the “POOL RESERVATION” we could only use the pool at a certain time. I’m sorry but if I’m paying a pretty penny just to stay at this place I expect my kids to enjoy the pool as much as possible.
Manager Response: Hello angielopez1237: Thank you for being our guest and for writing a review; we truly appreciate your providing us with feedback regarding your experience. We are happy that you thought our hotel was great (except for the waterpark reservation requirement).  It is our goal to provide all our guests with an opportunity to enjoy our waterpark in a safe, clean, and uncrowded environment. When our hotel is busy, we have up to 800 guests in house and we have found that our reservation system helps us to deliver on our most important goals: the safety and health of our guests. The reservation system prevents over-crowding and related water quality issues and ensures we do not exceed the fire marshal and health department maximum occupancy limits at our water park.  The scheduled, periodic closures help to ensure that optimum water chemistry is maintained throughout the day - this allows our filtration system, UV light purification system, and chemical feeders to effectively do their jobs and ensures each session has optimal water safety. Additionally, the closures allow us to clean and prepare the water park facility and furniture for each new session. In addition to the 1 reservation per day per room we do welcome “walk-ins” for our registered guests for additional sessions at the waterpark when it is not fully booked.  Please contact me if I can be of additional assistance to you.

Summary: Bed and pillows were way too soft. So my sleep quality was pretty bad. There are other minor problems. But overall it was alright. Staffs were friendly. The valet parking price was pretty steep. It was 38 per night. Location was great. About 10 min walk to the park
Manager Response: Greetings hidetoshi981: Thank you for being our guest and for submitting a review. We truly appecieate your feedback and will incorporate your thoughts as we evlauate our services, amenities, and supplies. I apologize that you found your pillows to be too soft; we are always happy to bring additional pillows up to your room so you can find the right onw for you. We stock foam and feather pillows and are happy to help you achieve a great nights rest. I apologize that you found the valet costs to be steep; our rates are on par with rates in our area and I feel we provide superior service and facilities. Please contact me if I can be of additional assistance to you.

Summary: Clean, convenient to disneyland and Disney California Adventure and spacious for our family of 4.  Appreciated the 2 showers in our room.  Would definitely stay here again if we find ourselves in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Inspire15438114725,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! We’re so pleased to hear that you and your family had such an enjoyable, relaxing, and comfortable stay at Courtyard Anaheim. It’s a delight to hear that you’d return for another fabulous vacation in the future, and we look forward to having the opportunity to welcome you back again!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Courtyard by Marriott Theme Park Entrance
Summary: We stayed at the Courtyard by Marriott Theme Park Entrance and Water park during our family Disneyland  trip and it was fantastic! Very clean, rooms are huge with bunk beds and 2 showers! My kids LOVED the water park! It was right across the street from the Disneyland Resort. All the staff we came in contact with were so nice and caring! Awesome customer service. Highly recommended hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Familyvacafun5,   Thank you so much for your fabulous review! It’s a delight to hear that you and your family had such a magical time at Courtyard Anaheim from start to finish, and that our spacious accommodations and dedicated staff made your time even more enjoyable. We greatly appreciate your enthusiastic recommendation, and we hope to have the chance to welcome you back again soon the next time you’re in town for another incredible Disneyland vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This hotel (for which I’m paying $400/night) does not offer housekeeping, presumably due to Covid (we all know that Covid has become an excuse for cost cutting measures and poor service).  I find this ridiculous given that they offer every other service (valet, cafe, etc.).   If you request it someone will empty your trash.  After I complained someone did a full service job on our room.  After a long day at Disney I want to come back to a clean room with the beds made.    They also have mandatory valet parking at $40 a night which I find outrageous as well.  On the positive side, the staff are friendly, the rooms are large and the water park is nice.
Manager Response: Greetings Ilovehusky1:   Greetings Ilovehusky1: Thank you for being our guest and thank you for your review. We do not automatically provide daily housekeeping service, but we invite our guests to let us know if they prefer no service, limited service, or full service. We are desperately looking forward to returning to pre-covid-19 housekeeping service levels but are currently unable to staff all the positions in the hotel.  When the Disney resort and the Anaheim convention center closed, we were forced to close our hotel for 411 days due to lack of business and had to lay off the entire staff (including me). Once we reopened, we hired and trained as many staff members as we could however occupancy levels fluctuated up and down as the various covid-19 variant waves swept through our area. The instability of the hospitality business, especially in our area, has been an impediment to our ability to attract and keep staff members; many prefer more stable work, such as factory or distribution centers, as those businesses have been a more reliable source of steady employment.  We have been successful in hiring for our front desk, valet, and food service positions but housekeepers continue to be in short supply throughout the Anaheim Resort area. We hope covid-19 is fading and that hotel occupancy levels will stabilize which will help us attract workers so that we can return to daily housekeeping services. Our valet charges are posted on our website so that our guests can make an informed decision about our hotel and our prices are in line with our market.  I am pleased that you found our staff to be friendly and enjoyed our large rooms and waterpark.

Summary: Nice clean rooms, courteous helpful staff, the in house water park was a big hit with the kids the jacuzzi was good for those sore feet after days walking around the park. easy walk to the entrance of Disneyland can't wait to book my next stay.
Manager Response: Dear tvsfarrier,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! We’re so happy that you and your family had such a fantastic time at Courtyard Anaheim, and that you were able to take advantage of our amazing onsite amenities during your stay—there’s nothing quite like getting to unwind in a relaxing jacuzzi! We’re thrilled to hear you’ll be returning for another stay in the future, and we can’t wait to welcome you back for another excellent getaway experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great hotel overall. Comfortable, clean, amazing staff. Can’t beat the location. The water park was top notch! I think my kids liked the water park as much as they liked Disneyland. I didn’t realize there would be a Starbucks in the lobby, but this was the kind of exciter I needed as a tired parent on a Disney trip!
Manager Response: Dear Disneyfamilybears,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! It’s a pleasure to hear that every aspect of your time at Courtyard Anaheim went above and beyond your expectations—especially our amazing water park for the kids and the convenience of our onsite Starbucks! We’re delighted that you had such a fantastic vacation with us, and we hope to have the chance to welcome you back again soon for another unforgettable getaway for the whole family.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great hotel! The staff is very friendly and helpful, the rooms are spacious and clean, and the water park is incredible! We had two younger children with us, but even teens would love the hotel. The walk to Disney parks was as easy as walking one block and crossing one street. I highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear teacherlovelady,   Thank you so much for your fantastic review! We’re delighted that you and your family had such a wonderful experience at Courtyard Anaheim, from our convenient location and amazing amenities, to our spacious room and welcoming staff. We appreciate your enthusiastic recommendation, and hope to have the chance to have you back again in the future for a vacation as remarkable as the last!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Amazing staff! Great service. Love the bistro bring open all day! I stay at Courtyards all the time and this is much more than that! Lots of moving parts with all of the families that stay there and the hotel staff there executes flawlessly!
Manager Response: Dear davidkean,   Thank you so much for your generous review! We take great pride in giving our guests a vacation experience that is as convenient and relaxing as it is fun, and we’re delighted to know that our dedicated team and excellent service was able to achieve just that for you and your family! We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again soon for another unforgettable vacation experience at Courtyard Anaheim.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The room was set up perfect for families with the bunk beds, an eating booth, a fridge and plenty of space for luggage. My only complaint was the lighting was very dim in the bathroom and overall in the room but otherwise the room was great! We had breakfast and coffee at the on-site restaurant and it was very good and reasonably priced. They had a nice gift shop and little snack store. Staff was great! Good location by Disney. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear 75mph,   Thank you so much for your kind review and comments! While we’re sorry to hear that the lighting in your room was a little dim, we’re so happy that your time with us was still enjoyable and relaxing on all fronts! We’re always striving to give our guests the best possible experience from start to finish at Courtyard Anaheim, and your feedback is an essential part of that process and greatly appreciated. We’re delighted to hear that you loved our convenient location and variety of onsite amenities, and we look forward to having you back again in the future for an even better vacation experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great. Love this hotel.  Scheduling pool times works out well. The good is great too. This is our third time staying at this hotel. Close to Disneyland. They work with you when you want to check on early.
Manager Response: Dear juliechristian16,   Thank you so much for your kind review! We love getting the opportunity to hear from our return guests, and it’s especially wonderful to hear that your third time staying at Courtyard Anaheim was just as enjoyable and relaxing as the previous visits. We hope to have the chance to welcome you back again for many more incredible vacation experiences!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Perfect location, very nice hotel.  Definitely recommend for families going to Disneyland!  Much easier to walk to the parks from here than drive.  Great rooms with two queen beds and cute bunk beds for kids.
Manager Response: Dear susanv4girls,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! We’re so happy to hear that Courtyard Anaheim was able to provide such a fantastic and memorable vacation experience for you and your family—our bunk beds are definitely a favorite for our younger guests! We hope to have the chance to welcome you back again soon for your next Disneyland vacation.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great location. Had everything we needed. Rooms were great with kids having the bunk beds and 2 other beds.   Food at the restaurant was also better then expected with some fun options for kids breakfast.   Pool is a little small though and the water in the splash park portion was a little cool but all in all the kids had fun running through it.
Manager Response: Dear JordanTD2022,   Thank you so much for your kind comments and review! We’re always striving to give our guests a vacation experience as stress-free and relaxing as possible, and we’re so glad that Courtyard Anaheim had everything that you and your family needed to have a wonderful time. We hope to have the chance to welcome you back again soon for another incredible getaway for the whole family to enjoy!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We took our family to Disneyland. The hotel exceeded our expectations. The location, amenities, pool, and food were wonderful. We had everything we needed in one location. The staff was extremely helpful and ensured all of our needs were met.
Manager Response: Dear fc20222022,   Thank you so much for your fabulous review! What a treat it is to hear that your time at Courtyard Anaheim exceeded your expectations on all fronts, from our dedicated and friendly staff to our enviable locations and amenities. We appreciate your kind comments, and we hope to have the chance to welcome you back again soon for your next Disneyland adventure!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Customer service was excellent as was the outdoor pool park.  Sleeping was a bit difficult because the street noise was excessive.  It sounded like race cars on the freeway during the night which woke me up on several occasions.  We appreciated the two queen beds and the bunk beds, but the bathroom layout was awkward.  While there were two sinks, you couldn't use on of them if someone was going to the restroom because they would open the door on you.  Also, the second shower was useless because it was in the main part of the bathroom, so no one could brush their teeth or anything unless if you didn't need any privacy.  It was a full 10-15 minute walk to the park.  Even though we booked it for the water park, next time I might take a budget place that just has a pool instead.
Manager Response: Greetings snapdragon59: Thank you for staying as our guest and for writing a review. I am happy that you received excellent customer service and enjoyed our waterpark. I apologize that you could hear street noise; our waterpark view rooms may be a better choice for you in the future as they face away from the highway and overlook the waterpark. I regret that you did not enjoy the layout of our bathrooms; our bathrooms have a large main area with a tub/shower and a vanity with two sinks and a door which leads to a separate area with a deluxe shower and toilet which usually receive high praise from our guests, but this shows we all have our individual preferences and that few designs are universally accepted. We invite you back to the Disney Resort area and hope you will stay with us again.

Summary: Great hotel for a visit to Disneyland with grandchildren.  The water park is fun for children.  It is an easy walk to Downtown Disney and the parks.  Great staff and service.  The bunk beds in the room were a hit with the kids.  This was our second stay at this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Katie M,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! It’s always a pleasure to hear from our returning guests about their experience at Courtyard Anaheim, and we’re delighted to know that your second visit was just as wonderful as the first. It’s a treat to hear that the kiddos in your party especially enjoyed our super fun water park and in-room bunk beds, too! We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you all back again for another fantastic vacation in the near future.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Very clean and lovely surroundings! Kids loved the water park and food!  Easy to get to Disneyland!! Loved our stay! Only two blocks from Disney entrance!! All staff courteous and professional! Guest services brought all needed towels etc in a timely fashion.
Manager Response: Dear kathleen7169,   Thank you so much for your generous review! We’re delighted to hear that every aspect of your time at Courtyard Anaheim was nothing short of wonderful, from our amazing location and generous staff, to our super fun water park for the kiddos to enjoy! We greatly appreciate your comments, and we hope that you’ll join us again soon for another remarkable family vacation.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great location to Disney main entrance 8-10 mins max. Clean hotel. My kids loved the water park. Staff was friendly. Draw back was the limited housekeeping service. During our 3 night stay there was no maid who came to clean the room.
Manager Response: Dear jmhhill24,   Thank you so much for your review and feedback! We understand that our limited housekeeping services may be inconvenient to some of our guests, and while we do not offer automatic daily cleaning to provide as much social distancing as possible, we do offer guests the opportunity to request cleaning services themselves on a daily or as needed basis. We’re delighted to hear however that you and your family were still able to enjoy our incredible amenities, location, and staff, and we hope to welcome you all back again for an even better return vacation to Courtyard Anaheim!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Everyone on staff was very friendly, welcoming and attentive to our needs.  The night attendant, Tionno, had a great attitude and always had a smile on her face, even tough it was insanely busy!  She was the best!!
Manager Response: Dear tamaraschaeffer10,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! Our staff are truly the heart and soul of the Courtyard Anaheim experience, and it’s always a delight to hear when one of our specific team members leaves such a positive impression on our guests. We’ll certainly pass on your kind comments and gratitude to Tionno, and we hope to welcome you back again soon for another unforgettable and relaxing vacation.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great Property for Disney fans and others!!
Summary: Rooms were very spacious, clean and relatively quiet, considering we requested water park view.  Staff were very friendly, it was a very short walk to the parks and downtown, and the Bistro was convenient and tasty.  Having two showers was a huge PLUS for our group.  I highly recommend this location!
Manager Response: Dear Deon A,   Thank you so much for your fabulous review! We’re so happy to hear that you and your group had such a wonderful time getting to enjoy our spacious accommodations, amazing amenities, and super convenient location. We greatly appreciate your enthusiastic recommendation, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again soon for another incredible vacation experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We very much enjoyed our stay. The Bellhop  (I believe his name is Jadyn) was fantastic. Very nice and showed us all about our room after bringing all our luggage up! Hotel was very clean. Only complaint is that they don’t clean throughout your stay.
Manager Response: Dear Evandomelen,   Thank you so much for your positive review! It’s always a treat to hear when one of our staff members goes above and beyond to make our guests feel extra welcome and well taken care of—we’ll certainly pass along your thanks to Jadyn! We understand your frustration regarding our cleaning policy; we know that many guests expect cleaning services every day during their vacation. We do offer daily cleaning available by individual request, however due to COVID guidelines and recommendations, automatic daily cleaning is not something we offer at the moment, in order to give guests as much space and social distancing from our staff as needed to feel comfortable. We hope that this did not dampen your stay with us too much, and we hope to welcome you back again soon for another fantastic vacation experience.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Excellent stay and the perfect distance from Disneyland
Summary: The room was well organized, lots of fridge space for snack foods and the “market” in the hotel was an added bonus. Was an exceptionally added bonus that my family of 4 each had their own bed (double queen room with bunk beds) for the much needed undisrurbed sleeps after LOOOOOONG days.  My mother-in-law travelled with us in her own room and we were so grateful she was right next to our room so our kids could visit her. The walk to/from Disneyland park was 5-10 minutes depending on your pace. Very close!   It worked well to book times for the pool/water park and we loved having the break from Disney many of the days we were there.   Thank you for the wonderful stay and amazing service.
Manager Response: Dear hasselstine,   Thank you so much for your fabulous review! What a delight it is to hear that you and your family had such a memorable and relaxing vacation during your stay at Courtyard Anaheim. At the end of a busy day, we know how important it is to have a welcoming place to return to to unwind and recharge. We’re so happy to know that our spacious yet cozy accommodations were able to provide the perfect sanctuary for all members of your family! Thank you again for your kind words. We look forward to welcoming you back again for your next Disney vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We were very happy with our stay. The water park was great to take a break in the middle of the day from the parks. Location is convenient to get to parks, and several restaurants on the way to the park made it easy to grab a quick breakfast. My two kids really loved the bunk beds in the room! Plenty of space to spread out. We would stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear arickelmann,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! We’re so happy that you enjoyed your stay at Courtyard Anaheim, and that you and your family were able to take advantage of our incredible amenities and accommodations in between your trips to Disneyland. We’re delighted to hear that you would return for another visit, and we look forward to having you and your family back again in the near future!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Excellent bathroom with walk-in shower as well as tub/shower. Very clean rooms, comfortable bedding, and courteous staff! Valet was mandatory, unexpectedly. Must make reservations for water park/pool/hot tub, even if just lounging outside.
Manager Response: Dear jonathanrS9904AB,   Thank you so much for your positive review! We’re so glad to hear that you especially enjoyed our spacious accommodations and welcoming staff during your stay at Courtyard Anaheim. We hope to have the chance to welcome you back again soon for another excellent vacation experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We enjoyed our stay. The rooms were clean, the staff was nice and the water park was amazing! We also appreciated that the hotel is in walking distance of Disneyland instead of having to purchase a ride - very convenient!
Manager Response: Dear katmceich,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! We’re delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay at Courtyard Anaheim, and that our convenient location, friendly staff, and impeccable rooms made your vacation extra enjoyable and relaxing. We hope to welcome you back again soon to host you for your next Disneyland getaway!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Was great experience the hotel was clean, the showers got enough shampoo. The Starbucks was long line but super super faster workers. And the front desk was so nice wonderful lady I forgot her name I just remember se said her dad form Italy she listen all we need. Thanks
Manager Response: Dear Miriam C,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We’re so happy to hear that our incredible staff went above and beyond to help make your stay at Courtyard Anaheim so enjoyable and comfortable. We will pass on your thanks to our team, and we hope to have the chance to welcome you back again for another unforgettable vacation experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This is by far my favorite place to stay when I take my family to Disneyland. The staff is exceptional and their customer service goes above and beyond. The hotel is super clean, I LOVE that the rooms have bunk beds which is perfect for families and the food in the bistro is so good!!
Manager Response: Dear nicurnip,   Thank you so much for your effusive review—we love getting to hear from our return visitors about their time with us! It’s such a pleasure to hear that you and your family had such a wonderful experience from start to finish, and that every aspect of your stay at Courtyard Anaheim was nothing short of amazing. We can’t wait to welcome you back again the next time you’re in the area for an incredible Disneyland vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Loved this hotel. Great for kids! Super close to Disneyland. Room arranged very well for family of 5. Food was very good. We came back each afternoon to rest/nap and went right back over. Walk to Dland in about 10 mins.
Manager Response: Dear kevincoari,   Thank you so much for your kind review! From our spacious accommodations and delicious food, to our convenient location and welcoming staff, we’re so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed every aspect of your stay at Courtyard Anaheim. We hope to welcome you all back again very soon for another fantastic Disneyland vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We loved this hotel! It smelled good, was clean, and comfortable. The water park was so much fun. We found our new favorite hotel when visiting Disneyland parks. The staff was amazing and accommodating.
Manager Response: Dear ChristyJ597,   Thank you so much for your kind review! What a pleasure it is to hear that Courtyard Anaheim has become your new favorite hotel for all your Disneyland adventures. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon for another fantastic vacation!    Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The room, pool, bistro and staff are terrific.  A special “Shout Out”!!! To Valicity for helping above and beyond our expectations.   We really appreciate all the efforts of the Courtyard team.  PS…The pool is a great spot to watch the Disney fireworks.
Manager Response: Dear Scott J,   Thank you so much for your fantastic review! We take great pride in having an incredible team of dedicated staff, and it’s always a delight to hear when one of our team members goes above and beyond for our guests. We’ll be sure to pass on your appreciation to Valicity and the entire team! We’re so glad you enjoyed your time with us (especially getting to watch the fireworks from our pool!), and we hope to welcome you back again soon for another remarkable vacation.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We loved our stay here for 2 nights while at Disneyland.  Disneyland is only a 10 minute walk away.  There is a Mimis, Panera and McDonalds all on the walk home to be able to pick up dinner.  Large dining area in hotel lobby that you can come back and eat at.  Our room had bunk bed bedroom for the kids, bathroom with a tub and shower and  small table to eat at.   We didn't get to use the water park because it was too cold but it looked fun.  Their is a Starbucks in the lobby also. Would stay here again if in the are.
Manager Response: Dear luv2travelkms,   Thank you so much for your positive review! It’s a treat to hear that you found Courtyard Anaheim to be the perfect hotel for your Disney vacation, and that you especially loved our spacious and comfortable accommodations. We hope to have the chance to welcome you back again for another fantastic stay, and to hopefully experience our fun water park the next time you’re in the area!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: They force you to valet park, it is very inconvenient!  I know how to park a car. Also they won't let you use a luggage cart by yourself! They force you to have a bellhop with the cart at all times. This place just wants you to spend all your money on tips as if Disney hasn't already fleeced you enough! The room was very nice and they hotel was very clean.
Manager Response: Greetings Averagejoe333: Thank you for being our guest! I am happy that you found your room to be very nice and the hotel very clean. I regret that we are not the right hotel for you and hope you find the perfect hotel for your future visits to the Anaheim Resort area. I know how important a vacation is, especially in these days, and encourage guests to research hotels so they book the right hotel for their needs and budget. We prominently post our valet parking prices and valet only policy on our website so that guests can make an informed decision; we also include this information on our reservation confirmations. Please contact me if I can be of additional assistance to you.

Summary: We stayed here recently for a quick Disney trip. We paid through Costco Travel, which I'm a big fan of.  I highly recommend not getting a rental car and just Uber-ing from John Wayne airport directly to the hotel. It will save you the $40/daily parking fee. I also recommend taking an Uber to get groceries for snacks/breakfast. The little shops nearby the hotel are crazy expensive. I'm talking like $4 for an individual size milk expensive. The hotel itself was great. Our room had two queen beds and a bunk bed set. We also had a bathroom with two showers and a mini fridge. It was very convenient and comfortable. Disney is just an easy 10 minute walk from the parking lot. The water park was fun too. It was nice to take a break from the heat. Would gladly stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Kristy L,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We’re so happy to hear that your stay at Courtyard Anaheim was so enjoyable from start to finish, and that you were able to take advantage of our comfortable accommodations and convenient location. It’s a delight to know that you’d stay with us again, and we can’t wait to welcome you back again soon for your next Disney vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Comfortable and convenient, staffs are helpful especially in the  pool area. Hotel is clean, short walk to Disneyland. Will recommend hotel to friends and relatives.Wish there were more food selection.
Manager Response: Dear luzaq2022,   Thank you so much for your positive review! We’re glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate your recommendation. While we understand your disappointment in our food and beverage options, we hope that didn’t impede too much on your time with us, and that you were still able to enjoy all that Courtyard Anaheim has to offer. We look forward to having you back again soon for another memorable vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Perfect Hotel for a Disney visit.
Summary: We love this hotel.  Easy walk to the park.  Wonderful small swim park. Easy, casual style, kid friendly dining. They have coffee and cocktails. The staff is very friendly always welcoming us as we walked in and telling us to have a good night.  One of our shower bottles ran out and although we said we would switch it out with the full one from the other shower, they were knocking at our door within 10 minutes with more soap.  Same thing happened with blankets, we requested extra blankets and they were at our door with in 10 minutes.
Manager Response: Dear MikeM,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We take great pride in having an incredible team of dedicated and helpful staff, so we love getting to hear about the ways they help to make our guests feel so well taken care of. We greatly appreciate your kind comments, and we hope to have the chance to welcome you and your family back for another incredible stay the next time you’re in town!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Good stay, waterpark was fun but $40 for Valet parking is a rip off
Summary: Staff was excellent - especially the Bistro team!!!  Food was very, very good and waaaayyy better than any other Courtyward I've ever stayed at, and I stay at hundreds of them!  Baggage valey (older gentleman with short grayish hair) was really friendly and welcoming!!  Check in was ok...I don't play the "Ambassador Elite" card, but when I simply asked for some bottles of water (which I get an every other Marriott property I stay at)....I was told - 'you are welcome to buy some in the pantry'!!!!! What???  I have 1+ million Marriott points!!!  Give me a break...understand who your customer is.
Manager Response: Dear Steve S,   Thank you so much for your positive comments and helpful feedback! It’s always a delight to hear when our guests feel so well taken care of by our dedicated staff during their time at Courtyard Anaheim. We are sorry to hear about your experience at check-in, and want to assure you that we strive to make all of our guests feel welcome and well attended to regardless of status. Your feedback is incredibly valuable for us as we continuously strive to improve our experience, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again soon for an even better return visit.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This hotel was awesome, and it was much better than any other Courtyard I’ve ever stayed at.  The room was spacious, clean, and just felt good to be in.  The kids loved the bunk beds.  Easy walking distance to DIsneyland and California Adventure Park.  We will definitely stay here again if we return to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear joshuajames10,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! What an honor it is to hear that you found your experience at Courtyard Anaheim to be a cut above the rest, and that your family loved our spacious accommodations and convenient location. We can’t wait to welcome you back the next time you’re in the area for a Disneyland vacation, and we look forward to seeing you again!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Very good location, super clean and convenient services.
Summary: Great hotel and room set up. Very good location, super clean and convenient services. Kids loved the waterpark. We have stayed twice and would be happy to stay again. Easy walk to the park entrance, 24 hour grocery store, starbucks in the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Alice C,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! It’s always a pleasure to hear from our return guests about their experience at Courtyard Anaheim, and we’re delighted to hear that your most recent stay was just as wonderful as the last. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back again for another fantastic return vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: My New Favorite Hotel for Disneyland
Summary: Finer details separate a good hotel from a great hotel. Seemingly small decisions by a hotel's owner, developer, and management can really impact the guest experience. I like owners and management that follow the Costco model. Treat your employees well. And be sure not to skimp on the product(s) you sell. When a guest engages in conversation with a long-serving employee like Penny in the gift shop, it's immediately apparent management treats its employees well. And the thermostat...stay with me here...yes, I'm talking about the thermostat in the room. I have never seen a more advanced (and expensive) thermostat in a hotel room. It had all kinds of settings, while still being easy to use. Why does the thermostat matter? Because it shows the owner and developer were not looking to
Manager Response: Dear UberAnalyst,   Thank you so much for your incredibly detailed and effusive review! It’s an absolute delight to read about your experience at Courtyard Anaheim. We take great pride in offering our guests a truly unforgettable experience from start to finish, and it always puts a smile on our faces to hear about how all of those little details can make such a positive impact. We greatly appreciate your comments, as well as your continued business with Marriott as a Platinum Member, and we hope to have the chance to welcome you back again for another remarkable vacation experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: I was upset with the fact that I had to have reservations for the Waterpark since I did a last minute booking around 1:45pm all that was left was from 5:30pm and later. It was a semi warm day on my date of arrival but it got cold quickly by the time our reservation came it was cold outside. I have 4 little ones. There were so many people piled in the hot tub we had to try to stay warm in the "heated" pool. You only get 2 hour slots.  I paid over $500 total.  Disappointed to say the least!
Manager Response: Greetings Momof481: Thank you for choosing our hotel; I apologize that you did not enjoy your experience at our waterpark. I appreciate your letting others know that we require reservations at our waterpark; we provide this information on our website in several locations (1st sentence of the hotel description, and in the "highlights" section, and the "features" section, and on the Surfside Waterpark web page). We also provide this information on our reservation confirmation notices with a link to the waterpark reservation app.  Our Surfside Waterpark reservation policy enables us to deliver on our most important goals: the safety and health of our guests. Our reservation system helps to prevent over-crowding; too many people in the waterpark can lead to injuries and water quality issues. Our reservation policy ensures that we do not exceed the fire marshal and health department maximum occupancy limits at our water park. The scheduled, periodic closures help to ensure that optimum water chemistry is maintained throughout the day - this allows our filtration system, ultraviolet light purification system, and chemical feeders to do their jobs and ensures each session has optimal water quality. Additionally, the closures allow us to clean and prepare the water park facility for each new session Surfside Waterpark. Please call or email me if I can be of further assistance to you.  Sincerely, Bill Cleaver, General Manager

Summary Heading: Great location and very clean hotel
Summary: This is clean, friendly, perfectly located hotel.  We stayed 3 nights while visiting Disneyland.  From the front door of the hotel to the ticket gate is less than a 10 minute easy walk!  You can't beat that.
Manager Response: Dear PaulineElliott65,   Thank you so much for your kind review! We’re so happy to hear that our convenient location and welcoming accommodations made your Disneyland vacation extra enjoyable and stress-free. We hope to have you back again to host you for your next Disney trip!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Love staying here.  Staff are always helpful and courteous, the rooms are well maintained and clean.  The kids always always love the waterpark and the different activities they can explore there.  Our first stay was in 2018, 2nd stay in 2020 and our third stay this year.  A remodel or updating situation for the hotel: It would be cool if the suite-sized rooms came with some sort of kitchenette or a larger refrigerator/sink area with a toaster..  that would be really great.
Manager Response: Dear Cookymmstr,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! We’re delighted to hear that your repeated visits to Courtyard Anaheim have always been enjoyable and relaxing from start to finish. We greatly appreciate your feedback about our suite amenities, as we’re always striving to improve and make our guests’ experiences as close to perfection as possible. We hope to have you back again soon for another fantastic return visit!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Excellent, kind, helpful staff, great location, amazing pool/ water park. Easy walking distance to parks. Great Starbucks cafe in lobby. Spacious, clean rooms. Quiet. Super easy parking, all valet, very prompt valet and bellman services.
Manager Response: Dear mindy p,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! We’re so happy to hear that our convenient location, comfortable suites, and accommodating staff made your stay at Courtyard Anaheim so enjoyable! We hope to have the chance to welcome you and your family back again soon for your next Disney vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We've visited Disneyland dozens of times and always stay at The Grand or at The Disneyland hotel BUT rooms aren't always available thus, we have found ourselves staying "across the street" twice in the past year and Courtyard by Marriott Theme Park Entrance is absolutely PERFECT and exceeded our expectations... so much so that it is now our go-to hotel until Disney brings back Extra Magic Hour :).  LOCATION: You can only get into the parks two ways: Downtown Disney near The Disneyland Hotel or entering Disneyland from Harbor Blvd (trams drop off here as well as all shuttles and the ART bus system). All the hotels on Harbor Blvd claim to be "across the street form Disneyland". It's not Las Vegas: the hotels are almost ontop of each other... they are extremely close to one another
Manager Response: Dear texasexes2006,   Wow—what an incredibly effusive and generous review! This was an absolute delight to read. Thank you so much for providing such a detailed and kind description of your experience at Courtyard Anaheim. Your comments are incredibly helpful and appreciated, as we always strive to better understand how we can give our guests a more perfect vacation than the last. We’re so happy to hear that you’ve found your new go-to hotel for your future Disney trips, and we can’t wait to welcome you back again for another memorable experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Staff was very friendly from the front desk to housekeeping and the restaurant.  The Bistro food was very good and great beverage selection.  The rooms were very clean and large.  Love having the dining table in the room and bunk beds.
Manager Response: Dear pardeegolfer,   Thank you so much for your kind review! We’re delighted to hear that you had a great stay at Courtyard Anaheim, and that you especially enjoyed our spacious accommodations—the bunk beds are definitely a guest favorite! We hope to have the chance to welcome you back again for another fantastic vacation experience.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: A very inviting welcoming and extremely helpful staff.  Loved the crew/team at the front desk.  Amazing and friendly!  So refreshing!!   I will definitely go back!!  The water Park was so much fun. Loved our view of the Water Park.  Easy walk to Disneyland and very safe walk.   A must!!
Manager Response: Dear treemarie909,   Thank you so much for your fabulous and enthusiastic review! We’re delighted to hear that our top tier team of staff were so welcoming and friendly from the moment you arrived, and that you also enjoyed our incredible accommodations and amenities. We can’t wait to welcome you back to Courtyard Anaheim again for another extraordinary vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Staff was awesome, courteous, friendly and polite! A plus. 5 star in my book. Can’t wait to stay again. Comfortable and clean bed and linens. Great coffee Starbucks was the best and water park was great for the kids.
Manager Response: Dear rkelly15,   Thank you so much for your fabulous review! What a treat it is to hear that your time at Courtyard Anaheim was worthy of five stars all around. We’re so happy that you and your family had such an incredible vacation, and we’re excited to host you again in the near future for another marvelous stay!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Super friendly staff, so welcoming and accommodating! Very clean! My dad left  his Apple Watch wrapped in one of the towels at the pool. He didn’t realize until the next day, they were so helpful in finding it for us. We’ll make definitely stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear RachelK84015,   Thank you so much for your fabulous review! We take great pride in making sure our guests are comfortable and well taken care of by our friendly staff, and we’re so happy to hear that their dedication and kindness made your stay extra enjoyable. We’re delighted to hear that you’ll be returning to Courtyard Anaheim again, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another wonderful vacation in the near future!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Excellent hotel and the friendliest staff!  Loved the bunk beds, very clean.  Pool area was fun.  Good at the restaurant was super tasty and quick, coffee and cocktails great too.  Very impressed w it’s hotel and every staff member seemed happy!
Manager Response: Dear 659tracy,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! We’re thrilled to hear that our fabulous staff and comfortable accommodations made your time with us so enjoyable. We look forward to having you back again in the near future for another remarkable experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Should be top of your list
Summary: Best hotel in or around Disneyland by far. The hotel is within walking distance to the park (10 mins with little kids) outside is a Mimi’s Cafe, a McDonald’s and Panera and a Coldstone Ice cream so awesome to refuel and not have to pay park food prices. The actual hotel has two Queens and bunk beds so can fit a family comfortably. The water park is fun and a welcome break, but what sets it apart is how friendly all the staff are from the valet to the front desk and cleaners. I’ve stayed three times here and will continue to do so.
Manager Response: Dear davehazell28,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We pride ourselves on having a truly incredible team of friendly and welcoming staff, and it’s always a delight to hear that their kindness and dedication helped make your stay at Courtyard Anaheim a cut above the rest. It’s always a pleasure to hear from our return guests about their stays, and we can’t wait to welcome you back again for many more incredible getaway experiences!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: I can not say enough great things about our stay here. I spent hours researching and this was such a close, quick walk. It ended up being closer then I expected. Perfect for my 3 yr old in the stroller and my teen and I. The staff was so friendly and helpful. The hotel so nice and such amazing, fun pool facilities. The food was great, the rooms where plenty big, bathroom set up terrific with 2 places to bath. The bunk bed my kids loved. A desk to study on and a round table to eat at. We were so happy.Even being able to fill up your water bottle at the water fountain was nice. The gym was great. The dining tables had tvs to watch the news or cartoons. There was a disney store inside the hotel as well. I so highly recommend. There is nothing negative to write.
Manager Response: Dear katm0801,   Thank you so much for your effusive review—what a pleasure to hear that Courtyard Anaheim did not disappoint! We pride ourselves on giving our guests an experience filled with wonderful memories, and we’re delighted to hear that your first time with us was so enjoyable for the entire family. We greatly appreciate your enthusiastic recommendation and kind comments, and we look forward to having you back again for your next Disney getaway.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Wonderful stay!  The hotel is in great location, with clean rooms, and an excellent breakfast!  The kids enjoyed the mickey pancakes and the bunk beds in the family suite made it special.  There is a small pool on the rooftop.  Having the CVS right next door was helpful for random items we needed.
Manager Response: Dear Carlee H,   Thank you so much for your kind review! We pride ourselves on giving our guests an incredible experience from start to finish, and it’s a delight to hear that our unique features like the bunk beds and mickey pancakes helped add a little extra magic to your stay. We hope to welcome you back again soon for another wonderful vacation at Courtyard Anaheim!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This hotel was absolutely beautiful - it felt brand new and exceptionally clean. Loved the bunk beds in the room, and our kids LOVED the water park. We should have booked an extra day just to have more time at the water park! The staff was extremely friendly, and the hotel was just a few minute's walk from Disney. It was perfect.
Manager Response: Dear theannest,   Thank you so much for your effusive review! We take great pride in making sure our guests feel comfortable and well taken care of from check-in to check-out, and it’s always such a treat to hear our guests describe their experience at Courtyard Anaheim as “perfect”. We look forward to having you back again in the near future for another remarkable vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great place to stay - David and all staff super friendly & knowledgeable,  rooms were spacious and clean.  About a 7 min walk to Disney entrance Mimi’s Cafe in the same parking lot. Will definitely be  stay here again
Manager Response: Dear YoMomma775,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! It’s always a pleasure to hear when one of our team members makes a positive impression on our guests. We’ll be sure to pass on your kind comments to David and all of our dedicated staff! We’re delighted to hear you’ll be staying with us again, and we can’t wait to welcome you back for another fantastic experience at Courtyard Anaheim!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Loved the room location for watching the fireworks and distance to the park entrance. The room was very nice and comfortable. It was away from the freeway noise so sleeping was easy. We were surprised how much the balcony door shut out the outside noise.
Manager Response: Dear kevinbS6586XK,   Thank you so much for your excellent review! We’re delighted to hear that our convenient location allowed you and your family to enjoy the fireworks from the comfort of your room, and that you were able to relax and unwind in our spacious and quiet accommodations. We hope to have the chance to welcome you back again soon for another fantastic and memorable vacation experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The Courtyard Marriott Anaheim is a great hotel for a Disney trip. It is quite close, and it is clean and comfortable. The water park is a lot of fun for the kids (the hot tub is a nice after a day on your feet at the park).  The staff is helpful and friendly.  We have now stayed there twice, and can't wait to go again.
Manager Response: Dear dansB9263EA,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We love getting to hear from our return visitors about their experiences at Courtyard Anaheim. We’re so happy that you enjoyed our comfortable accommodations, incredible location, and friendly staff during your stay! We can’t wait to have you back again for another incredible vacation.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Friendly and quiet.  The rooms are clean and its nice having 2 showers and bunk beds with two beds.  The check in and check out process is quick and easy.  The front desk always says hello as you pass buy.  It   was nice having a market and restaurants in the motel.
Manager Response: Dear Grandkidsmemories,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We pride ourselves on having an incredible team of friendly and welcoming staff, and we’re so pleased to hear that they made you feel comfortable and well attended to during your stay. We hope to have the chance to welcome you back again soon for another fantastic stay vacation at Courtyard Anaheim!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Hotel was clean they were accommodating on parking however they billed for room service that we did not use it was the previous occupant of the room the day before we arrived.  the hotel investigated and gave us credit but it did take a couple days to get credit along with my time
Manager Response: Dear duhnet13,   Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at Courtyard Anaheim. We very much understand the frustration you experienced regarding the billing error on our part, and we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We’re pleased to hear that the issue was eventually resolved, and we want to assure you that this is not a typical experience for our guests. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a more positive and enjoyable vacation.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Excellent location to Disneyland.  Rooms are nicely appointed.  The bunkbed for kids is great.  Staff very accomodating. The waterpark was amazing.  Very family oriented but also comfortable for adults only.
Manager Response: Dear Texas4Joy,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We pride ourselves on making Courtyard Anaheim a relaxing and enjoyable place for guests of all ages, and we’re happy to hear that all members of your party had such a fantastic experience. We hope to welcome you back again for another memorable vacation in the near future!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The staff were very helpful, welcoming and answered any question we had with a smile!!! The room was very comfortable for our family of 5. The food was good and reasonably priced. We didn’t use the pool on our stay but it looked amazing as well!
Manager Response: Dear b0yd5,   Thank you so much for your glowing review! In addition to our spacious and comfortable accommodations, we’re delighted to hear that our dedicated staff helped to make your stay at Courtyard Anaheim extra enjoyable and stress free. We hope we get the chance to welcome you back again in the near future—especially to get a chance to visit our water park!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Super close to Disneyland and great for families!
Summary: Check in was a breeze. The location was super close to Disneyland. The 2 shower bathroom is a super smart design. Love the corner eating area and the storage area by the door. The water park was great and a perfect viewing area for fireworks. Our room was next to the interstate and it was noisy. A white noise app helped resolve it at night. Love the hotel and would highly recommend it
Manager Response: Dear Julie K,   Thank you for your wonderful review! We’re so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed a relaxing, comfortable, and convenient stay at Courtyard Anaheim from start to finish. We greatly appreciate your enthusiastic recommendation, and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon for your next Disneyland vacation!    Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The best find. The pool/water slides area was clean and well managed - there were maybe 10 other people there besides us. My kids loved it. The room overlooked Disneyland, the entrance was a 5 minute walk, and the rooms were perfectly laid out with bunk beds down a little hallway for the kids to fall asleep. Food/coffee downstairs and a nice little clean water station to fill up your water bottles.
Manager Response: Dear WendyCJ16,   Thank you so much for your fantastic review! We’re delighted to hear that you and your family had such a wonderful time getting to enjoy our amenities and accommodations at Courtyard Anaheim. It’s always a treat to hear when our guests will be returning in the future, and we look forward to welcoming you back again for another memorable stay!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The staff is above and beyond we truly enjoyed our stay.  Every person we came in contact with was super helpful. We have stayed at this hotel many times and will continue to stay here every time we return.
Manager Response: Dear shannonhooper1,   Thank you so much for your glowing review! It’s always a pleasure to hear that our dedicated staff helped to make our guests feel welcome, comfortable, and well taken care of. Thank you so much for being a return visitor to Courtyard Anaheim—we look forward to having you back again for your next getaway!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Loved the hotel. Kids loved the bunk beds and rooms were spacious. Service was great at the restaurant, pool and front desk. We ate a lot of our meals at the restaurant and the breakfast sandwich with arugula was delicious!
Manager Response: Dear Gina94086,   Thank you so much for your awesome review! We’re so happy to hear that you and your family had such a great time at Courtyard Anaheim, and that your kids especially enjoyed our ever-popular bunk beds! We hope to see you again in the future for another fantastic vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Close to Disneyland, rooms toward the back of the property have a bit of noise from I5 but after a full day in the park you don’t really notice it. Breakfast options are good however the kids pancakes are huge easily feed 2 Elementary school age kids. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Natester007,   Thank you so much for your review! We’re pleased to hear that your time at Courtyard Anaheim was convenient and enjoyable from start to finish. We hope to welcome you and your family back again soon for another awesome vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Hotel was nice but Apple Watch was stolen by housekeeping.  No resolution even after screenshots from find my watch showed it still at the hotel.  I’m a platinum bonvoy member and I would 100% stay somewhere else next time I’m looking for some downtime with the wife and kids.
Manager Response: Greetings marcnance: Thank you for choosing our hotel and thank you for posting a review. I regret that your Apple Watch is missing; I certainly hope it turns up. After you checked out of the hotel, you called us and let us know your watch was missing. We searched the room and contacted the housekeepers who serviced your room after checkout but no watch was found. My team finds and returns thousands of guest items each each year, many items are of high value; however, we will continue to investigate this incident. The associates involved in the cleaning of your room report that they did not see your watch. All involved associates are in good standing with excellent employment history at our hotel.  Each associate involved in the cleaning or your room will receive a record of this incident in their employment file. If you have any additional information regarding your watch please contact me at bill@anaheimcourtyard.com or by telephone at 657.262.3120. Sincerely,

Summary: Jeff at the front desk was wonderful!!! Remembered us when we came back from Disneyland and called when our room was ready early. The next day when we went back to the park he asked us if we needed extra towels and they were there for us when we got back. Food there was also really good, we ate there 3 - 4 times.
Manager Response: Dear courtevans1217,   Thank you so much for your excellent review! We pride ourselves on having the best team members in the business here at Courtyard Anaheim. It’s always a joy to hear when one of our dedicated staff members goes above and beyond to make our guests feel welcome and well taken care of during their time with us! We hope to have the chance to welcome you back again for another exceptional Disneyland vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Location and Waterpark - Excellent Place to Stay
Summary: This was a fantastic place to stay to visit Disneyland.  There were three adults and one 4 year old and the room was spacious and very clean.  My granddaughter loved the water park (yes, she loved it more than Disney).  The staff was friendly and welcoming.  Breakfast was not free, but the restaurant downstairs was convenient for our family.  It really is super easy to walk to the entrance of Disneyland - which was great to come back for the waterpark (or a nap) in the middle of the day and go back at night.  There was a Mimi's restaurant and a McDonald's just on the short walk to Disneyland.  I would not hesitate to stay here again - even just for the waterpark and not to visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear TulaKitty,   Thank you so much for your generous review! We’re so happy to hear that you and your family had such an amazing time during your stay—what a treat that your granddaughter loved our water park so much! It’s a pleasure to hear that you’d return to Courtyard Anaheim just for our incredible amenities and welcoming staff. We hope we have the chance to welcome you all back again for another splendid vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Guest reps were so nice at check in & throughout the stay! Breakfast was so good and fresh! Such a great location when visiting Disneyland. Definitely am going back to this hotel. Close to everything.
Manager Response: Dear angelicazenitram,   Thank you so much for your glowing review! We’re delighted to hear that you had such an incredible and comfortable vacation experience at Courtyard Anaheim. We can’t wait to be part of your future Disneyland travel plans, and we look forward to welcoming you back again for another awesome stay!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Best Marriott I have ever stayed at. The gift shop people were beyond nice. The phone staff was amazing before I even get there. When I called he went above the normal service. The room was clean and I will come back
Manager Response: Dear maggiemunoz01,   Thank you so much for your kind review! It’s such a delight to hear that our helpful and dedicated staff helped to make your stay at Courtyard Anaheim stress-free and enjoyable even before you arrived on the property. We hope we get to welcome you back again for another exceptional vacation experience in the near future!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Very riendly staff, amazing water park, spacious suite, excellent housekeeping, clean room, food (and Starbucks) in the lobby cafe was vey good and the overall atmosphere was magical for our Disneyland vacation!
Manager Response: Dear lifes4luv,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We’re so happy to hear that you enjoyed every aspect of your Courtyard Anaheim experience, from our spacious accommodations and convenient amenities, to our welcoming staff and atmosphere! We hope to have the chance to welcome you back for another magical vacation experience in the near future!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Extra shower is the best thing since sliced bread!
Summary: The room was amazing!  Mom, Dad, and kids loved it.  The extra shower is the best thing since sliced bread.  Super roomy and spacious.  Very clean.  Beds were mostly comfortable.  There was a mix up when we checked in, but the staff took care of it right away and apologized profusely.  Took us about 5 minutes to walk to Disney.  I only wish they offered a breakfast with your stay, or at least more options at a more reasonable price.  Overall, would highly recommend to anyone especially families and would most definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Mekenzie2009,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! While we’re sorry to hear there was an initial mix-up with your room upon check in, we’re glad that our dedicated staff were able to help assist you right away, and that the rest of your time with us was relaxing and enjoyable. We greatly appreciate your enthusiastic recommendation, and we’re delighted to know that you’ll be returning to Courtyard Anaheim for another incredible vacation experience in the near future!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: From the time we arrived to the time we left, the service and environment was awesome. We stayed there for a Disney trip we had planned and recommend this hotel to anyone wanting to do the same. The walk from the hotel was about 5 minutes and it was great not having to wait for a shuttle. When we got to the room, what a great size and view of Disneyland. Overall, I had a blast there and will stay again for any nearby adventures.
Manager Response: Dear roobs1320,   Thank you so much for your fantastic review! It’s always a joy to hear when our guests have such a remarkable experience at Courtyard Anaheim, from our impeccable service and friendly staff, to our convenient location and spacious accommodations. We greatly appreciate your enthusiastic recommendation, and we can’t wait to welcome you back again for your next Disneyland vacation and California adventures!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: My grandchildren and their parents were in one room - a suite with bunk beds and a separate room with a king. Perfect arrangement for a family. And what kids do not like bunks? My room was a single room with two queens and bunks- perfect for a family also! Each room has a round table and corner built in upholstered bench and chairs for dining - again - super family friendly for hungry kids ! And a decent fridge . Downstairs had a lovely cafe for breakfast, lunch and dinner . Food was fine. All was clean , well maintained and staff super friendly. And finally it’s location is perfect to Disney entrance. We had a great time and agreed we’d stay there again!!
Manager Response: Dear msX9684DI,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We’re so happy to hear that our suite accommodations were perfect for you and your family—especially our bunk beds, which are always a favorite for our younger guests! It’s always a delight to know that our guests had such a memorable and positive experience at Courtyard Anaheim, and we’re excited to have the chance to welcome you back again for your next family vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Only place to stay when visiting Disneyland!
Summary: My family and I had a fantastic time here. I will never do a Disneyland trip without staying here! Amazing room layout, excellent food at the bistro, fun water park, and literally across the street from the Disneyland entrance!
Manager Response: Dear shford83,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! It’s such a pleasure to hear that you enjoyed your time at Courtyard Anaheim, and we’re honored that you’ll be making us a fixture in your future Disneyland trips. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This hotel was awesome!! Very clean and quiet. Beds were super comfortable and my 7 year old granddaughter was thrilled to have a bunkbed. Having two showers available made getting ready in the morning easier for everyone.  Being right across the street from Disneyland is just the cherry on top!! We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear 950lorrainet,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We’re delighted to hear that you and your family had a comfortable stay in our incredible accommodations. It’s always a treat to hear that our guests plan to return for another top tier stay, and we can’t wait to welcome you back again in the future!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This is my new fav hotel to stay at when going to Disneyland :)  Had a superb check-in experience with Charlotte & Ashley. Our room was great…very comfy beds, great view of the water park & had bunk beds too! Love The Bistro…especially after a long exhausting day at the park…so nice to go back to the hotel, eat and unwind :) The water park was a huge hit w/the kiddos and the property is very well kept and updated. Win win!!!
Manager Response: Dear mobro1212ppp,   Thank you so much for your fantastic review! We pride ourselves on having the best and most welcoming staff here at Courtyard Anaheim, so it’s always a delight to hear when specific team members leave such a positive impression on our guests.
