We’re so happy that you and your family enjoyed every aspect of your stay with us, and we can’t wait to welcome you back again for another incredible vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We loved our stay at the Courtyard and would stay again. We have tried multiple places in the area and this is now our new favorite. The staff was so friendly, the 24 hours small market was great for late night snacks, and the room felt really spacious. Definitely will book again!
Manager Response: Dear haymcj,   Thank you so much for your enthusiastic review! It’s such a delight to hear that Courtyard Anaheim has become your new favorite hotel in the area, and that everything from our amenities to friendly staff made your stay extra enjoyable. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The staff were what made this amazing. Especially the cafe staff and the front desk supervisor, but honestly every single person was kind, patient and wonderful.  The hotel was comfortable and ease of being near Disneyland a plus. The water park was fun. The cafe was good and had decent prices. The reason it doesn’t get 5 stars is simply the rooms weren’t super clean (but I get how hard everyone is working these days) and for the price I would like to have options for tea in the hotel or include breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear mstolley19,   Thank you so much for your kind review! We pride ourselves on giving our guests an incredible hotel experience from start to finish, and we’re pleased to hear that our welcoming staff, enviable location, and exciting amenities made your stay such a memorable vacation. We hope to have the chance to welcome you back again soon for an even better return experience at Courtyard Anaheim!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We loved this hotel.  Staff very friendly and helpful, close walking distance to Disneyland, Bistro in the hotel to grab a quick breakfast!  Rooms very nice and clean.  The water park was fun for the boys before checking out on the final day.
Manager Response: Dear jkvandal,   Thank you so much for your fantastic review! We’re so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed all of our incredible amenities at Courtyard Anaheim, and that your boys got to experience our super fun water park! We truly hope to welcome you all back again soon for another unforgettable vacation.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Clean rooms, super helpful hotel staff, great service. The one bedroom suite with bunk beds was perfect for our trip. We also were able to utilize the water park one night after disney, would stay here again for the value, location and people who work here.
Manager Response: Dear kgoverman13,   Thank you so much for your kind review! We’re so happy to hear that you got to experience some of our incredible amenities, like our iconic water park, and that your accommodations were comfortable for the whole family. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon for another fantastic Courtyard Anaheim getaway!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We stay at the Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park every year to celebrate two family birthdays at Disneyland.  This property is ideal for families, with a great waterpark, bunk beds in every room, a tub/shower combo plus a walk in shower, mini fridge and microwave.  Nice food options at the Bistro off the lobby. Staff was extremely friendly!  I am titanium elite, and all my requests were honored (high floor, quiet room, adjacent rooms) plus we were upgraded to top floor rooms overlooking the waterpark.  We’ll be back next year!
Manager Response: Dear BeachcomberME,   Thank you so much for your fantastic review! It’s always a delight to hear from our return guests about their repeated experiences at Courtyard Anaheim. We’re honored to host you for your yearly birthday celebrations—what a fun family tradition! As a Titanium Elite Member, we want to thank you for your continued business with us, and we look forward to welcoming you and the family back again next year for next birthday celebration getaway!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The hotel is the perfect distance from the park, literally took us 5 min to walk to the main entrance and we had a great view of the evening fireworks. Upon arrival our room was not ready but after a short 15 min wait they were able to get us in our room. They were nice enough to offer a different room if we choose to check in the second we walked in which I appreciated but declined. The staff is exceptional with their customer service and their recommendations around the area. Downstairs lobby was kept clean and organized. Our room was clean and I loved the double showers in our bathroom. The hotel has some showing of age but overall is a well kept property. The swim park was a nice touch at the end of a long day in Disney. I was sad to learn the jacuzzi was still under repair
Manager Response: Dear kkahoonei3133,   Thank you so much for your detailed and thoughtful review! We understand the disappointment regarding our hot tub repairs, and we want to apologize and assure you that the inconveniences you encountered are not a common occurrence. We’re pleased to hear that you were overall happy and comfortable with your stay at Courtyard Anaheim, and that our accommodating staff helped to make your time with us as relaxing and enjoyable as possible. We hope to have the chance to welcome you back again for an even better return experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: From end to end, a lovely experience. The young man who checked us in (I believe his name was Jordan or something like that) was so so so nice and helpful.   We had an excellent time and will absolutely be back!
Manager Response: Dear caileenholden,   Thank you so much for your glowing review! We pride ourselves on having the most welcoming and accommodating staff in the business, and it's always a delight to hear when one of our team members leaves such a positive impression on our guests. We’re thrilled to hear that you’ll be back again for your next vacation, and we look forward to welcoming you for another incredible and relaxing Courtyard Anaheim getaway!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great for families.  This hotel has everything you need. Friendly staff at check-in. Rooms were very large and clean.  Loved the bathroom layout. Our room had a separate  step in shower and another shower with tub.  The price was excellent for being very close to the Disneyland entrance.  Market and Cafe in the hotel was convenient and the prices were very reasonable. The outside pool area was fun and clean for both kids and adults. The gift shop was a nice addition to find some souvenirs and the sales lady Penny was a delight.  We enjoyed our stay and would definitely recommend and use this hotel again for future trips.
Manager Response: Dear Tabhern,   Thank you so much for your effusive review! We truly pride ourselves on having the most welcoming atmosphere and accommodating staff around, and it’s always a delight to hear when a specific team member makes such a positive impression on our guests. We’re thrilled that you would not only recommend Courtyard Anaheim to others, but that you’ll also be returning for your future Disneyland travels! We look forward to welcoming you back again in the near future.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The staff was always helpful! Our needs were met pretty much immediately. The bistro inside was delicious! I recommend the vegetable pasta.  And the room was clean and comfortable! It fit our family perfectly. And you can’t beat the location! Being able to walk back and forth to Disneyland as needed was an amazing perk!
Manager Response: Dear garyzgirl,   Thank you so much for your fabulous review! It’s such a treat to hear that you were well taken care of and made to feel right at home from the moment you arrived at Courtyard Anaheim. We’re also so pleased to know that you loved our other incredible amenities, like our delectable bistro and convenient location. We hope to have you back again for another relaxing and memorable vacation experience in the near future!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: it was great. Staff was very professional. Super clean and comfortable.  Easy 5-10 walk to Disneyland. We could see the Disneyland fireworks show  from the Hotel.  Each room had 2 showers and 2 queen beds and twin bunk beds.  and a corner table and seating rooms were large..
Manager Response: Dear karenseals5,   Thank you so much for your positive review! We’re so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at Courtyard Anaheim, especially our incredible accommodations and convenient location. We hope to have the chance to welcome you back again for your next Disneyland vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Loved the hotel- the staff was accommodating, helpful and quick.   We had a delicious meal from the Bistro. The water park area was fantastic for toddlers.   We will stay at this property again!  Easy walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear KayDee44,   Thank you so much for your fantastic review! It’s a true delight to hear that you had such an incredible time during your Courtyard Anaheim stay from start to finish. We can’t wait to welcome you and your family back again for your next Disneyland vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great hotel and great location. Rooms are good size and the bunk beds in each room is an added treat for kids. Nice to have a room that can easily hold 6 people. Having two showers was an added bonus. Clean and nicely apportioned. Our new go-to place to stay while visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear lorenv423,   Thank you so much for your glowing review! We’re so happy to hear that our spacious and comfortable accommodations were perfect for you and your family, and that you enjoyed our convenient Disneyland location and overall atmosphere at Courtyard Anaheim. We’re honored that we’ve become your new go-to hotel for future Disneyland trips, and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The room is spacious and super comfortable.  The bathroom, with the separate showers are fantastic, and pretty also.  I just wish the sinks were separated from the other shower, so family can get ready at the sinks and mirror, while others are showering.  Front staff is friendly and accommodating.  The walk to Disneyland is very easy.  Everything looked clean and new in the hotel and rooms.   We did hear some screaming kids and babies a few times, which went on for a bit longer than I'd hoped, but you can't really plan for that.  The biggest complaint I have is with the price to park, especially since, once arrived, we did not go anywhere with the car the whole time, so it's frustrating to pay that fee to house the car each day.  But, at least the car was safe and inside a
Manager Response: Dear E6635WSml,   Thank you so much for your review! We’re so pleased to hear that you and your family had such a comfortable and relaxing stay, and especially enjoyed our spacious accommodations and convenient locations! We certainly understand your frustrations regarding our parking policy, and we want to apologize for the miscommunication in regards to the situation you described when returning to the hotel. Comments like yours are incredibly helpful for us to improve our practices and operations for future guests. Thank you again for taking the time to review your stay; we’re thrilled to hear you’ll be returning to Courtyard Anaheim in the future, and we look forward to welcoming you back for an even better return experience!    Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Had two rooms.  Both clean and well maintained with plenty of towels. Good value.  People at front desk super friendly.  Restaurant employees friendly and efficient. Good experience.  Fourth time we have stayed there.  Will come again!
Manager Response: Dear lindemann01,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! It’s always a pleasure to hear from our returning guests about their experiences at Courtyard Anaheim, especially when their return visits are so enjoyable! Thank you so much for choosing us as your go-to Disneyland vacation hotel; our incredible staff look forward to welcoming you back again in the near future!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: It was our first time staying at this location and it exceeded our expectations. The rooms were very spacious, beautiful, and clean. The staff was very kind and attentive. The food from the bistro was amazing. The location to disney was perfect; it took us about 5 min to walk there. We will definitely be staying there again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear grace4785,   Thank you so much for your generous and kind review! We love getting to hear from our first-time guests about their stay at Courtyard Anaheim, especially when their experiences are so positive! We take pride in having the most welcoming and attentive staff, as well as incredible amenities for guests of all ages to enjoy. We’re so happy you had such a wonderful time, and we can’t wait to have you back again for your next stay at Courtyard Anaheim!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: The only place to stay when visiting Disney
Summary: I travel a lot but rarely complete reviews. This hotel property is so exceptional I had to share.  From the moment you check in and you check out you feel incredibly comfortable staying here. The staff and accommodations are excellent.
Manager Response: Dear 3bridgesboys,   Thank you so much for taking the time to review your stay at Courtyard Anaheim! We pride ourselves on giving our guests a wonderful experience from check-in to check-out, and we’re so pleased to hear that your time with us was so memorable that you felt compelled to share your thoughts. We hope to have the chance to welcome you back again soon for another exceptional vacation in the near future!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Amazing location. Literally only a 2 minute walk from Disneyland. Rooms are large and updated. Property beautifully maintained and the water park was just the icing on the cake. Valet was prompt with opening our car door and were very attentive to our needs. Valicity was kind, professional and very knowledgeable of the surrounding area. She was kind enough to take the time to explain all of the amenities and even assisted in switching our water park reservation as we had missed our time slot. Such amazing energy! We loved every bit of our stay and can’t wait to come back
Manager Response: Dear alesia199710,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! It’s always such a joy to hear that our incredible staff were attentive, kind, and welcoming throughout the duration of your stay. We’ll be sure to pass along your generous comments to Valicity! We can’t wait to welcome you and your family back again soon for another fantastic vacation at Courtyard Anaheim.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We rented a total of 4 rooms and staff was able to put all of us in the same floor with all four rooms next to each other.  This was great! Walking distance to Disneyland, about 10 minutes.  Quiet rooms and staff were professional.  Close to Mimi’s Cafe, McDonald, and Panera.  During our stay the pool was not available due to repair and maintenance.
Manager Response: Dear jeniburgess,   Thank you for your kind review! We’re so happy to hear that you enjoyed our comfortable accommodations and convenient location. While we’re sorry you didn’t get a chance to experience our water park during your time with us, we hope to have the chance to welcome you back again for an even better return experience at Courtyard Anaheim!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Hotel was beautiful and location was great for walking to Disneyland.  Staff was eager to help and the entire place was impeccably clean.  The rooms were purely AMAZING so much room, a bathtub and a walk in shower. The rooms are surely the best part about this hotel.  A few disappointments. Did not know the pool was closed, until we checked in, the water park pool was a big reason for picking this hotel.  The parking was just over $30 with tax, which is ridiculously high and then you have to use the valet service.  We usually always stay at a Marriott with breakfast included and this was not one of the perks.  As a Marriott Titanium Elite member parking should be free at all their properties.  I am very loyal to the Marriott brand and they in turn have been good to me over the
Manager Response: Dear DPassey,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! While we understand the disappointment regarding our water park being closed for annual refurbishment, we’re glad that you were still able to have a relaxing and comfortable stay at Courtyard Anaheim. We’re so happy that you enjoyed our incredible room accommodations, and that our convenient location and kind staff made your time with us even more welcoming and fun. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again soon for an even better return visit!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great service all around. From the moment I called over the phone to book the room. To the moment we drove off. We were very pleased. The room was clean. Everyone was friendly and professional. Valet was great and convenient. Gentlemen on the phone answered all my questions and was patient.
Manager Response: Dear AliciaIS2022,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! Our welcoming and accommodating staff are the heart and soul of Courtyard Anaheim, and it’s such a pleasure to hear that they helped make your stay so enjoyable from booking to check-out. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again for another fantastic vacation experience in the near future!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Wonderful and great location.The grandchildren loved the hotel and the staff were kind and welcoming. I would recommend this hotel to any family. It was a very fun weekend. The proximity to the park is the best and makes naps very easy.
Manager Response: Dear paulpabst,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! It’s so wonderful to hear that you and your family felt so comfortable and well-attended during your stay. We greatly appreciate your recommendation, and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon for another memorable vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We stay here for our Disneyland trips, but really we all enjoy being at the hotel more! This place is so great. Immaculate and well appointed rooms. Fabulous water park. But the best part is the bistro…they make fantastic little kid meals (at a great price I might add) to keep my kiddos energized and I enjoy having Starbucks coffee at my fingertips! Really there isn’t anything I don’t love about this hotel. My kids actually cry upon check out. Thanks for the latest round of memories!!!
Manager Response: Dear deedrat2022,   Thank you so much for your effusive review! What an absolute compliment it is to hear that you and your family have consistently enjoyed your stays at Courtyard Anaheim, even more so than your days at Disneyland. We love getting to make lasting memories for all of our guests, and we’re so happy that your little ones especially have had such magical experiences during your time with us. Thank you again for your lovely comments; we look forward to welcoming you back again soon, be it for another Disneyland trip or just to relax at Courtyard Anaheim!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disneyland
Summary: Great location.  Nice hotel...well presented and maintained.  Liked having Panera and McDonalds right next door. There is a convenience store right there, too.  Easy access to the Disneyland entrance.  Staff was very helpful and friendly.  We will be back!
Manager Response: Dear Don D,   Thank you so much for your fantastic review! We’re so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at Courtyard Anaheim, and that you especially enjoyed our convenient location and friendly staff. We can’t wait to welcome you back again soon for another remarkable vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The front desk associate at check in was fantastic! Valet service was also outstanding! They made our quick overnight stay into a memorable trip for our family. The staff and food were also great at the bistro. Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear lorissapollock,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We pride ourselves on having some of the best, most friendly staff around, and we’re so happy to hear that they made your time at Courtyard Anaheim extra enjoyable on all fronts. Thank you again for your lovely words; we hope to welcome you and your family back again soon for another amazing experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Staff was very helpful and courteous Lovely, clean room. Kids loved the bunk beds. So close to several restaurants for breakfast. Mimi’s Cafe right next door. It is just down the street from the Disneyland Park entrance.
Manager Response: Dear relax945532022,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! We’re so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your time at Courtyard Anaheim, and that our enviable location and world-class staff helped make your stay extra fun and convenient. We hope to welcome you and your family back again soon for another remarkable vacation experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: I was very disappointed to find that the hotel was doing nothing to ask guests to wear masks. The mask adherence at times was below 50% and there seemed to be plenty of people who had zero expectation that they would be asked to wear a mask.
Manager Response: Greetings ChrisTaylorPasadena: Thank you for staying as our guest and thank you for your review. We take our obligation to protect our guests very seriously: all of our associates wear masks at all times, we have signage throughout the public areas stating that masks must be worn while inside the hotel and have sanitation stations throughout the hotel. We adhere to the highest industry standards in preparing our rooms for our guests and and have enhanced cleaning protocols in all our public spaces. You and I met in the lobby and you brought your concern to my attention; we did see some guests who were not wearing masks but they were all in the dining area actively eating and/or drinking which is still permissable even during this current Omicron wave. While we spoke, a party of 6 exited the elevator. All except one young woman were wearing their masks. I asked the woman to wear a mask, she was embarrassed and said she forgot; a nearby hotel associate promptly provided her with a courtesy mask and she quickly put it on. You were at the hotel for one night and I sincerely apologize if you saw someone without a mask on but I assure you that we do all that we can to ensure compliance with the state of California mask mandate.

Summary: Very nice updated rooms.  Waterplay area was great fun for the kiddos. Close to Disneyland making for an easy walk.  The staff was always cheerful and helpful whenever we were in the lobby.  Would definitely stay in this hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear tctraveler2021,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! We take great pride in maintaining and sparkling property and welcoming atmosphere, and we’re so pleased to hear that you and your family felt comfortable and well-taken care of from check-in to check-out. We’re pleased to hear that you’d return to Courtyard Anaheim again, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: I loved my stay. It was perfect for my family. The restaurant/Starbucks was perfect for one of the rainy days we stayed. Having 2 showers made getting ready in the mornings go so fast. All the employees were amazing. Definitely will stay anytime we go to Disneyland. The hotel is literally across the street and having a Dennys and Panera near by was so convenient. I have no negative comments. Best hotel I’ve ever stayed at!
Manager Response: Dear ruby3fab,   Thank you so much for your effusive review! We’re so happy to hear that Courtyard Anaheim was the perfect place for you and your family, and that our incredible amenities, top-tier location, and welcoming staff made you all feel so welcome. We’re honored to hear that you’ve found your new spot to stay during your Disneyland vacations, and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon for another fantastic experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The hotel was clean in the lobby, hall’s,  elevator’s, and our room.  Very friendly staff at the pool.  Wish it had continental breakfast option.  Appreciated the front always saying hi and acknowledging my presence as I passed the desk each time.
Manager Response: Dear IBM2647,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! Our staff take great pride in making our guests feel welcome and comfortable during their time at Courtyard Anaheim, and we’re so happy to hear they did just that during your stay. We hope to have the chance to welcome you back again in the near future for another incredible getaway!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Nice hotel, friendly staff.  Much better than a standard Courtyard.  The room was unexpectedly large, clean and quiet.  Easy access to the parks makes this easily the best place to stay if going to Disney.  Valets ignored us on arrival and was unapologetic, even after the manager let them know, but otherwise a great hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Explorer04521376211,   Thank you so much for your review! While we’re sorry to hear that you had a less than pleasant experience with our valet staff, we want to assure you that this is not a common occurrence, and that we pride ourselves on having a dedicated and welcoming team on all fronts. We’re pleased to hear that you were still able to enjoy the other wonderful aspects of Courtyard Anaheim, like our spacious accommodations and convenient location. We greatly appreciate your honest comments, and we hope to have the chance to welcome you back for an even better return visit!    Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We have a family of six and this was a great place to stay the water park was great close to disney and shopping the rooms were clean and had everything you need. Staff was very helpful and kind. And valet was amazing and helpful with unloading and loading the car
Manager Response: Dear kandt03,   Thank you so much for your kind review! We’re so happy to hear that you and your family felt welcomed and well-taken care of by our incredible staff from check-in to check-out, and that you enjoyed our top tier amenities and location. We hope to welcome you back again in the near future for your next vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great property and great customer service
Summary: We stayed there for five nights and the hotel was extremely clean, the staff was very welcoming. With a short walk to Disneyland, this hotel is in a great location. The family liked the bistro only wish they had a complimentary breakfast but with COVID, not sure they could.   I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear cdfATC86,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We understand the disappointment regarding our bistro in lieu of a complimentary breakfast, however we’re pleased to hear that didn’t impede on your time at Courtyard Anaheim too much, and that you so greatly enjoyed our welcoming staff and top-tier amenities. We’re so appreciative of your enthusiastic recommendation, and we hope to have you back again soon for another excellent stay!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great service and welcoming feeling. And 5 stars to the car service. Amazing and made my trip less hectic. They were able to accommodate my request. And guest services interaction with the kids was astonishing. Loved every min of it.
Manager Response: Dear Tinalawrency8692,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! We pride ourselves on making all of our guests feel welcome from the moment they arrive to the moment they leave, and we’re so happy to hear that our amazing staff did just that. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you and your family back again for another incredible getaway experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The Hotel is freshly renovated and is within walking distance to the Disney parks. The beds are comfortable and our room was quiet at the end of a hallway. We had a one bedroom suite and my 18 year old said the bunk bed was comfortable, my 20 year old said it wasn't. The bistro in the lobby serves Starbucks coffee. During our stay and due to covid, rooms are only cleaned after your fourth night, but a quick call and towels and other room supplies were replenished while we were out for the day. I don't know if I'll be back to Disneyland any time soon, but I would definitely recommend this hotel. Location, comfort, cleanliness. Also, the hotel staff greets you upon entering the lobby everytime you return. Valet is also very friendly and efficient. Best off property hotel in
Manager Response: Dear J K,   Thank you so much for your generous review! We pride ourselves on making our guests feel welcome, comfortable, and well-taken care of from the moment they arrive, and we’re thrilled to hear that our dedicated staff and clean accommodations did just that. We’re honored to know that you consider Courtyard Anaheim one of the best properties in the area, and whether you’re returning to Disneyland or just looked for a relaxing escape, we hope to welcome you back again soon for an even better return experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Friendly staff; clean rooms; convenient location. Rooms cleaned only on request, but making the best of the COVID situat Only negative is limited breakfast options - no table service; just a ‘bistro’ where food is ordered ar a counter. Waiter will bring cooked items  to the table; otherwise, customers carry coffee and bagel and the line to table themselves. .there was line at the bistro at busy breakfast time (8AM), but staff was friendly and efficient and handled line well.
Manager Response: Dear Guest54_78,   Thank you so much for your review! We’re happy to hear that you felt welcomed by our friendly and dedicated staff, and that you enjoyed our amenities and convenient location. We understand the disappointment regarding our bistro, however we hope that didn’t impede too much on your time at Courtyard Anaheim. We greatly appreciate your comments, and we hope to welcome you back again sometime in the near future!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: All the staff were friendly and kind. The rooms were very spacious and clean. The Christmas decor was very festive and the food at the hotel restaurant was amazing. Will definitely stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear skari67,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! We’re so happy to hear that you felt welcomed and well taken care of by our friendly staff, and that our wonderful amenities and accommodations were so well enjoyed. We’re thrilled to hear that you’ll be returning to Courtyard Anaheim for another fantastic stay, and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great location for Disney goers and the hotel staff was pleasant! Room was very clean with great amenities. Perfect hotel for families needing to get away. I would happily stay here again for our next trip.
Manager Response: Dear mikemarrero11,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We pride ourselves on giving our guests a magical getaway experience, and we’re so happy that you and your family so enjoyed your time with us. We look forward to having you back again soon for another memorable vacation at Courtyard Anaheim!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The hotel was really great! Festive and happy, helpful staff. I loved that it has a bistro in the hotel. It’s within walking distance of the Disneyland park entrance, which was super convenient. My only complaint was during our five day stay, housekeeping did not come at all. They did tell us during check-in that they weren’t doing full housekeeping services, but I thought they’d come at least once during the week. It was a bit frustrating to have to ask for clean towels and more shampoo and to take out our own garbage.
Manager Response: Dear mestebla,   Thank you so much for your kind review! Thank you for sharing your feedback about our housekeeping situation, and while we understand the frustration you felt with the minimized service, we hope that your time with us was still enjoyable for you and your family. We’re pleased to hear that you enjoyed our wonderful amenities and welcoming staff, and we hope to have you back to Courtyard Anaheim again soon for an even better return visit!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We had a great stay at the hotel. We loved the location of the hotel - very close and walkable to Disney with some restaurants on the way within walking (Panera, McDonald's, etc). Staff was so nice and accommodating - special shout out to Geoffrey at the front desk. We asked for rooms near another family we were traveling with and he was able to get us on the same floor- he also remembered me from the phone and throughout the trip! The waterpark was fun, but the water was very COLD- was easy to get reservations. We loved the king suite room - very roomy, had a smart TV for netflix and the bunkbeds were perfect. My one complaint was the food in the bistro was not very good- my husband said the bagel was not edible and the chocolate muffin was terrible. That's so minor though
Manager Response: Dear allie104,   Thank you so much for your kind review! We pride ourselves on having the best and most welcoming staff here at Courtyard Anaheim, and it’s always a pleasure to hear when one of our specific team members left such a positive impression! While we’re sorry to hear that the food in the bistro was not the most delicious, we hope that didn’t take away from the rest of your getaway. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon for an even better return visit!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This is a great hotel. The hotel and the rooms are very clean. The lobby and hallways were nicely decorated for Christmas. Staff is very friendly and responsive. Easy walk to the main gate at Disneyland. Food is good and reasonably priced.
Manager Response: Dear MJKBWK,   Thank you so much for your lovely review and comments! We’re so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us on all fronts, from our festive décor and wonderful amenities, to our top-tier staff and enviable location. We hope to welcome you back to Courtyard Anaheim again soon for your next Disney vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The staff, food, water park, rooms, and decorations are best. This Marriott is amazing and feels like home. Highly recommend for a great staycation or vacation. Closer to Disneyland and California Adventure entrance than the Disneyland parking lot.
Manager Response: Dear Amber F.,   Thank you so much for your generous review! We’re so happy to hear that you enjoyed all aspects of your stay at Courtyard Anaheim, from our festive holiday atmosphere to our welcoming staff and amenities. It’s an honor to be considered your favorite Marriott, and we greatly appreciate your enthusiastic recommendation. We hope to have you back again soon for another fantastic getaway!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The location was perfect, a 10 minute Walk to Disneyland and California Adventure. The Hotel was clean with friendly service, which is very important during these challenging times. Very good experience.
Manager Response: Dear kbm22102,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! We take great pride in providing our guests with an incredible experience at Courtyard Anaheim from the inside out, and we’re so happy to hear that you enjoyed our convenient location, clean amenities, and welcoming staff. We hope to have you back again soon for another fantastic stay!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Loved the kindness and friendliness of staff
Summary: It was so nice being greeted every time we entered or exited. Maybe it is the pandemic, but it would put a smile on my face in and out each way!  The rooms were a really good size and my kids loved the bunk beds.  Only downside was due to Covid restrictions housekeeping didn’t come and we stayed an entire week, so by the end of the week we definitely were feeling it.
Manager Response: Dear Aultkath,   Thank you so much for your kind review! We know how important it is to not only feel safe and comfortable during your getaway, but also welcomed and relaxed from check-in to check-out. We’re so happy to hear that our top-tier staff did just that! While we understand your frustrations with our adjusted housekeeping, we hope that didn’t take away too much from the rest of your stay at Courtyard Anaheim. We hope to welcome you and your family back again soon for another remarkable time!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: It's a shame that I have to leave a 2 star review for this property due to poor billing practice and customer service. FYI, I gave the hotel multiple chances to correct the issue. the first manager promised to call me back to resolve it, 2 weeks later I left the GM a message with no reply. I have no choice but to dispute the charges. I have to say the amount is not much, its more of a "principal" issue. I am gonna go to the extend that this may be intentional, hoping the guests will not catch. if true, cant wait for a class action lawsuit !!
Manager Response: Greetings SJC95126: Thank you for your review; however, I wonder if you have posted this to the correct hotel? I checked with my managers and they do not recall any issues with guest billings and I have not received any messages from guests regarding billing or any other issues. Providing our guests with exceptional customer service is very important to us. Please contact me personally so I can assist you in correcting the mistake if it occured at my hotel or help direct you to the correct hotel. Sincerely, Bill Cleaver, GM, 657.262.3120, bill@anaheimcourtyard.com.

Summary: This hotel is a 5 minute walk (or less) to Disneyland! I was pleasantly surprised how nice it was for the price we paid! We had a great time! The kids LOVED the water park. The restaurant has delicious and reasonable priced food. The staff was friendly and helpful. It was decorated festive for Christmas! We will definitely be coming back.
Manager Response: Dear ashafrash25,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! We’re so happy that you and your family had such a wonderful time at Courtyard Anaheim, from our convenient Disneyland location to our festive decorations and fantastic amenities. It’s such a thrill to know that you’ll be returning for your next big vacation, and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: What a great place! Hotel was clean, staff was so helpful and everyone was so friendly. Extremely convenient to Disney entrance. The bistro was great for getting breakfast in the mornings, very tasty. Will make this an annual Thanksgiving tradition.
Manager Response: Dear Dean G,   Thank you so much for your glowing review! We’re so happy to know that Courtyard Anaheim was such a wonderful part of your holiday this year, and we’re honored to be included in your new Thanksgiving tradition. Whether your next visit is for the holidays or just for a fun family getaway, our dedicated staff look forward to welcoming you back for another magical and memorable experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Convenient location within walking distance to Disneyland and California Adventure plus near several restaurants. Clean hotel indoors and quick access back to Interstate 5 freeway. Very pleasant hotel agents!
Manager Response: Dear RRodriguez70,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! We’re so happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay at Courtyard Anaheim, and that our convenient location made your Disneyland experience all the more magical. We hope to welcome you back again for your next big getaway!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Excellent customer service!  The room was very very spacious more than enough room for a family of 4.  Disneyland entrance is about an 8 min walk. I would highly recommend this hotel.  Thank you Marriott for a lovely stay!
Manager Response: Dear lauracamacho82,   Thank you so much for your glowing five star review! We pride ourselves on giving all of our guests a magical vacation experience from start to finish, and we’re so happy to hear that our spacious accommodations and welcoming staff did just that. We greatly appreciate your recommendation and thanks, and we hope to welcome you and your family back again soon for your next Disneyland adventure!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great stay! The rooms are huge for families. Don’t know how our reservation got booked for 5 but the room had 2 queen beds and bunk beds. Large bathroom with separate show and separate tub so bath tkme wouldn’t be a problem. Water park is totally for kids not adults. Makes sense. Loads of space. The sodas and energy drinks downstairs are stupid pricey so don’t do it. Didn’t eat there but food and coffee looked good. I will bring my family here when we go to Disney. From the front door to the gate it was 6 minutes. Just bring a cooler (fridge is tiny) and some drinks and snacks.
Manager Response: Dear Stephanie B,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We’re so happy to hear that you and your family had such a great time at Courtyard Anaheim. We pride ourselves on creating magical vacation experiences for all of our guests, and it’s such a pleasure to know that our spacious accommodations and water park helped make your stay so incredible. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back again soon for your next Disneyland vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This Courtyard is conveniently located across from the Disneyland entrance. The rooms are great for a large family. The reason for not giving this hotel a better rating is that housekeeping is no longer provided. You need to inform the front desk that you want to trash removed and fresh towels, but they will not clean or make up the room. They claim this is due to COVID. Seeing as how most of the guests are there to go to Disneyland, COVID is not a reasonable excuse. If people were so worried about COVID they wouldn’t be going to Disneyland. Truthfully, I don’t want to clean up my room when I’m paying to stay there and on vacation.
Manager Response: Greetings azlaura2021: Thank you for being our guest and for your review. I am happy that you enjoyed our convenient location to the Disney Resort and enjoyed the benefits of our large rooms.   Although we do not automatically provide housekeeping service for our stay-over guests we do provide various levels of service upon request. We provide information about our services on our Marriott website at the top of our home page and we provide this information on our e-mailed reservation confirmations. We also provide this information at registration both verbally by the desk clerk as well as on an information card which is included with your key packet. We also place a letter from me in each guest room with instructions on how to request housekeeping services via the Marriott Bonvoy Mobile Chat application, by telephone, or by speaking to a front desk agent. Housekeeping preferences among our guests are wide ranging, and we provide various levels of services in order to meet our guests’ requests. In addition to our guests' preferences there is a shortage of housekeeping staff throughout the hospitality industry with many workers preferring not to work in occupied rooms. I apologize for the extra effort required to request stay-over housekeeping services. We look forward to returning to pre-covid-19 levels of service as soon as conditions permit. Sincerely, Bill Cleaver, General Manager

Summary: Customer service, front desk, bellhop and valet, and housekeeping all fantastic. I had originally booked a stay and extended it but had to book a separate reservation. After calling ahead we were able to stay in the same room throughout the stay and the check in was seem less. Also, being the holidays, the ambiance was top notch.
Manager Response: Dear jonathanlmhc,  Thank you so much for your fantastic review! We pride ourselves on giving our guests an enjoyable, comfortable, and memorable vacation experience, and it's such a pleasure to hear that our brilliant staff did just that and more. We're so happy that you enjoyed our festive décor and holiday ambiance, and we hope to welcome you back again for another remarkable experience!  Sincerely,  Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Fabulous Disneyland-adjacent property at a reasonable price!
Summary: My family and I (three adults, three children) stayed at the hotel during our recent Disneyland trip. While the Disneyland Hotel is magic, the Courtyard is half the price and has much more spacious rooms. The bunk beds were great, as were the double showers, and we also appreciated the table/chairs so we could eat meals in our room. Speaking of meals, the hotel restaurant was amazing ... the quality of the food combined with the extremely reasonable prices meant we ate there a lot. We happened to be staying during a November heat wave so we also got to enjoy the waterpark. It was so clean and we all enjoyed the amenities. Lastly, you can't beat the location ... it's an easy walk to the parks. Thank you for everything, Marriott. The staff were friendly and you have a great
Manager Response: Dear amhanstein,   Thank you so much for your effusive comments and review! We are so happy to hear that you and your family had such an incredible time during your stay at Courtyard Anaheim. We pride ourselves on creating magical vacation experiences for all of our guests, from our incredible amenities and spacious suites, to our enviable location and top-tier staff. We are so grateful for your thanks, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon for another wonderful getaway!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Large rooms with two showers and bunk beds for the kids. Very close to Disneyland entrance.  Bistro has good food options, staff is available and very friendly. Strongly recommend and would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear carlenlopez,   Thank you so much for your kind comments! We’re so happy that our dedicated staff, top-tier amenities, and spacious accommodations helped to make your time at Courtyard Anaheim comfortable and enjoyable. We appreciate your enthusiastic recommendation, and we hope to welcome you back again soon for another incredible getaway!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We loved our time at Courtyard by Marriott. The staff was friendly, location was terrific and the pool area was awesome. We will be coming back. We enjoyed the bistro onsite and felt like the room was spacious and fit our needs. The bunk room was a hit with our two children as well.
Manager Response: Dear bradleysrandall,   Thank you so much for your generous review! We’re so happy to hear that your time with us was comfortable and enjoyable, from our spacious suite accommodations and enviable location, to our welcoming staff and amazing amenities. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back again soon for an even more wonderful getaway!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: It’s is a family of six.  This was a great room that fit us well.  The pool area was pretty good too, although we spent more of our time at the theme parks.  Staff was very courteous and helpful.  I’d stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Micratayy,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! We’re so happy that you found our spacious accommodations to be a comfortable fit for you and your family, and that you enjoyed our incredible amenities and welcoming staff. We’re pleased to hear you’d stay with us again, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another amazing family vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Excellent stay at this place--highly recommend!
Summary: We have stayed at multiple places (including the Disney resorts) and we were all very impressed with the rooms and amenities offered at this hotel. Rooms: 2 queen beds with a large bathroom with both a tub & separate shower! Spacious & clean with comfortable beds.  Amenities: the bistro downstairs had really good breakfast to start your day, all very reasonably priced (kids pancakes & breakfast sandwich were our highlights). There is a small store if you forget anything or want to grab some water, snacks, etc. for the room. Also provided was a water refill station before the elevators. Pool/water area: we did not use this but it looked pretty awesome for younger kids (ours were a bit old for it). Fitness room: we did use this a bit, there was treadmills, ellipticals, weights,
Manager Response: Dear gnperez,   Thank you so much for your gracious review! It’s always a thrill to hear from our return guests about their consistently positive experiences. We are so happy to hear that every aspect of your stay at Courtyard Anaheim was so fantastic, from our spacious accommodations, top-tier amenities, and brilliantly welcoming staff. We’re honored to have your recommendation, and we hope to welcome you back again in the near future for another wonderful getaway!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Good location for walk to Disney
Summary: Friendly staff up all around - Jacob at front desk was Bueno!! The room was spot on for my family of 5, (2 Bunk Beds, 1 Bedroom Suite, 1 King, No view, Corner room) on the 3rd floor. The kids were very surprised & enjoyed the pool/water play area. Restaurant in lobby had reasonable prices for a hotel near by Disney & plenty of seating areas indoor/outdoor, but we brought foo back to room to enjoy with my bottle of wine from home. Overall, i would recommend and would stay in future for the next Disney adventure. Thank you to the staff.
Manager Response: Dear walt2810,   Thank you so much for your glowing review! We pride ourselves on having the best, most dedicated staff around, and it’s always such a joy to hear when one of our dedicated team members made such a positive impact on your stay. We’ll be sure to pass along your message of gratitude to both Jacob and our incredible team! We truly appreciate your recommendation, and we look forward to welcoming you back to Courtyard Anaheim for your next magical Disneyland vacation.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Rooms comfortable for a family of five. Great location near Disney. Very helpful staff, they got us a room early so we could get changed easily for the water park. Water park was awesome and we could see the fireworks from our room.
Manager Response: Dear christineV2255ZB,   Thank you so much for your kind review! We’re so happy to hear that your family of five felt well taken care of during your stay, and that our helpful staff and amazing amenities added a little bit of magic to your experience. We hope to welcome you and your family back again soon for another spectacular getaway!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We stayed here once before in October 2019 (pre-COVID) and had a wonderful 3 night stay again. The hotel is clean and distance to Disney is excellent. They were so accommodating and I really enjoyed the chat function through the app. We will definitely stay again when we visit the parks again.
Manager Response: Dear ShortChang,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! We love hearing from our return guests about their repeated experiences at Courtyard Anaheim, and it’s such a pleasure to hear that your stay this time around was just as magnificent as your first time with us in 2019. We’re so happy to hear you’ll be returning the next time you’re making a visit to Disneyland, and we look forward to welcoming you back again for another fantastic vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Everything was wonderful. Rooms, location, staff, amenities, food, and the water park. We are a family of 5 and the bunk beds plus the second shower in the rooms make all family members comfortable. I will recommend this place to everyone!
Manager Response: Dear StephanieT20212021,   Thank you so much for your generous and enthusiastic review! It’s always a joy to hear that our incredible staff helped make you and your family feel so welcome and comfortable, and that every aspect of your time with us was so wonderful. We’re honored to hear that you’d recommend Courtyard Anaheim, and we hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back for another memorable getaway!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great stay for our 4-day trip to Disneyland/California Adventure Parks
Summary: Easy walking distance to the Disney theme parks, water park fun for my three sons (and capacity limits/sign-up with covid kept it from being packed/overcrowded) and room was refreshed daily per request (towels, shampoo/condition/soap, garbage, coffee pot supplies). Miss daily vacuuming and bedmaking but service consistent with other hotels during covid times.   Bistro had pizza for a responsible price and room "breakfast nook" was used daily for either a breakfast or dinner and snacks. Staff friendly and accommodating at bistro and front desk, with daily well-wishes as we went in and out. Room pick-up was scheduled while we were out and about with no conflicts with room use and was alerted and provided instructions to reserve pool times immediately upon check-in. Fridge,
Manager Response: Dear RASfamilyoffive,   Thank you so much for your kind and detailed review! We’re thrilled to hear that your time at Courtyard Anaheim was so memorable and fantastic for you and your family, from our enviable and convenient Disneyland location to our spacious and welcoming accommodations. It’s such a treat to hear that you’d return for another stay, and we look forward to having you and your family back again soon!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Convenient to Disneyland and their waterpark is a bonus
Summary: Quick and convenient access to Disneyland maingate. Great waterpark, with views of Space Mountain anf the fireworks if they are running. We loved the king bedroom suite with the large king room, the double bunkbed room and the living room. Enough space for all and could schedule naps and down time in separate areas.
Manager Response: Dear S T,   Thank you so much for your kind review! We’re so happy to hear that our spacious accommodations were such a hit, and that our amazing location made your Disneyland vacation convenient and extra exciting. We hope to have you back again soon for your next big trip!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Bigger room for half the price.
Summary: I've stayed on property several times and it's always great to be fully immersed in the Disney bubble but it's just so expensive! This time I decided to stay off property and I'm very glad I did. The suite was bigger and the walk was closer to the front gate than Paradise Pier or perhaps even the Disneyland Hotel would have been. The only downside was giving up the on-property perks such as the extra magic hour but I'd rather save the money and put it towards other things such as upgrading our flight, souvenirs, and extra nice meals in the park. Given how little time we spend in the hotel room, this was a fantastic way to go and I would definitely go this route again.
Manager Response: Dear Steve B,   Thank you so much for your glowing review! We pride ourselves on providing a magical experience for all of our guests with our convenient Disneyland location, dedicated staff, and comfortable amenities. We’re so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay at Courtyard Anaheim, and we hope you’ll choose us again the next time you’re in town for another Disneyland getaway!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This is a fantastic place to stay when visiting Disneyland.  I have already told my friends that they need to stay here.  We drove down from Northern California and took my 5 year old granddaughter to Disneyland for the first time.  Yes, it is in easy walking distance (7 to 10 minutes to the entrance) and it has the awesome water park.  My granddaughter preferred the water park more than Disneyland (probably due to no lines at the water park).  The room was large for the three adults that accompanied the little one.  The bunk bed was awesome and the bathroom large and spacious with two showers!  We had no view, but didn’t really need it with the amusement park so close.  We did eat at the cafe in the mornings we were there as the price was right, it was close, and the food was
Manager Response: Dear TulaKitty,   Thank you so much for your lovely and kind review! While we understand that our parking services are not for everyone, we are so honored to hear that you’d return to Courtyard Anaheim even if you weren’t visiting Disneyland! Our dedicated and friendly staff work hard to ensure that our guests are made to feel comfortable and welcome from check-in to check-out, and it’s wonderful to hear that our spacious and exciting accommodations were loved by all in your party. Whether you’re making another Disneyland trip, or just looking to getaway, we look forward to having you back again soon for another remarkable experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Family had a great time at this hotel. Very family friendly, clean, and within walking distance to the parks! The water park was an added bonus. My family will definitely be staying here in the future!
Manager Response: Dear kesajuliana12,   Thank you so much for your enthusiastic review! It’s always a pleasure to hear that our guests and their families enjoyed our clean and comfortable amenities, in addition to our amazing location near Disneyland. We look forward to seeing you again for your next family vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: After Two dozen stays, still the best in Anaheim
Summary: Two dozen stays at this hotel have all been 5 stars. This place is the best. Hands down. My daughter and I have been Annual Passholders (now Magic Keyholders) since 2018 and have stayed at this property more than 2 dozen times. Every single stay has been wonderful.   We have stayed at the  on property hotels  including multiple times Club Level at the Grand Californian and this place sparks more joy.  Let me give you one anecdote that is one of many reasons this is the #1 hotel in Anaheim:  Last weekend my oldest daughter and I were there for a quick weekend trip. On the second day we became very ill (nothing that we ate. We got a bug a family member had at home before we left) and subsequently were unable to depart on our departure date.  I called down to the front desk,
Manager Response: Dear Kelsey Kay L,  Thank you so very much for your absolutely effusive review! This was such a pleasure to read; what a thrill to hear from such a seasoned guest that your experiences at Courtyard Anaheim have been consistently wonderful from start to finish. While we’re so sorry to hear about your unexpected illness, it’s such a joy to hear that our dedicated staff were able to accommodate your needs and make you a little bit more comfortable. We always love to hear when guests mention employees by name for their outstanding service, and we will be sure to pass on your thanks to Randle and all of our team members! Thank you again for your generous review; we are always happy to put a little bit of magic into your vacation, and we look forward to welcoming you back again for another remarkable stay.  Sincerely,   Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We enjoyed our stay. Happy that there were enough bed options for our family of 6 in one room. Friendly staff and great amenities. Would stay here again! It was a 5 - 10 minute walk to the park. Good food options around including a bistro inside the hotel. Not to mention a cute little Disney souvenir shop!
Manager Response: Dear nicolebell83,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! We’re so pleased to hear that you and your family enjoyed your time with us, from our spacious accommodations and delightful shops, to our convenient location near Disneyland. We’re thrilled to hear you’ll be returning again, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another remarkable vacation experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Location is great but the staff needs to be trained!
Summary: Over our 3 day stay, we had multiple situations with extremely rude staff members at the valet desk and front desk. Luckily, there were a couple of great employees who stepped in to help resolve the situations and answer our questions but the management here should really look into training their team on customer service best practices.
Manager Response: Greetings 92040: Thank you for being our guest; we hope your visit to the Disneyland Resort area was enjoyable. I sincerely apologize that our valet and front desk departments did not meet your expectations. This is not a typical experience at our hotel but one that needs to be addressed. I would certainly appreciate it if you would e-mail or call me so that I can personally apologize to you and better understand your experience. I look forward to speaking with you and thank you for your review. Sincerely, Bill Cleaver, General Manager

Summary: Yes Marriott it’s so nice and the service is over the top the quality of food they have well surprise you it is very very good so easy to access the Disney park I would recommend this to anyone. I have been to this hotel three times and by far it’s a nicest Marriott I have stayed up thumbs up to the staff I’m making us stay very enjoyable for the value it’s top of my list
Manager Response: Dear gggjoseph,   Thank you so much for your glowing 5 star review! We’re thrilled to hear that your time with us exceeded your expectations in all aspects, and that you’d happily recommend us as one of your top hotels! It’s so wonderful to hear that our remarkable staff and convenient location near Disneyland helped make your time so enjoyable, and we look forward to having you back again in the near future for another memorable stay!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great staff, beautiful hotel, lots of holiday fun
Summary: We loved this hotel for our recent Halloween trip to Disneyland. The hotel was clean, the rooms were large, the water park was great staff were very friendly, and the Halloween decorations were so fun.
Manager Response: Dear AshleyA6422,   Thank you so much for your kind review! We love getting into the holiday spirit here at Courtyard Anaheim, and it’s so wonderful to hear that you enjoyed our festive Halloween decorations on top of our excellent amenities and friendly staff! We hope to have you back again soon for another wonderful vacation.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Really nice hotel. The staff is really Friendly and helpful. They obviously care about their customers experience. (They decorate the lobby for holidays in a really fun welcoming way) There are lot of amenities. It’s great for kids (bunk beds, water park). Close walk to Disney entrance. As close as the Disney hotel.
Manager Response: Dear williamlongstaff,   Thank you for your wonderful review! Our staff are the heart and soul of Courtyard Anaheim, and it’s such a treat to hear that their dedication and commitment to our guests was palpable during your stay. We’re so pleased that you enjoyed all aspects of your time with us, from our amenities to incredible location, and we hope to welcome you back again for your next vacation experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great place for a family vacation!
Summary: Easy walking distance from Disneyland and the hotel staff was exceptional.  Starbuck in the hotel makes it easy to get coffee and breakfast for the family before walking to Disneyland.  Nice little gift shop for food, drinks, daily supplies, and gifts.
Manager Response: Dear militelloian,   Thank you so much for your kind review! We’re so pleased to hear that your time at Courtyard Anaheim was so exceptional, from our top-tier dedicated staff to our excellent location and amenities. We hope to have you back again soon for your next vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We had a great time, all staff was very helpful and accommodating. Everyone was super friendly. The waterpark was awesome, the kids had a great time. Walking distance to Disneyland. The valet team is awesome!!! Came and picked up my luggage from my room, brought my car up and by the time i got there it was loaded and ready to go. Will definitely be staying for our next Disney trip.
Manager Response: Dear LisaG20215463,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! Our dedicated staff are known for providing world-class service and kindness at Courtyard Anaheim, and it’s always a treat to hear that our entire team made your stay so much more enjoyable and relaxing. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon for your next big Disneyland adventure!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Amazing hotel, amazing staff and we had the BEST time! The rooms are super fun for kiddos (there was a bunk bed in ours in addition to the 2 queens even though we didnt ask for it) the water park is super fun and our view was of Space Mountain. Also we got there at 8:30am and they checked us in immediately so we could race of to the park and enjoy. We will BE BACK!
Manager Response: Dear MichaelRobert1eR,   Thank you so much for your glowing 5 star review! Our dedicated staff are truly the backbone of our operation here at Courtyard Anaheim, and it’s always a pleasure to hear that their welcoming service helped to make your stay so incredible from start to finish. We can’t wait to have you back again soon to enjoy another fantastic vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The kids loved the festive Halloween decorations and everyone was so friendly. Two showers and plenty of room for our family of 5 made this the best place to stay in Disney! The kids also loved the watersides!
Manager Response: Dear Deneemarie,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! Courtyard Anaheim is designed to give guests of all ages a fantastic vacation experience, and we’re so pleased to hear that your family of five enjoyed every aspect of your stay. We hope to have you back again soon for another unforgettable vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: First time staying at this beautiful hotel. Every staff member was so nice! I was able to check in early…huge plus!!  The room was huge, clean and well appointed. I could not believe the storage space. I can’t say enough about how nice and clean the room was. The bathroom was also huge! Large glass shower plus a tub/shower and big vanity mirror.  I honestly did not hear any other guests, it was quiet. I could hear the freeway but no noise from other rooms.  The walk to the park was quick, safe and easy.  The only thing I wish the room had was a full length mirror.  I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Happymagicmoments,   Thank you so much for your generous 5 star review! We love hearing from our first time guests about their experiences at Courtyard Anaheim. It’s such a pleasure to know that our dedicated staff, beautiful accommodations, and enviable location made your stay so incredibly memorable. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon for your next vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Loved the hotel and proximity to the parks.  The staff was very courteous.  However, at this price point, I want housekeeping everyday.  After five days and four people in one room, there is no excuse for not having trash taken out, clean towels and refreshed coffee, etc.
Manager Response: Dear amyc772,   Thank you so much for taking the time to review your time with us at Courtyard Anaheim! We completely understand your frustration regarding housekeeping, and would like to apologize for falling short of your expectations. We do our best to balance the needs of all of our guests; due to the current situation with the Pandemic, we unfortunately do not offer automatic daily housekeeping. However, we do make sure to abide by trash removal, towel refreshing, etc. upon individual request, as some guests may wish to limit in-room contact as much as possible. Despite these issues, we’re pleased to hear that our convenient location and welcoming staff helped enhance your stay, and we hope to have you back again soon so that we can create an even better experience.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The staff and service were exceptional! The location was so convenient to Disneyland, Downtown Disney. The water park at the hotel was safe, clean and fun for the kids. I would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear dianemarasa,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We’re always honored when our guests feel compelled to recommend Courtyard Anaheim after such an incredible experience. We hope to have you and your family back for another fun-filled stay and Disneyland vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Would definitely stay here again.  Very nice, friendly and helpful staff Water Park in hotel is great for kids, we used it every day. Rooms with bunk beds such a great idea. “Limited maid service” was a bit of surprise at this price point but requests were taken care of.
Manager Response: Dear barbaraclark2021,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! While we understand that limitations on our housekeeping services can be frustrating, we’re so happy to hear that your requests and needs were appropriately taken care of, and that your stay was still filled with magic from start to finish. We look forward to having you and your family back to Courtyard Anaheim again soon!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Loved the location and water park. Rooms were very comfortable and great set up having kids. Staff was awesome and helpful. We were able to eat breakfast and grab coffee downstairs before heading over to the park each day.
Manager Response: Dear zachdickmeyer,   Thank you for your kind 5 star review! Comfort and fun are our top priorities for guest experiences at Courtyard Anaheim, and we’re pleased to hear that everything from our wonderful location to fantastic accommodations made your stay so memorable. We hope to have you back again for your next vacation and Disneyland travels!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great location. Love the waterpark. Rooms are good size and clean. Staff is extremely friendly and helpful!  No room service, but we like this hotel better than the three Disney properties in the area.
Manager Response: Dear bryanrham,   Thank you for your 5 star review! We’re honored to hear that we exceeded your expectations compared to other hotel options, and we appreciate your kind words regarding your stay. We hope to have the chance to welcome you back again for another remarkable vacation experience!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This is our favorite place to stay when we come to Disneyland. The staff is all friendly and accommodating. It's across the street from the park and only a short walk to the park entrance.  Everything is clean and well-decorated for all the holidays.  It feels like you're staying in a Disneyland hotel without paying Disneyland brand prices. My kids love the Surfside pool area, which is just an added bonus to the magic of our trip. On our last stay, my 3 year-old son got hurt out at the pool (it was minor) and the pool supervisor, Barbara, went out of her way to write him a "Get well soon" card and give him some balloons. It made his day! Great work Courtyard Marriott!
Manager Response: Dear Seth L,   Thank you so much for your glowing 5 star review! We’re so happy to hear that you and your family had such an incredible time enjoying our festive decorations and super fun waterpark. Our world-class staff are a fixture of our hotel, and it warms our heart to hear that our pool supervisor made such a positive impact on you and your family. We hope to have you back again soon for another wonderful vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Staff was rad. Happy to recommend nearby restaurants etc and even stopped us to give kids toys. The facility was very clean and even after a mess left by a huge party, a few mins later everything looked back to normal. Staff had good attitudes from the front desk to cleaning.   When we go back to Disneyland we will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Safari16851003720,   Thank you so much for your glowing 5 star review! Our dedicated staff are truly one-of-a-kind, and they’re a beloved and integral part of making Courtyard Anaheim such a remarkable place to stay. We love hearing from guests about the little things they do to go above and beyond! Thank you again for taking the time to review your stay; we look forward to welcoming you back for your next Disneyland getaway!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We paid a premium price to stay in a nice hotel. Upon arrival we were told housekeeping services were available upon request only.  On the second morning of our stay we called the front desk and requested housekeeping services... they said they might not be able to accommodate our request but will try.  Only the trash was ever taken out of our room during our stay.  Beds never made, floors never cleaned. The nasty black hair that was in the bathroom before we got there was never cleaned up. Do better Courtyard, we usually love staying in your hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at the Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance and providing your feedback. Providing the highest level of hospitality is our number one priority and we sincerely apologize for falling short of meeting your expectations. I apologize that you were unaware that our housekeeping services have been limited due to Covid-19 concerns and staffing issues. We always want our guests to be informed so we will continue to search for enhanced and/or additional ways to notify our guests in advance of their stay. Currently we post a link in red at the top of our Marriott.com website (directly above the picture of our hotel) which states "The health and safety of our guests is our top priority. Covid-19 updates and what to expect at our hotel." Once you click on the link it opens a hotel information page with updates about our hotel. Under "Enhanced Cleaning Protocols & Housekeeping Service at this hotel" it states "Housekeeping Service: We have elevated our rigorous protocols to thoroughly clean all surfaces with hospital grade disinfectants. Our Housekeepers will not enter your room while are in it. Additionally, we are not offering housekeeping service for your room unless requested by you, our guest, between 9am and 4pm."  We also include a link on our confirmation notices which are e-mailed to our guests which states "Important Information About Your Stay - In response to current travel advisories, this hotel may have modified hours or limitation on certain services and amenities. Learn more."  Once you click on the link it opens the same message as mentioned in the previous paragraph. Most Marriott hotels are providing these service updates via this method so you may want to click on these alerts for your future travel so that you have up to date information about the services being offered during these unusual times.  Once again, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.

Summary: I absolutely loved the bunk bed option for our family. It worked perfectly and made made our trip go smoothly. My youngest really enjoyed the water park as well. And the amount of time that we signed up for was all my 5 year old needed.
Manager Response: Dear bre505,   Thank you so much for taking the time to review your stay! Our unique amenities like our family favorite bunk beds and incredible water park are just a couple of our signature highlights; it’s always a joy to hear that those special details helped to enhance your time with us. We hope to welcome you and your family back again soon for another wonderful vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Perfect hotel for a Disneyland trip
Summary: The Courtyard was perfect for our Disneyland trip. Staff was incredibly friendly and helpful. Hotel was decorated for Halloween, making it feel special. Waterpark was very clean and a LOT of fun!  We will be back.
Manager Response: Dear magicmccabe,   Thank you for your lovely review! Special vacation moments are certainly our specialty, and it’s always a joy to hear that our incredible staff and perfectly festive decorations made your time with us feel so wonderful. We can’t wait to have you back again for another vacation filled with fun, comfort, and unforgettable memories!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Haven’t been to Disneyland in 6+ years and staying at this Marriott helped make our trip more memorable.   Easy check in through the app. Staff was very friendly and helpful.   The Bistro on site is great! Perfect hours. Good food. Clean. The atmosphere is cozy and the seating outside was great for active kids.
