We even watched the fireworks outside by the fire pit one night.   The smallest little things really can make an impact on your day. That small little thing on this trip was the plastic white cover to my tea every day from the hotel Bistro.  A staff member from the hotel hand drew characters on the top of the plastic covers.  My kids loved seeing them.  It was a special little touch; and being that our trip was to visit Disneyland it really helped make a special little
Manager Response: Dear FarAway327793,   Thank you so very much for your gracious 5-star review! “The smallest little things really can make an impact on your day.” You couldn’t have said it better; we want to make every guest who stays at Courtyard Anaheim feel a little bit of magic from start to finish, and we’re so happy to hear that our dedicated staff went out of their way to give your trip that special little touch! Thank you again for taking the time to review your experience with us. We truly hope to have you back again soon for another memorable Disneyland getaway!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The room was clean and everything we expected. The front desk staff was super friendly and helpful. The pool area was clean and fun for the kids. There are plenty of restaurants nearby and Disneyland was a short walk from the hotel. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Experience562693,   Thank you so much for your lovely 5-star review! It’s always a pleasure to hear about all of our guests’ favorite experiences and memories during their time at Courtyard Anaheim. We’re thrilled to hear that your whole family found something special during your time with us; we look forward to having you back again for an even better Disneyland vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Large rooms, bunk beds for kids, great little dining area, plus an amazing water park onsite and wonderful employees....we couldn't ask for anything more!  This was a great stay, I would definitely come back anytime I was in the area for a Disney vacation.
Manager Response: Dear Stay597320,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! It’s such a treat to hear that every aspect of your time with us, from our amazing amenities to our world-class staff, was magical and memorable from start to finish. We look forward to having you back again the next time you’re planning another Disneyland vacation!    Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: I love the services overall and the valet parking service they offered! I enjoy everything there including the Halloween decors! Feels cozy and nice. We got two queens and a bunkbed so there was plenty of spaces to sleep. I would definitely go back there again.
Manager Response: Dear the0rtegas,   Thank you for your lovely and enthusiastic review! We’re so happy to hear you loved every part of your stay, from our signature world-class staff and service, to our seasonal treats like our famous Halloween decorations! It’s a joy to hear you’d return for another stay; we look forward to welcoming you back again in the near future!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Great location! Great amenities!  Even better people!
Summary: In a time where it's hard to get people to show up to work somehow this hotel has multiple people that are willing to be helpful and kind in a sometimes demanding industry. From the front desk to the lifeguards they treated my kids and I very well. Thank you for such a great stay.
Manager Response: Dear joehelmut,   Thank you so much for your gracious review! Our incredible staff are truly the foundation of our operation here at Courtyard Anaheim, and we always love to hear from our guests how much their hard work and dedication impacts their stay for the better. We appreciate your thanks, and we hope to welcome you and your family back soon for another incredible vacation.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Beautiful rooms with so much space for our family. Bunk beds and tub and shower made showering after a long day was bonus. Convenience to the parks was perfect. Friendly, helpful staff. Laundry onsite was close to room and easy to use. Pool and slides were lots of fun. Health protocols were great and the staff always brought fresh towels and toiletries as needed. Highly recommend. We will return.
Manager Response: Dear JennDisney,   Thank you so much for your lovely 5 star review! We’re so pleased to hear that you found our top-tier amenities and welcoming staff to be so incredible! We believe that having a comfortable and welcoming spot to return to at the end of a day filled with adventure is key to having a great vacation experience. It’s a treat to hear that you’ll be returning to Courtyard Anaheim again for another magical vacation, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: the only hotel we stay and will stay when visiting disneyland. we have young kids, so the proximity to disneyland and you guys' waterpark are hard to beat. having mimi's cafe and panera next door are definitely a plus when you don't feel like spending $300 for breakfast or dinner at disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear edgarae78,   Thank you so much for your kind review! We know how important it is to stay fueled up and energized for a day out at Disneyland or splashing around in our waterpark. We’re so happy to hear that you found our convenient location and wonderful family-friendly amenities to be so incredible, and we truly hope to have you and your family back again soon for your next big getaway!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Loved their valet and their amenities - absolutely wonderful - would recommend! They were friendly and kind and helped my family and I out a ton! They were right next to Disneyland and it was so convenient!
Manager Response: Dear 596daltonj,   Thank you so much for your gracious review! We pride ourselves on having the most dedicated and friendly staff around, and we’re so pleased to hear that they helped make you and your family feel comfortable and welcome from start to finish. We hope to have you back again for another fantastic getaway!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We arrived at 2:00 am after a long flight delay. The staff at the Courtyard was very friendly, welcoming us, and helpful with instructions & directions for our visit to Disneyland.  Each time we passed by the check-in areas, we were always greeted & asked if we needed any assistance.  Our grandson loved the water park area. It’s great they keep it open till 10:00 pm.  The room setup was perfect so our family could be together. Our grandson liked the bunk beds.  The proximity to Disneyland was great so it was an easy walk. There were numerous restaurants within walking distance.  We would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear lp-fm,   Thank you for your kind 5 star review! We’re so happy to hear that our welcoming staff helped to make your stay incredible and stress-free from start to finish, and that our wonderful accommodations were perfect for the whole family. We look forward to having you back again soon for your next Disneyland adventure!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Everything about this trip and hotel was perfect!  We got in very early on the first day of our trip and knew we might not be able to check in right away, but Geoffrey at the front desk worked some magic and not only got us into our rooms right away but they were top floor, gorgeous views, and right next door to each other.  Made us feel like VIPs.  Just a lovely man and set the tone for a great stay. Everyone was thrilled with the size of the rooms, the twin bunk beds, double showers, and cute sitting area.  Kids had a fabulous time at the pool and waterslide area.  I think reservations are a great idea, didn't mind that a bit.  Oh, and did I mention the whole hotel is mega-decorated for Halloween?  Basically everything was perfect.  My one tiny critique is that the on-site
Manager Response: Dear Seaside676252,   Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a detailed and gracious review! It’s always a pleasure and a joy to hear when our guests recall a specific member of our team who helped make their stay remarkable. We greatly appreciate your kindness, and will certainly pass along your message of gratitude! Thank you for leaving us feedback about our on-site market selection as well. We’re always striving to improve our guests’ experiences for the better, and these kinds of comments are integral in helping us to create an even better environment for our visitors. We appreciate your input and we truly hope to welcome you back again for your next vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great place to stay when traveling to Disneyland. It’s close to the park. The staff is friendly and courteous. It’s definitely a hotel for family. Very well maintained and clean. Close to restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear geoffreyj612,   Thank you for your kind review! We work hard to ensure that our guests have a safe, comfortable, and enjoyable stay at Courtyard Anaheim, and we’re pleased to hear that our friendly staff and commitment to cleanliness helped make your experience so wonderful! We hope to have you and your family back for your next Disneyland vacation.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We were super surprised and pleased with how big the room was, but also how amazingly clean everything was. Staff was one of the kindest I have ever seen at a hotel. Totally decked out for Halloween, which was fun for us and the kids between heading to Disney and the water park. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear lakenparde,   Thank you so much for your generous 5 star review! Our top-tier staff are dedicated to creating incredible experiences for our guests; we’re thrilled to hear their kindness, hospitality, and service went above and beyond to make your stay comfortable and enjoyable. We hope to have you back again soon for another memorable Disneyland vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We really enjoyed this Marriott.  lt was within easy walking distance to the Disneyland entrance.  The front desk staff were wonderful, very friendly and helpful.  The food at the Bistro was high quality, the room was super comfortable and spacious (two queens and a bunk bed along with a small round table, a shower plus a separate bathtub). Oh, and a water park!  The grandkids had so much fun in the pools and on the water slides!
Manager Response: Dear Dreamer813933,   Thank you for taking the time to leave us such a wonderful review! It’s such a pleasure to hear that our delicious Bistro, spacious rooms, and famous water park were well enjoyed by the whole family during your stay. We hope to have you back for your next Disneyland vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: I had seen this hotel but never stayed there. I have 4 lil ones (14,9,5,3) and they all enjoyed it. Even Me. The water park is so much fun for all. We spent two days inside the hotel we didn't even want to leave. The rooms are spacious. We got the two beds and bunks corner room and we fit well. The customer service was the best out of all the Marriotts I have stayed at. I am a Marriott Titanium Elite member.
Manager Response: Dear MoneyManOrtiz,   Thank you so much for taking the time to review your first stay at Courtyard Anaheim! It’s always a pleasure to hear from our first-time guests, and we’re so thrilled to know that you and your family all had such an incredible time. Our bunk beds and water park are both some of our most beloved features, and we’re so happy to hear that they were thoroughly enjoyed! Thank you for being a Marriott Titanium Elite Member; we appreciate your feedback and hope to have you back for another amazing stay.    Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The hotel is conveniently located, the staff is exceptionally friendly and the Halloween decor is particularly charming. It always proves to be a great (though admittedly pricey) base for our family's multi-day adventures at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear WagMoreRockO,   Thank you for taking the time to review your stay! We’re so pleased to hear that you and your family felt welcomed and well-taken care of from the moment you arrived at Courtyard Anaheim, and that our friendly staff and fantastic Halloween decorations made your experience even more special. We hope to see you and your family again for your next Disneyland vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: My kids had more fun playing at the water park than they did in Disneyland. They would get so excited to go back to the hotel to swim. The location was awesome. Only a short walk to the entrance which was super helpful with 2 toddlers in tow.
Manager Response: Dear kcorona16,   Thank you for your kind 5 star review! It’s such a treat to hear that our water park was so thoroughly enjoyed by you and your family. We’re pleased to hear that our convenient location made your Disneyland experience even better as well, and we hope to have you back again for your next vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: The property is amazing. The staff is super friendly and helpful. The food in the Bistro is really good and the water pa
Summary: The property is amazing. The staff is super friendly and helpful. The food in the Bistro is really good and the water park is a plus if you go with kids. Walking distance to Disneyland. Definitely we are going back to this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear renatanavarro2021,   Thank you so much for your glowing review! We’re so pleased to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay at Courtyard Anaheim on all fronts, from the delicious dining options to our dedicated staff. We can’t wait to see you again for your next Disneyland vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We had a wonderful experience staying here. Everything we needed was available to us and very close to Disneyland. The water park was perfect. We loved how sanitary and clean they were. Everything was kept sanitized which made us comfortable with the kids. We will continue to stay here in the future. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear rjavila,   Thank you very much for your glowing review! We understand how important it is to make sure our guests feel safe and well-taken care of, and we strive to ensure that our accommodations and amenities are kept to the highest standards of cleanliness. We’re so happy to know that you and your family were able to relax and enjoy all of the fun Courtyard Anaheim has to offer, and we look forward to seeing you again for your next vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This is my go to hotel for the last few years when we hit disneyland.  The place is great.   It started years ago when a manager named Matt Stanley took care of an issue.  A place having him there shows a lot. The rooms are clean.  The walk to Disneyland is manageable, and dinner places are on our walk back. You cannot beat it.  I highly recommend this place.
Manager Response: Dear markdca73,   Thank you so much for your gracious review! Hearing from our return guests is always a pleasure, and we greatly appreciate your kind comments. Our staff are the heart and soul of everything we do here at Courtyard Anaheim, and it’s such a joy to hear that their dedication and kindness has left such a lasting impression after all of these years. We’re grateful for your continued support, and we look forward to seeing you once more for another remarkable stay!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We absolutely loved this hotel we will stay here every time we go to Disneyland and the surrounding areas!  The room was so comfortable the kids loved the pool and the adults loved the hot tub can’t wait to go back!!!
Manager Response: Dear NMercado2021,   Thank you so much for your enthusiastic review! It’s such a treat hearing from our return guests, and we’re so pleased to hear that every stay is as wonderful as the last. We can’t wait to have you back for another memorable vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The staff was so helpful and accommodating, we had to switch rooms midway because we decided to extend our trip. They did everything possible to make it smooth. Spacious rooms, awesome water park! We had an amazing trip! The bistro had really tasty food, the menu is only available in person, but it was full breakfast, lunch and dinner options. We loved having the Starbucks available to us, before heading to the park or our midday rest. We will definitely be back again!
Manager Response: Dear ileabingham,   Thank you so much for your generous review! Top-tier hospitality is our top priority at Courtyard Anaheim, and we’re so happy to hear that our dedicated staff went above and beyond to help make your stay relaxing and enjoyable. It’s such a treat to hear that you and your family will be back again for another wonderful stay, and we look forward to welcoming you back!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The hotel is in nice shape. It’s clean, modern, and our room was very comfortable. But the best part was how much fun my kids (8, 6 and 1) had at the water park. The plan was to spent time there when we arrived on Wednesday afternoon before spending two days at Disneyland. After one long day at Disneyland we decided to postpone the second day’s reservation and instead spend the second day at the hotel water park before checking out. It was a big part of what my kids talk about from the trip. We will be back for sure.
Manager Response: Dear BradleyCW,   Thank you so much for your glowing review! We’re so happy to hear that your kids had such a wonderful time enjoying our fantastic waterpark. It’s one of our favorites, too! We’re honored to hear that you’ll be returning for another wonderful vacation, and we look forward to welcoming you and your family in the near future.    Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: My family had a wonderful experience staying at this hotel. Not only was it a quick walk to Disney, the staff and rooms were amazing. We appreciated how clean everything was and the size of our room was perfect for our family of 4. We are already planning our next trip.
Manager Response: Dear sarahperez864,   Thank you so much for your lovely review! We’re thrilled to hear that you and your family are already planning your return trip with us. We look forward to welcoming you back to impeccable rooms, lovely amenities, and another magical vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Convenient location and so much fun for kids!
Summary: Booked a quasi-last minute trip to Disneyland and picked this hotel for the location based on multiple travel bloggers recommending this hotel for families. The location is absolutely fantastic, but the best is the splash area. My daughter loved it so much, I think she actually liked it better than Disneyland. It was a blast and so worth it. We will come back to stay longer and enjoy more time in the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Priscila M,   Thank you so much for your glowing review! Courtyard Anaheim is known for having incredible accommodations for families, and we’re so happy to hear that your experience did not disappoint! We look forward to having you and your daughter back for an even longer stay.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Best value, better water park, good food and staff that actually cares. Props to the GM for excellent service
Summary: the value and quality here is clutch, excellent service, rooms, eats and water park. Had a small issue with some punk kid but the staff including the GM reached out to make god on a situation the had no control of. Props to all the staff and the GM, good by disney hotels, hello Marriott! Water park 5+, food 5+ and service 5+. I appreciate the hospitality
Manager Response: Dear Chad F.,   Thank you so much for your glowing 5 star review! Unrivaled hospitality is what makes Courtyard Anaheim so special, and we’re thrilled to hear that our dedicated staff helped you feel comfortable, safe, and relaxed during your time with us. We appreciate your kind review, and we all hope to welcome you back for another amazing vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: I have 4 daughters and this was are before school start big family vacation my daughters are 11M, 2, 5 & 7 and boy did they have so much fun i love this hotel so much. From the customer service, the room was beautiful, the water park is a must girls enjoyed it very much and the location is amazing! I love how its literally by everything! Cant wait to go back to Disneyland and come back here!!
Manager Response: Dear chansoryasou,   Thank you so much for your kind 5 star review! We’re thrilled to hear that you and your family had such a wonderful time, and we hope that your vacation was the perfect way to end the summer right before the new school year. Our staff look forward to welcoming you back for another wonderful stay!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Seriously the best staff I have ever come upon! Great job on making us feel so welcome! From the valet to front desk to ALL staff we come to see! We loved the water park too for our children! Thank you all for making our stay a pleasant trip to remember! Felt like a movie cuz it’s now rare to see ALL staff always say hello & so forth! Staff needs a raise & a monthly recognition party for that✊🏼🙌🏼
Manager Response: Dear lavenim,   Thank you so much for your gracious 5 star review! We pride ourselves on having the most incredible team of staff at Courtyard Anaheim, and it’s such a treat to hear that you felt well-taken care of from start to finish. We hope to welcome you and your family back for another unforgettable stay in the future!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great location, great staff and great rooms…wish we could have stayed longer! Walking distance to Disneyland. My kids loved the water park at night and we could even see the Disney fireworks. Loved the rooms with the bunk bed!
Manager Response: Dear melsweeney19,   Thank you so much for your kind 5 star review! It’s such a pleasure to hear that you and your family enjoyed our unique amenities, from our amazing water park to our bunk beds for the kids! We hope you choose us for your next Disneyland vacation, and that you can stay even longer for another incredible stay.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We loved staying at the Courtyard Anaheim on our recent trip to Disneyland. The location can’t be beat but what really sold me was the bunk beds and two showers - perfect for our family of five! It was very clean, we had views of the park, and my kids loved the water park. There were two big slides, a bunch of slides for younger kids, a huge hot tub, and a lap pool. We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Cookie435,   Thank you so much for your kind 5 star review! We are so happy to hear that your incredible stay was made even better by our prime location, beautiful water park, and super cool bunk beds accommodations! It’s such a treat to know we’ll be seeing you again, and we look forward to welcoming you and your family back for another fantastic vacation.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Incredible location, excellent staff and service!
Summary: This Courtyard has wonderful amenities and our room with two queen-sized beds even had bunk beds for those with younger kids. The location to Disneyland makes for only a 5 minute walk. The gym and pools were also nice. They even have a mini waterpark for the family to enjoy.
Manager Response: Dear docfink,   Thank you so much for your kind review! We take pride in having incredible amenities and accommodations for all of our guests, and we’re so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your time with us. We truly appreciate your review and hope to welcome you and your family back for another wonderful vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Great distance to the parks, love the refillable water bottle machine, love the bedding options and the double showers. Everything was very clean and comfortable as well. Hotel staff is friendly and helpful!
Manager Response: Dear HinaRozen,   Thank you for your glowing 5 star review! We’re so happy to hear you had such a comfortable and memorable stay, from the exceptional accommodations to the prime location. We hope to welcome you back for another wonderful vacation soon!    Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Everything about this hotel was great! Great location, very friendly staff, clean and well kept Would definitely stay here again . If you are going to Disneyland I would recommend this hotel!! My family and I loved our stay here
Manager Response: Dear kelliemurra,   Thank you so much for your wonderful 5 star review! We’re so glad to know that every element of your stay was fantastic for you and your family. We look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable vacation.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Love the staff here and the cleanliness of the hotel. The water park in the hotel was a great place for our kids and easy walking distance to Disneyland . Would love to stay here again. Only suggestion is for Marriott gold members or higher should get free parking or discounted parking, but it’s cheaper the parking at Disneyland
Manager Response: Dear mohmoney00,   Thank you so much for taking the time to review your stay! We appreciate your feedback regarding our parking policy for Marriott Gold members, and while we were unable to accommodate any additional discounts, we’re so pleased to know that your stay was still enjoyable for you and your family. We truly hope to see you again for another wonderful vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Overall it was a great staff, no matter how short staff the hospitality industry might be, the staff that is working is always friendly and warm welcoming. I came with my family for our Disneyland trip, the hotel is really just a short walk to the main entrance. It is a great spot when you have had a long day and want to go back to the hotel to take a break.
Manager Response: Dear Lmorales0211,    Thank you so much for your gracious 5 star review! We appreciate your kind comments towards our dedicated staff, and we’re pleased to know you felt comfortable and well-taken care of during your stay. We hope to see you and your family again for another fantastic vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: Michael, the front desk that checked us in… was awesome! Fast and efficient! One of the best customer service I’ve experienced. The whole hotel had such a great welcoming attitude. Hands down best hotel I’ve stayed at!  Thank you so much!
Manager Response: Dear AJMLIMA,   Thank you so much for your glowing and enthusiastic review! Our dedicated staff are always thrilled to provide an unforgettable hotel experience, and it’s always a treat to hear that one of our team members was such a memorable part of your time with us. Thank you again; we hope to welcome you back again soon!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: One of the best hotels my family and I have stayed. Everyone was very friendly and helpful. The kids loved the water park. We will be returning for our next vacation. The valet parking was great, the restaurant was awesome. Housekeeping does a great job.
Manager Response: Dear erikrivera33,   Thank you so much for your gracious 5 star review! It’s such a thrill to hear that you’ll be returning for your next vacation, and our hotel staff are ready to welcome you and your family back to another excellent experience.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Excellent especially if you have kids
Summary: Location as promised, easy 1 mile walk to entrance of Disneyland.  Clean, comfortable rooms.  We chose a double queen room even though it was the two of us because that was all that was available.   On top of that there was a bunk bed in the same room, and a nifty banquette with table in the corner.  If we had children with us it would have been ideal for their morning breakfast or late snacks.  The water park was outstanding, great place to cool off in the heat of the afternoon and return to the park in the evening, reservations required for limiting crowds, and a full cleaning done between available time slots.  Never imagined a small area would have slides and waterfalls, and for adults a nice pool and large spa.  Good viewing of park fireworks from there too. Friendly,
Manager Response: Dear Paradise56756,   Thank you so much for taking the time to leave such a glowing review! We pride ourselves on providing a world-class vacation experience for our guests, and it’s such a pleasure to hear that every aspect of your stay was outstanding for every member of the family. We’re grateful for your kind comments, and we hope to welcome you back for another excellent and memorable vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We had a great stay. The hotel staff was super accommodating and friendly. We enjoyed the water park and loved the “bonus” Disneyland fireworks. The kids loved the bunk beds too! We would definitely return.
Manager Response: Dear cjac0b,   Thank you so much for your kind review! We’re so happy to hear your kids enjoyed our bunk beds, and that our waterpark and fireworks were a treat for the whole family. Our staff look forward to welcoming you back for another wonderful stay!    Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: The service was amazing, very clean rooms. I love that they had Starbucks inside. The food at the cafe was very good. The pool area was excellent very fun for kids. The valet service was excellent. The staff was very friendly.
Manager Response: Dear ntapia30,   Thank you so much for your glowing 5 star review! Our wonderful staff are a significant part of our hotel experience, and we’re so happy to hear that they helped elevate your stay for the entire family. We are all looking forward to welcoming you back for another amazing vacation.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: I loved everything about the hotel but I do wish there was a bar and a better restaurant on site. The kids really enjoyed the water park. We also loved being able to watch the Disneyland fireworks from the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear kathyvelasquez2021,   Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review! We appreciate your feedback in regards to our onsite dining options. We’re pleased to hear you were still able to have an enjoyable experience with us overall, and that your family had a great time enjoying our water park and watching the fireworks! We truly hope you welcome you back for your next Disneyland vacation.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We visited Anaheim/Disney Sunday night, August 22nd - Tuesday, August 24th and had a great stay at Courtyard Marriott by the park entrance.   Before booking I read other reviews and saw pictures of the rooms etc.  The pictures did not do the room justice.  Our room, #654 was PERFECT.  Two queen size beds PLUS a very comfortable bunk bead for the kids.  I was afraid the room would feel tight, but not at all.  Plenty of room where we would have been comfortable if there were 6-8 people staying (We were only a family of 4)  By the way, there were 2 showers.  I've never seen that in a regular room before.  One was a very nice updated walk in shower, the other was a traditional hotel bathtub shower.   So convenient that 2 people can shower at the same time and both had private areas.
Manager Response: Dear KennyJacob,   Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review! It’s such a pleasure to hear how much our accommodations exceeded your expectations, and that every member of your party had a comfortable experience in our double queen room. We appreciate your feedback regarding our valet parking policy, and we’re happy to hear that you were able to have an enjoyable vacation thanks to our friendly and efficient hotel staff. Thank you for choosing to stay with us for your Disneyland trip, and we hope to welcome you back for another fantastic vacation!     Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We had a lovely time. We arrived really late and Josh I believe that was his name he brought our bags up and was extremely friendly and knowledgeable about the surrounding area. The room was clean and comfortable with a surprise set of bunk beds so everyone had their own bed!!!
Manager Response: Dear kimie11270,   Thank you so much for your gracious review! It’s always a pleasure to know that our staff made you feel well-taken care of, and that your time with us exceeded expectations. We hope to welcome you back for another fantastic stay in the future!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Favorite Off Property Disney Adjacent Hotel
Summary: We love this hotel. Super close to Disneyland, awesome view of the fireworks, great pool area for kiddos. Kids loves the pizza from the hotel. They requested it every night. Rooms feel spacious. Plenty of storage.
Manager Response: Dear 177elaine,   Thank you so much for your 5 star review! We’re so happy to hear that you and your family had such a great time, and that the pizza was a much-requested favorite for the kids! We truly hope to welcome you and your family back for your next Disneyland vacation.   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: This is my family’s go-to hotel for visiting Disneyland. 2 queen beds and bunk beds, plus 2 showers, at MOST it’s a 7-10 minute walk to the main gate, bonus is you can cross at the light by the hotel and then have clear sidewalks all the way in and avoid the other Harbor hotel crowds. We doordash groceries to the room and take advantage of the fridge and microwave.   At this latest trip we spent 4 nights at this courtyard and then 2 nights at DL hotel for pool and an extra sprinkle of Disney and (coming from an extreme Disney lover and enthusiast) it’s just NOT worth it. This hotel is clean, new, comfortable, convenient, and has extra space in the rooms. The staff are friendly and will go above and beyond to be helpful. Water park is fun (bigger than the HOJO nextdoor) and you
Manager Response: Dear EmilyIrene9,   Thank you so much for your glowing 5 star review! It’s always a treat to hear from our return guests, and we’re so happy to hear that your last stay was just as fantastic as your previous experiences at Courtyard Anaheim. Our world-class staff look forward to welcoming you and your family back for your next vacation of fun and relaxation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We had a blast during our stay! We got the too with two queen beds plus a bunk bed. My kids though the bunks were the coolest thing ever! We had a cute little balcony as well that they loved. The water park was beyond amazing! Hot tub, two big kid slides, a whole area for all ages and a fun little pool for tiny ones. It was a very quick walk to Disney. The staff was BEYOND friendly in every area of the hotel. Hands down our favorite hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Montgomerynm,   Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a gracious review! It’s always a thrill to hear about the fun our guests had during their stay. We’re happy to hear your kids loved our bunk beds, and that the entire family felt taken care of by our dedicated staff. We hope to see you again for your next family vacation!   Sincerely,    Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary: We landed Anaheim in the morning and got to the hotel around 11 ish. I've noted on the mobil check in we will arrive early. We were planning to leave our baggages with the hotel and go to Disneyland until the room is ready, but when we got there, the room was already ready, so we were able to unpack, have lunch at the hotel and went to Disneyland. The lady at the front desk was super nice and welcomed us.  Because of our Mariotto status, we got upgrade to the high level, waterpark view. It was nice since when my husband and our son went down for the swimming I was able to watch them from the balcony.  All other staffs were super nice - I when down to the market to get a milk for our son, and checked out at the front desk, and the guy who was ringing the milk, when he heard our
Manager Response: Dear JS_Orinda,   Thank you so much for your gracious review! We pride ourselves on having the most welcoming staff and inviting accommodations to make every getaway an exceptional experience. It’s such a pleasure to hear about your incredible experience, from the moment you arrived in Anaheim to your departure. We truly look forward to welcoming you and your family back for another magical stay!    Sincerely,   Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance

Summary Heading: Look no further for near Disney hotel
Summary: Literally steps away from park entrance. Friendly and efficient service throughout. Bistro was a surprising highlight. Highly recommend the avocado toast for breakfast. Modern, super clean room. King one bedroom with bunk bed in living room was perfect our family of three. Bedroom was huge though, so could definitely fit a rollaway or playpen. Tip: You need to reserve water park time in advance and you can only have one slot per day. Best to plan ahead.  Only one minor complaint. Mask wearing mandated within hotel, but not unforced, so there were plenty of folks walking around without.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and the 5 stars, very much appreciated.   Hope to welcome you and your family back soon!

Summary: If you and your family are headed to Disneyland, look no further than this perfect location and hotel!   It is conveniently located across the street from Disneyland and there are many restaurants near the hotel for your family dining needs.   From check in to check out, our experience was five star and this hotel was perfect for our family getaway. The hotel is clean and sanitized and safety protocols are in place.  We had an amazing room that had two queen beds and a set of bunkbeds along with a bathtub and a separate shower area. The beds were super comfortable and the amenities were great. There was a refrigerator and microwave in our room and there was plenty of drawer space to store your clothes if you plan on staying for a week.   The water park in the hotel is an
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel (and the 5 stars), much appreciated! We look forward to welcoming you and your family back to the hotel.

Summary: This hotel is GREAT for families!! Room was clean, great size for four people - and a view of their waterpark AND Disneyland!! Their waterpark is so cute and was fun for both of our kids aged 10 & 12. But kids of all ages were happily enjoying it!  The Cafe on the main level serves Starbucks and has drinks available for the pool. Prior to our arrival we ordered groceries and had them delivered. The room has a microwave, Keurig and fridge - so easy to get breakfast handled! The best part though ------ BUNK BEDS!  We really liked this property! Truly feel like we got what we paid for!   From a parent who needed to do some emergency laundry... The facilities are CLEAN. Just be sure to have quarters. $2.00 per machine.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we are glad you enjoyed your stay!  We hope to welcome you and your family again soon!

Summary: Everything was great! Water park, room , food court . Location to Disneyland.We were able to check in early and got a better room that we had signed up for. I took my grandson and he enjoyed the water park and also applies was that we checked in early and was able to get him in an earlier swim time then our sign time. For a future travel I will surely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, we are glad you and your grandson had a good time.  We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights in July.  The room layout and size is excellent for a family.  Each member of my family had their own real bed, and we had plenty of space for our luggage too.  The refrigerator/microwave area has plenty of storage for food too.  We had breakfast in our room every day.  The dinette seating made this very comfortable.  As with most other hotels right now, your room is not cleaned daily.  However, you can get additional supplies (cups, coffee, towels, etc.) by talking with the front desk staff or communicating with them through their app.  Additional supplies were always brought to our room quickly.  All staff were friendly and helpful.  The pool area was never crowded since you have to reserve a time.  The actual pool is on the small side.  If you have
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and the great review!

Summary Heading: Everything about this stay was 5 star!
Summary: Everything about this hotel was 5 star! Jeff at checkin got our stay started with a professional, friendly, helpful early checkin. Our room was clean, spacious, functional and had a great view. The water park is amazing for a hotel and we enjoyed sitting poolside and watching all the families experience the fun!  Our chats with the front desk to answer questions were prompt and professional. The 2 meals from the Bistro we enjoyed were quick and yummy. We loved our stay and will definitely return!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, we cannot wait to welcome you back!

Summary: We stayed June 10 through June 15. We only had two issues. The TV did not work and the light switch in the bathroom quit working halfway through our stay￼. They fixed the TV immediately. And I let them know about the light switch during check out. I always look for a hotel￼ with bell service. ￼In this hotel did not let me down. I hope Marriott continues to offer valet and bell service at most of it’s hotels.￼The front desk staff and valet were incredibly nice and helpful.￼ Charlotte was very informative and knowledgeable. Andre loaded all of our luggage. My 8 year old absolutely loved the water park. The walk to Disneyland took about 10 minutes.￼ I would definitely stay at this hotel again￼.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and your review, we hope to welcome you back to the hotel soon!

Summary: This was our first stay at this Courtyard. We typically stay at the Best Western since it is the closest to the main gate but we wanted to switch it up this time. We booked about 3 months in advance at $269 for a double Queen/bunk bed room. The Bistro was amazing, both the coffee and breakfast sandwiches were great. I cannot say enough about the staff and how friendly  they were. We called for towels and garbage pickup and they arrived in less than 10 minutes. The waterpark is the best pool on Harbor for sure! Worth the stay for that alone so make sure to book a reservation. The walk is not terrible but seems long as the end of the day or if you are going back for a nap. Love the large rooms with the bunk beds. Can't wait to come back.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a try, we are happy you did! We cannot wait to welcome you back.

Summary Heading: Perfect location, love the water park!
Summary: Perfect for our Disney visit. Our kids loved the water park. The hotel was clean and comfortable. The room had two queen beds and a bunk bed so the kids got to pick between the regular bed and the bunk bed - of course, the bunk bed was more fun and a great place to build a fort! Very easy, short walk to Disney Park. Only disappointment was that during Covid, you had to reserve blocks of time in the water park (something like 9-11:30, 12:30-3:30, 4:30-7:30 and 8:30-10), which we didn’t know until they emailed us about it two days in advance of our visit. So we weren’t able to get all the times we wanted which was disappointing, since the water park was the reason we stayed at this hotel. These restrictions will probably go away soon so shouldn’t matter for long. I recommend
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Great staff, nice room, great view, easy short walk to Disneyland
Summary: My wife (a huge Disneyland fan) and I stayed here for two nights on a getaway trip from Los Angeles.  We stayed on an upper floor, the 4th, and got a park view room with a balcony.  The view is awesome, exactly what you want in a room with a view of Disneyland, right by the Matterhorn and you can also see Space Mountain really well.  To get to Disneyland you walk across the street and then down about a block or two, it takes about 5-10 minutes is all.  The park opened at 9 the day we went and we showed up in line to get the temperature check / security check at about 8:40.  It moved slowly and we didn't get into the park until 9:30.  The next day we showed up around 10 and there was no line- so if you can afford to arrive a bit after opening, the line out front will be way less
Manager Response: Scott, thank you for your review and thank your wife for being a huge fan of Disneyland! We look forward to welcoming you back, hope it's soon!

Summary: Our second time at this hotel, my son always loves it here and seems to prefer the waterpark over disneyland. Rooms are always cleaned, staff are friendly and very accommodating. We look forward to our next trip from down under
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind words! It's always a pleasure to see kids enjoying our waterpark. We're looking forward to hosting you again on your next trip.

Summary: I did not stay at this hotel as I had to cancel because of Covid 19. It was extremely easy to cancel. I appreciate the flexibility. I know hotels will be losing money and I'm happy they did the right thing. We will be staying there when our trip is back on.
Manager Response: We're so glad we could make the process easy for you and we hope to host you in the future!

Summary Heading: The PERFECT hotel for families near Disneyland, AWESOME Waterslides
Summary: In my opinion this is the absolute BEST hotel near Disneyland Anaheim. My family of four absolutely LOVED our 11 night stay in August 2019. The reasons I highly recommend staying here; the rooms are spacious and CLEAN, the water playground is awesome fun, The Bistro Restaurant in the lobby was delicious and it’s a short walk to Disneyland. We stayed in a Two Queen Room with Bunk Bed and Balcony/View of Disneyland Fireworks from 15th – 26th August 2019. And what a spectacular view of the fireworks it was! Nightly fireworks displays, that could be viewed from the comfort of our own balcony if we didn’t feel like being amongst the crowds. There’s also a beautiful daytime view of Matterhorn mountain and even the monorail. The room was very modern, spacious and extremely clean with
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was a pleasant surprise!  Perfect location to Disneyland and Downtown Disney- a short 10 minute walk.  The water park was a blast for our grandkids ages 2,4, and 6.  The bistro was open late and early with healthy options.  Lots of beds for a family with a tub shower combo plus an additional shower and double vanity.  If you are lucky enough to get Christine (kris, Chris??) in the Bistro- she is awesome!  Everyone was helpful and friendly!  We will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience! It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: We got two rooms.  There were three adults and four kids and we had more than enough beds and showers.  The rooms were nice and comfortable.  The kids loved the water park on the days we weren't at Disneyland.  It's a fairly short walk to the park entrance.  I was able to buy discounted tickets at the counter and that was great.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This Courtyard is located perfectly to take advantage of all Disneyland has to offer. If you book the right room, you can even have a park and fireworks view!  The rooms are laid out perfectly for families. Each room has two queen beds (or one king) plus a set of bunk beds that can sleep two children. There is also a small breakfast nook that is quite handy for additional seating while in the room.   The walk to the parks is roughly the same distance as walking from the Grand Californian to Disneyland.  This hotel also has an excellent heated water park with plenty of shaded seating. My kids spent two days at the water park and loved it!  On this vacation, we stayed at the Grand Californian for three nights and this hotel for three nights. We all agreed that when we return we
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us! We would love to host your family again in the future.

Summary: As a Marriott Platinum member, this was the BEST courtyard I’ve ever stayed at. Rooms are clean, location is great. And not to mention the Fantastic customer service. Our son woke up with a fever one morning and I went to the front desk to get a few things from the gift shop; Patrick provided us with assistance and even loaned us a child thermometer. Patrick also helped answer numerous questions about the theme park as it was our first time visiting Disneyland as a family. Excellent Service by this front desk agent. He went above and beyond and we won’t forget it. We told many friends about this property already. We will be back!
Manager Response: none

Summary: After a two day drive from Oregon, we arrived at the Marriott Anaheim Theme Park Entrance hotel early (11 am) & quite tired. We were staying one night, checking in to Disney's Grand Californian the next morning, then coming back to the Marriott for one last night before driving home again (it was our first trip to Disneyland & our plans changed a lot as I did research on where to stay & how long).   Our room at the Marriott would not be ready until the afternoon, but we were give wristbands for the pool area & did a quick change in the bathrooms downstairs, then headed up to the second floor to the pool area. All was forgotten and forgiven by our grouchy little one the moment she saw the AMAZING waterpark! A pool, a hot tub, a great big splash pad and not one but TWO water
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us! We're thrilled to hear that your little one's birthday was everything she dreamed of. We would love to host you again in the future!

Summary: We spent 7 nights here from Dec 28 - Jan 4 for a first time family Disney vacation.  Couldn't have asked for a better location.  Very quick walk (5 mins) to Disney.  The hotel was perfect for us.  It was clean.  The rooms were surprisingly quiet (when you consider how many families and kids must be here).  We had a great view of the nightly Disney fireworks.  Beds were very comfortable.    Really no issues whatsoever with this hotel and would highly recommend it to any families looking for a safe, convenient location from which to enjoy Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: First time here! Absolutely love it!
Summary: I absolutely love this hotel, it is my new favorite I will stay here every time I'm in Anaheim to go to Disneyland.  Janelle at The bistro was amazing took great care of me and my daughter front desk people Rock.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review! We're so honored to be your go-to when in Anaheim and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: This hotel was 10/10 for us!   We arrived early but Jeff at the front desk was able to get us into a room straight away!   The room was amazing and as other reviewers have said the bunk beds were a blessing. Our room looked at the Disneyland so that was a highlight for us!  After long days at Disneyland it was lovely to come back to the pool area and soak in the giant hot tub! While the kids loved the water slides and pool.   The onsite store was great to pick up a bottle of wine and a few snacks, and the cafe had a great selection of food for breakfast and dinner.  The location to the park was the best, a short walk and your'e there!! We would 100% stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Wonderful stay and so convenient to the park!
Summary: We just returned from three nights here. The hotel was amazingly convenient to the park (on prior Disney visits we had longer walks from the parking garages than we did from this hotel).It seemed like such a deal at 1/2 the price of the park resort hotels. The staff were wonderfully accommodating and the facility was in very good condition. The representations in the photos are accurate, beds were comfortable, extra things most rooms don't have (booth and table and the extra shower) were appreciated. I liked the size of the room, bunk beds, fridge and microwave and our 8 YO daughter loved the pool and water-slide area. By the third day of visiting the parks she was ready to return for a break at the slides! We headed out early each day and were exhausted and happy to get back to
Manager Response: We're so thrilled you had a wonderful stay with us!

Summary: The hotel rooms are spacious. The bunkbeds means no kids’ feet in your back all night. Bathroom has bath and two shower facilities.  Perfect for families.  Very clean and cheaper than the Resort hotels.  Great service too.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed for one night in a one bedroom suite. It was super clean, spacious and had everything we needed with 3 kids ! Including a safe bunk bed with big high rail :)  Microwave, mini fridge, lots of room for them to play, coffee maker etc. The pool and water park are great too ! As well as the bistro cafe downstairs  We will be back soon !
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave this great review! We would love to welcome you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Great Place to stay while visiting Disneyland
Summary: We stayed here for 6 nights (using points) and were very happy with our stay! Patrick at the front desk was awesome!!  Our Room was very spacious, 2 queen beds and a bunk bed. The bathroom was the best, especially for a family of 4. A large separate shower and toilet room attached to the rest of the bathroom which included a tub and double sinks. Our room also included both a microwave and fridge, which was a plus.  We had no problem with loud noises here, even with the work being done on the pool area.  We would pick this hotel again if we returned to visit Disneyland. You have Mimi's Bistro right out front of the hotel, as well as a Panera and McDonald's on your walk to Disneyland. The best part was .... Disneyland's gate was just a 10 minute walk from the hotel!!!!! (If you
Manager Response: none

Summary: Best hotel I've ever stayed in. Guaranteed 5 star on all fronts. Very personable front desk staff as well. Everyone is chatty and welcoming. The Bistro staff were also really friendly and interesting to talk to. The property is immaculate and the attention to detail is faultless. The water park operates in January and swimming is fine on a sunny day. 8 minute walk across to Disney. I would stay here again in a heartbeat. Both teens took tuns between the bunk and the spare double bed. I'm quite tall so I did find the standard queen bed a little small, so I'd go for a king next time. It was also really handy being able to skip room cleaning and score Marriott points instead. That gave us ultra flexibility going back and forth between Disney and our room at will. Very quiet rooms
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the glowing review! It would be our pleasure to welcome you and your family back again soon.

Summary: This was our second time staying here for our family trip to Disney.  The location is an easy walk to Disney (and much cheaper than staying at Disney).  The pool is a big hit for our young kiddos with the big slides, hot tub, and play areas.  Best of all is the staff - so accommodating, friendly, and patient.  Big shoutout to Janell at the Bistro who took excellent care of us.  Love this hotel!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Perfectly located for a Disney visit
Summary: Spacious & spotlessly clean rooms.  Water park was a great place for the kids to chill after a big day at Disney.  Exceptionally friendly staff who went out of their way to make our stay very comfortable and memorable for the right reasons.  Would love to stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review! It would be our pleasure to have you stay with us again.

Summary: This was our Second Stay here. Pre Christmas Trip and Hotel was all decked out for the Hoildays and looked amazing without being over the top with decorations  What we love most about this place is its so Fresh and Quiet  Kids Really enjoyed the Pool and Slides this time round - Even in Winter, Slides and Pool heated.  Thanks Marriott for another great stay XX  We will certainly return again and stay here on our next trip in L.A
Manager Response: none

Summary: Less than 10 minute walk to Disney. There was a traffic light to easily cross the street right in front of park. Room was nice, all the rooms we booked had bunk beds.  The view from balcony facing park was identical to website. Disney only does fireworks on weekends and holidays in January, you can easily see them from pool area and save the money, just check Disney schedule. We will stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience! It would be our pleasure to host you again in the future.

Summary: Great family accommodation walking distance to Disneyland. Surrounded by places to eat.  Great waterpark for children . Rooms are a nice size and accomodate a family in comfort. You can see Disneyland fireworks from your room.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location but time to sort environmental aspects
Summary: Lovely hotel placed very close to Disney entrance. Rooms, beds, bathrooms, staff all faultless. Bristo downstairs really convenient. My bug bear is the horrendous lack of care for the environment/excessive and unnecessary use of plastics and disposables. While this is true of American hotels in general (shame on America), it is time for change! We do not want to see disposable coffee cups with plastic lids instead of a coffee mug in room. We don’t want tiny shampoo, conditioner jars. We don’t want plastic cutlery. Please make an effort and be part of the solution, not the problem.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback! We will be sure to pass this along to our management team.

Summary: Along with most of the lodgings fronting the Disney Resort parks on Harbor Blvd. this hotel has been a standing fixture since the mid-late twentieth century but regular refurbishments, good facilities and attentive staff have kept it relevant so it still offers good accommodations for a family stay.  The good: our family king room with twin bunks (501) was clean, bright, spacious, comfortably furnished and stylishly decorated. Everything expected was there and it all worked as expected. The king bed was comfortable, the linens clean and crisp and we were each able to find a favourite pillow. The annex room with twin bunks provided a perfect abode for our two young grandchildren. The bathroom arrangement was spacious and also worked well with young children. Once the Disney parks
Manager Response: none

Summary: Janell went above and beyond with my order! She was so kind and provided exceptional service! Definitely deserves recognition! Everyone at tbis hotel is amazing and extremely accommodating! 5 stars all the way.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review and we'll be sure to pass along your praise to Janelle.

Summary: This place is perfect! Super close to the entrance of DL. My kids enjoyed the slides and mini-water park as much as DL. And the Bistro has amazing food, the staff and valet parking were all great, and Janell at the Bistro was da bomb!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We booked sort of late so we couldn't get a room at the Disneyland resort hotels. We decided to try the courtyard hotel. Loved the bunk beds that made extra beds to sleep in. Also the two showers were very nice. The extra towels were wonderful.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience! We're so glad fate brought you to us and we hope to welcome you back again in the future.

Summary: Stayed with 4 grandkids and parents. Great service, clean and excellent proximity to Disneyland. Hi fi to Janelle in bistro. So welcome as are all the bistro staff   I was pleasantly surprised how good the food options were BUT if you are a coffee fan bring some with you. Coffee is dreadful in This part of the world. Only Star Bucks 😩
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed at the Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim for 10 nights. The level of convenience if you are visiting Disneyland can’t be beaten, directly across the road, but set back from the main Road so you don’t get as much noise. The Room was a great size, beds comfortable and a high level of cleanliness.  All Staff were very friendly and professional however Janell @ Bistro was the stand out star of our visit. She gave us helpful tips for places to visit and good shopping spots. She went over and above for my fussy daughters food requirements and not to mention made a mean latte.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience! We're so glad our team could go above and beyond for you and it would be our pleasure to host you again.

Summary: We were very happy with our stay.  The room was extremely clean, spacious and well laid out.  There was a really nice shower and tub/shower combo which made it great for getting ready for the day quickly.  Although their bar is not elaborate they had wine, beer and 4 pre-made mixed cocktails that were actual quit good.  They also had a nice fire pit to relax and keep warm on a cold night.  A special mention to Janell who served us both evenings.  She was very nice and knew how to describe each of the drink choices.  In fact, everyone in the hotel was very nice and helpful.  We will definitely go back when we visit Disneyland again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great hotel, very clean, friendly, kind, thoughtful staff.  Especially Janelle in the Bistro, goes above and beyond, every single day.   Exceptional service.  Definitely stay here again. Less than 10 minute walk to park, great location.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience! We're so glad our customer service could make you feel welcome. It would be our pleasure to host you again.

Summary: My family stayed at the courtyard for our visit to the Disney theme parks. Staff were all excellent. We ate in the bistro downstairs 2 nights and we had fantastic service by Janell @ Bistro. She attended to my children’s dietary needs and made us feel very welcome.  Our room was clean and provided us with everything we needed. Location to theme park entrance gates is an easy 5 min stroll.  Definitely recommend this venue to other families with young children.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very nice, clean, and new hotel! Also liked that the room had two showers. Made cleaning up at night fast since no one really had to wait that long. Especially loved Janell at the Bistro as she was so nice and welcoming and really brought a smile to our faces! STAY HERE!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us this review, Patrick! It would be our pleasure to welcome you for another stay soon.

Summary: Booked the room on points for a 3 night stay with the family while visiting Disneyland. The hotel was clean and up to date. The staff were especially friendly, especially the front desk staff for cheerful greetings and Janell at the Bistro who really made it feel as though the hotel was an extension of the friendly Disney experience. The location was easy to uber in and out of, and a short walk to the park. I have stayed at some other neighboring properties and this is the nicest by far.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Keep the magic going by staying a quick walk from the park gates. Enjoy the water park - virtually deserted in January despite the warm California sun! Everything you would expect from Marriott - spacious, clean, and comfortable rooms.   No room service - orders from the Bistro by phone only after 5PM. This is in the small print of that brochure handed out at check in. We ordered dinner by phone the first night because we were too exhausted to go out. Didn’t realize we couldn’t do the same for breakfast before heading to the airport; had to wait in line to order, then wait 20 minutes for our food which caused us to cut it closer to flight time than we’re comfortable with.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review and we appreciate your feedback on our F&B options. We will be sure to pass that along to management. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Checked in on 1/3/20 late night. Let me tell you, Janell was awesome, friendly, and her customer service was above and beyond. Answered all question and was super helpful with their menu, taking care of us and kids. She made us feel welcome and taken care of. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Brilliant and kind lady!!! I was freezing and made me amazing hot chocolate even after she had closed!!! Thanks so much Janell!! I Such unbelievable American hospitality I shall never forget!! Totally deserving of best barista award!!!
Manager Response: We truly appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us. We'll be sure to share your kind words with Janelle and the rest of our team. Please join us again soon.

Summary: We stayed there because of its close proximity to Disneyland. Although it is not directly opposite the theme park entrance like Best Western but it is on the same stretch and definitely close enough to walk back for a nap and head back to the park especially when the park operating hours is till 12am. The room is so spacious that comes with two large double beds and a bunk bed and our kids love it. The staff were very helpful and cheerful throughout our stay. There’s a shop where you can get some Disney souvenirs and snacks, water and stuff too. We also love the very cosy cafe that served Starbucks coffee. Overall, will surely recommend to friends and go back to Courtyard Marriott the next time.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The location was right near Disney.  The rooms were very nice and the service was good.  I loved how close the location was.  I would recommend staying here if you are coming to visit Disneyland.  Would stay again.
Manager Response: We appreciate this 5-star review. Please join us again soon for another magical travel experience.

Summary: We stayed for 3 nights as couldn’t guarantee an early check in after 14+ hours on a plane from Australia . Opted for 2 queen & bunk option as we have a gangly (male) teen but the bunk was a little short even for our older (female ) teen who is not so tall . Room was clean & well equipped . Perfect for walking distance to the Parks& crashing after dinner Gym was more than adequate & staff were lovely , friendly & helpful. Tony Roma’s seafood & Grill was easy walking distance for dinner and although there were no vegetable options as sides , I asked for broccoli & got a plate full
Manager Response: We appreciate your review and feedback and hope to welcome you again during your next visit to California.

Summary Heading: Great deal and oh-so-close to the entrance (can you tell by the name?)
Summary: True to it's name, this Courtyard Marriott is very, very close to the Disneyland entrance. One of the closest possible, outside of staying at a Disney on-site property - and maybe just a smidge closer to the main entrance than Disneyland Hotel or Paradise Pier.  A terrific deal for just a bit over $200/night, particularly for a family-style trip.  Rooms, if not glamorous were clean and comfortable.  Of special note was besides the two queen beds, there was a bunk bed, which my then 3.5 year old thought was the coolest hotel feature ever.  We had a decent view of the hotel's pool, which looked fun but we did not partake - too much Disney to do.  Parking was valet-only, but not unreasonable.  Being so close to the park and to Downtown Disney, we didn't really need our car much
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Planning a trip to Disneyland? Stay here!!!
Summary: Courtyard Marriott feels like a Disney property, the rooms and service and meal prices are amazing! Spacious rooms,  with bunk beds, Starbucks, water slide, $4.50 kids menu!! The staff is wonderful. The hotel is beautifully decorated for Christmas. The lobby is so inviting and they play Christmas movies at Christmas time. The staff is super friendly!! Jenell was super fun. We loved her holiday sweaters and her hospitality, so be sure to stop by the Bistro on your way back from the park. The Bistro menu is perfect and I hope they never change it!! There is something perfect for every guest and the presentation and quality will exceed your expectations! This hotel is such an amazing value, we will stay here for years to come.
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for this rave review. We hope to welcome you again soon for another magical travel experience.

Summary: We had the best staycation at this Marriott. Our family of 5, including 3 kids ages 11, 10 and 5 loved the spacious room and bunk bed...along with 2 showers!  The water park was also a lot of fun. It was a cool night when we decided to go, but the pools and slides are heated.  What made our stay even better was the service...especially Janelle at the Bistro. She was so sweet to my kids and made us feel at home. We look forward to coming back again soon!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We are a family of 4.  We have spent 6 nights here and have been very impressed with everything.  The room had 2 queen beds and a bunk bed.  Overall it was very comfortable.  For a nice quick meal after a visit to Disneyland the bistro here is great.  Excellent service for our entire stay and nothing was to hard.  It seemed as though Janell@Bistro was always working but always with a smile.  I would recommend for a family and the watermark attached to it tops it off for a good spa afterwards.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to host you and your family, and we hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: Jet lag gets me. Normally I take naps at home too. So this hotel delivers as promised. 7min one way to Disneyland. I leave and re-enter the park for naps. This location is perfect for me!  Good and cheery staff. Good food at the bistro, although there are many food options along the main avenue. Room is large and spacious. Two queen beds and a bunk bed means we have more than enough space for our family of four. A separate door for the shower and the toilet allows for another user to use the basins.   Very pleased with the choice.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed there on a Disney trip. It's walking distance to the park even with kids and strollers. They really cater to families and kids. The pool area is amazing with slides and kid pool. Janell in the bistro was super nice and went out of her way to make sure we were having a good time.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave this review. We're thrilled you enjoyed your time with us and hope to welcome you for another magical travel experience.

Summary Heading: Walking distance to Disneyland and restaurants.
Summary: We choose this hotel because it was close to both Disneyland parks and had a water park on site. Check in was quick, the rooms are spacious and one room had two queen beds and two bunks, while the other had one queen bed and two bunk beds. Rooms were neat and clean. The kids couldn’t wait to explore the water park area and there is also a gym within the hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family visited Disneyland and chose to stay at Courtyard by Marriott. Location and room didn’t disappoint. It’s a 5-10 minutes walk to Disneyland everyday. It is spacious with 2 queen beds and a double decker bunk beds. My little one was so intrigued by the bunk bed that she insisted that she takes the afternoon nap on the upper deck. There is a corner table with comfy seats that I fell asleep on. My little one enjoyed playing her toy at the special corner table.
Manager Response: Thank you for this 5-star review. We're delighted you enjoyed our prime location and spacious guest rooms. Please join us again soon.

Summary Heading: It seriously is just the best!2nd stay and it was just as amazing!
Summary: I can’t say enough about this hotel. Every aspect is perfect. The rooms are so comfortable and clean and as a family of five perfect as we all get to be in comfy beds! The cleanliness of the hotel is amazing. The location is absolutely perfect. Just a few minutes to Disney yet still a little away so as to have that break. Kids are loving the pool and water slides even in December as it is heated and so much fun with the water park. Even the teenagers love the slides!  The bistro is fantastic value and quality and we’ve now eaten dinner twice as it was so good. Sitting by the fire pit with a lovely wine was lovely. The best thing about Courtyard Themepark is hands down its staff. All are so happy and caring. They are polite and attentive without being overbearing and everyone was
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have been to Disneyland a couple of time snd stayed at a couple different places both at Disney hotels and neighbor hotels. This is hotel there is. All the rooms have bunk beds which are perfect for the kids and our room also had a little corner both and table. It was about a 7 minute walk to the park. I would recommend this hotel to any family! Felt super spacious!
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for this rave 5-star review. We're thrilled you enjoyed our prime location and spacious guest rooms. Please join us again soon for another magical travel experience.

Summary: Our family of 4 (kids aged 5&7) stayed 5 nights for a family vacation at Disney. This location was perfect, we were able to walk 10 min to the park, making it easy to come back for afternoon pool/water slides breaks. The standard room was spacious with bunks. Once the kids fell asleep in their bunks, we were able to quietly watch TV without disturbing them. The room also has a great shower and a tub/shower combo (2 showed!) making getting ready fast in the AM. We also really enjoyed the restaurant, they don’t offer room service but are super accommodating with to go orders so you can eat & drink at the pool or in the room easily. Janell was our server every night we were there and was awesome at accommodating all of our requests. We’ll be back for sure and we’re already
Manager Response: none

Summary: COURTYARD ANAHEIM THEME PARK ENTRANCE was FANTASTIC !!!! Close to DISNEYLAND entrance , short walk !!!! SAFE  CLEAN  area!!! VERY REASONABLE COST  with a FANTASTIC STAFF, ALWAYS very  helpful and happy . Extra towels or items , no problem , just request and they are there. There is a BISTRO in the entrance area and the staff are FANTASTIC - special call out to  KRIS and JANELL, they  and the rest of the management and staff  are very helpful and pleasant . You will NOT BE SORRY STAYING HERE !!!!!!!!!!  COME ENJOY !!!!!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had many options when choosing a hotel to attend an event at Disneyland. We fortunately choose Marriott Courtyard. Extremely friendly service, anywhere in the hotel the staff are happy to help. We had lunch and dinner at the Bistro. The menu was delicious. The food was well prepared. The dining area included a outdoor patio what a  Gas fireplace with piped in Christmas music. The pool area was super fun including a water slide. We had a great time and recommend this as a perfect location while visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation, Toni!

Summary: The proximity to the park from the hotel is exceptional. The staff were friendly and accommodating. Special mention to Janell @ Bistro. She was phenomenal! The kind of staff you want to have employed on your team! A pleasing start to our 4 week holiday in the US.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Brian, Ashley and Janelle were amazingly supportive in creating a very memorable birthday party for our daughter.  Brian envisioned the location in the public bistro area. Then he and Ashley decorated with balloons, streamers and table cloths to amaze my daughter and guests. Janelle was available throughout party to fill our every need.     Besides all that the hotel is comfortable, clean and totally accommodating.  Great location also.
Manager Response: We're glad to hear it, Rich!

Summary: We chose this hotel based on it proximity to Disneyland and the fact it could accomodate all of us. (6 in total). The rooms were so much larger then i expected, and the fact that we had a seperate room from the kids was an added bonus.  The bathroom was the perfect layout for a large family. There were two showers, one over a bath and the vanity in the middle. This allowed several of our family members in at the same time so we could get ready in record time.  The pool area was a godsend to our family, as we visited during a freak heat wave. We would go to Disneyland early in the morning, come home during the day for a sleep (yes we managed to somehow get all of us done for a nap) or swim, then head back later in the day. I found the laundry to be a huge convenience. From memory
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Awesome week stay at the Marriott
Summary: Our family of five stayed here for a week over Halloween. The hotel staff is extremely friendly and always acknowledge you when you are leaving or returning. The rooms are very clean and were always done before we returned. Two showers in the room is a nice touch as well as the fridge and microwave. The valet parking was quite handy but is $24 a day. About a 10 minute walk to Disneyland which is great. Lots of restaurants nearby as well as a Walgreens and CVS. We would definitely stay here again and have no complaints or issues. Keep up the great work.
Manager Response: Thank you very much, George! We look forward to your next visit. 😊

Summary: The is the first time we've ever stayed in a hotel that my husband did not complain about the bed.  We had the family suite with a king bedroom, two bunkbeds in another room (4 total bunks, and a generously sized living space with a dining table.  The bathroom has 2 sinks and 2 showers for getting ready all at the same time.  The water park is definitely geared towards younger kids. Our 6 and 8 year olds loved it.  Also, great view of the fireworks from the pool deck.  We were here right before Halloween - decorations were very cool.
Manager Response: none
