Someone arrived within moments and we had it all cleaned up and she chatted and smiled the whole time!!  The bistro... You can get great simple meals to have or take to your soon... Guy at counter even helped me work out my coins and turn them into notes as American coins were confusing!!  The water park... My two teens and one pre teen loved it!!! Don't be put off by anyone saying its only for little kids... Trust me... Its not... But it does get busy and having a late night soak in the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share this review with us following your recent visit. We're delighted to hear our staff made your stay pleasant. Thank you, also, for your feedback about our valet service. We're happy that your family enjoyed your stay, and we're proud to be your home away from home during your vacation to the US. We hope to welcome you again someday.

Summary: Wow! This hotel was perfect for a Disney trip with kids! The rooms had bunk beds and was comfortable. The pool area was a lot of fun with slides, play areas and a hot tub. It was within easy walking distance of Disney and was extremely convenient. We had breakfast at the bistro one morning and the croissant sandwiches were okay.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: BEST Disneyland Area Hotel for Families!
Summary: This was our second stay at the Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance and we could not have had a better stay! We had one hiccup and were given keys to a room that was not ours and did not open the door. But the staff is extremely friendly and helpful. They apologized and got the issue fixed quickly and with a smile. We were also staying there during the Halloween season and the hotel went all out with their Halloween decorations. Our kids loved all the spooky touches and found new things they loved every time we walked in. Bravo, Courtyard! Now for the things we just love about this hotel.  ROOMS: They are set up to be ideal for families! Our boys love the bunk beds. The bathroom is also nice, having a separate shower/toilet area and main bathroom sink and tub area made it
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share this review with us. We're thrilled to hear you loved our spacious, family-oriented guest rooms, and that your children loved our spooky holiday touches. We're also delighted that you enjoyed our water park and found our location convenient for your visit to Disneyland. We hope to have the opportunity to serve you again in the future.

Summary: The kids in our group loved the little waterpark/pool and spa (hot tub) in the hotel. Staff were lovely and there is washing facilities on the 3rd and 5th floors which is helpful. The Bistro down stairs is a good place to eat and is reasonably priced - beer and wine on offer but no cocktails if that's what you'd like. We were able to see the nightly Disney fireworks from our room. Halloween decorations in the hotel were fantastic and a bit of a novelty for those who don't have Halloween in their country.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was by far the best we stayed at on our west coast trip. Rooms were large and clean. Bathroom had two showers which works well with kids. The onsite waterpark was great for the kids to burn off energy while we relaxed by the pool. Only down side is that the pool area is fairly small and was always crowded with screaming kids. The location is great, right across the street from Disney. Numerous restaurants and shops within walking distance. Would definitely stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for this lovely review, Jayson. We're delighted to hear that your children enjoyed our waterpark and that you found our rooms comfortably sized for your family's vacation. We know how important comfort is while traveling. Should your vacation needs bring you back to our area in the future, we hope to have the opportunity to serve you once again.

Summary: This hotel turned out to be a fine place for our family vacation in Anaheim. The staff here are super friendly and the rooms and hotel were clean. The water park is a bonus, especially for those with young kids. Adults traveling without kids might find the pool area a bit annoying as some parents don't supervise they children very well. The hotel dining area has good food and a Starbucks for coffee. The food is good but there are less expensive food options nearby. But overall, this is a great place close to Disney. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice hotel but things disappear from your room! I had an item of clothing that I very much loved that disappeared I only realised when I went to pack to come home... when I informed reception they said I must of taken it out or I'd find it when I went home!... boiling hot every day I definitely had no need for my jacket.. as I said nice hotel but PLEASE lock your bags.   I usually stay at the Howard Johnson across the road and it always has been fabulous I've never had any issues and for the money I think I'll be going back there in future. I just thought I'd treat myself to the better hotel.. won't be doing that again.
Manager Response: Dear mpmt123:  Thank you for staying as our guest and thank you for your review. I apologize that we were unsuccessful in finding your garment. We did conduct a thorough investigation and interviewed all the staff members who serviced your room. I have high confidence in my staff, we find thousands of items each year (many high value items such as personal electronics, wallets, and cash) and log them into our lost and found system. We do place investigation notes into each person's file in the few instances where an item is reported lost but not found so that we can see if a pattern develops. I hope that you will contact your transportation providers and any other hotels you visited to see if they have found your lost garment. The Anaheim Howard Johnson is a great hotel and we are glad you have enjoyed your visits there. Our company owns and operates both hotels (I was general manager of that hotel for many years). Both hotels have great reputations and practices concerning protection of our guests' possessions. Please contact me if I can be of additional assistance to you.

Summary: This hotel has quickly become our 'go-to' Disneyland hotel for us and the kids; and for good reason!  The hotel is great - modern, maintained, clean, and with great amenities (the Water Park is incredible for the little ones).  Plus the location is optimal with a few restaurants and the park entrance less than a 10 minutes walk.  The rooms are just as good.  Very clean and well kept, great beds (and bunk beds for the kids), and some nice in-room perks such as Netflix smart TV in-room.  Lastly, the staff are great!  Always well staffed, and friendly!  Highly recommend!  I know we'll be back!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Couldn't have asked for a better hotel! Family friendly in every way. Fabulous, very clean and well maintenance water park. Bunk beds in the rooms for the kiddies. Shower/tub combo and stand in shower stall. Lots of space for the kids to dance around in the room(and we were in a standard room). Table and booth type seats in every room. Starbucks coffee shop in the lobby. Lots of great restaurants in walking distance. Friendly, helpful staff. A 5 minute walk to the gates of Disney! Best hotel on the block in my opinion!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us this wonderful review. We're delighted to hear you found our guest rooms spacious and our location convenient for your stay. We're especially happy to hear our staff left such a positive impact on your experience. Should your travels bring you back to the area, we hope you'll return for another stay.

Summary: The final stop on our California family vacation was Anaheim. We wanted a hotel that was walking distance from Disneyland, close restaurants, bunk beds, and a pool with water slides. This hotel had all of these and based on reviews from Trip Advisor, we decided to book this hotel.  Our first impression of the hotel was WOW! The kids could see the waterpark from the parking lot so they were pumped. We were immediately greeted by hotel staff who assisted us with our luggage. Check in was a breeze and we were in our room in less than 15 mins. We booked a Disneyland view room with a separate bunk bed room and a king size bed.   The room was excellent and super clean. Exactly what we wanted for our first trip to Disney. The bathroom has 2 showers and dual sinks. Great for our family
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very pleased with our stay at this hotel! We chose it due to its convenient location to Disneyland - the entrance is right across the street so only a few minutes walk away!  Lots of places to eat around the hotel too. We have 3 young kids and arrived at lunchtime so spent our first afternoon at the hotel's waterpark (a welcome relief in the LA heat). The pool is small but the kids didn't care and loved everything about this waterpark. The Disney fireworks were close enough for a good view from the hotel's outdoor patio (our room overlooked the waterpark but for a little extra you can book a room overlooking the park and enjoy the fireworks from your room). The room was clean and spacious (2 queen beds and twin bunk beds) with bar fridge, microwave and large bathroom. Staff were
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review with us! We're thrilled that you loved our guest rooms, convenient location, and outstanding service. We especially love hearing that your children enjoyed our pool and play area. We try to keep our parking costs in line with other area properties, and we appreciate your feedback. Thank you again for your valuable review, and we hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: The hotel is conveniently located within a five minute walk to the park entrances. Freeway is close and many dining options are on the same street. McDonald's, IHOP, Cheesecake Factory, And many other options.  The water park is great for kids, waterslides of all sizes. The pool is a bit small.  No in room dining options unfortunately. Customer service is good, everyone was helpful and friendly. Room was adequately clean.  The balcony door did not open, would have been nice to be able to open the door.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate you sharing your feedback with us after your recent stay in Anaheim. We're delighted that you loved our location and water play area, and we thank you for the information about the balcony door in your room. Should your travels ever bring you back to the area, we hope to have the opportunity to provide you with a five-star stay in every way.

Summary: We stayed for 4 nights at this hotel and LOVED it! We typically stay at the Deluxe Disney resorts at Walt Disney World and this was just as clean and accomodating. I am VERY picky about hotels and this totally exceeded my expectations. Everything felt fresh and clean. We loved the space in the room and having two showers! This was the perfect home base for our visits to Disneyland, Downtown Disney, Laguna Beach and Long Beach. The walk to Disneyland is a breeze and it was great having a McDonald's on the way to stop for a quick breakfast! The staff at the hotel were super friendly as well.   My 3rd grader loved the waterslides. My hubby and I thought they were pretty fun too! It was cool looking across the street from the pool and seeing Disneyland right there!  The only
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review with us! We're thrilled that you loved our spacious guest rooms, convenient location, and outstanding service. We're happy to have been your home base during your trip to Disney. Thank you again for your valuable feedback, and we hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary Heading: No matter what, I will still choose this one
Summary: It is our first time visiting Disney land , first we pick this hotel for its location on the map( but found out more cheaper one , & closer to the park entrance ) like save 5-10 mins walk.. We enjoy the hotel sheets & my kid love the bunkbed experience ( you could sleep two on each bunk bed! Very comfortable ), plus two big nice sized big queen beds in the room!  All are plus , until the newly alarm system waking up horror for my kid every hours..  we could not sleep but the manager did a great job put us in the Fairfield next door at 3 am ... to have a better sleep ... then I look at that hotel , I realized we pick the right hotel , better sheets, no air conditioning noise, , clean comfortable!!!  Next day they refunded us the room price plus free coffee ... we know they did
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for taking time out of your day to share your valuable feedback with us regarding your recent stay. It's wonderful to hear that you found our guest rooms spacious and our location convenient. We do apologize for the alarms, but we're glad we were able to accommodate you. Thank you again, and we hope to welcome you back for a five-star experience in every way in the future.

Summary: I booked this property due to its proximity to Disneyland, the on site water park, and the promise of balcony views over the Disney fireworks.  The rooms were indeed spacious, modern, spotlessly clean and could easily accommodate 6 people (we were only 4 people but for the only time in our trip the kids had their own beds which was a bonus!).  The downside. The rooms did indeed have balconies.....but those balconies were completely unfurnished?!?! It was weird! I've never stayed in a property advertising balconies with views that lacked a table and a couple of chairs?! I would have loved to spend an hour or two watching the sun set over disneyland but without furniture it wasn't very inviting! We paid a premium for the balcony and it wasn't worth the cost.   The water park was a
Manager Response: Thank you for your 4-star review! We're pleased to know that you enjoyed your stay with us and we appreciate your feedback regarding the balconies, waterpark, and pricing as well. We hope we have the chance to welcome you back again on your next visit!

Summary: Fun weekend making memories. This hotel has an awesome water park Pool area. The Ultimate Pool Party weekend!  A fun hotel if anyone is looking for something close to Disneyland. Our room balcony had a view of the fireworks.  Something our kids have never seen that late at Disneyland. Walk to downtown Disney for a special treat 🍭👙🎉☀️⛱🎀when I first booked the room and discussed details with Savanah from the booking hotline I was a little uneasy because of her harsh personality. This was a total contrast to everyone else we encountered at the hotel. From the wonderful valet ($20 a night, and you can come and go as often as you need), to the check in process and wonderful receptionists!  The lifeguards on duty were great always making sure people were staying safe and having a
Manager Response: We're delighted to read such a wonderful review! Thank you for taking the time to submit this feedback and share your wonderful experience with us. We're sorry to hear about your experience over the phone with your reservations representative, but we're glad our team was able to make your stay special. We appreciate your suggestions for the rooms as well! We hope to welcome you and your family back in the future.

Summary Heading: Whoever built this hotel has travelled with young kids!
Summary: Upon arriving at the the hotel, the valet gave our kids Mickey Mouse balloons. Check-In was fast and friendly. As a platinum member you get 400 points, treat in cafe and we got upgraded to a Disney view. Room is amazing. Kids just loved the bunk beds. It was also nice that they were in a separate area down the hall as this allowed us to watch tv/stay up later without disturbing the kids. The splash park is amazing! Pool is small, but there are 2 big slides and a section with 3-4 smaller slides. Kids loved it and we enjoyed having a cold beer while watching them have fun. No bar/restaurant at the splash park, however you could walk to the lobby and they would put it in a plastic cup for you. We were too tired to go out for dinner so we just grabbed some sandwhiches in the cafe
Manager Response: Thank you for such a wonderful review! We're very happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your time with us and we hope we have the chance to welcome you back on your next visit.

Summary Heading: Mostly Good Things to Say About This Hotel
Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 4 nights, based on the many great reviews for it.  I would say it mostly lived up to what everyone else is saying.  The hotel is new, modern, and clean, as it should be.  The service was good.  The staff are polite and..... good....  no one stood out or was excellent in any way.  Housekeeping was reliable and always left plenty of towels.  The kids loved the pool area and were not bothered by the EXTREMELY small pool (probably the smallest I have ever seen at a hotel).  There are two pretty cool water slides, a hot tub, a splash play area, and plenty of seating.  This is all on the second floor and is a very nice place to sit and watch the Disneyland fireworks.  I also thought the hotel felt really "quiet" on the inside, especially considering the
Manager Response: Dear brpinedo:  Thank you for staying with us and thank you for your review. I am very happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope you will give us the priviledge of hosting your next visit to the Disneyland Resort Area.   WiFi and Cellphone service are a bit tricky in a hotel situation. The hotel provides the WiFi service and your cellphone service provider delivers your cell phone service. The hotel can't do much about poor cellphone service and in a busy destination near Disneyland you are competing with a lot of people for cellphone signal. We do suggest that you turn "WiFi Calling" on when you are in our hotel which will greatly improve your cellphone experience.  We do control the WiFi and provide free WiFi service at 10mbps upload/download speeds for up to 6 devices. Our paid service provides 25mbps upload/download service for up to 10 devices and our lobby WiFi provides 8mbps upload/dowload speeds. We do encourage you to contact the front desk or our WiFi service supoort team if you are having connectivity issues. As with most devices, sometimes powering off then on again will help.   In a hotel environment with lots of other hotels in the area, there are many conflicting WiFi signals as well as various device issues which can impede your service; our teams are trained to help you connect and it is well worth the call to ensure you get great connectivity. Please let me know if I can be of additional assistance to you.

Summary: Location: about 10mins walk to disneyland Room: good size for family Bathroom: 2sinks with separate shower and bath... very good for family. Only that it is fixed shower head, not with flexible hose. Food: bistro at lobby for breakfast/lunch, mimi's just outside the hotel and mcdonalds/paneca bread next door
Manager Response: Thank you very much for this kind, 5-star review, Chris! We're thrilled you enjoyed your stay. Please come back and visit us on your next trip!

Summary: My family stayed here during a recent trip to Disneyland. It is a great, family friendly option!  It is located right across the street from Disneyland, but it is a bit of a walk to get to the true entrance to the parks. The hotel staff was friendly and courteous. Also, the rooms are clean and spacious. The hotel even offers accommodations for six in the same room. The children enjoyed the water slides and we enjoyed the hot tub after long days in the park. The Courtyard exceeded my expectations!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The entrance to the happiest place on earth
Summary: They have some of the best beds I have ever slept on.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.  I asked for a few extra coffee pods (I really enjoyed their in room Keriq) and each day of our stay they gave us extra, extra coffee pods in a wide variety.  The Bistro was nice and served a variety of salads, sandwiches, and breakfast options a a good price.  They also served "Starbucks".
Manager Response: Thank you for such a kind review, Donna! We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope for the chance to welcome you again when you return.

Summary: We had to tear the kids away from the water play area to GO TO Disneyland!! We usually never play in the hotel pool but this one captured the kids and having an AP, thankfully we weren't in a rush to get to Disneyland.  Kudos to Courtyard for having plenty of TOWELS at the pool. It was super nice to not have to search for a towel.  And even though there weren't lifeguards at the pool, the attendants were noticeably around to help monitor the running and playing. The pool is really small and great for kids at 3.5 feet deep!  Only thing was there were some adults tossing their 3yo? about 7 feet up in the air to each other in the pool. That didn't seem safe to me especially with so many people in the pool. But the attendants didn't say anything. Guess adults tossing a kid like they
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have stayed at countless hotels (not to brag but I am kinda a big deal ;) this is the best hotel to stay with the family. The room is set up with a family in mind. Two queens, bunk bed, two showers, double sink, seating area....much more. Great, small but fun water park. Staff was fantastic.  Easy walk to Disneyland and California Adventure. What else do you need. Stay here and you will not be disappointed!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for such a great review and recommendation! We're thrilled you enjoyed your stay with us, from our location to our water park, and we hope to welcome you back in the future.

Summary Heading: No Need to go to Disneyland with this Hotel!
Summary: After spending a couple of days in Hermosa Beach, my family stayed at the Courtyard for one night and it was awesome!  It was a super hot weekend in So Cal and the water park on the 2nd floor was a great place to cool down.  Check in was quick.  Valet was super nice.  The room was one of the cleanest I've ever been in.  Even my kids socks were still clean after walking around in the room!  It would have been nice if the balcony had chairs but I understand why there weren't any.  Furniture could be a potential safety hazard with kids around.  We chose a Disney view room and it was perfect for viewing the fireworks.  There really was no need to go Disneyland with this hotel.  My kids didn't even notice that it was just across the street.  We did decide to go to a character
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at Courtyard Marriott Theme Park Entrance before Christmas and absolutely loved it! We were in Anaheim for quite a few days and wanted a good base for our family when we hit the parks. This hotel is awesome! We stayed in a balcony king room, that had bunk beds for our twins, a great view of Disneyland and perfect setting to watch the fireworks every night. I highly recommend getting this type of room if you can. The bathroom is spacious, a bath and a separate shower which is fab. The king size bed is lovely, the kids had a great view of the waterpark from their bedroom which they loved. The lobby has some kids activities too which occupies littles while you are talking to front desk. They have a Starbucks-type bistro in the lobby and a little market for groceries,
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review with us! We're thrilled that you loved our spacious guest rooms, convenient location, and outstanding service. We're happy you found our amenities perfect for your family's needs, and we can't wait to welcome you back again for your Easter vacation!

Summary: The rooms are really big, ours had 4 beds and two showers. The staff are amazing and the gift shop is packed, and the Marketplace is really handy as well. The food is amazing, especially the pizza!! We stayed in the fireworks view room and it was fantastic. Would definitely recommend
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is an awesome place to stay for family's. It is located perfectly in Anaheim. Staff are friendly and will answer any questions you have. The only thing I could fault with this hotel and it's minor are the prices in the market but don't let that put you off because I've stayed at few hotels in Anaheim and this one is by far the best. The 2 showers in the rooms are excellent and room and hotel are extremely clean staff put in a great effort in keeping this hotel beautiful and clean.
Manager Response: Brad, we're thrilled to read this review. We really appreciate our guests taking the time to review their stay and share it here for others to see. We do apprecate your feedback on pricing as well. We certainly hope to welcome you back on your next visit.

Summary Heading: Excellent family hotel - quality, value and comfort
Summary: I'm very pleased with this property.  It is totally tuned to families with young kids, is conveniently >900m from Disneyworld entrance and >500m from the I-5 freeway.  They have very friendly staff, excellent service and the beds are super comfy! We got a family room that included 2x queens and a bunk bed. Fortunately, we were situated on the 2nd floor, overlooking the splash pool and slides and having access to the gym. There is a small (super)Market downstairs where you can conveniently pick up last minute items such as shaving blades or tampons, beer and wine, soft drinks and sweet snacks. At the deli, the kitchen is open till late as some hungry visitors decide to stay at Disney till close.  The food is delicious and presented in very clean take away boxes, bagged for
Manager Response: none

Summary: We decided to visit Disneyland and just considering either we stay in theme park or some where nearby. Compared to Disneyland hotel, Courtyard was much cheaper and very accessible (7 mins walk to the main entrance). The hotel was spacious and they have a water park inside the hotel which we spent one morning there. Great for family and great for the kids.  The only downside was our room was facing the highway which was quite noisy at night.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We're happy to hear that you loved our spacious hotel, water park and family-friendly environment. We appreciate your feedback on the noise you experienced as well. We hope to welcome you back in the future!

Summary: I stayed at the Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance last month with my wife and daughter and we loved every second we were there! I wish we were still there!  Upon driving up to the entrance we were greeted by the valet who got to work right away helping us unload our car. The valet walked us into the lobby where the great hospitality continued.   My daughter was tired from the long trip (flying from Japan) but thankfully the front desk staff got us checked in in a timely manner so that we could settle it. But before headed up to our room, Randle gave my daughter a little present to welcome us. It certainly cheered her up. Thanks Randale!  The room was amazing! HUGE! Spacious for the little one to run around, a nice eating area to enjoy breakfast with the family, great storage
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel delivered very well on our needs.  We picked this hotel because of the waterslides, pool and spray pads.  With a special needs child, we knew that Disneylad would be an intense sensory experience for him each day and the pools and spray pads were a nice retreat from the heat, crowd and noise. The hotel is fairly new; perhaps less than 2 years so the condition of the rooms and amenities was very modern, neat and clean. All of our interactions with staff were pleasant and efficient.  Because our son took naps in the early afternoon, we called the front desk early in the day to ask that they clean our room in late afternoon.  They were very amenable to our request. The room was not luxurious, but it was tidy and comfortable.  The bunk beds were fun.  For the rate, it
Manager Response: We're delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It was our pleasure to accommodate your family's needs. Thank you for taking the time to leave this generous review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Really nice furnishings. Great location to walk to Disneyland. The water park is really nice break for the kids. Great room for families. 2 queen beds a bunk bead. Corner table with bench great to eat at or kids can play. Bathroom was great with 2 showers so we could get ready faster. Highly recommend for families.
Manager Response: none

Summary: While on the pricy end for a Courtyard, we found the hotel to be comfortable, clean, and right next to the theme park - which somewhat justifies the cost.  I knew exactly what to expect since the photos present an accurate idea of what the property looks like. Waterslides were a bonus that my kids enjoyed immensely. Also a great view of the fireworks from the waterfall deck. Valet parking service was very fast. Overall this was a good experience, we would stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband & I spent 2 night there we were given a large family suite with a separate bathroom which was fabulous ideal for a family, staff all helpful at the front desk Location was also great as we just walked out and Disneyland & Down Town Disney practically across the road everything was in walking distance. I would highly recommend
Manager Response: Thank you for your generous review! We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed ours taff and service as well as our convenient location. We hope to welcome you again soon for another brilliant stay.

Summary Heading: fantastic hotel, clean, good pool and awesome location, right across the street from disney
Summary: Stayed here for three nights at the end of June and it was fab. Room right next to the pool and it was a great size for the four of us, two kids that were so excited that Disney is right across the street!! very clean.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A Perfect, Outstanding, Affordable Hotel for families visiting Disneyland!
Summary: I had originally booked the Hilton Anaheim.  I wasn't totally convinced about staying there only due to its location and walking distance from the parks.  With 2 children ages 5 & 7 I knew that walking wasn't going to cut it for the 3 nights we were going to be there as it's a 20 min or so walk.  I am extremely fussy about where I stay on vacation. Comfortable bedding, cleanliness and fresh smelling rooms without that typical hotel odour is a must for me.  The hotels/inns directly opposite Disney Boulevard didn't appeal to me for that reason.  So I googled new hotels in Disneyland and this oustanding property came up.   This hotel is only a short walk from Disneyland, we timed it, literally took us  7 mins, if we didn't stop anywhere along the way.   The hotel is EXACTLY how you
Manager Response: Thank you for your generous review!

Summary: My family of 5 stayed 3 days here in Dec16 for our trip to Disneyland Anaheim. Checked in was smooth and fast. The hotel has been newly refurbished so it looks really new and clean. We had the 2 Queen with Waterpark view room. The room was pretty spacious for my family of 5 (4 adults and a 7-year-old) and we also have a partial view of Disneyland from the small balcony.   The hotel has a mini waterpark together with a baby pool, jacuzzi pool and a small normal swimming pool. The water in the jacuzzi and slides are heated which is really nice on a cold day. Staff in the hotel are very friendly and helpful also. The is a small convenience shop just beside the reception. Though convenient, prices are slightly more expensive. You can also get the Disneyland tickets from the
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our family of 5 fit great for the 4 nights we were here. The bunk beds were super popular with our kids. We were only on the 2nd floor, but we faced Disneyland and were able to see the fireworks from our porch. The corner booth area was perfect for pizza after the park.  I also loved the extra shower. The water park was also super fun, and my kids loved it. I actually had to do laundry one day while my husband took my kids to the water park area, which they loved. They have laundry areas on the 3rd and 5th floor, and they take quarters and not cards. They do have a tv in the laundry area, though. There were also games and books in the lobby you could borrow if you had any time to do so. The only negatives I found were that the hotel only offers valet with no self park, which was
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to submit such a great review, Amy! We appreciate your feedback and hope we have the chance to welcome you and your family back again on your next visit.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel for Family of Four!
Summary: This hotel was excellent. We wanted to stay near Disneyland without paying the price of a park hotel. The distance to the park entrance was a fairly short walk, and the room was VERY clean and spacious. I liked the fact that our girls could sleep in the bunk beds. I will also say the queen beds were probably the one of the most comfortable beds I've ever experienced. I slept well every night, which rarely happens! We took full advantage of having a nice place to rest in the afternoons for a bit before heading back into one of the parks for more fun. We were excited about having two showers, but even during our 4 nights, we never took advantage of showering at the same time. The water park was also a nice thing to have.  The staff was super friendly, and always greeted us with a
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great place to stay with a family!
Summary: Room was fantastic!  It comfortably slept all 5 of us (2 adults + 3 children).  Bunkbeds were awesome for the kids and the mini waterpark at the hotel was a huge hit!  Kids loved it and it was a big hit when we wanted to take a break from the theme park.
Manager Response: Thank you for this wonderful review! We're thrilled you and your family enjoyed all the hotel has to offer. We appreciate you sharing your feedback here and we hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: This is a fun, fresh and friendly hotel.  The rooms are fairly spacious and the bunk beds are convenient.  The layout of the bathroom is also family friendly with separate doors for the shower and the toilet!!  People can still be brushing their teeth and using the sink while others are showering - this is genius!!  The guest room appeared clean. However, it lacked a sense of luxury. The lobby is welcoming and also family friendly with casual seating and games.  We grabbed coffee and a breakfast sandwich on our way out the door.  It was on the expensive side for what you got.  I heard others were headed to McDonald's for breakfast which is conveniently located one parking lot over.  The walk to Disneyland entrance is super convenient as well.  We had nice interactions with the
Manager Response: none

Summary: The location of this hotel was fabulous and amenities were clean and safe. The bunk bed was a big hit with the children. Fireworks from pool area was also great for toddlers.  However this hotel has the potential to be fabulous but just isn't there yet. For example - when we arrived it took well over a hour and a half for the staff to bring our bags to the room. They mentioned to our children to go and enjoy the pool area but we had two toddlers looking out a window at the slides and pool area but could not go in because their bathers hadn't arrived. It took three phone calls and over a hour land a half later for the bags to arrive. On the second day we spent the day at Disneyland only to come back at night (around 10pm) and find our room hadn't been cleaned at all and therefore
Manager Response: Dear Sam P: Thank you for your review; I apologize for the problems you encountered during your stay. Our goal is 100% guest satisfaction and I truly regret that we let you down. I would like to further research your concerns and would greatly appreciate it if you would contact me so I can access your guest records so my team and I can find out what went wrong and prevent these issues from happening again. My e-mail is bill@anaheimcourtyard.com. Best regards, Bill

Summary: Staff is friendly and helpful. From the front desk staff, to valet, to bellmen...everyone was gracious, welcoming. Hotel is new, clean, well lit. Highly recommended! The pool/splash pad is great for kids. Rooms are spacious and clean.  Hotel is walking distance from Disneyland!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Vicki! From our staff to our water park, we're thrilled you loved it all. Thank you again and we hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Checked this via trip advisor before going to Disneyland.  Omg I can't say enough about the place.  New building fun water park for kids and families.  We had a two green with a set of bunk beds. For me, my daughter and granddaughter.  We absolutely love d the place.  Right across the street from Disneyland and a short two block walk to the main entrance.  Staff was wonderful , polite and helpful staff on every level.  Even housekeepers.  Whole hotel was very clean and new.  We loved our stay there not real noise anywhere.  If you want a fabulous place to stay this is it.  Loved it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderfully kind feedback! It's terrific to hear that you loved our family environment, staff and location. Your kind words made our day! We'll see you next time.

Summary: We found the hotel via a travel agent and were very impressed. With 3 kids the room configuration was a hit. Plenty of space and the waterpark was a great motivator for the kids to return home at the end of a big days at the park. The staff were friendly and always simile Ng and trying to impress. We will stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good- lobby and rooms are very nice. The separate shower and bath tub is nice if you have kids. Close walk to Disneyland and close to kid friendly food places. Water park is awesome, my kids loved it.  Bad- room did not get cleaned the second day we were there. I sent an email and they apologized but said that we were in the room when they tried to clean it, but we were out of the room and at Disneyland for about 13 hours that day, so I didn't really by that excuse. They also charged me $200 a day for parking, so I had to go down and fix that before check out.   Nice hotel but probably wouldn't stay there again. I always try and stay in nice hotels so I don't have to worry about the little things and you need a clean room with 2 kids and Disneyland all day. They did give me some
Manager Response: Dear dubseb:  Thank you for you booking your stay at our hotel and for posting a review. I am happy to know that your kids loved our waterpark and that our location was convenient for you. I apologize that we were unable to service your room on one day. On that day, the "Do not disturb" sign was left on your door knob during the day so our housekeeping team was not able to service your room. According to the door lock activity report, you did return to the room at 2:37pm in the afternoon. At 5:42pm you called the front desk to request housekeeping service at which time we stated that we only provide limited service after 5pm. At 6:08pm the night maid changed your room's bedding, emptied the trash, and provided new towels. I also apologize for the valet clerical error; we mistakenly entered an extra "0" on the valet charge which resulted in a $200.00 charge instead of a $20.00 charge. We corrected this upon notification but sincerely regret that you had to bring this to our attention. I appreciate your bringing these matters to my attention and will continue to work towards achieving 100% satisfaction. Please let me know if I can be of additional assistance to you.

Summary: I joined my daughter, son-in-law, and their two sons at this like new hotel located directly across the road from Disneyland for three days, June 10 – 13, 2017. We loved our stay and would definitely recommend this hotel, especially for families. This is such a family friendly hotel. All of the staff were outstanding and very accommodating. Our large room was perfect for the five of us; especially with the bunk beds for the kids. It was comfortable, clean, and with a large bathroom as well.  The onsite hotel water park was great too. The kids loved it. I almost think they liked it more than Disneyland. The Courtyard by Marriott Anaheim Theme Park Entrance hotel location is close to the entry of Disneyland and there are all kinds of restaurants around. We had great views of the
Manager Response: Thank you for your generous review! We're happy to hear you enjoyed our conveneient location and hope to welcome you again soon for another magical stay.

Summary: Fantastic hotel that is close to Disneyland.  Stayed at Paradise Pier Hotel the previous trip and this hotel is definitely better.  Bunk beds and dining area made the stay much better.  The layout of the hotel room was done very well. Plenty of space for extra luggage and stroller.  Waterpark was also better than Paradise Pier and something fun to do the day of arrival if not going to the park.  Dual sinks and dual showers were great.  The only suggestion for improvement was the hot water was only warm and not very hot.  This is not a deal breaker and we will be staying here the next time again!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel even better view from room
Summary: Great hotel and modern comfortable room and large balcony  Recommend paying the extra for disney view we had 606 on the top floor large room with separate bunk bed room and amazing view of the Matterhorn all the fireworks at night  Amazing hotel 3 nights only needed 5 to use the amazing water park fully.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review! We're thrilled that you loved our comfortable guest rooms as well as our amazing Disneyland views. We hope to welcome you back again soon so you can enjoy our water park even more!

Summary: Stayed four nights with our teen and tween in a room which was spacious and well thought out. There was plenty of room for everyone's luggage and all the things that come with staying with teens. The bathroom was designed so that the toilet and one of the showers could be in use while someone else used the sinks and other shower or tub, and there was a drying line over the tub - perfect for wet swimmers. The service was great and the staff helped me sort out a few issues (not relating to the hotel) for which I was grateful. The breakfast was reasonable and had some healthy choices which was great, although there was some confusion about what we ordered on two occasions. Fantastic location - we walked to Disneyland every day (twice one day) and there are some handy eating options
Manager Response: none

Summary: We loved this hotel! We stayed for 5 days and it was fabulous. It was clean and modern looking. Our room was a lot roomier than I thought it would be--great use of space. Loved that there were two showers. Super close to Disneyland--even after a long day at the park it didn't feel too far. The kids loved the waterpark! We also liked the food at the restaurant downstairs. And the menu prices weren't out of this world either.  The only thing we didn't like was the hassle of valet parking. We would prefer to self park. Other than that it was awesome. We will definitely be back! Awesome hotel!
Manager Response: We love hosting family vacations! Thank you for letting us know that we did a great job for yours. From our rooms to our location, it sounds like you truly loved it all. We appreciate all of your wonderful feedback and we hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary Heading: Fantastic place wouldn't stay anywhere else
Summary: We stayed here on a recommendation and I wouldn't stay anywhere else. When we come back we will definitely stay here, rooms were spacious and quiet and the staff fantastic.  Great location close to Disneyland and within walker distance to all the great places to eat.  I travel for work and this is one of the best places I have stayed at.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at this Courtyard at the gates of Disneyland and it was great!  We have adult children and did fine here but if you had young children it is perfect.  We had a suite with a king bed in s bedroom, a bunkbed room that slept 4, a living room with a two tables.  The bathroom had two showers.  We had just come from a beautiful elegant hotel and needed a less expensive place to sleep 6.  The staff was great, the location was great and it was less expensive than two rooms in most hotels.  Had a great gym and pool.  The pool area was designed for kids but it was a great place to recharge.
Manager Response: We're very happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us in our fantastic location! We appreciate you taking the time to leave this 5-star review, and we truly hope to welcome you back again on your next visit.

Summary: This courtyard is far better than the typical courtyard.  1.) it's location is so great. It's next to the house of mouse (Disneyland)  2.) it's next to a major highway  3.) it's well mixed with business travelers and tourist   4.) nice little waterpark on the second floor.  5.) very good seating area and gift shops.  6.) the rooms are well done.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was very quiet, clean, and great location.  The staff was very friendly.  The only negatives were that the sheets are not soft, and the wi-fi isn't secure.  The shower was very nice, and the bed very comfortable.  The room is good for families.  I highly recommend staying at this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for this 5-star review, Marjorie! We appreciate your recommendation as well as your feedback, and we look forward to hosting you again on your next visit!

Summary: Stay here for six nights with my family during this vacation to Disneyland. The location for the hotel is perfect for anyone going into Disneyland. The room was very nice to fit for family vacation. With great view of the park. And the hotel itself has a lot of amenities including a water park and laundry room. Perfect for long stay. The downside is this place is valet parking only.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is walking distance to Disneyland and when you need a break there is a water park to relieve you from the heat. Also, you can see the fireworks from the room balcony! Ask Paige or Shelby for the best views and the best rooms. You will be surprised how helpful they are.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! It's wonderful to hear that you think our hotel is just perfect for Anaheim family getaways. From our location to our water park, we're thrilled that you loved it all. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We had a fabulous stay at this hotel, after reading the great reviews I cancelled at a neighbouring property and booked here.  We arrived a little early, we were immediately greeted by the staff at the entrance.  The young lady who booked us in was very polite, helpful and engaging.  We were travelling with our daughter and grandchild, our room was perfect. Two beds plus the bunks gave us plenty of space.  Good storage space, little nook just inside the door fit the stroller perfectly, fridge and a proper seating area for eating. Very well thought out room.  This facility is very very clean, our room was very well looked after, plenty of towels and spotless.  The water park is a great feature, After a long day it was refreshing and a real treat which revived everyone to tackle
Manager Response: none

Summary: We just completed a rather excellent stay at this Courtyard Marriott.  Every single staff member that we encountered was extremely helpful, courteous, and professional.  The hotel is very warm and inviting and the rooms are just perfect!  We had a King Disney view and it was everything we needed.  Two bunk beds for our older kids plus plenty of room for a pack and play for the baby.  PLENTY of towels, PLENTY of space, we never felt crowded at all!  Housekeeping was great.  Waterpark was awesome, wish we could have enjoyed it a little more but it was slightly cool and we ran out of time.  I really do not have a negative thing to report.  My only concern would be the ability of this location to maintain the high level of quality and cleanliness after several years of wear and
Manager Response: Jessica, this is the type of review we strive to receive! We're thrilled you had such a wonderful time at our hotel and we cannot wait to deliver the same level of top-notch service to you and your family on your next visit. See you soon!

Summary: I am the third child in a family of 5 from Australia. We had a family holiday in which 6 other members came to Disneyland for a few days before we went on our way to other destinations. We chose this hotel for 3 nights. We have never been to a Marriot Hotel before and I haven't even heard of the name Marriot before this so I was excited.  We pulled up in our cab that we used to travel from the LAX to the hotel and were instantly greeted by about a billion staff members at the door. (Not really, but you know what I mean.) They were all extremely friendly and all looked very happy. We checked in only to realise that we were very early and our room wasn't ready yet. Thankfully, the lady that met us to check us in found a clean empty room near our desired room and she let us have
Manager Response: What a delight it was to read your review, Amy! Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We're so glad we could be your first Marriott experience and that it was such a positive one. From our world-class service to our cozy accommodations and amenities, it sounds like you truly enjoyed the visit and we couldn't be more thrilled. We hope your next Marriott stay is just as wonderful and we hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: I loved the proximity to Disney!  This is a located right across the street from Disney.  It's about a half a block walk to the property and probably a 10 minute walk to the actual gates of Disneyland/California Adventures.  Although it was a bit cool when we went, we did get a chance to visit the water park one day.  It's a nice place to let the kids run around and get rid of some energy.  There were three slides (two for big kids, one for small), a little 1 foot deep wading pool, a hot tub, a small pool and a structure to play on.  We enjoyed the bunk beds. The room was spacious despite the bunk beds. We got a great view of the fireworks from our partial view of Disney room.  I thought we would only be able to catch a glimpse of it , but we got to see the whole show.  Only
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at the Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park Entrance from 5/21/17 - 5/24/17.   We had a wonderful stay even if there were a few bumps.  1) This is a top notch Courtyard property.   The rooms are big and the property itself is in a great spot about 10 minutes walking from the front gates of both Disney parks.    2)  The rooms are modern, ours had a small patio overlooking the waterpark a bath/shower and a separate shower.   42" LCD tv / fridge / etc!    The bunk beds were a nice addition.  3) The waterpark was great - it is enclosed so the kids don't run away.   Well staffed and enough things to keep the kids busy.    They walked around one afternoon handing out little stuffed animal whales to all the kids!  4) Starbucks coffee on premises was a nice addition.  No breakfast
Manager Response: Thank you very much for this kind 5-star review, Eric! We are thrilled our team was able to make you comfortable during this inconvenience and that you enjoyed your stay with us. We certainly hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future for a flawless visit!

Summary: This is the perfect hotel for a family visit to Disneyland. We took our children and grandchildren to Disneyland and chose this hotel because of its close proximity to Disneyland. About a 7 minute walk from the park entrance it was easy to come and go especially if you cross the road and walk on the side where there are not many people.  The hotel is extremely well maintained, the rooms of a high standard, washing facilities  and staff who provide a high level of service. The little coffee shop downstairs serves reasonably priced meals and good coffee. Plenty of other eating options around the area. If you tire of Disneyland the hotel has its own waterpark which all of the kids enjoyed. Would go back again at anytime.
Manager Response: We're overjoyed to receive such a wonderful review, Doug! We're thrilled to hear that your children and grandchildren enjoyed our water park, and also to hear that our team went above and beyond to make you feel at home. We truly look forward to welcoming you back for another magical visit with us in the very near future.

Summary: This hotel is the perfect choice for Disney Vacations. It's a 5 minute walk from the Disney Entrance to the lobby. It's as close or closer than the hotels on Disney. Rooms and bathrooms are nicely equipped and spacious. The Water Park is an excellent additional attraction. The Staff from the valet to the lobby staff are truly first class. They really seems to care and keep a positive attitude even in the throws of being very busy.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I needed a hotel for a couple days while I was at a conference and a couple days at Disney. This was perfect because it was walkable to both and the kids had a water park to play in on the days we weren't doing Disney.   The room was nice. Fireworks were super loud every night- I guess I never realized that's a nightly thing at Disneyland but it is and it woke us up because we were in bed early. The food in the cafe was not very good but there are many options in the vicinity including a Panera next door and Mimi's in the parking lot.   The best was the pool area. Hours of fun for the kids. Would definitely return.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your experience with us, Anna! We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed our close proximity to the park, and that you had a chance to enjoy our water park. We truly look forward to welcoming you back for another magical stay in Anaheim.

Summary: We loved this hotel and would highly recommend it to anyone visiting Disneyland with a family. The rooms were really spacious with bunks for the kids and two large queen size beds. The bathroom was huge with a separate toilet which is a bonus with a family. We arrived on an overnight international flight at 9am expecting to have to store our bags until our room was ready, but the staff member offered for us to stay in an empty room until our room was available which was hugely appreciated. We had paid for a fireworks view room which we eventually moved to. The view of the fireworks was great, but both rooms were exactly the same so unless the fireworks are important to you either is a good choice. It was too chilly to use the water park in January but it looked like lots of fun
Manager Response: none

Summary: We just got back from a 4 night trip with a 2 1/2 year old. The hotel location is great, a quick 10 minute or less walk from the main gate of Disneyland, the location near Panera, Mimi's, and IHOP, Denny's etc was great. We loved having youtube in the room so our child could watch the baby tv programs he watches at home and the toddler water park was the best! It is more for younger ones as even the adult pool is small and shallow but for us this was a bonus! The hot tub was large and the jets good. All hotel staff except for one, was great and very friendly.  A couple minor areas were as follows: - I agree with the reviewers that say the beds are not so soft and the sheets are a bit rough. I understand there isn't much they can do about this but this is true, I've stayed at
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your thorough review with us. We're happy to hear that you enjoyed so many aspects of our property, from our prime location to our pool features. We appreciate your feedback about our beds and linens, as well as your comments about the restaurant hours, in-room tea and anniversary surprise we hoped you would enjoy. We will review your comments with our team internally and hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary Heading: Nice water slides, clean room, small (but adequate) pool - CONVENIENCE to DISNEY
Summary: The subject should say it all.  The waterslides were excellent. The room was clean and new - towels changed each day, although for some reason we did not get clean glasses in our room -after a few days that is just gross.  The pool was small but completely adequate.  Make no mistake about it this is a family hotel.  If you were staying here for Disneyland, then it is fantastic - you can walk to and from the park as many times a day as you need to.  Overall, this is a great choice in the Disneyland area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our family of four (2 adults, kids aged 8 and 6) stayed at this property for 6 nights at the beginning of May. We had a 6th floor standard room overlooking the waterpark. It took us ten minutes to walk to the security checkpoint at the park. The staff were friendly and very helpful. The room was thoughtfully designed for the way the hotel was primarily used - that is, for families visiting Disneyland Park. It was exactly what we needed. The kids were delighted to have bunk beds. They were sturdy and the top bunk had a good security railing - my wriggly 6 year old was safe and secure. With 2 queen beds as well, we had plenty of room to spread out. The bathroom had 2 showers and two sinks (one toilet), so our prep time in the morning was expedited and we had none of the usual
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to share your wonderful review with us! We're delighted to hear that your family enjoyed so many aspects of the visit. From our convenient location to our friendly staff, our cozy accommodations for families of all sizes to our many property features and amenities, it sounds like it was a truly special experience and we're so happy we could be a part of it. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Highly recommend this place especially for families.  Rooms are great for a family  of 5 (2 queens and a set of bunks) and we found the 2 showers (one over bath) particularly helpful in the mornings!  Pool area with heated slides and large outdoor spa were fabulous. Gym facility's great too.  The 10 min walk to Disneyland no problem for us and kids 16, 13 and 8 - even after 10 plus hours at the park!!  Lots of places for food within that 10 min walk, if you don't eat at their restaurant for breakfast or dinner.  Staff are exceptionally polite and welcoming. Can highly recommend and would definitely return.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Amazing Team That Understands Customer Service
Summary: Five star reviews are often skipped over so I'm going to do my best to make this review worthy of reading...because simply put...these guys deserve the attention.   I'll premise this review by stating that my stay here wasn't without flaw, it wasn't 100% perfect so my perspective doesn't come from a purely "lucky" standpoint.  We had issues with our keys not working and maintenance grumbling about the fact that theirs did work until they tried our keys. This was all at a point where our one year old came down with a flu bug and we were overwhelmingly anxious just to get in the room and rest. Again, I state this so that it is clear that anyone taking the time to read this review can understand  that the 5 star rating isn't a whimsical perspective... After 7 nights at this
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and hope you'll join us again for another magical experience!

Summary: This is a great hotel for families. We had a Fireworks view room with 2 queen beds as well as bunk beds and the room was clean, spacious and comfortable.  Traveling with young children we appreciated the proximity to McDonald's and Panera for quick easy meals. The waterpark was a big hit too. We would definitely consider staying there again on our annual Disneyland trip as it was an east walk to the Parks. We came back to the room each afternoon for a swim and a rest before enjoying the nightime activities at DLR.
Manager Response: Thank you for your generous review. We're elated to hear you enjoyed the fireworks and our convenient location. We hope you'll join us again for another brilliant stay.

Summary Heading: Great Place to stay with family.
Summary: I booked this hotel as there were not many places that offered 2 bedrooms - we have 3 children over the age of 10 and this gave us plenty of room.  We had our room which was large with a king bed and the kids had a room with 2 bunk beds - plus an additional lounge room.  These rooms do back onto the freeway so could be a little noisy but from the balcony in the main bedroom you could get a view of the fireworks. I had requested a higher floor room - and we were on the top floor (6th floor). We found the hotel very clean and tidy and service was excellent.  It was easy to get to Disneyland and there are many restaurants handy.  The waterpark was good for our younger 2 at the end of a hot busy day. The lobby shops offered the basics if needed and Starbucks coffee was good! The
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We're happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us and hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: We just stayed at this hotel and it was amazing, the staff was so friendly and the rooms are awesome. We loved the bunk beds!! The cherry on top was the awesome pool. the kids absolutely loved it it was a great way to relax after a long day at Disneyland!
Manager Response: What a wonderful review! Thank you for sharing such kind words with us. We are thrilled you and your family enjoyed your stay with us and we hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back during your next visit.

Summary: Excellent place to stay to visit Disneyland. The entrance was a five minute walk from the hotel which meant we could come back for a couple of hours to rest up mid afternoon before heading back out for the evening. Being able to see the fireworks from the room on a day we weren't in Disneyland was a big bonus as the fireworks were cancelled the next night due to wind.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The property is located 5 min walking from the entrance of the two Disney parks and that is a big plus - you don't want to walk after a long day at the park and this is just perfect. They have a Waterpark on level 2 and its a fun place for kids even after you have enjoyed in the parks all day long. The rooms are quite spacious, bright, airy and well furnished with a double bunk bed. The breakfast and dining options in the hotel is very basic and I was surprised that I could not get a coffee after 10 am at the Starbucks below. Luckily there is a Panera Bread and a McDonalds just outside the hotel. Parking is plenty. The room at $400 plus per night with no breakfast was on the higher side given that you end up spending 8-10 hours at the Disney Parks and I was disappointed that I
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to submit this 4-star review and for your recommendation! We're happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us at our great location and we appreciate your feedback regarding pricing and operating hours as well. We hope we have the chance to welcome you back again in the future!

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay and Great Service
Summary: We stayed in the Disney View rooms with balcony.  The view wasn't that great because of all the trees around Disney, but when there were fireworks we saw the show easily from the 5th floor!     Be sure to ask about the configuration of the room if you have kids.  All rooms have bunk beds, but the room with 2 queens  had the bunk beds in the same room.  The king room had bunk beds in a separate room.   All the rooms are big and VERY clean.  My husband didn't like the bed but I had no problem with it.  The sheets were stiff, which was weird.   They must have great insulation, because the rooms were very quiet!  The water in the bathroom wasn't very hot, presumably because they have kids stay there, but it would be nice to have a HOT bath. The service here is GREAT!  Front desk
Manager Response: none

Summary: Totally perfect stay! Near Disneyland and we ALL loved the waterpark inside! (From my 5 years old girl to my 60yrs. Old dad).  We didn't get to try the food so I can not tell u about it... but about everything else it was the perfect spot for our family vacation.   Definitelly would stay there again!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Alternative to the "In park" hotel options
Summary: My family of 6 had a 2 day Disneyland trip planned and we initially wanted to stay in one of the theme park hotels, but after doing some research The Courtyard turned out to be the better option.  While price was a major factor in the decision we also needed space to sleep 6 in one room with easy access to the park.  Upon check in you immediately felt like you were being welcomed and they were genuinely happy to see us.  Check in was a breeze and within 30 minutes we had our bags in the room, swim suits on and were in the water park playing.  The Waterpark - Such a huge bonus to have a space for the kids to play and parents can relax.  Only downside was there is no food or drink service in the pool area.  Although the store in the hotel was very well stocked and they provide
Manager Response: Thank you very much for this wonderful 5-star review! We're very happy that you and your family enjoyed your stay and that you were able to take advantage of our great location, water park and convenience of our room layout. We greatly appreciate you sharing your fantastic experience here, and we hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back again on your next visit.

Summary: I travel a lot for work and am used to staying at Marriotts of all levels. We chose this Courtyard for our Disneyland trip because of what staying at a Courtyard is typically like, plus the water park and proximity to the park. First, the water park and proximity to the park are absolutely all they're cracked up to be. That's the only reason I wasn't angry about staying there.   The rooms were disappointing. I've stayed at multiple Courtyards in probably 15 different states and normally love them. Soft, comfortable beds and clean rooms are about my only requirements. The rooms were clean but the bed was horrible. The mattress was fine but the sheets felt like sleeping on a tarp. After our first night I reached out and they informed me they were standard sheets. We requested to
Manager Response: Dear Honored Guest: Thank you for choosing our hotel and for your loyalty to Marriott hotels; we truly appreciate your feedback in hopes of improving our service and amenities. I sincerely apologize that our bed comfort did not meet your expectations. We purchase the standard Marriott sheets and we do not starch them; however, we do iron them. Anaheim has a high mineral content in its water which may be contributing to your dissatisfaction. I met with our laundry chemical provider today and we have decided to increase the softener which is added automatically to our laundry as a test to see if we can improve our bed comfort. Our current bed comfort score is 72.1 which is 3.5 points above the brand average but hopefully this change will increase the comfort for our guests. Thank you for your comments and for helping us improve our guest experience. We are also working on acquiring a full liquor license and hope to have this in place by this summer. I hope you will consider us for your next visit to Anaheim but we certainly recommend the Fairfield or Residence Inn as well. Best regards,

Summary: Amazing property! the customer service - the location- the décor - the waterpark - the gym. Everything was perfect.  There's a store in the hotel that has Disney items - park tickets are available too.   Walkable to Disney and multiple restaurants.  The fireworks are visible from the hotel - especially the pool and in front of Mimi's restaurant.
Manager Response: Perfection is what we strive for! Thank you for letting us know that we succeeded for your experience. We love hosting families for Disneyland getaways. The waterpark is always a hit with the little ones! Thank you again and we hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary Heading: Best place to stay at Disneyland
Summary: By far the best part of our Disney trip was the Courtyard Theme Park. The rooms are very nicely decorated and very comfortable for our family of 4. Could have easily housed 2 more little ones with the bunk bed that seems to be in most rooms. The water park was the hit for the boys as it was a nice break between park visits. The Mimi's cafe right outside the front door is a nice morning breakfast stop. Can't go wrong with this place!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your generous comments regarding your latest stay with us! We're honored to hear that we were the highlight of your visit to Anaheim, and that our water park was a major hit with your boys between park visits. We truly look forward to our next opportunity to welcome you back for yet another magical stay with your family.

Summary Heading: A Stay Your Kids Will Want To Repeat
Summary: Although we are a short drive from Disneyland, we thought it would be fun to stay at this Courtyard for a night with 4 of our grandkids.  We figured we could "play" at the hotel, and the park.  This is a nice hotel and our room had two queen beds, and two bunks.  It also had a nice corner seating unit with table.  The room has the typical furnishings, a very useable bathroom with separate shower and tub/shower, and a dual vanity.  This is clearly designed for families.  There is also ample closet space, and a useable desktop.  The facility has a workout room, a Bistro, a gift shop and a quick store for beverages, snacks, and the items you forgot to pack.  The standout feature is the water park.  There are two large ( one open and one enclosed ) slides, and two smaller ones.
Manager Response: We're overjoyed to hear that your family had an excellent stay with us! We're delighted that you had the opportunity to splash around in our water park and that your kids truly enjoyed the many features and climbing areas. It also pleases us to hear that our team went above and beyond to be courteous and helpful throughout your stay. Should you return to Anaheim, we look forward to welcoming you back for another five-star visit!

Summary: This hotel was clean, spacious, and fun to hang around in. It's perfect for when you go out for the day and come back to a comfy and clean bed. Our family stayed in a double with two bunk beds, the only problem that wouldn't make this 5 stars was the pillows, or the bed. Our family all woke up with bad neck aches from sleeping. But, the pool and jacuzzi were both wonderful in themselves and the fitness centre on the same floor was amazing, offering water, headphones and towels if you get a little sweaty! We could also directly look down and see the pool, and also from our view we could see the fireworks from Disneyland! Overall, I would highly recommend this hotel for a couple or family!
Manager Response: There's nothing more magical than a trip to Disneyland and we loved hosting you for yours! It's great to hear that our hotel was perfect for your family. However, we do believe comfort is key when traveling and we're sorry the beds and pillows weren't your favorite. We appreciate you letting us know and we hope to provide you with a perfectly comfortable stay next time!

Summary Heading: Amazing waterpark, close to Disneyland main entrance, large family room.
Summary: Our family of 5 stayed here in the large family room with two large beds and a set of bunk beds. Plenty of space and convenient amenities with room fridge, microwave, coffee maker and two showers. Room was very clean and beds were very comfortable. Staff were very welcoming and helpful, always smiling. The hotel waterpark is amazing with slides and water features, pool and hottub and lots of loungers and pool towels. Perfect for children of all ages and adults and a great way to cool down after long hours at the Disney parks across the road. Location is great, across the street from Disneyland, about a block walk down the street to the main gate area. Lots of restaurants in the immediate area including Mimi's Cafe in the parking lot, Panera Bread a few doors down, McDonalds etc.
Manager Response: Thank you for this wonderful review, we truly appreciate you sharing your experience! We're glad you enjoyed our great location as well as our waterpark, amenities and your dining experience. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit!

Summary Heading: Would be 5 star but let down by some easy fixes...
Summary: What left a sour taste for me was on leaving how they weren't really very helpful or accomodating. We are a family with 3 small kids including a baby and we have an 11.40pm flight home for 12 hours. We just needed an afternoon check out. They would only give us till 12.30pm then when I asked for a bit more, they said they were fully booked, even though she has just said I could pay a full night for a few extra hours!! I would be happy to have paid something extra but not a full night just for a couple of hours!   Room - large and great for a family. Waterpark - great for little ones and a break from Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to submit this review, we're glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us, including the rooms and our waterpark. We're sorry that we were unable to accommodate your request for a later checkout. We certainly hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back on your next visit for a flawless stay.

Summary: We stayed in the one bedroom queen suite with a bunk bed. The room was large and we were quite happy with the configuration of the bathroom. The six of us had plenty of room and weren't tripping over each other (hence, much less fighting). The staff were friendly, efficient and well-organized.   A big shout out for Matt, the manager, who went above and beyond. After an issue with dealing with the central reservation staff (who input the wrong dates when making a room-type change causing a room cancellation and potential loss of deposit), Matt was able to get us the suite we wanted for the dates we needed. It was a lot of work on his part organizing and juggling rooms over a month.  The water park was great for the kids. It was a nice break from the crowds and business of
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to submit this fantastic 5-star review, Barb! We are absolutely thrilled that you and your family enjoyed a comfortable stay with us, and we truly appreciate your detailed feedback and recommendation. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Great hotel, extremely friendly staff..loved our stay.
Summary: Great hotel, friendly staff with a very warm welcome. All the staff at the front desk were amazing, in particular Patrick who provided exceptional customer service. Would highly recommend this place to all families visiting Disneyland. Rooms were very clean & spacious, ideal for families of 5. Rooms consisted of bunk beds which the kids loved!
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review! We're delighted to hear that our team went above and beyond to assist you and that you found your rooms to be clean and spacious. We truly hope to welcome you back for another 5-star stay.

Summary Heading: Fantastic, New Property Right Near Disney
Summary: We stayed at the Courtyard Anaheim Theme Park hotel a few days before Christmas.  We ran into a few rainy days but still managed to have a great time!  First, the rooms are FANTASTIC for people with families or larger groups. I am not sure why more hotels do not use the bunkbed concept - this easily allowed our three young kids to fit in the room without feeling tight (we had 2 queens and a bunk bed).  Our older kids had fun sleeping on the bunk and the baby had plenty of space on her own bed.  The bathroom was also designed with families in mind with two separate showers - making post-Disney clean up much more efficient.  The hotel has a nice lobby area with a cafe - we grabbed coffee and breakfast there all mornings and it was good (pricey as can be expected).  The hotel is
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your wonderful review, Sara. We're so glad you enjoyed our accommodations, which were designed with families in mind! Despite the rain, it sounds like you enjoyed our property's great features like our waterpark and lobby. We hope to welcome you and your family again soon!

Summary Heading: AMAZING place for families within walking distance of Disneyland!
Summary: I came upon this place by recommendations from friends. I would have to say that this place is a gem! It's literally right across the street from Disneyland and a 10 minute maximum walk to the park. I was able to walk back and forth freely without too much planning or thought into transportation. The check-in process is pretty quick. The staff is very pleasant and helpful. Our room was a double queen with double twin. This type of room was the cheapest available booking option. If I had children, this would be a dream! There was plenty of space and bed space for sleeping humans. I was most impressed by the bathrooms- TWO SHOWERS! How often does that happen? It's very rare! The double shower definitely won me over. The hotel itself was in good shape, clean, and trendy in style.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! We're so glad your friends recommended our property to you so that you could experience the convenience of our location and spacious rooms. We're also thrilled our double showers made such an impression on you! We hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: This hotel was very clean, the service was nice, the restaurant & market were good to have right in the lobby.  The extra shower was nice to have as well.  The water slides and pool were fun, it was just a bit cool for us due to the time of year we stayed. It was short walk to the entrance of Disneyland, California Adventure & Downtown Disney.  Panera Bread & Mimi's Cafe were next door.  McDonalds was on your walk to the parks.  We will stay here anytime we visit Anaheim in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review! We're so happy to hear you enjoyed our property and its many features, including our restaurant and pool. We hope to welcome you back for another wonderful stay soon!

Summary Heading: Easy Access to Disneyland/California Adventure theme parks
Summary: Checked in around 10 PM - very friendly staff, everything was waiting for us. Onsite bistro was closed, but McDonalds and IHop (both 24 hrs) just a short walk away for a late night snack. Hotel is quite new, larger rooms accommodate at least 6, and probably more with a cot or two. (ours had 2 queens and a double bunk bed). Very clean and sound-proof - not disturbed at all. Bathroom to die for - huge walk in glass shower - separate door with toilet - plus bathtub also with shower. Large double sinks and lit mirror between the two.
